Lʼotar low a fɛŋ ekʼɛy a akr lʼok wɛl ɛtŋ lʼɛrm wɛl Jope.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af, ke ɛ́rmu nyahan a ekʼus ejagb a am titm Jope a, Piɛr uyu êl luw af pɛtɛ ab af Nyam ŋↄŋn eci. Ke lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ŋ̂,
ɛtŋ namn owʼr sos; eke wɛl am kok in ecʼob ij owi a, nʼam ɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
Lʼɛkn afr ekʼagbr ɛm ɛtŋ ob nyam anŋ ɛm am us es: ob ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af eke wɛl ucu ow ecʼɛnyɛmbri yar a ↄny es ke am is es wus.
Gbad ab af mindey ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ekʼɛli akr yar, lel ɛl eke bʼɛrir es wus wus, lele ↄr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ab anŋ ɛm.
Lebl nyam dad ninɛ: «Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!»
Gbɛkↄ Piɛr ↄdu eb dad ninɛ: «Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, mi kʼↄtum, aŋke lɛgŋ kaka mʼijm ob eke wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ekʼaylm ŋ eci any af a.»
Ɛmɛny lebl a ikŋn ɛm ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Kì lɛr ob yecʼeke Nyam ayal a ɛsɛ ob ekʼaylm af.»
Low a ɛy ↄkm kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ob a ɛwl mɛny im afr.
Piɛr am tutr low na eke lʼɛkn es ɛkn ɛm a e nyandrɛ. Kↄ wanci ab af, agŋ a eke Kↄrnɛy ɛrm a bi bibrm uw yogŋ eke Simↄ ecʼêl a kʼanŋ ab any, ɛtŋ sica -lʼow -lʼok lisany a.
-Nʼam ibrm -lʼɛsɛ: «Kↄ aŋa anake Simↄ Piɛr anŋ ab ee?»
Piɛr anŋ am tutr es ɛkn a e nyandrɛ, ɛtŋ Abŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Kin agŋ nyahan anŋ aŋa am ↄlʼŋ.
Ìgb, ùs es, ke ím ɛl ab; kì bɛbar aŋke ɛm mʼɛrm ɛl -lʼow.»
Piɛr us es im ɛŋn agŋ a ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: «Ɛm, ɛgŋ a ekʼam ↄↄl ab ana. Kↄ bla sosiɛm owr ee?»

-Li dad ninɛ: «Ɛy, ɛy ecʼanym ɛs Kↄrnɛy e nin ɛm sʼow. Lʼel nɛny nyam ɛs eke bʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛtŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ bʼawʼr. Nyam ecʼɛrm ɛs nyam ow dadʼr eke li kʼɛsŋʼŋ ow in ogŋ a, ke lʼíri yecʼa eke bʼow ↄny dadʼr a.»
Ɛtŋ sica Piɛr eb ok ɛl akŋ ncok a eci. Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, lʼus ejagb wɛl ab, ɛtŋ Jope ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ɛwlʼl.
Eke ɛmɛny lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, lʼɛy Sesare. Kↄrnɛy lel in ecʼakŋ ecʼagŋ a lele lawlɛl tasi eke lʼɛw abu ow a, anŋ ɛl ecʼeku ɛm.
Wanci ab af eke Piɛr am ow ɛy akŋ a, Kↄrnɛy igb ow ↄbrʼr ɛtŋ ok ↄwrↄkp wus in ecʼany af, ɛsŋn in ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
Kↄ Piɛr ↄny igbmʼn ɛtŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Ìgb, aŋke ɛm yɛji ɛgŋ cɛ mʼel.»
Ɛtŋ eke nʼam ot nɛnym Kↄrnɛy ab a, lʼɛy akŋ a; yogŋ, lʼɛkn agŋ nↄnↄ eke as luku.

Li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Uwr any eke Jwif eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ↄↄm abusu eke li kʼim lʼɛkn utu ɛgŋ oglog lʼɛy ow ecʼakŋ a. Kↄ ɛm, Nyam yɛgmʼm eke mi kʼócm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke aylm oglog ɛgŋ ekʼitm eke wɛl kʼim ɛkn af.
Na sosiɛm, eke ɛsŋnʼm a, mʼↄnym nɛny mʼocm es ɛtŋ mʼow. Sica mʼam erur eke mi kʼuw low a nuŋ af eke ɛsŋʼm ab any.»
Kↄrnɛy ↄdu eb dad ninɛ: «Ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan eke wanci nɛnɛ af ekʼel ncebles e wanci nyahan ɛm a eke mʼanŋ ɛm ogŋ a Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm a, kpru ɛm ɛgŋ nyam eke sus mob ekʼam jɛjn a inymʼm es anym.
Li dadʼm ninɛ: “Kↄrnɛy, Nyam iri ŋ e ŋↄŋn e lebl a ɛtŋ lʼijlm abu ɛlum ekʼↄŋ ↄgbↄru ab es.
Ɛ̀rm agŋ ím Jope ɛsŋ Simↄ Piɛr ow. Nʼanŋ ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Simↄ a ecʼêl ekʼanŋ okij nɛny ab ɛm.”
Kpɛkŋ mʼɛrm agŋ ow ɛsŋʼŋ ɛtŋ erur ow. Sica ɛy fɛŋ sʼanŋ aŋa Nyam ecʼany af eke si kʼiri ów a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ abulʼŋ eke ki dad ɛy a.»
Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Sica ow am okʼm es sos ɛm tasi eke njɛ Nyam am jɛjm agŋ es,
kↄ ɛb kaka fɛŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bʼↄny in ecʼɛlum ke bi kok low nyim nyim a, li bʼeb ow.
Nʼawŋ Israɛl ecʼagŋ in ecʼamani a: Amani Mamn a el ɛrm es ɛy a ekʼanŋ Jesu Krist a ekʼel agŋ fɛŋ ecʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ɛm.
Eke Jan ↄb kokoba ke ok agŋ mij nuŋ bake ow uwr a, low yecʼa eke ikŋ anym ɛy Galile toŋ ke eb Israɛl nimum ɛm a, uwr any.
Uwr elel eke Nyam ↄŋn Nasarɛt e Jesu in ecʼAbŋ Lala a lele abusu ab ab any. Uwr elel yɛjʼeke Jesu ɛcr wus nimum af kok ów amamn, ke ewlm agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ agn ecʼes ɛw ab ɛm a, aŋke Nyam anŋ in ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛy sʼij ów a fɛŋ eke li kok Jerusalɛm lele Israɛl wus af ab a e daŋku. Wɛl ɛwʼr olikŋ af ɛtŋ lʼuw,
gbɛkↄ eke ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Nyam ↄŋʼn nʼanŋ owr, ɛtŋ ow ↄŋʼn abusu eke li kʼɛlu sos ↄkm.
Ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ecʼany af lʼɛlum sos ↄkm, kↄ ɛy a cɛ eke Nyam ikŋ anym sↄsum ot ɛsɛ adaŋku af a ecʼany af. Eke Nyam igbmʼn agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm a, sʼij ɛtŋ sʼɛgŋ in ab.
Nʼↄŋ ɛy abusu eke si kʼↄb kokoba sʼok agŋ a, ke si dad eke in anake Nyam ɛwʼr eke li ki jɛj agŋ ekʼuw lel agŋ ekʼanŋ owr ab ab e low lʼok a.
Kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ dad in e low ekʼɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ekʼin ub ow nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ a e sikpl a in bʼow in ↄny oc ap ow e nin a ecʼabusu ab ɛm.»
Eke Piɛr odad anŋ nɛnym kʼuwrm a, Abŋ Lala us es agŋ a fɛŋ eke am iri in ecʼodad ab af.
Ɔmn ɛsɛl a ekʼel Jwifɛl ke igŋ Piɛr ab ow a, low am iti any eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ Lala a eke bʼↄŋ agŋ a, kʼim ɛŋn agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a.
Tasi ɛm a, -nʼam iri wɛl am dad sodad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am kↄklm Nyam e sagb a. Ow sosiɛm Piɛr dad ninɛ:
«Kↄ wɛl ↄtu eke kʼɛdŋn agŋ amua mij ok nuŋ, sica eke -nʼɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af ab ee?»
Ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼok wɛl mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm. Ow e jam a, -lʼibrm eke Piɛr kʼanŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lel agŋ lisijimɛl a ekʼanŋ Jude ab ab iri ekʼagŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji ɛgŋ Nyam ecʼodad a eb.
Eke Piɛr ɛwl mɛny uyu ow Jerusalɛm a, Jwifɛl ekʼↄny ↄmn a
am okʼr ów af
dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛ̀ɛ́! Im ɛy agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a
ogŋ ɛtŋ ij ob ɛl ab!»
Ow sosiɛm, Piɛr otar low a ekʼɛy a akr mɛwl ɛm ok ɛl. Li dad ninɛ:

«Mʼanŋ Jope ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ eke mʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam a, mʼam ɛkn es. Mʼɛkn ob nyam ekʼam us es ow ɛŋnʼm, ob ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af ke wɛl cucu ow ecʼɛnyɛmbri yar a ↄny es, ke anŋ afr am us es toŋ ow titmʼm.
Mʼok any es mi lɛr lokm a ɛtŋ mʼɛkn mindey eke bʼɛli akr yar, akp ɛm ndey, mindey eke bʼɛrir es lele ↄr ab.
Ɛtŋ mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼam dadʼm ɛsɛ: “Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!”
Gbɛkↄ mi dad mʼɛsɛ: “Njaŋ o, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ! Aŋke lɛgŋ kaka ob e wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ekʼaylm ŋ ecʼany af a ɛymʼm nɛnym.”
Ɛmɛny lebl a anŋ afr ikŋ dad ninɛ: “Ob eke Nyam dad eke ow ayl a, ŋ, kì dad kʼɛsɛ ow aylm.”
Low a ɛy ɛbɛn ɛbɛn sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ob a ɛwl im afr.
Wanci ab af cɛ, agŋ nyahan ow ok êl a eke sʼanŋ ɛm a ogŋ; Sesare ɛb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛrm ɛl -lʼow ɛm eci.
Abŋ Lala dadʼm eke mi kʼim ɛl ab, ke bɛbar kʼánm ɛm ɛm. Agŋ lisijimɛl nↄhↄn na eke mʼot ab mʼow aŋa a, ɛwlʼm Sesare, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ sʼok Kↄrnɛy ecʼakŋ a.
Lʼotar elel eke lʼɛkan afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ekʼinym es in ecʼakŋ a, ke am dadʼr eke li kʼɛrm agŋ im Jope ɛsŋʼm mʼów,
mi dádʼr sodad eke bʼow el in lele in ecʼakŋ a nimum ab e sↄg eci.
Mʼↄb nuŋ mʼam dad ɛl odad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Abŋ Lala us ɛl es af ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji lʼus ɛy es af nuŋ ↄb ɛm ab af.
Kpɛkŋ mʼↄkn low yecʼa eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad a: “Jan ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, kↄ ↄny, wɛl bʼow ok ↄny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.”
Ɛl yɛji Nyam ↄŋ ɛl ob ap nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke nʼↄŋ ɛy lɛgŋ a eke sʼub Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist nawrɛ a: sica bwo elʼm eke mi kʼɛdŋn Nyam, low yecʼeke lʼerur eke li ki kok ab ee?»
Eke sica -lʼirir sodad amua bake ow uwr a, -nʼↄny ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ -li kↄklm Nyam -li dad ninɛ: «Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam ↄŋ agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji abusu eke kʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ɛ́ŋn owr anŋ tasi a.»
Etiɛn ekʼuw oc es e gbre ijr ekʼɛy a, ↄŋ ↄmn ɛsɛl a ↄmu es; ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb im toŋ ok Fenisi, Sipr lele Antiↄs
ɛb ɛm ab, gbɛkↄ agŋ ekʼel Jwifɛl a sↄny cɛ -nʼam dad Nyam ecʼodad a -lʼok.
Kↄ ↄmn ɛsɛl bɛb ekʼel Sipr lele Sirɛn ɛb ɛm ecʼa, ow ok Antiↄs, ɛtŋ dad agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e lís ecʼAmani Mamn a ecʼodad.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼabusu a anŋ ɛl ab, ow ↄŋ agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ itŋn ɛrm ɛm el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci.
Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ecʼagŋ a iri low na ɛtŋ -lʼɛrm Barnabas im Antiↄs.
Eke nʼim lʼɛy yogŋ ke lʼɛkn elel eke Nyam eci bibm a kokr ↄmn ɛsɛl a, sos ɛm iŋnʼn ɛtŋ lʼatr wɛl sos es eke wɛl kʼↄny ɛrm susu, úcu Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄny es.
Tasi ɛm a, Barnabas el ɛgŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn eke Abŋ Lala lele ↄmn ab iy ɛm gbↄŋ. Agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl ɛgŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ owi eb.
Ow ↄŋ Barnabas im Tars eke kʼɛsŋ Sↄl.
Eke nʼɛŋn ow a, lʼoc ow ab lʼɛwl lʼow Antiↄs. -Nʼanŋ yogŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm ɛl yony mum toŋ lakpo mum, ɛtŋ -li yɛgm agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl low. Antiↄs ɛb ɛm anake wɛl ↄg es ɛsŋ jam ɛsɛl a “kretiɛnɛl a”.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl anŋ Jerusalɛm ow Antiↄs.
Abŋ Lala nyimn ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Agabus
ɛtŋ am ↄb amani dad eke owʼn kʼow in ibnm ɛtŋ lek ligbɛl in bʼow in ɛy wus na nimum af. (Lek a ɛy tasi, lakpo ab af eke Klod el Sesar a.)
Ow ↄŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɛgŋ eb eke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ kʼↄŋ yecʼa eke nʼↄny ow ecʼabusu a, yecʼa ekʼↄtu eke kʼɛlum lisijimɛl ekʼanŋ Jude a abu a.
-Li kok ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ -lʼoc abu ɛlum a -nʼↄŋ Barnabas lele Sↄl ab oc im ↄŋ Jude wus af e Nyamel a ecʼagŋ ekpekp a.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ɛb ebu Erↄd Agripa am ijr Nyamel ecʼagŋ nyam nyam gbre.
Nʼↄŋ wɛl ibi Jak ekʼel Jan lisijim a lab ler ɛm ɛm.

Sica eke lʼɛkn ekʼow akpl Jwifɛl a sos ɛm a, Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ecʼes gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm, nʼↄŋ wɛl ↄny Piɛr ɛlu sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ srↄda eyŋ eb yar yar sakp yar am ↄsu ow. Nʼↄny tutr eke li ki jɛj ow e low lʼok dedeku a ecʼany af eke Pak ecʼes gbɛgbl a bʼoc es.

Sica eke lʼɛkn ekʼow akpl Jwifɛl a sos ɛm a, Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ecʼes gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm, nʼↄŋ wɛl ↄny Piɛr ɛlu sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ srↄda eyŋ eb yar yar sakp yar am ↄsu ow. Nʼↄny tutr eke li ki jɛj ow e low lʼok dedeku a ecʼany af eke Pak ecʼes gbɛgbl a bʼoc es.
Kↄ eke Piɛr anŋ sobel ɛm a, Nyamel ecʼagŋ a am ŋↄŋn Nyam ↄŋʼn ↄmn ɛm tasi.
Ncok a eke lɛgŋ kʼɛny ke Erↄd jɛj in e low ok dedeku a ecʼany af a, Piɛr am ɛru mɛmn srↄda eyŋ yony ecʼaraŋn. Wɛl okʼr ŋgbraka yony ɛtŋ usu ↄsu ɛsɛl inym es, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in ecʼusu sobel lisany a.
Kpru ɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs nyam ilm any ɛtŋ usuayl ɛjn ok sobel akŋ a. Afr ɛrm ɛs a iyr Piɛr abu mɛnɛgb ɛm, uwrʼr ɛtŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Ìgb fafa!» Ŋgbraka a ekʼanŋʼn sabu a ɛr ok wus.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dadʼr ninɛ: «Sùs ŋ e mob a,
ke ók ŋ e cↄkrukpↄ a.» Piɛr ɛlumʼn ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a igŋ af dad ninɛ: «Sùs ŋ e mob af ɛw a ke úsʼm jam.»
Piɛr igŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ugŋ ɛy ↄkm sobel ab ɛm. Li kʼↄnym ↄmn eke low a eke afr ɛrm ɛs a am kok a kʼel nawrɛ tasi: nʼam tutr eke ow el es ɛkn ɛm.

-Lʼafŋ krɛkrɛ ecʼusu ↄsu usu ab es, yony ɛm ecʼa yɛji ɛtŋ -nʼim -lʼok lowi lisany a ekʼↄkŋ baŋn ab any a ogŋ. Ɛl ecʼany af lisany a fig in obi ɛtŋ -lʼok ↄkm. -Nʼim -lʼok ɛbɛrŋ nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kpru ɛm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛluʼl es.

Sica low a ekʼɛy a ok Piɛr es sos ɛm ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: «Ca gbɛ, mʼam ɛkn ekʼow el nawrɛ tasi: Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ anake ↄŋ in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs ow eb ɛluʼm es Erↄd ecʼabusu ab ɛm eke mʼanŋ lele Jwifɛl e low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ekʼam tutr eke ki kok ɛm e lís ab ab a.»
Sica eke ow okʼr es sos ɛm a, nʼim Mari ekʼel Jan Mark lis ecʼakŋ a. Yogŋ agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl as luku anŋ Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm.
Piɛr cicm lisany abu, ɛtŋ akŋ juma kok lis nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Rod igb ow eke ki figʼr lisany a.
Eke lʼiri lebl a ke lʼuw any ekʼow el Piɛr a, sos ɛm iŋnʼn toŋ lʼijl es eke li ki fig ow lisany a, kↄ lʼuru es nʼim li dad agŋ a eke Piɛr in anŋ lisany.
-Li dad ow ninɛ: «Nuŋ ɛm am uŋʼŋ!» Kↄ nɛny am atʼr es eke ow el low nawrɛ tasi. Ɛtŋ -li dad -lʼusr af ninɛ: «Ɛbɛn ke in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs ana.»
Ɛbɛn yɛji Piɛr abu anŋ ɛm am cicm lisany a abu. Eke sica -li figr lisany a, -lʼɛkn ow ɛtŋ ow ɛw ɛl any iti.
Li tat wɛl abu eke wɛl ki yewal ɛtŋ lʼotar elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄny ɛluʼl ↄkm sobel ab ɛm a e low akr lʼok wɛl. Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: «Dàdr low a okr Jak
lel agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab.» Ɛtŋ lʼɛy ↄkm lʼeb ejagb nʼim usu ɛjeci.
Sica eke usu ot es a, bↄbar ligbɛl ɛy srↄda eyŋ a ecʼaraŋn ɛtŋ -nʼam ibrm ɛl sosi low yecʼekʼɛŋn Piɛr a.
Erↄd ↄŋ wɛl ↄl Piɛr es, kↄ wɛl ɛŋnmʼn. Li bibrm usu ↄsu ɛsɛl a low ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼibi ɛl.
Ow e jam a, nʼanŋ Jude nʼim Sesare ɛtŋ yogŋ nʼanŋ sɛgŋ bɛb.

Sica lɛgŋ nyam Erↄd ↄny ɛrm bebl ligbɛl Tir baŋn eyŋ lele Sidↄn baŋn eyŋ ab e lís. Baŋn a yony mum nɛny okr af eke kʼim ɛknʼn. In e saw ecʼɛgŋ ekʼel Blastus ɛm -lʼɛcr -nʼim -lʼibrm Erↄd eke ɛrm es ɛy kʼanŋ, aŋke ɛl e baŋn a yony mum bʼↄl ob ij ɛb ebu ecʼɛb ab ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ɛw a ow a, Erↄd sus in ecʼɛb es ɛw ɛs e mob sus ɛm a, li sig es ɛb ebu e lɛkpn af ɛtŋ nʼam dad wɛl ów dedeku ɛm.
Dedeku a ↄg dad ninɛ: «Na nyàm anake am dad odad a, kↄ ow elm ɛgŋ.»
Kↄ, kpru ɛm, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs nyam kok Erↄd low, aŋke anygbɛl a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa lʼɛgŋm nʼↄↄm ow, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ bɛb bʼɛc a sisŋ ijʼr lʼuw.
Nyam ecʼodad a gbɛ am eb es obn.
Eke Barnabas lele Sↄl ab uwar ɛl e juma Jerusalɛm a, -lʼoc Jan Mark -lʼɛwl mɛny ab -nʼim Antiↄs.

Antiↄs e Nyamel ab ɛm, kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl lele low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ekʼanŋ a ecʼen el: Barnabas, Simeↄn (eke wɛl igŋ nin af Nijɛr), Lusius (Sirɛn baŋn iy), Manayɛn (ekʼel Galile ecʼes ɛw ɛs Erↄd Antipas e mew ɛm e lawl), lele Sↄl ab.
Lɛgŋ nyam, eke -nʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam ke -nʼam ɛnŋ nɛny a, Abŋ Lala dad ɛl ninɛ: «Òcr Barnabas lele Sↄl ab ɛwr saw yecʼɛtŋ ke -li kok juma a eke mʼɛsŋ ɛl ow ecʼa.»
Ow sosiɛm, eke -nʼɛnŋn nɛny, -ni ŋↄŋan Nyam toŋ ke ow uwr a, -lʼat Barnabas lele Sↄl ab abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -nʼↄŋ wɛl abusu wɛl im.
EkʼAbŋ Lala ɛrm Barnabas lele Sↄl ab a, -nʼim -lʼok Selesi baŋn ɛtŋ yogŋ, -lʼeb mijɛtŋ -nʼim Sipr lekr ɛm.
Eke -nʼimn -lʼokr Salamin baŋn a, -nʼam dad Nyam odad Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a. Jan Mark yɛji anŋ ɛl ab ɛl eci abu ɛlum eci.
-Lʼubr lekr a kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -lʼok Pafↄs ekʼanŋ nuŋ a. Yogŋ, -nʼɛŋn cam ɛs nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Bar Jesu; lʼel Jwif nyam eke bʼocr in sosi kokoba ↄb ɛs.
Lʼir Sɛrgius Polus, lekr a ecʼes ɛw ɛs ekʼel nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛs a ogŋ. Nʼↄŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Barnabas lele Sↄl ab aŋke lʼerur eke li kʼiri Nyam odad.
Gbɛkↄ cam ɛs eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Grɛk ɛm Elimas a bʼatar Barnabas lele Sↄl ab ów es ɛtŋ am ↄl eke kʼirmn es ɛw ɛs a ecʼↄmn a eke kʼↄny a.
Sↄl eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Pↄl yɛji,
ke Abŋ Lala iy ɛm a, ↄkŋ cam ɛs ab any
ɛtŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Yadŋ gbɛl ɛs eke low ŋuŋ kok eb sos! Agn e liy! Low mamn fɛŋ ecʼifnu! Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼów amamn a eke bɛbm ok es a, bʼↄl eke kʼↄny wuwal. Kↄ kʼow walm ow e low ɛlum es ee?
Sica ìri gↄŋ: Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow efalʼŋ any ɛtŋ kʼow ɛknm ligbn ecʼusuayl a sɛgŋ bɛb.» Kpɛkŋ Elimas any efl ɛtŋ anŋ ncebn ɛm; nʼam bↄbrm lʼↄl ɛgŋ eke kʼↄnyʼn abu.
Eke es ɛw ɛs ɛkn low a ekʼɛy a, lʼub nawrɛ ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e lís e low yɛgm a okʼr es sos ɛm nↄnↄ.
Sica Pↄl lele agŋ a ekʼam usʼr jam ab ab eb mijɛtŋ Pafↄs nanu ɛtŋ im ok Pɛrj, Panfili wus af. Ɛtŋ Jan Mark ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ ɛwl im Jerusalɛm.
Ɛl gbɛ, -lʼigŋ Pɛrj -lʼus ejagb kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -nʼim -lʼok Pisidi wus af ecʼAntiↄs a. Eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ow a, -lʼok Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a -lʼok es.

Eke wɛl awl lɛl ol e silɛl ab ɛm lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ecʼab ɛm uwr a, Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a ↄŋ ɛgŋ im dad ɛl ninɛ: «Agŋ lisijimɛl, ekʼↄnyn ów ↄm ecʼodad eke ki dadr atar dedeku a sos es, ke ↄtur eke ki dadr gↄŋ.»
Pↄl igb tat ɛl abu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Israɛl ecʼagŋ lele ↄny ekʼelmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ecʼa, ìgŋn lↄru es irir!
Nyam ekʼel Israɛl ecʼagŋ a e Nyam a sↄsum ɛy lagŋɛl ot. Nʼɛnyn agŋ amua lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke -lʼiir etuɛb Ejipt wus af a. Ɛtŋ in e lɛc ab ɛm nʼↄny lʼot wɛl es Ejipt.
Loj yogŋ, nʼↄnym wɛl ab ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
Kana wus af a, ni ŋuŋn ɛb lↄbŋ ɛtŋ lʼoc wɛl eci wus a nʼↄŋ in ecʼagŋ a ɛsɛ ɛl ecʼaja ob cɛ af.
Ów amua fɛŋ ↄtu eke kʼij akpo duw akpo ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.
Low na bʼɛc a, nʼↄŋ ɛy lagŋɛl jɛj ok ɛsɛl toŋ ow ok kokoba ↄb ɛs Samiɛl e lɛgŋ ɛm a.
Sica -lʼibrm ɛb ebu nyam ɛtŋ Nyam ↄŋ ɛl Saul, Kis jim, Bɛnjamɛ ecʼeb ɛm ecʼɛgŋ ekʼɛw ɛb ab es ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
Eke sica Nyam igŋ Saul ɛlu es a, nʼↄŋ wɛl David ɛsɛ ɛb ebu af. Nʼam dad David e lís e low lʼɛsɛ:
David ecʼalaw ab ɛm e nyam el Jesu eke Nyam oc ɛw Israɛl eci Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke lʼɛwar lʼɛw es ab af.
Gbuŋ ke Jesu ów a, Jan dad Nyam odad ibrm ekʼIsraɛl ecʼagŋ a nimum kʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ók mij nuŋ.

Eke sica Jan am uwar in e juma a, nʼam dad lʼɛsɛ: “Kↄ ↄny, bwo ecʼɛgŋ am ocrʼm eke mʼel ee? Mʼelm ɛgŋ a ekʼam ekur a. Gbɛkↄ ìrir, ɛgŋ nyam anŋʼm jam am ow, ɛtŋ mʼitm bↄbↄ yɛji eke mi kʼↄny in e cↄkrukpↄ meb a mi mↄmuʼn es akr ɛm.”
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny ekʼeel Abraham ecʼalaw lele ↄny ekʼelmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ecʼa, ɛy fɛŋ anake wɛl is ɛy es eb ɛlu ecʼodad na a.

Tasi ɛm a, Jerusalɛm ecʼagŋ a lele ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab uwm ɛgŋ a ekʼel Jesu ab any, ɛtŋ kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl eci silɛl eke wɛl bʼawl nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ a, -lʼirim ow okm ɛl es sos ɛm. Gbɛkↄ eke -lʼↄbr Jesu low a, -nʼↄŋ sodad a fɛŋ iy nɛny.
-Nʼɛŋnm low kaka ekʼow ɛm -li kʼibi ow, kↄ -li dad Pilat eke kʼibiʼr.
Eke -li kokr fɛŋ a eke Nyam Lɛl ɛwar Jesu eci lís a, -lʼusm ow es olikŋ af ɛtŋ -lʼɛlu ow uwↄmu ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam igbmʼn luw ɛm.
Sɛgŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl, agŋ a ekʼus Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ toŋ im ok Jerusalɛm a ecʼany af, lʼokm sos ↄkm ɛtŋ sica agŋ a el in ecʼadaŋku Israɛl ecʼagŋ ecʼany af.
Ɛy obi yɛji, sʼam is ↄny Amani Mamn na. Sica eke Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm a, low yecʼa eke lʼɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kok ow iy nɛny ɛy eke sʼel ɛl ecʼey a eci, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Selu yony ɛm ab af:
Ɛy obi yɛji, sʼam is ↄny Amani Mamn na. Sica eke Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm a, low yecʼa eke lʼɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kok ow iy nɛny ɛy eke sʼel ɛl ecʼey a eci, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Selu yony ɛm ab af:
Nyam ikŋ anym ɛwar eke in bʼow in igbm Jesu luw ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke owʼn kʼɛ́wlm in ugŋm es ij. Li dad ninɛ:
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ɛjecʼɛm nʼam dad lʼɛsɛ:
David e lɛgŋ ɛm a, li kok Nyam e juma e bɛbm ɛw es a toŋ batŋ lʼuw, wɛl ocʼr es lagŋɛl e saw ɛtŋ lʼugŋ es;
kↄ in a eke Nyam igbm luw ɛm a, lʼugŋm es.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it eke kʼuwr any eke Jesu ɛm anake ↄtur ↄnyn sikpl eci oc ap a. Mois ecʼol a ↄtum ebm ɛlum ↄny es ↄny e sikpl ab ɛm, kↄ agŋ fɛŋ eke ↄny ↄmn Jesu ɛm a, Nyam ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it eke kʼuwr any eke Jesu ɛm anake ↄtur ↄnyn sikpl eci oc ap a. Mois ecʼol a ↄtum ebm ɛlum ↄny es ↄny e sikpl ab ɛm, kↄ agŋ fɛŋ eke ↄny ↄmn Jesu ɛm a, Nyam ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Sica ɛ̀wr ɛrm yecʼɛtŋ ke low na eke kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl dad a kʼɛ́ŋnm ↄny:
“Ɛ̀kan, ↄny, Nyam e miyɛr kokr ɛsɛl,
low a íti ↄny any, ke írmn ocr es!
Aŋke ↄny ecʼowr anŋ ɛm, mʼow mi kok low nyam eke kʼow ubmn nawrɛ,
eke ɛgŋ am dad ↄny ow ecʼodad bↄbↄ yɛji.” »
Eke Pↄl lele Barnabas ab ok ↄkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, wɛl ibrm eke nɛnɛgŋ ekʼam ow a, -li kʼɛwl mɛny -lʼow -li dad odad nyam na cɛ.
Eke luku as a uwr a, Jwifɛl nↄnↄ lele agŋ a ekʼɛgŋ ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low eb a, am us Pↄl lele Barnabas ab jam. -Nʼam dad wɛl eke -li kʼinym es kikri Nyam eci lɛc a eke bʼↄŋ ɛl ab ɛm.
Eke nɛnɛgŋ ow a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛb ab ɛm ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ cɛ in im in am iri Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad af.
Eke Jwifɛl ɛkn dedeku na a, ow ↄny ɛl nyamnɛyr; -nʼam wɛwr Pↄl ɛtŋ -nʼam ↄny odad -lʼoc ow es nɛnym.

Pↄl lele Barnabas ab am dad ɛl odad tasi ɛsɛ: «Ɔny, ow it eke wɛl kʼikŋ anym dad ↄny Nyam ecʼodad a yɛ; gbɛkↄ eke ebmn odad a, ke am ocar ↄny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke kʼↄtum ɛŋnm sel ekʼↄnym uwr a, sica si bʼow sʼim agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ogŋ!
Kin low yecʼeke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋ ɛy ow ecʼabusu a:
Eke agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a iri ów amua a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛl ɛtŋ -nʼam ɛlu Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bia odad na eci; ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ikŋ anym ɛw sel ekʼↄnym uwr ecʼa, ub nawrɛ.
Nyam ecʼodad a eb es wus a nimum af.
Kↄ Jwifɛl a ok bosu amamn ɛm ecʼↄyↄw a eke bʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele ɛb a eci nyimn ɛsɛl ab ab al lokm; -lʼijr Pↄl lele Barnabas ab gbre ɛtŋ -lʼogŋ wɛl ɛl eci wus ab af.
Pↄl lele Barnabas ab cic akr sɛc ok ɛl es
ɛtŋ im Ikoniↄm.
Jam ɛsɛl a ekʼanŋ Antiↄs a ecʼa, sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl lele Abŋ Lala eke -nʼɛŋan ab a afŋn ɛl es.

Ɛsɛ Antiↄs ecʼab af, eke Pↄl lele Barnabas ab im ok Ikoniↄm ɛb ɛm yogŋ a, -nʼim -lʼok Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ -nʼam dad Nyam odad toŋ batŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab e nↄnↄ ub nawrɛ.
Gbɛkↄ Jwifɛl a ekʼerurm eke kʼub nawrɛ a, itr agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a toŋ -nʼↄny agŋ lisijimɛl a e tutr ŋuŋ.

Kↄ Pↄl lele Barnabas ab ubrm ɛl e lɛgŋ ab es. Eke -nʼↄnyn ↄmn nↄnↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm a, -nʼam dad Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a ecʼodad ɛrm susu ɛm. Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ am ↄŋ ɛl abusu -li kok simɛny ɛwr lele ów any iti owi ab, ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, nʼam yɛgm eke wɛl ecʼodad a el nawrɛ.
Ɛb ab ɛm ecʼagŋ a ubr ɛm yony: agŋ likpr inym es Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ bɛb inym es ɛrm ɛsɛl a eci.
Jwifɛl lele ɛl ekʼelm Jwifɛl a lele ɛl ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab, am bɛbm eke kʼijr Pↄl lele Barnabas ab gbre ke íbi ɛl mebn ɛm.
Eke -li bʼuw any a, -lʼuru es -nʼimn Likaoni wus af e sɛb ab a ekʼel Lisr, Dɛrb, lele ow e saw saw ab ab eci.
Yogŋ yɛji, -nʼam ↄb Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
Lisr yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke bi sig es cɛ aŋke li bubm es. In e mew ɛm ɛtŋ sos ɛyrʼr ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka lʼↄtum nʼanm es.
Lɛgŋ nyam Pↄl am dad odad ɛtŋ nʼam iri. Pↄl okʼr anyamn af am lɛrʼr ɛtŋ lʼɛkn eke ɛgŋ a ↄny ↄmn eke kʼewl.
Li dad ow lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm ninɛ: «Ìgb, ìnym es ceŋ!» Ɛgŋ a igb us es ɛtŋ am an es.
Eke dedeku a ɛkn low a eke Pↄl kok a, -lʼↄg -li dad ɛl ecʼɛbr ekʼel Likaoni ab ɛm ninɛ: «Sinyam itŋn sos el agŋ ow ɛŋn ɛy!»
-Nʼam ɛsŋ Barnabas “Zes” ɛtŋ -nʼam ɛsŋ Pↄl “Ɛrmɛs”,
aŋke Pↄl anake bʼↄb amani a.
Zes eci nyam ŋↄŋn usu a anŋ ɛb a ecʼɛm ɛy usu a. In ecʼegb waw ɛs a ot sed lele suw amamn ab ow lisany a ecʼany af; lʼerur eke dedeku ab ab -li ki waw egb -nʼↄŋ Barnabas lele Pↄl ab.
Gbɛkↄ eke Barnabas lele Pↄl ab iri low na a, -nʼↄny ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a -li gbagbrm ɛm,
ɛtŋ -lʼuru es -lʼok dedeku ab ɛm -nʼam ɛlu lebl -li dad -lʼɛsɛ:
«Agŋ lisijimɛl, kↄ bla ɛtŋ am kokr ɛbɛn ee? Agŋ cɛ sʼel ɛsɛ ↄny af. Sʼam is ↄny Amani Mamn a eke kʼigŋn ↄny e sinyam ekekey na ekʼel ob ↄfr ↄfr a okr es, ke ɛ́wal lɛɛr Nyam ekʼanŋ owr
Godo godo a, li yɛb ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eb ɛl obi ecʼejagb eke -lʼerurir.
Gbɛkↄ sɛgŋ fɛŋ li bʼokm sos ↄkm in ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny ab ɛm: li bʼↄŋ mij anŋ afr ɛtŋ an ok ↄny wus ɛtŋ li bʼↄŋ ↄny egb eke kʼubr ekʼow e lɛgŋ bʼow a;
li bʼↄŋ ↄny ob ij ɛtŋ li bi yibr ↄny ecʼɛrm a sos ɛm iŋn.»
Sodad amua e dad ɛm bↄbↄ yɛji, ɛrm ɛsɛl a ij gbre eke kʼɛdŋn dedeku a eke ki waw egb ↄŋ ɛl.
Jwifɛl ekʼanŋ Pisidi eci Antiↄs a lele Ikoniↄm ab a ow ɛtŋ eb dedeku a. -Lʼↄr Pↄl mebn ɛm ibi eci, ɛtŋ -lʼↄdu -lʼɛlu ow ↄkm baŋn a aŋke -li tutr ekʼow uw ŋ̂.
Sica eke jam ɛsɛl a ow ar ɛlul il ɛm a, lʼigb wus lʼɛwl lʼɛy baŋn a. Eke lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, Barnabas ab -nʼim Dɛrb.
Pↄl lele Barnabas ab im ↄb Amani Mamn e kokoba Dɛrb ɛb ɛm; yogŋ, -li kok agŋ nↄnↄ el jam ɛsɛl. Sica -lʼɛwl mɛny -nʼim Lisr, Ikoniↄm, lele Pisidi eci Antiↄs ab ab.
-Lʼusur jam ɛsɛl a ɛrm, -lʼatr wɛl sos es eke wɛl kʼinym es tuↄtuↄ wɛl ecʼↄmn ab ɛm ɛtŋ -nʼam dad wɛl -lʼɛsɛ: «Ow it eke si kʼijr gbre nↄnↄ gbuŋ ke sʼók Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.»
Nyamel fɛŋ ɛm, -li bʼɛnm agŋ ekpekp -nʼↄŋ wɛl ɛtŋ eke -li bʼɛnŋ nɛny -ni ŋↄŋn Nyam a, -li bʼafl wɛl es -nʼↄŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eke agŋ amua ↄny ↄmn in ɛm a.
Ɛmɛny -lʼubr Pisidi wus a ɛtŋ -nʼim -lʼok Panfili eci wus ab af.
Pɛrj ɛb ɛm yogŋ, -lʼↄb Nyam ecʼAmani Mamn a e kokoba ɛtŋ sica -nʼim -lʼok Atali ɛb ɛm.
-Lʼigb yogŋ mijɛtŋ ɛm -nʼaam Siri ecʼAntiↄs a. Ɛb na ɛm anake wɛl ot ok ɛl Nyam eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm juma na eke sica -li kokr -lʼuwarir a ecʼa.
Eke -nʼimn -lʼokr yogŋ a, -lʼas Nyamel ecʼagŋ a luku -li dad wɛl ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, lele elel eke Nyam figr agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji ↄmn e lakp a.
-Nʼanŋ yogŋ jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ibn nↄnↄ.
Agŋ bɛb anŋ Jude ow Siri eci Antiↄs a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ lisijimɛl a low dad ɛsɛ: «Eke ubrmn likr es ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ecʼol a am ibrm ab af a, kʼow ↄtumn ɛŋnmn es eb ɛlu.»
Pↄl lele Barnabas ab ɛgŋm low na ebm ɛtŋ -lʼatar ów es ligbɛl agŋ ab ab. Wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke Pↄl, Barnabas lele Antiↄs ecʼagŋ bɛb ab kʼim Jerusalɛm ke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab -li dad odad na.
Ɛtŋ Nyamel a ɛkn ɛl ecʼusu im a e low.
-Lʼɛcr Fenisi lele Samari ab eci, ɛtŋ -nʼam awl elel ekʼagŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ocr any ↄkŋn Nyam a e low; amani na ↄŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ↄny sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl.
Eke -lʼokr Jerusalɛm a, Nyamel a, ɛrm ɛsɛl a, lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab eb ɛl, ɛtŋ ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, -nʼam awl -lʼok wɛl.
Gbɛkↄ Farisiɛl ecʼogog ecʼagŋ bɛb ekʼↄny ↄmn a, igb ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Ke wɛl búbr agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn kʼelm Jwifɛl a ekr es ke wɛl ↄ́ŋ ɛl -lʼɛlum Mois ecʼol a.»
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab as luku ɛtŋ am ↄny odad na igbl ogŋ ɛkn.

Eke -lʼatarir ów es kpekpe a, Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Agŋ lisijimɛl, uwr any eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ Nyam sↄsum ocʼm ↄny ecʼaraŋn eke mi kʼↄb Amani Mamn e kokoba mʼók agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼiri ke -lʼub nawrɛ.
Ɛtŋ Nyam eke uw agŋ eci mɛrm ab any a, ɛlu ↄkm yɛgm eke lʼeb wɛl; nʼↄŋ wɛl Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af.
Ɛl lele ɛy ab ecʼaraŋn a, lʼokm ereb kaka: lʼayal wɛl ecʼɛrm a aŋke -nʼↄny ↄmn.
Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm am sismn Nyam odad agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn a ecʼɛrɛkp leg leg ecʼuyul ɛm, ɛrɛkp ekʼɛy lagŋɛl lele ɛy obi ɛy obi ab, sʼↄtum sʼuyum ab ee?
Ke tasi ɛm a, sʼub nawrɛ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu eci sↄrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm wɛl sↄg ɛy ɛsɛ ɛl af.»
Sica dedeku a fɛŋ yewal tiŋ, ɛtŋ wɛl am iri Pↄl lele Barnabas ab dad mɛny ɛwr lele low any iti owi ab eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok ↄŋ agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a.
Eke Pↄl lele Barnabas ab dad odad a ok es a, Jak
ↄdu eb ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Agŋ lisijimɛl, ìrir ɛm ecʼodad na!
Simↄ dad elel eke kpↄkpↄ ɛm ɛtŋ Nyam ɛw ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a e low any, ke ɛl ɛm a ot agŋ eb mum nyam el in eci.
Ɛtŋ low na lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ecʼodad ab ab okr af, aŋke Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ:
Ow e jam a, mʼow mʼɛwl mʼow,
ke David ecʼêl a ekʼɛy wus a mʼúsr ɛm,
in e êl ekʼuŋ a, mi kókr ɛm,
ke mʼínymn in es.
Ɛtŋ agŋ ɛjecʼa fɛŋ bʼow ↄl Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ es;
ɛɛ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eke mʼɛsŋ eke kʼel ɛm ecʼa,
bʼow ↄlʼm es.
Na el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad eke dad;
lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ lʼɛlu in ecʼów amua ↄkm li yɛgm.»
Jak igŋ af dad ninɛ: «Na sosiɛm, mʼerurm eke wɛl kʼijr agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl ke oc any ↄkŋ Nyam a gbre.
Gbɛkↄ sʼáwŋ ɛl lɛl si dad ɛl eke -li kʼijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ↄŋ sɛkp, -lʼijmn nfaci, -lʼijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -lʼɛgŋmn mebl;
aŋke godo godo ɛtŋ, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm, wɛl am dad Mois eci sol amua ecʼodad ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ wɛl bʼawl.»

Ow sosiɛm ɛrm ɛsɛl a, agŋ ekpekp a, lele Nyamel a fɛŋ ab ɛgŋ eb eke kʼot ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ igŋ Pↄl lele Barnabas ab af im Siri ecʼAntiↄs a. -Li sↄsum Jud eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Barsabas lele Silas ab -lʼot; -lʼel agŋ lisijimɛl ab ɛm ecʼany ɛsɛl yony.
Kin lɛl eke wɛl ↄŋ ɛl a: «Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ekʼel ↄny lisijimɛl a, am ↄŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ekʼelm Jwif kʼir Antiↄs, Siri lele Silisi ab a lebl.
Sʼiri ekʼagŋ anŋ ɛy ogŋ aŋa ow ↄŋ ↄny ɛwr jeŋjeŋ, ebr ɛrmij ɛl eci sodad ebl ab ɛm. Ow elm ɛy sʼↄↄm ɛl abusu low na e kok eci.
Na sosiɛm, ɛy a fɛŋ eci nɛny af okr ɛm, si sↄsum agŋ sʼot eke si kʼɛrm ɛl ↄny ogŋ a, -lʼɛwl ɛy lawlɛl Barnabas lele Pↄl ab,
eke blel irmn ɛl ecʼowr anŋ a ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛm.
Sʼam ɛrm Jud lele Silas ab ↄny ogŋ a eke ki dad ↄny ɛl obi ɛm, lɛl na eke sʼam nↄn aŋa a e low.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy lele Abŋ Lala ab, sʼɛgŋ sʼeb eke si kʼↄↄm ↄny ɛrɛkp ɛjeci ekʼow elm sol amua ekʼit a cɛ:
kʼìjr ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ↄŋ sɛkp, kʼɛ̀gŋn mebl, kʼìjr ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, kʼìjmn nfaci. Eke ↄsur ów amua, ow bʼow akpl. Agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼam ɛsŋn ↄny!»
Wɛl ɛlu agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm ab es, ɛtŋ -nʼim -lʼok Antiↄs. Yogŋ -lʼas agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼↄny ↄmn a luku ɛtŋ -nʼↄŋ wɛl lɛl a.
Wɛl awl lɛl a ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm am iŋn, sos es atr ecʼodad ekʼanŋ ɛm a eci.
Jud lele Silas ab ekʼɛl obi yɛji el kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl a, dad ↄmn ɛsɛl a odad kpekpe sos es atr eci; -nʼↄŋ wɛl ecʼↄmn a ij lɛc obn.
-Nʼanŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ bɛb, ɛtŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ↄmn ɛsɛl a ↄŋ ɛl ejagb -lʼɛwl -nʼim agŋ a ekʼɛrm ɛl a ogŋ. [
Silas gbɛ ɛgŋ eb eke kʼanŋ yogŋ.]
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl lele Barnabas ab gbɛ anŋ Antiↄs. Agŋ ɛjeci nↄnↄ ab -nʼam yɛgm agŋ low, ɛtŋ -nʼam ↄb Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad a ecʼamani.

Eke -nʼanŋn Antiↄs yogŋ toŋ ow ibn a, Pↄl dad Barnabas ninɛ: «Sʼɛ́wl mɛny sʼim ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke sʼↄb Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad a ecʼamani a, sʼɛ́kn agŋ lisijimɛl a ekʼↄny ↄmn a, sʼɛ́kn elel eke -nʼam aan es a.»
Barnabas erur eke Jan Mark kʼigŋ ɛl ab im,
kↄ Pↄl gbɛ erurm aŋke Jan Mark igŋ ɛlu ɛl es Panfili, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lʼɛwlm wɛl juma ab ɛm ij.
-Lʼatar ów es sɛnyn sɛnyn toŋ -lʼɛlulil es. Barnabas oc Mark ɛtŋ eb mijɛtŋ im Sipr;
Pↄl gbɛ oc Silas, ɛtŋ eke ↄmn ɛsɛl a ot ok ɛl Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm a, nʼim.
Lʼɛcr Siri lele Silisi wus af ab eci nʼam atr Nyamel a fɛŋ sos es ↄmn ɛm.
Pↄl im ɛy Dɛrb ɛtŋ ɛmɛny im ɛy Lisr.
Yogŋ, jam ɛs nyam anŋ eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Timote; lis a Jwif ekʼin yɛji ↄny ↄmn; ɛs a gbɛ Grɛk.
Agŋ lisijimɛl a e kʼir Lisr lele Ikoniↄm baŋn ab a, bi dad Timote e lís ecʼów amamn nↄnↄ.
Pↄl erur eke kʼↄny ɛcmʼn ab; lʼoc ow ab nʼim ɛtŋ lʼubr ow likr es, Jwifɛl a ekʼanŋ yogŋ a eke -li bʼow -lʼɛc a sosiɛm, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛs a Grɛk.
Ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke -nʼam ɛc a, -nʼam dad agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn a ów a fɛŋ eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele Jerusalɛm ecʼagŋ ekpekp ab ab dad ucu es a, ɛtŋ -nʼam ibrm eke wɛl kʼɛlum ów amua.
Sinyamel a am ɛy lɛc ↄmn ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ liy nyam nyam fɛŋ agŋ am bobn.
Abŋ Lala ɛ́gbm Pↄl lele Silas ab es eke -li ki dad Nyam ecʼodad a Azi ogog a; ow ↄŋ -lʼubr Friji lele Galasi ab eci wus ab af.
Eke -li titmn Misi wus af a, -nʼam bɛbm eke -li kʼim Bitini wus af, gbɛkↄ Jesu ecʼAbŋ a yɛbm ɛl.
Ow sosiɛm -lʼubr Misi ɛtŋ -nʼim Troas baŋn eci nanu a.
Ncok ɛm a, Pↄl ɛrur mɛmn: lʼɛkn Maseduan iy nyam ekʼinym es ke am ŋↄŋnʼn dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛ̀c Maseduan ke ów ɛlum ɛy abu!»
Kpɛkŋ eke mɛmn ɛrur na bʼoc es a, si bɛbm sos sʼus ejagb Maseduan im eci,
aŋke sʼub nawrɛ eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɛy eke si kʼɛwl yogŋ ecʼagŋ a Amani Mamn a.
Sʼeb mijɛtŋ Troas, sʼigb yogŋ kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ sʼim sʼok Samotras lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, sʼim sʼok Neapolis baŋn.
Sʼigb yogŋ sʼim Filip, Maseduan eci wus a eci ɛb gbɛl ekʼanŋ Rom ecʼes ɛw ɛm a.
Sʼanŋ ɛb ab ɛm si kok sɛgŋ wa cɛ.
Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, sʼok ↄkm baŋn a sʼim mij nɛny a; yogŋ si tutr eke si bʼow sʼɛŋn Jwifɛl ekʼanŋ Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm usu nyam.
Sʼok es yogŋ ɛtŋ ↄyↄw a ekʼas luku anŋ yogŋ a, si dad ɛl odad.
Ɔyↄw ab ɛm e nyam e nin el Lidi, Tiatir baŋn yↄwi eke bʼↄl sigbad ebl amamn ij ke bʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ. Nʼam iri ɛy ecʼodad a, ɛtŋ Nyam ↄŋʼn abŋ eke li kʼɛw Pↄl e sodad a ɛrm af.
Ow ↄŋ wɛl okʼr mij nuŋ, in lele in ecʼakŋ ab ab.
Lʼɛw ɛy abu li dad ninɛ: «Eke am ɛkan eke mʼub Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nawrɛ tasi, ke òwr anŋn ɛm ogŋ a.» Ɛtŋ lʼatrm ɛy sʼɛgŋ sʼeb.
Lɛgŋ nyam sʼaam Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ adyↄwli nyam am ↄbr ɛy. In ɛm a, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam
anŋ eke bʼↄŋʼn lʼɛkn efi e low ekʼam ow a li dad. Ów amua eke li bʼɛkn li dad a bʼↄŋ in ecʼes ɛwɛl a os nↄnↄ.
Ɛy lele Pↄl ab, nʼam us ɛy jam lʼɛlu lebl li dad lʼɛsɛ: «Agŋ amua, Afr Kpekpe e Nyam a e juma kok ɛsɛl! -Nʼam dad ↄny ejagb a eke bʼɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ecʼodad!»
Yↄwli a am kok ɛbɛn sɛgŋ nↄnↄ. Ow bʼafŋn es a, Pↄl ɛrm ebl toŋ batŋ ɛwl mɛny dad abŋ ŋuŋ a ninɛ: «Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, ɛ̀y ↄkm in ɛm!» Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ abŋ a ɛy ↄkm yↄwli ab ɛm.
Eke adyↄwli a ecʼes ɛwɛl a am ɛkn eke -li kʼow -nʼɛŋnmn os ow ɛm ij a, -nʼↄny Pↄl lele Silas ab -lʼow ɛbɛrŋ ɛm es ɛwɛl ecʼany af.
-Lʼot wɛl -nʼim Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl ekʼanŋ yogŋ a ecʼany af, ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: «Agŋ amua am is odad ɛy ecʼɛb na ɛm;
ɛl Jwifɛl, ɛtŋ -nʼam yɛgm agŋ ɛb ir owr. Ɛy Rom eyŋ; ɛy ecʼol a ↄↄm abusu eke si kʼɛgŋ sʼeb oglog si kok ow e low.»
Dedeku a yɛji ebl ɛrm ok Pↄl lele Silas ab af. Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ↄŋ wɛl eb Pↄl lele Silas ab mob sos ɛtŋ ↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼↄr ɛl likŋni ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ↄr ɛl sɛnyn sɛnyn bake ow uwr a, wɛl ok ɛl sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl ↄŋ usu ↄsu ɛs eke kʼɛw ɛl nyamn af sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Eke nʼɛŋn abusu ikŋ na a, lʼot lʼok wɛl sobel ab ɛm ecʼakŋni nyam ekʼanŋ sobel a e nuŋ kↄkↄ a, ɛtŋ nʼawŋm wɛl akr ekŋ ekpr ab.
Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, Pↄl lele Silas ab am ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛgŋ ɛj kↄklmʼn ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a am iri.
Kpru ɛm, wus umu tuↄtuↄ, ↄny sobel a mumu. Kpɛkŋ masany a fɛŋ fifig ok es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a eci ŋgbraka a fɛŋ mↄmu es.
Usu ↄsu ɛs a ufŋm es, eke li bʼɛkn eke sobel a eci masany a fifig a, lʼↄdu in e lab ler ɛm a lʼɛlu ↄkm eke li kʼibir in sosi, aŋke nʼam tutr eke sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a uru es im.
Kↄ Pↄl barm in e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm ninɛ: «Kì kokr ŋ sosi low ŋuŋ! Ɛy fɛŋ sʼanŋ aŋa!»
Usu ↄsu ɛs a ibrm eke wɛl kʼigŋ al; lʼuru es lʼɛy akŋ a, sos ufŋ ɛm, erŋn ab, lʼok ↄwrↄkp wus Pↄl lele Silas ab ecʼany af.
Nʼↄŋ wɛl ok ↄkm ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Agŋ ɛgbɛl, kↄ ayaf mi ki kokr ke mʼɛ́ŋn sel ee?»
-Li dad ow ninɛ: «Ùb Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu nawrɛ ke ŋ lele ŋ ecʼakŋ ab ɛ́ŋan sel.»
Ɛtŋ -nʼam dad ow Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad, in lele agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋʼn akŋ ab ab.
Ncok a eci wanci ab af cɛ, usu ↄsu ɛs a ot ɛl ab im ɛtŋ yↄyↄg ɛl abi ɛnyɛmbri ab es. Kpɛkŋ in ecʼagŋ ab ab wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
Lʼoc Pↄl lele Silas ab nʼim in ecʼakŋ a ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ wɛl ob ij. Ɛgŋ na lele in ecʼakŋ ab ab sos ɛm am iŋn aŋke -lʼub Nyam nawrɛ.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɛrm agŋ ow dad usu ↄsu ɛs a ninɛ: «Ɛ̀lu agŋ a es.»
Usu ↄsu ɛs a ow dad Pↄl ninɛ: «Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼɛlu ↄny es. Ɔtur eke sica kʼokr ↄkm imn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm.»

Kↄ Pↄl dad agŋ a ninɛ: «Wɛl jɛjm ɛy e low okm, ɛtŋ -nʼↄŋ wɛl ↄr ɛy dedeku ecʼany af, ke ɛy Rom ecʼagŋ cɛ! Ɛtŋ -nʼↄny -lʼok ɛy sobel ɛm. Sica -nʼam erur eke -li kʼok ɛy ↄkm es lↄl ɛm ee? Sʼɛgŋm! -Lʼow ɛl obi -lʼok ɛy es!»
Agŋ a im ɛwl jɛj ok ɛsɛl a sodad a eke Pↄl dad a. Eke -lʼirir eke Pↄl lele Silas ab el Rom eyŋ tasi a, ɛrmni ɛdŋ ɛl es.
-Lʼow -lʼɛgŋ low ij -nʼↄŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ -nʼↄny -lʼok wɛl ↄkm sobel ab ɛm ɛtŋ -ni ŋↄŋn wɛl eke wɛl kʼok ↄkm baŋn a.
Eke Pↄl lele Silas ab ok ↄkm sobel ab ɛm a, -nʼim Lidi ogŋ a. Eke -lʼɛkan agŋ lisijimɛl a, ke -lʼatar wɛl sos es a, -nʼim.
Sica Pↄl lele Silas ab ɛcr Anfipolis baŋn lele Apoloni baŋn ab eci im ok Tesaloni; yogŋ, Jwifɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu anŋ.
Ɛsɛ elel eke sakp sakp fɛŋ li bi kok ab af a, Pↄl im ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Nɛnɛgŋ kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan, lʼatar ów es Nyam odad nuŋ af agŋ a ekʼanŋ yogŋ ab ab.
Nʼam ayal lʼok wɛl ɛtŋ nʼam yɛgm wɛl eke Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ow akpl eke Mesi a kʼij gbre ke ánŋ luw ɛm igb. Nʼam dad wɛl lʼɛsɛ: «Jesu na eke mʼam dad ↄny in ecʼodad a, in anake lʼel Mesi a.»
Jwifɛl ab ɛm e bɛb odad a ok es sos ɛm ɛtŋ -lʼow -nʼɛŋn Pↄl lele Silas ab. Grɛkɛl nↄnↄ ekʼam igŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele bosu amamn ɛm ecʼↄyↄw nↄnↄ ab yɛji kok ɛbɛn.

Gbɛkↄ Jwifɛl a nyamnɛyr am ↄny. -Lʼas ów marɛm marɛm ɛsɛl eke -nʼɛŋan ɛbɛrŋ ɛm a luku, -nʼam is odad agŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -nʼam bubr agŋ ɛm baŋn a. Ca -lʼigb -lʼok Jasↄn ecʼakŋ a, -nʼam ↄl Pↄl lele Silas ab eke -li kʼↄny -lʼot -nʼim dedeku a ecʼany af.
Eke -nʼɛŋnm wɛl a, -lʼↄdu Jasↄn lele agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab es -lʼow baŋn a ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a ecʼany af, ɛtŋ -nʼam ↄg -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Agŋ amua inymn wus na nimum es afr; sica ɛy ogŋ a -lʼok a!
Ɛtŋ Jasↄn eb ok ɛl akŋ! Agŋ amua fɛŋ am kok ów ekʼelm Sesar ecʼol a eci, aŋke -nʼam dad eke es ɛw ɛs ɛjeci nyam in anŋ eke wɛʼn bʼɛsŋ Jesu.»
Sodad amua ↄŋ dedeku a lele ɛb a ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab sos inym es afr.
-Nʼↄŋ Jasↄn lele agŋ lisijimɛl ab ab ɛw os es gbuŋ ɛtŋ -lʼɛlu wɛl es.
Kpɛkŋ eke lɛgŋ uk a, agŋ lisijimɛl a ↄŋ Pↄl lele Silas ab im Bere. Eke -lʼokr yogŋ a, -nʼim Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
Bere e Jwifɛl a bʼɛgŋ low eb akm Tesaloni ecʼa; -lʼeb Nyam odad a ɛl e sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li bi wewr Nyam Lɛl a, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼɛkn eke Pↄl ecʼodad eke bi dad ɛl a el nawrɛ.
Ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ nↄnↄ ub nawrɛ; ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl ab ɛm, bosu amamn ɛm ecʼↄyↄw nↄnↄ lele egŋ nↄnↄ ab yɛji ub nawrɛ.
Kↄ eke Tesaloni e Jwifɛl a iri eke Pↄl am dad Nyam odad Bere baŋn ɛm yɛjʼa, -lʼow -nʼam ŋuŋn dedeku a mɛrm ɛm -nʼↄŋ wɛl ɛw jeŋ jeŋ.
Ow sosiɛm, kpɛkŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ↄŋ Pↄl imn okij any a eci; gbɛkↄ Silas lele Timote ab gbɛ anŋ Bere.
Agŋ a ekʼaam nyimn Pↄl a im ɛwlʼl toŋ ok Atɛn baŋn, ɛtŋ -lʼɛwl -nʼim Bere Silas lele Timote ab ecʼamani a eke Pↄl ↄŋ ab ab. Amani ab ɛm, nʼam ibrm eke wɛl kʼow fafa ɛŋnʼn.
Eke Pↄl am eku Silas lele Timote ab Atɛn yogŋ a, low am ɛyʼr sos ɛm eke ɛb na kʼel sɛkp eci nuŋ igŋ ↄfr.
Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ, li bʼatar ów es Jwifɛl lele agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl ke am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ li bʼatar ów es agŋ ɛjeci eke li bʼɛŋn ab ab.
Epikurɛl lele Sitoyikɛl eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab
yɛji am atar ów es Pↄl ab. Ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb am ibrm ɛsɛ: «Nɛnym gbɛl ɛs na, bla odad iy nʼam dad gbɛ ee?» Eke agŋ bɛb am iri Pↄl dad Jesu ecʼodad lele luw ɛm anŋ igb owi ab a,
-nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛgŋ na, ɛsɛ etu e sinyam a cɛ ecʼodad owʼn am dad af.»
Ow sosiɛm -lʼoc Pↄl ab -nʼim baŋn a ecʼów bɛbm ɛsɛl a
ecʼany af, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: «Kↄ sʼↄtu eke si kʼuw low yɛgm owr na eke am dad ow ecʼodad ab any ee?
Eke am dad ɛy ów eke am iti ɛy any a sosiɛm, sʼam erur eke si kʼuw ow e nyandrɛ ab any.»
Tasi ɛm a, Atɛn eyŋ a fɛŋ lele etu agŋ a ekʼir ɛl ab a, bʼeb sɛgŋ nↄnↄ am iri oglog am dad ów owr ecʼodad cɛ.
Pↄl inym es ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a ecʼany af ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Atɛn eyŋ, mʼam ɛbmn nyamn eke low low fɛŋ ɛm eel Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi.
Tasi ɛm a, eke mʼam ɛc ↄny eci baŋn ɛm a ke mʼam ɛkn ↄny e sinyam nuŋ igŋ e mob a, mʼɛkn egb waw usu nyam eke wɛl nↄn: “Nyàm eke wɛl uwm any eci”.
Ɛɛ! Yecʼa eke am igŋn nuŋ ke uwmn any a anake mʼam ow mi dad ↄny in ecʼodad a.
Nyam a eke kok wus na nimum lele mob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ ɛm ab a, anake el afr lele wus ab eci Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ a, ɛtŋ lʼírm Sinyamel ekʼagŋ us ab ɛm.
Lʼibram eke agŋ kʼↄŋʼn ob kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ owʼn ↄnym ob af; tasi ɛm a, in anake li bʼↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ owr anŋ, sel lele mob mob fɛŋ ab a.
Ɛgŋ nyam coco ɛm, li kok ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ɛtŋ lʼok wɛl wus na nimum af. Lʼok akpo nʼↄŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ susu susu a eke -li kʼir a yɛji, lʼɛdŋ ow e sereb a.
Li kok ɛbɛn yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a ↄ́lʼl es. Ɛtŋ eke es ↄl a am ɛw bↄbrm ɛm yɛji, kʼaw ke -lʼↄtu eke -li kʼɛŋn ow, aŋke Nyam anm kpekpe ɛgŋ kaka eci.
Tasi ɛm a, ↄny e lɛl nↄn ɛsɛl a yɛji dad ninɛ: “In ɛm sʼanŋ owr, sʼↄtu eke si kʼan es sʼɛc, ɛtŋ sʼanŋ.” Ɛtŋ lɛl nↄn ɛs ɛjeci nyam yɛji dad ninɛ: “Sʼel in ecʼey.”
Eke sʼel in ecʼey a, si kʼↄ́nyn tutr eke Nyam anŋ ɛsɛ sika ɛm nyàm, os ɛm nyàm oglog lebn ɛm nyàm ekʼagŋ ij mɛwl kok ɛl ecʼów tutr ɛm af.
Agŋ ecʼany uwm ɛm ecʼów eke kok lɛgŋ a ekʼɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛwm ɛrm af ij, kↄ nʼam ibrm susu a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ a eke kʼitŋn ɛl ecʼes an a.
Lʼoc lɛgŋ nyam lʼɛw es, eke ɛgŋ a eke li sↄsum lʼoc ab ɛm, li bʼow li jɛj wus e low lʼok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm. Lʼɛlu ow e low ↄkm agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af ɛgŋ na eke lʼigbm luw ɛm ab ɛm!»
Eke -lʼirir Pↄl dad luw ɛm anŋ igb ecʼodad a, agŋ bɛb am kokrʼr miyɛr, ɛtŋ oglog am dad ɛsɛ: «Lɛgŋ ɛjeci ke sʼíri ŋ ecʼodad na.»
Af aŋa anake Pↄl ɛlu ɛl es a.
Kↄ agŋ bɛb gbɛ ɛgŋ in e low a eb ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ. Ɛl ɛm a, Denis ekʼel ów bɛbm ɛsɛl ab ɛm ecʼɛgŋ a, yↄw nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Damaris a lele agŋ ɛjecʼab anŋ ɛm.
Eke ów amua bʼɛc a, Pↄl igb Atɛn im ɛy Korɛnt.
Yogŋ nʼɛŋn Jwif nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Akilas; wɛl ewʼr Pↄŋ eci wus ab af. Nʼanŋ Rom, Itali wus af lʼow ɛy Prisil ab ow kʼibnm, aŋke yogŋ Sesar Klod ↄŋ abusu wɛl ogŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ. Pↄl im ɛŋn ɛl,
ɛtŋ eke -nʼↄnyn juma nyam ekʼel ndey lɛl ɛm lɛ́f e kok a, lʼir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li bʼokr af -li kok juma.
Nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ, Pↄl bʼim Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ eke li bʼeb odad a, li bʼↄl eke li kʼeb Grɛkɛl lele Jwifɛl ab.
Sica eke Silas lele Timote ab anŋ Maseduan ow a,
Pↄl bʼoc in e lɛgŋ a fɛŋ am dad Jwifɛl a Nyam odad am ij nɛny dad eke Mesi a Jesu.
Kↄ Jwifɛl a ɛ́gŋm in e low a ebm ɛtŋ bi wɛwrʼr; ow sosiɛm lʼufŋ in e mob sus ɛm a e siflefl ab es lʼok wɛl es,
ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Eke batŋ irmn, ke ↄny obi ɛm ana; ow elm ɛm e low ij. Sicaca ɛm a, mʼow mʼoc any mʼↄkŋ agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a.»
Pↄl igb yogŋ im ir Titius Justus ogŋ, ekʼin ecʼêl a titm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Lʼelm Jwif kↄ lʼel ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛgŋ ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi a eb.
Krispus ekʼel Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ecʼes ɛw a, lele in ecʼakŋ ab ab
ub Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nawrɛ. Korɛnt baŋn eyŋ nↄnↄ ekʼiri Pↄl ecʼodad a yɛji ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ ok mij nuŋ.
Sica ncok nyam, Pↄl am ɛrur mɛmn ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ am dadʼr ɛsɛ: «Kʼùru erŋn! Nɛny ánŋʼŋ ɛm am dad! Kʼàbl nɛny,
aŋke mʼanŋ ŋ ab. Ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum kokmʼŋ low ŋuŋ aŋke ɛb na ɛm, agŋ nↄnↄ el ɛm eci.»
Pↄl anŋ Korɛnt kok lakpo nyam awl nↄhↄn ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ Nyam odad.
Lakpo ab af eke Galiↄn eb Rom ecʼes ɛw Akayi ogog ecʼa, Jwifɛl okr af irŋn Pↄl. -Lʼoc ow -nʼim jɛj ok ecʼany af
ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: «Ɛgŋ na am ↄl eke kʼeb agŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ ekʼotm ol a ecʼab es.»
Eke Pↄl ↄl eke ki dad odad a, Galiↄn dad Jwifɛl a ninɛ: «Ɔny Jwifɛl, tasi ɛm a, blel ow el low ŋuŋ li kok, oglog low ligbɛl marɛm anake li kok a, ke blel mʼók sos es mʼiri ↄny ecʼodad a.
Kↄ ekʼow el ów es atar odad ebl owi af, en owi af lele ↄny obi e sol owi af ab a, na ↄny obi e low eke kʼɛkan ana. Sodad nɛnɛ a, mʼérurm eke mi kʼel ow e jɛj ok ɛs!»
Ɛtŋ lʼogŋ wɛl jɛj ok usu a.
Ɛl fɛŋ -nʼↄny Sↄstɛn ekʼel Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ecʼes ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ -nʼam ↄr ow jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ecʼany af; gbɛkↄ Galiↄn cicm sar okm ɛl es.
Pↄl anŋ Korɛnt ibn. Sica lʼɛlu agŋ lisijimɛl a es, ɛtŋ lʼeb mijɛtŋ lʼot Prisil lele Akilas ab nʼim Siri. Gbuŋ ke -lʼeb mijɛtŋ a, Saŋkre ɛb ɛm yogŋ, Pↄl ↄŋ wɛl ɛrʼr sin aŋke lʼij nɛny.
-Nʼim -lʼok Efɛs ɛtŋ Pↄl ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ. Nʼim lʼɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛtŋ Jwifɛl ab ab -nʼam atar ów es.
-Lʼibrm ow ekʼow kʼanŋ ɛl ab ibn, kↄ lʼɛgŋm.
Ke lʼɛ́lu wɛl es a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Eke Nyam ɛgŋ, lɛgŋ ɛjeci mʼow mʼɛwl mɛny mʼow ↄny ogŋ aŋa.» Ɛtŋ lʼigb Efɛs nʼimn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci.
Eke lʼitr es Sesare a, lʼuyu nʼim Jerusalɛm lʼɛsŋn Nyamel ecʼagŋ a, gbuŋ ɛtŋ nʼim Antiↄs.
Li kok sɛgŋ bɛb yogŋ ɛtŋ nʼim. In ecʼim ɛm a, lʼɛcr Galasi lele Friji e wus ab af eci ɛtŋ nʼam atr jam ɛsɛl a sos es.
Jwif nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Apolↄs ke wɛl ew Alesandri a, ow ɛy Efɛs. Lʼel odad ebl mamn ɛs eke uw Nyam Lɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn yɛji.
Wɛl yɛgmʼn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb a e low, ɛtŋ ari at ɛm, nʼam ↄb kokoba li yɛgm agŋ Jesu e lís e low fɛŋ cɛcɛ ɛm; gbɛkↄ Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a cɛ e low lʼuw any.
Nʼam dad ów ↄmn ɛm tasi Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ. Eke Prisil lele Akilas ab iriʼr lebl a, -lʼoc ow ɛtŋ -lʼotar Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb a e low akr tasi -lʼok ow.

Sica eke Apolↄs am erur eke kʼim Akayi wus af a, agŋ lisijimɛl a atrʼr sos es, ɛtŋ -li kok lɛl -nʼawŋ ɛb ab ɛm eci jam ɛsɛl a yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl ébʼr sɛnyn sɛnyn. Eke nʼim lʼɛy yogŋ a, agŋ a eke Nyam e bibm ɛm ↄny ↄmn a, lʼɛlum wɛl abu nↄnↄ.
Tasi ɛm a, dedeku fɛŋ ecʼany af nʼam ot ów tasi li yɛgm eke Jwifɛl a ↄnym low ij: Nyam Lɛl ɛm, nʼam ɛlu ↄkm eke Mesi a Jesu.
EkʼApolↄs anŋ Korɛnt a, Pↄl ebr mafɛny ɛm eci im ɛy Efɛs. Nʼɛŋn jam ɛsɛl bɛb yogŋ
ɛtŋ lʼibrm wɛl ninɛ: «Kↄ eke ubr nawrɛ a, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ee?» -Li dad ow ninɛ: «EkʼAbŋ Lala nyam anŋ yɛji, sʼirim; wɛl dadm ɛy ow e low.»
Ow ↄŋ Pↄl ibrm ɛl ninɛ: «Ke sica bogŋ e mij ok nuŋ ɛŋan ee?» -Li dad ow ninɛ: «Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a eke yɛgm agŋ a.»
Pↄl dad ɛl ninɛ: «Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jan am ok agŋ a ekʼɛgŋ eb eke kʼitŋn ɛrm a mij nuŋ ɛtŋ nʼam dad Israɛl ecʼagŋ a eke kʼub ɛgŋ a eke bʼow anŋʼn jam ow a nawrɛ, ɛgŋ a el Jesu.»
Eke -lʼirir ów amua a, -nʼↄŋ wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm.
Pↄl at ɛl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -nʼɛŋn Abŋ Lala. -Nʼam ɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛtŋ -nʼam iri Nyam ogŋ ecʼodad -li dad.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ↄtu ekʼij agŋ lɛw yony.
Pↄl bʼim Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ yogŋ awl emum nyahan, li bi dad ów ↄmn ɛm tasi. Nʼam dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ecʼodad ɛtŋ nʼam ↄl elel eke li kʼeb agŋ a ekʼam iri in ecʼodad a.

Gbɛkↄ agŋ nↄnↄ am ↄny lↄru aru, ɛ́gŋm ekʼub nawrɛ ɛtŋ dedeku a ecʼany af, am cak Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb a e low. Ow sosiɛm Pↄl ɛlu ɛl es, ot jam ɛsɛl ab ab im, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad Nyam odad Tiranus e lɛl êl ɛm a.
Low na ibn toŋ ij akpo yony; ow ↄŋ agŋ a ekʼir Azi ogog a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab iri Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad a.
Pↄl ɛm, Nyam am kok sakrowa ɛgbɛl toŋ batŋ agŋ bʼot sigbad, oglog nuŋ es awŋ eke Pↄl ɛw sos a ís ↄ́lu a: ↄl a bʼoc ɛl es lís ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a bʼok ↄkm ɛl ɛm.
Pↄl ɛm, Nyam am kok sakrowa ɛgbɛl toŋ batŋ agŋ bʼot sigbad, oglog nuŋ es awŋ eke Pↄl ɛw sos a ís ↄ́lu a: ↄl a bʼoc ɛl es lís ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a bʼok ↄkm ɛl ɛm.

Jwifɛl bɛb eke bʼɛc susu susu ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ eke bʼanŋ ↄ́lu ɛm a, ɛl yɛji am ɛbm oc Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin a ogŋn abŋ eŋuŋ ok ↄkm. -Li bi dad abŋ eŋuŋ a -lʼɛsɛ: «Jesu a eke Pↄl am dad in e low a e nin ɛm, mʼam dad ↄny eke kʼokr ↄkm!»
Ɛbɛn eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam, Jwif eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Seva a, ecʼey lↄbŋ a yɛji bi kok ana.
Kↄ lɛgŋ nyam, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam dad ɛl ninɛ: «Mʼuw Jesu any ɛtŋ mʼuw ɛgŋ ekʼel Pↄl ab any, ɛtŋ kↄ ↄny, bwo el ↄny ee?»
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke abŋ ŋuŋ ir ɛm a ɛy ɛl af, ɛtŋ lʼɛy lɛc lʼakm wɛl fɛŋ; lʼↄr wɛl lɛc ɛm toŋ batŋ mob kok kok ɛl; -lʼuru es -lʼok ↄkm akŋ a -nʼim sos ↄfr.
Efɛs ecʼagŋ a, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab, iri low na; ɛl fɛŋ erŋn am ↄny ɛl ɛtŋ agŋ am ↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin a ecʼɛlum ligbɛl.
Agŋ nↄnↄ a eke ub nawrɛ a ow dedeku a fɛŋ ecʼany af ɛgŋ ów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr a e low eb.
Agŋ nↄnↄ a eke kok cam owi a ot ɛl e silɛl a ow, ɛtŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ecʼany af -lʼofŋ. Wɛl ub silɛl a ecʼos abi ekʼↄtu eke kʼij a, ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼos ab ɛm, ow ij jɛtɛ efu fandi ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.
Elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼabusu ɛm, Nyam ecʼodad a am eb es ke am ɛlu in e lɛc a ↄkm ana.
Eke ów amua ɛc ok es a, Abŋ Lala nyimn Pↄl
eke kʼɛcr Maseduan lele Akayi ab eci, ke im Jerusalɛm. Nʼam dad eke ekʼin im yogŋ, owʼn it ke in ím Rom yɛji.
Ow sosiɛm nʼↄŋ in ecʼabu ɛlum ɛsɛl yony, Timote lele Eras ab ikŋ anym im Maseduan, kↄ in obi a gbɛ ɛmɛny nʼanŋ Azi sɛgŋ bɛb.
Lɛgŋ na af, ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb a sosiɛm.
Sika iny ɛs nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Demetrius bʼoc jɛtɛ ufu kokr nyàm yↄw Artemis
eci nyamel ekekey, ɛtŋ ow bʼↄŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a bʼɛŋn os nↄnↄ.
Lʼas in e juma kok ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ɛjecʼa eke ɛl e juma a ot in ecʼa es a luku ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Agŋ o, uwr any eke ow el juma na anake bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼir ɛb sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
Am ɛkan ɛtŋ am irir low eke Pↄl ikŋ na am kok a: tasi ɛm a, nʼam dad eke sinyam a eke agŋ in kok a, in elm nyàm, ɛtŋ lʼeb agŋ nↄnↄ, ow elm Efɛs aŋa sↄny cɛ, kↄ Azi wus nimum af yɛji.
Low na ↄtu eke ki ŋuŋn ɛy e juma a, ke ɛmɛny ow ↄ́ŋ nyàm yↄw Artemis e nyamel gbɛl a irmn in ecʼany a; nyàm yↄw na eke Azi lele wus na nimum ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ab bʼigŋ nuŋ a e sagb a bʼow oc es!»
Eke -lʼirir sodad amua a, agŋ a ɛrm ebl afŋn es ɛtŋ am ↄg dad ɛsɛ: «Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!»
Ɛrm bebl a eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm. Agŋ a ↄny Gayus lele Aritak ab, Maseduan wus af eyŋ yony eke bʼɛwl Pↄl usu, ɛtŋ dedeku ɛm -lʼub -lʼok dedeku a e luku as usu a.
Pↄl am erur eke kʼokm sos ↄkm dedeku a ecʼany af, kↄ jam ɛsɛl a ɛdŋn in.
Azi wus ab af eci idr ɛsɛl bɛb a ekʼel lawlɛl a, ↄŋʼn bↄwl ŋↄŋnʼn eke li kʼiim dedeku a e luku as usu a.
Wanci ab af a, luku as a wuwal: agŋ bɛb bʼↄny na ke dad, amua bʼↄny na ke dad, ɛtŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl ecʼa, -lʼuwm low a sosiɛm eke -nʼanŋn luku as ab ɛm ab any.
Jwifɛl a akŋ ów a ok Alesandr nɛnym ɛtŋ -lʼikŋm ow anym eke li ki dad. Alesandr igbl abu ogŋ: lʼerur eke dedeku a ecʼany af li kʼeb odad li dad lʼotar akr.
Gbɛkↄ sica eke ow ok ɛl es sos ɛm eke ow el Jwif a, ɛl fɛŋ -lʼↄg lebl nyam toŋ ow kok wanci ↄmu yony: «Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!»

Sↄg a anŋ ɛm toŋ ɛtŋ sica ɛb a eci es ɛw ɛs a ↄtu ɛdŋn dedeku a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Efɛs ecʼagŋ, yewalil ↄ! Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke Efɛs ecʼɛb a bʼↄsu Artemis gbɛl a e nuŋ igŋ usu a lele in e lebn ɛm nyàm ekʼanŋ afr ɛy wus ab ab.
Ow itim ɛgŋ kaka any. Ow sosiɛm ↄtur eke ki yewalil tiŋ, kì kokr nyamb owi.
Kin, otr agŋ amua owr aŋa, -lʼiym nyamel gbɛl a e mil ɛtŋ -li wɛwrm ɛy e nyàm yↄw a yɛji.
Eke Demetrius lele in e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab ↄny low ɛgŋ ab a, ow ↄny sɛgŋ eke wɛl bi jɛj ów ok ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛsɛl yɛji anŋ: yogŋ anake -li kʼim -li jɛj -lʼok a.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke ↄnyn low eke kʼibrmn a, wɛl bʼow dad ow ecʼodad luku as gbɛl a eke bʼan es ol af a ecʼany af.

Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e low na ekʼɛy a, af yogŋ a, wɛl ↄtu eke kʼot ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ low ɛgŋm ebm ɛsɛl af, aŋke low kaka anm ekʼam ayal ɛy ecʼɛŋanin na, ɛtŋ si kʼow sʼↄnym odad ebl ekʼow af si kʼotar ɛŋanin na e low akr sɛnyn sɛnyn.»
Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, lʼigbl luku as a ecʼagŋ a sos ogŋ.
Eke ów wuwal a fɛŋ ok sel a, Pↄl as jam ɛsɛl a luku ɛtŋ am atr ɛl sos es. Ow bʼuwr a, lʼɛlu wɛl es nʼim Maseduan.
Lʼɛcr wus ab af eci, lʼatr ↄmn ɛsɛl a sos es, sodad nↄnↄ a eke li dad wɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ nʼim Grɛs,
nʼanŋ yogŋ lʼij awl nyahan. Sica eke nʼam bɛbm sos eke li kʼeb mijɛtŋ nʼim Siri a, lʼiri eke Jwifɛl a am ut in ecʼasre. Ow sosiɛm lʼɛwl mɛny lʼebr Maseduan eci.
Agŋ a ekʼim am ɛwlʼl a
el: Sopatɛr Pirus jim, Bere iy, Aritak lele Sekundus ab ekʼel Tesaloni eyŋ, Gayus, Dɛrb iy, Timote, Tisik lele Trofim ab, Azi wus af ecʼagŋ.
Agŋ amua ikŋ anym im Troas am eku ɛy.
Ɛy gbɛ, eke Futufutu eke ejru anm ɛm ecʼes gbɛgbl a uwr a, sʼeb mijɛtŋ Filip ɛb ɛm Maseduan wus af; ɛtŋ eke sɛgŋ yen ɛc a, sʼim sʼɛŋn ɛl Troas, sʼanŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ lↄbŋ.
Ma ɛy ncebles a, sʼɛŋanin eke si kʼubr futufutu ɛm,
ɛtŋ Pↄl am dad dedeku a odad. Eke lɛgŋ bʼow ɛny ke li bʼow nʼim a sosiɛm, li dad odad toŋ lɛgŋ usu ubr ɛm.
Oj ab ɛm a eke sʼas luku êl afr yogŋ a, kɛniɛ nↄnↄ anŋ.
Ŋgbafrɛ nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Etikus sig es finɛtr nɛny af a. Pↄl ecʼodad a ekʼam ↄfu nɛnym a, ↄŋ mɛmn ɛwlʼl. Mɛmn a afŋn in es toŋ nʼanŋ êl afr nyahan ɛm a lʼɛy wus. Wɛl ↄny igblʼl ogŋ, kↄ lʼuw.
Pↄl us es, im ubuʼr af, ocʼr ɛtŋ dad agŋ a ninɛ: «Ɛrmij kʼók ↄny: nʼanŋ owr!»
Ɛmɛny Pↄl ɛwl uyu êl afr a, lʼubr futufutu ab ɛm li cɛc, ɛtŋ in yɛji lʼij. Ɛmɛny li dad odad ibn kpekpe toŋ ligbn ɛjn ɛy ↄkm ɛtŋ nʼim.
Iy a gbɛ anŋ owr, wɛl ocʼr im ɛtŋ ow el agŋ a fɛŋ ecʼɛrm es ɛy.
Sʼikŋ anym sʼim eke si kʼeb mijɛtŋ ot im ɛy Asos; yogŋ anake si kʼoc Pↄl a, aŋke tasi ɛm a, li dad eke li kʼɛcr wus wus eci.
Eke lʼow nʼɛŋn ɛy Asos a, sʼocʼr mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ sʼim Mitilɛn.
Sʼigb yogŋ sʼim ɛtŋ lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, sʼow sʼok lekr a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Kio a ecʼany af. Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, sʼow sʼok Samↄs, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ bʼɛny akr af a,
sʼow sʼok Mile.
Tasi ɛm a, Pↄl ɛgŋ eb eke kʼinyam es Efɛs irmnm lɛgŋ Azi wus af. Nʼam ogŋ es yecʼɛtŋ ekʼow it ke nʼánŋ Jerusalɛm Pantekↄt e lɛgŋ a.
Pↄl anŋ Mile awŋ bↄwl Efɛs eke Nyamel ecʼagŋ ekpekp a kʼow.
Eke -lʼowr -nʼɛŋan ow a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ eke mʼanŋ ↄny ab a, uwr elel eke mʼaan es ab any, lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a ɛtŋ eke mʼow Azi wus na af a.
Es is ɛm, mi kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma ↄŋn ikŋ ɛm, Jwifɛl eci asre eke bʼut ɛm e gbre ijr ecʼa sosiɛm.
Uwr any ɛkan eke low fɛŋ ekʼↄtu eke kʼakpl ↄny ecʼa, mʼocm mi lↄlm es. Dedeku fɛŋ ecʼany af, ↄny ecʼakŋ akŋ, mi dad ↄny ɛtŋ mi yɛgm ↄny yɛji.
Mʼɛsŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab eke kʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm, oc any ↄkŋ Nyam ke ↄ́ny ↄmn ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ɛm.
Sica mʼaam Jerusalɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am atʼm eke mi ki kok ab af. Low yecʼa eke bʼow ɛŋnʼm yogŋ a, mʼuwm any.
Low a cɛ eke mʼuw any a el: ɛb fɛŋ ɛm eke mi bʼɛc a, Abŋ Lala bʼɛwarʼm ɛm e gbre ij nↄnↄ lele sobel ɛm eke mʼow mʼɛy ab ab a e low.

Gbɛkↄ mʼam ɛkn eke ɛm ecʼa, ɛm ecʼowr anŋ a ↄnym any; low a cɛ ekʼↄny any a el ke mʼím toŋ mʼigŋ ɛm eci es uru a e nuŋ, ke mi kók juma a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu abulʼm a, toŋ ke mʼúwar; juma a el ke mʼↄ́b Amani Mamn a ekʼel Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a e kokoba.
Mʼɛc ↄny fɛŋ ecʼaraŋn mi dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ecʼodad; gbɛkↄ sicaca ɛm a, mʼuw any ekʼↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼow ɛknm im ij.
Na sosiɛm anake yɛfɛnyna mʼam igbl lebl ogŋ mi dad mʼɛsɛ: ekʼↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam am irm, ke ow elm ɛm e low ij,
aŋke mi dad ↄny Nyam e low a fɛŋ eke bɛbm ɛw es a; mʼocm kaka mi lↄlm es.
Ɔ̀surir ↄny obi lele Abŋ Lala eci mɛbob a ekʼↄŋ ↄny eke kʼↄsur ab ab. Ɛsɛ elel eke mɛcɛb ↄsu ɛs bʼɛw in e mɛcɛb a nyamn af ab af a, ɛ̀wr Nyamel a eke Nyam ↄl jim lokm e mebl ab ɛm
a e low ɛrm.
Mʼuw any tasi eke ɛm eci im ɛm a, agŋ ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af bʼow ok ↄny ecʼaraŋn ɛtŋ kʼow yɛbm mɛbob a kaka.
Ɛtŋ ↄny ɛm a yɛji, agŋ bʼow ok ↄkm am ↄny yadŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄmn ɛsɛl a ús ɛl jam.
Ɔ̀sur sos! Ke ↄ́kan ekʼakpo emum nyahan, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, ↄŋn ikŋ ɛm, mʼↄpim ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam nyam ecʼów ↄm.
Sica mʼam oc mʼɛlul ↄny Nyam lele in eci sↄrŋ ikŋ eci odad ab ab abu ɛm. Nʼↄny abusu eke li kʼagbr ↄny ↄmn ɛm ke nʼↄ́ŋ ↄny aja a fɛŋ eke lʼoc lʼɛw es agŋ a ekʼel in ecʼa ecʼa.
Mʼocm nyamn mʼɛwm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ecʼos, sika, lele simob sus ɛm ab af.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke ow el ɛm e sabu ab ɛm mi kok juma mʼɛŋn yecʼekʼit a agŋ a ekʼam ɛwlʼm a, lele ɛm obi ab ecʼa.
Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ mi yɛgm ↄny eke ki kokr juma ɛbɛn ke ɛ́lumn ↄgbↄru abu. Ɔ̀kan Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu eci sodad amua eke dad a: “Eke wɛl bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ob a, wɛl bʼɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn nↄnↄ akm yecʼeke wɛl bʼɛŋn ɛgŋ ɛm a.” »
Eke odad a uwr a, Pↄl ok ↄwrↄkp wus ɛl fɛŋ ab ŋↄŋn Nyam.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am ikŋ ↄŋn ɛtŋ am ɛy Pↄl af es ɛlulil eci.
Sos ↄw ɛl es nↄnↄ aŋke Pↄl dad ɛl eke wɛʼn kʼow in ɛknmʼn ij. Ɛtŋ -lʼɛwl ow toŋ -lʼok mijɛtŋ a e lís.
Eke sica sʼɛlu ɛl es a, sʼimn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci, kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ sʼok Kↄs lekr ɛm; lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, sʼim sʼok Rod lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ sʼigb yogŋ sʼim sʼok Patara baŋn.
Yogŋ, sʼɛŋn mijɛtŋ nyam ekʼam ow im Fenisi ɛtŋ sʼok ɛm sʼim.
Sʼɛkn Sipr lekr a kpekpe ɛm, sʼɛcr ow ecʼesr ɛm a, ɛtŋ sʼimn Siri eci. Sʼitr es Tir eci nanu gbɛl a, yogŋ a eke mijɛtŋ a kʼusm in ecʼɛrɛkp ab es a.
Yogŋ sʼɛŋn jam ɛsɛl ɛtŋ sʼanŋ ɛl ab ow ij nɛnɛgŋ mum nyam. Eke Abŋ Lala ɛwar ɛl a, -li dad Pↄl eke kʼúyum iim Jerusalɛm.
Gbɛkↄ eke nɛnɛgŋ gber mum a oc es a, sʼɛwl sʼebr ɛy ecʼusu im ab ɛm. Ɛl fɛŋ -lʼow -lʼɛwl ɛy, ɛl ecʼↄyↄw lele ɛl ecʼey ab toŋ sʼok ↄkm baŋn a. Okij nɛny yogŋ, sʼok ↄwrↄkp wus si ŋↄŋn Nyam.
Eke sica sʼɛlulil es a, sʼok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl gbɛ -lʼɛwl -nʼim gbugŋ gbugŋ.
Sica eke sʼigb Tir a, sʼim sʼok Pitolemais, ɛtŋ sʼuwar ɛy ecʼusu im mij af ecʼa. Yogŋ sʼɛkanin ɛb ab ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ sʼanŋ ɛl ab lɛgŋ nyam cɛ.
Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, sʼim sʼok Sesare. Yogŋ, sʼok Amani Mamn a ecʼes ↄmun ɛs Filip ecʼakŋ a ɛtŋ sʼanŋ in ogŋ a. Lʼel agŋ lↄbŋ a eke wɛl sↄsum ot Jerusalɛm a e nyam.
Nʼↄny ey ↄyↄw yar eke ɛbim egŋ, ke bʼↄb kokoba dad odad eke Nyam bʼↄŋ ɛl a.
Sʼanŋ yogŋ ow kok sɛgŋ nↄnↄ toŋ ɛtŋ kokoba ↄb ɛs nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Agabus
anŋ Jude ow.

Lʼow ɛy ogŋ a, lʼoc Pↄl eci meb er ɛm a, nʼawŋ in ecʼakr a lele sabu ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: «Kin Abŋ Lala ecʼodad eke am dad: ɛgŋ a eke meb er ɛm na el in ecʼa, Jerusalɛm yogŋ, Jwifɛl bʼow awŋʼn ɛbɛn, ke -lʼoc -lʼɛlu ow agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a abu ɛm.»
Eke sʼiri ów amua a, ɛy obi ɛy obi lele Sesare ecʼɛy lisijimɛl ab ab, si ŋↄŋn Pↄl eke kʼúyum iim Jerusalɛm.
Gbɛkↄ li dad ninɛ: «Kↄ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ikŋn ↄŋn ↄwarʼm sos es ee? Ɛm, mi bɛbm sos, ow elm ɛm ecʼawŋ a cɛ eci, kↄ ke mʼúw Jerusalɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu sosiɛm.»
Eke sʼↄtum sʼebmʼn odad ebl ɛm a, sʼatramʼn ij ɛtŋ si dad sʼɛsɛ: «Ke ow él yecʼa ekʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ am erur a!»
Eke sica sʼanŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ bɛb a, si bɛbm sos sʼam uyu sʼimn Jerusalɛm eci.
Sesare eci jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛwl ɛy Jerusalɛm; -lʼoc ɛy -nʼim ɛgŋ nyam eke kʼeb ok ɛy akŋ a ogŋ; wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn Minasↄn, Sipr lekr ɛm ecʼɛgŋ ekʼel jam ɛs lɛgŋ kpekpe, ke ir Jerusalɛm.
Yogŋ eke sʼok a, ɛy lisijimɛl a eb ɛy sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Pↄl ot ɛy ab im Jak ogŋ a; yogŋ, Nyamel ecʼagŋ ekpekp a fɛŋ as luku.
Pↄl ɛsŋn ɛl, ɛtŋ mɛwl ɛm am dad ɛl in e juma ab ɛm ecʼów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ecʼaraŋn a.
Eke -lʼirir ow ecʼodad a uwr a, -li kↄklm Nyam; ɛtŋ -li dad Pↄl ninɛ: «Ɛy lisijim, am ɛkn eke Jwifɛl fandi fandi ub Jesu nawrɛ, ke ɛl fɛŋ -li bʼucu ol a -nʼↄny es sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
Wɛl dad ɛl eke ŋ bi yɛgm Jwifɛl a fɛŋ ekʼin ir lutu a low eke wɛʼn kʼigŋ Mois ecʼol a in ɛlu es, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ŋ bi dad wɛl eke wɛʼn kʼúbrm wɛl ecʼey a ekr es, wɛʼn kí kokm Jwifɛl ecʼów a.
-Li bʼow -lʼiri tasi eke ŋ ow aŋa. Ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?
Ow akpl ke kók ow a eke si bʼow si dadʼŋ a. Aŋa, sʼↄny agŋ yar ekʼij nɛny Nyam ecʼany af.
Òc ɛl ab im, ànŋ ɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm, ke sↄ́g ɛl e low kok a e labm, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼↄtu -lʼɛr sin.
Ow ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ bʼow uw any eke ów a fɛŋ e wɛl dad ŋ e lís a elm nawrɛ; ow bʼow yɛgm eke ŋ yɛji anŋ Mois ecʼol a ecʼɛlum ɛm.

Agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl ke ub nawrɛ a ecʼa, si kok lɛl sʼawŋ ɛl si dad ɛl ów yecʼa eke si bɛbm a. Kin ów a: -li kʼijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ↄŋ sɛkp, -lʼɛgŋmn mebl, -lʼijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -lʼijmn nfaci.»
Af yogŋ, Pↄl oc agŋ yar amua ab im, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, -nʼim wɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm.
Ɛmɛny nʼim Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ nʼam dad wɛl dedeku ɛm lɛgŋ yecʼaf eke sos ayal eci low kok a bʼow uwr ke wɛl bʼow waw ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam nyam ecʼegb a.
Eke sos ayal eci sɛgŋ lↄbŋ a am ow uwr a, kpɛkŋ Azi ogog eci Jwifɛl a ɛkn Pↄl Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a. -Lʼij abra -nʼↄŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ɛtŋ -nʼↄny ow;

-nʼam ↄg -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Israɛl ecʼagŋ, ɛ̀lumn ɛy abu! Kin ɛgŋ a eke usu fɛŋ, agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af bi dad ów eŋuŋ ok Israɛl ecʼagŋ af, Mois ecʼol ab af lele Nyamel gbɛl na af ab a. Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, lʼot agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl lʼok Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm;
ow ɛm a, -ni ŋuŋn usu lala a Nyam ecʼany af.»
Tasi ɛm a, -nʼam dad ɛbɛn aŋke -lʼɛkn Efɛs iy Trofim
Pↄl ab ɛb ab ɛm. -Nʼam tutr eke Pↄl oc ɛluʼl Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ lokm a.
Likekr a eb es ɛb ab ɛm ɛtŋ ↄy ↄy a fɛŋ ɛm agŋ am anŋ ow. -Nʼↄny Pↄl -lʼↄdu -lʼɛlu ow ↄkm Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -li babl masany a.
-Nʼam ↄl eke -li kʼibi Pↄl, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl im dad Rom e kumada a ekʼanŋ Jerusalɛm a likekr a eke eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm a e low.
Kpɛkŋ lʼot srↄda eyŋ lele ɛl ecʼanym ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ lʼuru es nʼim dedeku a ogŋ a. Eke -li bʼɛkn kumada a lele srↄda eyŋ ab ab a, -lʼↄrm Pↄl ij.
Kumada a ɛri im titm Pↄl, ↄŋ wɛl ↄnyʼn ɛtŋ ↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼoc ŋgbraka yony awŋnʼn; ɛtŋ lʼibrm ɛgŋ yecʼa eke lʼel a lele low yecʼa eke nʼam kok ab ab.
Gbɛkↄ dedeku ab ɛm, agŋ amua ám dad odad na, ke bɛb ám dad ɛjeci. Kumada a ↄ́tum irim low a tasi likekr na ɛm; nʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼoc Pↄl im in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm.
Eke Pↄl anŋ êl a ecʼaf uyu usu a, srↄda eyŋ a ocʼr abu ɛm abu ɛm, dedeku a e lɛc ekʼam ɛlu ↄkm a sosiɛm,
aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ am usʼr jam ↄg dad ɛsɛ: «Wɛl íbiʼr! Wɛl íbiʼr!»
Wanci ab af eke srↄda eyŋ a am ↄl eke kʼↄny Pↄl ɛlu frutu lakp ab ɛm a, li dad kumada a ninɛ: «Kↄ mʼↄny abusu eke mi ki dadʼŋ odad tɛl ee?» Kumada a ninɛ: «Kↄ bʼɛbr Grɛk ee?
Njɛ elm Ejipt iy a eke efnɛny a cɛ is ar ke ot áru fandi yar ab im loj ab ee?»
Pↄl dad ninɛ: «Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ewʼm Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, ɛb ekʼↄny any ecʼɛgŋ. Mʼam ŋↄŋnʼŋ, ↄŋʼm abusu mi dád dedeku a odad.»
Kumada a ↄŋʼn abusu. Pↄl inym es êl a ecʼaf uyu usu a ɛtŋ lʼↄwl wɛl abu eke -li ki yewal. Eke -li yewalil a, Pↄl am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm:
«Agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ ɛsɛl ab, ìgŋn lↄru es ke írir low yecʼa eke sica mʼam ow mi dad ɛm e dogŋn ecʼa.»
Eke sica -lʼirir ekʼow am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm a, usu a irm es tiŋ ɛtŋ Pↄl dad ninɛ:
«Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ewʼm Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, gbɛkↄ Jerusalɛm aŋa wɛl gbagblʼm, ɛtŋ Gamaliɛl el ɛm e low yɛgm ɛs.
Li yɛgmʼm mʼuw ɛy lagŋɛl ecʼol ab any sɛnyn sɛnyn. Nyam eci juma kok a eci lɛc a iyʼm ɛm nↄnↄ ɛsɛ elel eke yɛfɛnyna ↄny fɛŋ ow iy ↄny ɛm ab af.
Mʼijr agŋ a ekʼam us Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb na a gbre luw eci. Mʼↄny egŋ lele ↄyↄw ab mʼok sobel ɛm.

Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a nimum ab ↄtu ekʼij daŋku ekʼow el odad nawrɛ eke mʼam dad. Ɛl ecʼabu ɛm, mʼɛŋn silɛl ɛy lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ekʼanŋ Damas a eci eke ow ɛm -li kʼuwrʼm any; ɛtŋ mʼim eke mi kʼↄny ↄmn ɛsɛl a ekʼanŋ a, mʼók ɛl ŋgbraka ke mʼót ɛl ab mʼow Jerusalɛm ke mi kók ɛl low ŋuŋ.»
«Mʼus ejagb mʼaam ɛtŋ eke mʼam titm Damas a, lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, kpɛkŋ usuayl ligbɛl nyam eci jɛjn a anŋ afr ow uburʼm es.
Mʼɛy wus ɛtŋ mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼam dadʼm ɛsɛ: “Sↄl, Sↄl, kↄ bla ɛtŋ am ijrʼm gbre ee?”
Mʼibrm mʼɛsɛ: “Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kↄ ŋ bwo elʼŋ ee?” Lebl a dad ninɛ: “Ɛm Nasarɛt e Jesu ekʼam ijr gbre a.”
Agŋ a ekʼanŋ ɛm ab a ɛkn usuayl a, kↄ -lʼirim ɛgŋ a ekʼam dadʼm odad a e lebl a.
Mʼibrm mʼɛsɛ: “Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee?” Ɛtŋ li dadʼm ninɛ: “Ìgb wus, ìm Damas, yogŋ wɛl bʼow dadʼŋ low yecʼeke Nyam am dadʼŋ eke ki kok a.”
Eke usuayl na ekʼam jɛjn a efalʼm any a, agŋ a ekʼanŋ ɛm ab a ↄnyʼm abu ɛtŋ ɛwlʼm Damas.
Yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Ananias, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs sɛnyn eke bʼɛlum ɛy ecʼol a, ke Damas e Jwifɛl a fɛŋ bʼerur in e low.
Lʼow nʼɛŋnʼm, li titmʼm ɛtŋ li dadʼm ninɛ: “Ɛm lisijim Sↄl, ɛ̀kn es!” Wanci ab af cɛ, any efl a oc es ɛtŋ mʼam ɛknʼn.
Lʼigŋ af li dad ninɛ: “Ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a ikŋ anym sↄsum ocʼŋ yecʼɛtŋ ke úw low yecʼa eke lʼerur ab any, ɛ́kn Nɛnyɛmbri Nyam Ɛs a, ke íri in obi e nɛny ɛm ecʼodad.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke kʼij in e daŋku yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ecʼany af, dád low yecʼa ekʼɛkn ke iri a.
Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm kʼeku ee? Ìgb, òk mij nuŋ, ke ŋ eci sikpl a fɛŋ tɛ́tŋ es in e nin a ecʼɛsŋ ɛm.”
Mʼɛwl mʼim Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ eke mʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, mʼɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
Mʼɛkn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛtŋ li dadʼm ninɛ: “Ògŋ es ɛy ↄkm Jerusalɛm fafa, aŋke ɛm e lís e low a eke am dad a, ɛb eyŋ a kʼow ɛgŋm ow e low ebm.”
Mi dad mʼɛsɛ: “Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, -lʼuw any tasi eke mi bʼim Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu mʼↄny agŋ mʼok sobel ɛm ɛtŋ mi bʼↄŋ wɛl ↄr agŋ eke bʼubʼŋ nawrɛ a.
Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ibi ŋ e daŋku ij ɛs Etiɛn a, ɛm yɛji mʼanŋ yogŋ. Agŋ a ekʼam ibi Etiɛn a, mʼɛgŋ ɛl e low a mʼeb ɛtŋ mʼↄsu ɛl e mob sus ɛm a.”
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dadʼm ninɛ: “Ìm, aŋke mʼow mʼɛrmʼŋ usu kpekpe, agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ogŋ.” »
Dedeku a iri Pↄl ecʼodad a toŋ batŋ igŋ yogŋ a eke li dad ów amua na a; kↄ sica -nʼam ↄg -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Ìrmnin ɛgŋ na! Ìbir ir! Lʼitm eke li kʼanŋ owr!»
-Nʼam ↄg, -nʼam ufŋ ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es, ɛtŋ -nʼam wↄwl sɛc afr.
Kumada a ibrm eke wɛl kʼↄny Pↄl ɛlu in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm, ke wɛl ↄ́rʼr ŋgbre ɛm, ow ↄŋʼn li dád odad, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼúw low a sosiɛm eke dedeku a am ↄgrʼr ab any.
Gbɛkↄ eke wɛl awŋʼn eke kʼↄrʼr a, li dad srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛs a ekʼanŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: «Kↄ ↄny abusu eke kʼↄr Rom iy tasi eke wɛl jɛjm in e low okm ee?»
Eke lʼiri ów amua a, nʼim nʼam ↄŋ in eci kumada a amani li dad lʼɛsɛ: «Bogŋ e low anake blel kok ab ee? Ɛgŋ na Rom iy tasi!»
Kumada a ow ɛŋn Pↄl ɛtŋ am ibrmʼn ɛsɛ: «Dàdʼm ↄ, kↄ ŋ Rom iy tasi ee?» Pↄl dadʼr ninɛ: «Ɛɛ, ɛm Rom iy.»
Ɛtŋ kumada a dad ninɛ: «Ɛm labm ligbɛl mi sↄg gbuŋ ɛtŋ mʼel Rom iy tasi.» Pↄl dad ninɛ: «Ɛm ecʼa gbɛ, mew ɛm ɛtŋ.»
Kpɛkŋ agŋ a ekʼam ow ↄrʼr yecʼɛtŋ ke li dád odad a, ɛwl sos mɛny; kumada a in obi yɛji erŋn ↄny eke Pↄl kʼel Rom iy tasi ke nʼↄŋ wɛl ↄny awŋ ow ŋgbraka ɛm a.

Kumada a am erur eke kʼuw low a tasi ekʼow sosiɛm Jwifɛl a am ok Pↄl ów af ab any; na sosiɛm, eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, nʼↄŋ wɛl mↄmu Pↄl es ŋgbraka ab ɛm, ɛtŋ lʼibrm egb waw ɛsɛl ecʼes ɛwɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a fɛŋ ab eke kʼas luku. Lʼoc Pↄl lʼow ɛtŋ nʼinymn ow es ɛl ecʼany af.
Pↄl ok Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ a anyamn af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: «Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ab ecʼɛb eke mʼir toŋ ke kʼit yɛfɛnyna a, ɛm tutr ɛm a, mʼↄnym low kaka eke mi kokr ɛm sosi ów af.»
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ↄŋ abusu ekʼagŋ a ekʼanŋ Pↄl saw a, ki bↄbmʼn nɛny es.
Ow ↄŋ Pↄl dadʼr ninɛ: «Ŋ anake Nyam bʼow ↄrʼŋ a; ŋ, êl eke wɛl ufur!
Anŋ aŋa eke ki jɛj ɛm e low ok ol ɛm, kↄ ol ibrm eke kʼↄŋ wɛl ↄrʼm ee?»
Agŋ a ekʼanŋ Pↄl saw a am dadʼr ɛsɛ: «Nyam ecʼegb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am wɛwr ee?»
Pↄl dad ninɛ: «Lisijimɛl, mʼuwm any ekʼow el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab ab ↄ! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ:
Pↄl uw any eke Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ a e bɛb a el Sadusiɛl ɛtŋ likpr a Farisiɛl; na sosiɛm anake ɛl ecʼany af lʼagbr lebl es li dad eke: «Lisijimɛl, ɛm Farisi, Farisi ecʼiy.
Eke mʼub luw ɛm anŋ igb owi nawrɛ a sosiɛm anake wɛl am jɛj ɛm e low ok a.»
Kpɛkŋ eke Pↄl dad ów amua a, Farisiɛl a lele Sadusiɛl ab ab ów es atar ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ luku as a ecʼagŋ a ubr ɛm sakp yony.
(Tasi ɛm a, Sadusiɛl bi dad eke luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lele abŋ ab yɛji in anm; gbɛkↄ Farisiɛl ↄny ↄmn ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.)
Likekr a am at es, ɛtŋ ol eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb ekʼel Farisiɛl ecʼogog ecʼagŋ a igb ɛrm bebl ɛm am dad ɛsɛ: «Sʼɛŋnm low ↄbr kaka ɛgŋ na ɛm. Ow kʼↄdm abŋ nyam oglog afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dadʼr odad!»
Ów es atar a am uyu afr toŋ kumada a erŋn am ↄny bake wɛl píplm Pↄl ɛm. Na sosiɛm anake nʼↄŋ in eci srↄda eyŋ a eke kʼim dedeku ab ɛm ↄny Pↄl oc es ɛl ecʼaraŋn, ke -lʼoc -nʼim ow frutu lakp ab ɛm a.
Lɛgŋ bʼuk a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛlu sos ↄkm Pↄl ecʼany af ɛtŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Sos átʼŋ es! Ij ɛm e daŋku Jerusalɛm aŋa, ɛtŋ ow it eke Rom yɛji ow kʼel ɛbɛn.»
Lɛgŋ bʼɛny eci ibribr a, Jwifɛl bɛb ut asre; -lʼɛgŋ -lʼeb -lʼij nɛny eke -li kʼijmn ob, -lʼɛgŋmn mij eke -li kʼibim Pↄl.
Agŋ a ekʼut asre ikŋ na a, ij agŋ ekŋ yony afŋ es.
-Nʼim -nʼɛŋn egb waw ɛsɛl ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a lel agŋ ekpekp ab ab ɛtŋ -li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Sʼɛgŋ sʼeb sʼij nɛny eke si kʼíjm ob kaka eke si kʼibim Pↄl.
Sica ↄny lele Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ ab ab, ìbrmn kumada a eke kʼoc Pↄl is ↄny; dàdr eke am erurir eke kʼɛkanin in e low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ɛy obi ɛm a, si bɛbm sos eke si kʼibiʼr gbuŋ ke lʼów lʼok aŋa.»
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl lisijↄw iyŋ nyam iri asre ut a ecʼodad a. Nʼim lʼɛy frutu lakp ab ɛm lʼɛwar ɛyu.
Ow ↄŋ Pↄl ɛsŋ srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛtŋ dadʼr ninɛ: «Ɛ̀wl ŋgbafrɛli na ŋ e kumada a ogŋ; nʼↄny low eke li ki dad ow.»
Srↄda eyŋ ecʼanym ɛs a ocʼr ab im kumada a ogŋ ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Pↄl, sobel ɛm ɛs a ɛsŋʼm ɛtŋ dadʼm eke mi kʼisʼŋ ŋgbafrɛli na, nʼↄny low eke li dadʼŋ.»
Kumada a ↄny ŋgbafrɛli a abu ab im saw ɛm, ɛtŋ am ibrmʼn ɛsɛ: «Bla odad iy ki dadʼm ee?»
Li dad ninɛ: «Jwifɛl nɛny okr af eke efi kʼibrmʼŋ oc Pↄl ow Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ ecʼany af; -nʼam iwr -li dad eke Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ a in am ↄl eke in kʼɛkan low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn.

Gbɛkↄ kʼùb ɛl nawrɛ! Aŋke ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ ekŋ yony ekʼafŋ es bʼow lↄl es ↄnyʼn. -Lʼɛgŋ -lʼeb -lʼij nɛny eke -li kʼijmn ob, -lʼɛgŋmn mij toŋ ke -lʼibi ow. Caca ɛm a, -li bɛbm sos, -nʼam eku ŋ ecʼodad ebl cɛ.»
Li dad ŋgbafrɛli a ninɛ: «Kì dad odad na eke dadʼm a kʼok ɛgŋ kaka.» Ɛtŋ kumada a ɛluʼl es nʼim.

Ow e jam a, kumada a ɛsŋ in e srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e yony ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: «Àsr srↄda eyŋ agŋ ekŋ lɛw, gbaŋkↄ af uyu ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw, lele mpioro ↄwl ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ lɛw ab luku ke ↄny fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos imn Sesare ncebles e wanci libarm ɛm.
Sigbaŋkↄ a yɛji eke kʼoc Pↄl im sɛnyn sɛnyn es ɛw ɛs Felis ogŋ a, bɛ̀bmn ɛl sos.»
Ɛtŋ kumada a nↄn lɛl na:
«Klod Lisias am ɛsŋn in ecʼes ɛw ɛs mamn Felis.
Jwifɛl ↄny ɛgŋ na aam ibi; eke mʼiri eke lʼel Rom iy tasi a, mʼim ɛm e srↄda eyŋ ab ab mʼɛdŋn in abu any ɛtŋ mʼeb mʼɛluʼl es.
Eke mʼerur eke mi kʼuw low a sosiɛm eke Jwifɛl am okʼr ów af ab any a, mʼocʼr mʼim ɛl e Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ a ecʼany af.
Mʼɛkn eke ów a eke -nʼam dad -lʼok ow af a, el ɛl obi ɛm ecʼol a ecʼów, gbɛkↄ wɛl ↄtum ɛŋnm low ↄbr ekʼow ɛm li kʼɛŋn luw oglog ke wɛl ɛluʼl sobel ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ɛwarʼm eke Jwifɛl am ut in ecʼasre a, mʼerur eke mi kʼocʼr mʼis ŋ ɛtŋ mʼibrm agŋ a ekʼam okʼr ów af a eke kʼↄŋʼn dedeku ŋ ecʼany af.»
Srↄda eyŋ a ɛlum ol a eke wɛl ↄŋ ɛl a: -lʼoc Pↄl ɛtŋ ncok ɛm -lʼɛwl ow toŋ -lʼok Antipatris.
Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, srↄda eyŋ a ekʼim lakr ɛm a, ɛwl ow frutu lakp ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛlu gbaŋkↄ af uyu ɛsɛl ab es aam usu a Pↄl ab.
Eke -nʼimn -lʼokr Sesare a, gbaŋkↄ af uyu ɛsɛl a oc lɛl a ↄŋ es ɛw ɛs a ɛtŋ -lʼoc Pↄl -lʼɛlu ow abu ɛm.
Es ɛw ɛs a awl lɛl a ɛtŋ ibrm Pↄl wus yecʼaf ecʼɛgŋ eke li kʼel a.
Eke lʼiri ekʼow el Silisi wus af ecʼɛgŋ a,
li dad ow ninɛ: «Ŋ ecʼagŋ a ekʼam okʼŋ ów af a bʼow ow a, mʼow mʼibrmʼŋ low.» Ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼɛw Pↄl es Erↄd ecʼêl gbɛl ab ɛm.
Sɛgŋ yen bʼɛc a, egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ow Sesare agŋ ekpekp bɛb ab lele awoka nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Tɛrtulus ab. -Lʼow es ɛw ɛs Felis ecʼany af eke -li kʼↄŋ Pↄl dedeku.
Wɛl ɛsŋ Pↄl, ɛtŋ Tɛrtulus am okʼr ów af sodad amua ɛm: «Es ɛw mamn, ŋ e nin ɛm, sʼam ir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ ŋ e nyimn sɛnyn ɛm anake ów amua tititŋn akpl ɛy ecʼɛb na ecʼa.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, usu fɛŋ ecʼów eke si bʼɛŋn a, sʼam ɛluʼŋ ow e bia ɛrm nyam ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ mʼerurm eke mi kʼirmnʼŋ lɛgŋ nↄnↄ, na sosiɛm anake mʼam ŋↄŋn ŋ ekʼɛrm kʼɛy ŋ es, ke íri ɛy ecʼodad a; ow kʼow ibnm.
Sʼɛkn ekʼɛgŋ na el ɛgŋ ɛm e nuŋuŋ: li bʼis odad wus na nimum eci Jwifɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ lʼel Nasariɛl
ecʼogog a ecʼes ɛw ɛs.
Lʼɛw eke li ki ŋuŋn Nyamel gbɛl a sos;
ow sosiɛm sʼɛwʼr abu af. [Sʼerur eke si ki jɛj in e low sʼok ɛy ecʼol ab ɛm,
kↄ kumada Lisias ɛdŋn abu any ɛtŋ lɛc ɛm lʼeb ow ɛy ecʼabu ɛm.
Nʼↄŋ abusu eke agŋ a ekʼam okʼr ów af a kʼow ŋ ecʼany af.]
Eke ibrmʼn low, ↄtu eke ŋ obi yɛji kʼuw low a tasi ekʼow sosiɛm sʼam okʼr ów af ab any.»
Jwifɛl a akr lebl af, dad ekʼow el low nawrɛ.
Es ɛw ɛs Felis ↄwl Pↄl abu eke ki dad odad ɛtŋ Pↄl eb odad dad ninɛ: «Mʼuw any eke akpo nↄnↄ ɛm el ɛb na eci jɛj ok ɛs, ow anake mʼↄny ↄmn ke mʼam ow ŋ ecʼany af eke mi kʼayal sos a.
Ɛsɛ elel eke ↄtu eke ŋ obi kʼotar akr ab af a, ow kokm sɛgŋ lɛw yony afŋm es eke mʼow Jerusalɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ eci.
Wɛl ɛŋnm im mʼatarm ów es Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ mʼokm dedeku a al ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu oglog ɛb ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, agŋ amua kʼↄtum ayalm ów a eke -nʼam okʼm af a e low.

Gbɛkↄ low na gbɛ, ŋ ecʼany af, mʼam mʼɛgŋ mʼeb: Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼejagb a ecʼus ɛm a, ke ɛm lagŋɛl e Nyam a anake mʼam igŋ nuŋ a. Jwifɛl bi dad ekʼow el ejagb yadŋ, kↄ ɛm mʼub ol e silɛl a lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ab nawrɛ.
Mʼↄny ↄmn ikŋ na Nyam ɛm, ↄmn a eke ɛl obi yɛji -nʼↄnyn, eke Nyam bʼow igbm agŋ amamn lele eŋuŋ ab luw ɛm a.
Na sosiɛm anake mʼam atr sos es eke mi kokrm ɛm sosi ów af Nyam ecʼany af lele agŋ ecʼany af ab a.
Eke mʼↄpi Jerusalɛm akpo nↄnↄ a, mʼɛwl mɛny mʼim eke mi kʼɛlum ɛm ecʼɛb a abu os ɛm, ke mʼáp Nyam ob.
Eke -nʼɛŋanʼm Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ke mʼuwar sos ayal ecʼes gbɛgbl a ŋ̂; agŋ nↄnↄ anm ɛm ab, ɛtŋ sↄ́g yɛji anm.
Gbɛkↄ Azi eci Jwifɛl nyam nyam anŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ blel -nʼↄnyn low ɛm ab, ɛl anake blel -nʼinym es ŋ ecʼany af aŋa ke -lʼokʼm ów af a.
Oglog ekʼagŋ amua ekʼanŋ aŋa a ɛkn low ŋuŋ eke mi kok lɛgŋ a eke mʼanŋ Sanedrɛn ecʼagŋ a ecʼany af a, -lʼↄtu eke -li ki dad.
Mʼinym es ɛl ecʼany af mʼigbl lebl ogŋ mi dad eke mʼub luw ɛm anŋ igb e low nawrɛ; kↄ low na cɛ eci anake yɛfɛnyna wɛl inymnʼm es ↄny ecʼany af jɛj ok ecʼab ee?»
Felis ekʼiri Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu eci ejagb owi a ok es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn a, oc jɛj ok a ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: «Lɛgŋ eke kumada Lisias bʼow ow a, mʼow mi dad ↄny ecʼodad a.»
Nʼↄŋ srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛs a abusu eke kʼɛw Pↄl es sobel ɛm, gbɛkↄ lʼɛw ow abusu es eke ow lawlɛl a ki kok ow e lís e low.
Sɛgŋ bɛb bʼɛc a, Felis lele ɛy Drusiy Jwif yↄwi ab ab ow. Nʼↄŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Pↄl ow ɛtŋ nʼam iri ↄmn eke ow ↄny Jesu Krist ɛm a ecʼodad.

Gbɛkↄ eke Pↄl ↄb nuŋ am dad es an mamn ecʼodad, sos es ↄnyn e low lele jɛj ok e lɛgŋ e low ab a, ow am ↄr Felis ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: «Sica ↄtu eke kʼim gↄŋ. Lɛgŋ eke mʼow mʼɛŋn abusu a, mʼow mʼɛwl mʼɛsŋʼŋ.»
In ecʼↄmn ɛm a ke Pↄl bʼow ↄŋʼn os; na sosiɛm anake sakp nↄnↄ li bʼɛsŋ Pↄl ow ot nɛnym in ab a.
Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn a cɛ toŋ akpo yony ɛc, ɛtŋ Pↄrsius Fɛstus usr Felis usu ɛsɛ es ɛw ɛs af. Eke Felis erur eke kʼeb sↄdŋ Jwifɛl ogŋ a, lʼɛw Pↄl es sobel ɛm.
Sica Fɛstus ow ɛy in eci wus ab af eb juma; kpɛkŋ ekʼow ij sɛgŋ nyahan a, lʼigb Sesare lʼuyu nʼim Jerusalɛm.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ecʼany ɛsɛl tasi ab ab ow in ogŋ a am ok Pↄl dedeku es. -Nʼam at -lʼibrm ow
eke ow kʼɛgŋ ɛl nɛnym ↄŋ Pↄl ow Jerusalɛm; tasi ɛm a, -lʼut Pↄl ecʼasre ɛtŋ -lʼerur eke -li kʼibi ow ejagb us ab ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ Fɛstus dad ninɛ: «Pↄl anŋ sobel ɛm Sesare ɛtŋ; ɛm obi yɛji ow kʼow ibnm mʼow mʼɛwl mʼim yogŋ.
Ow akpl ke ↄny e any ɛsɛl a ów ɛwlʼm Sesare ke ekʼɛgŋ ikŋ na kok low ŋuŋ a, ókar ir dedeku es.»
Fɛstus kok sɛgŋ niwn oglog sɛgŋ lɛw cɛ ɛl ab, ɛtŋ lʼɛwl nʼim Sesare. Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, nʼim jɛj ok ɛm ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼoc Pↄl ow.
Eke Pↄl ow a, Jwifɛl a ekʼanŋ Jerusalɛm ow a, ɛlul il ɛm ɛtŋ am ↄny yadŋ ɛgbɛl okʼr af ekʼɛl obi yɛji -lʼↄtumn eke -li kʼayal.
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl am dogŋn sos dad ɛsɛ: «Mi kokm low ↄbr kaka Jwifɛl ecʼol a e lís, Nyamel gbɛl a e lís lele Sesar e lís ab.»
Fɛstus ekʼerur eke kʼeb sↄdŋ Jwifɛl ecʼany af a, ibrm Pↄl ninɛ: «Erur eke kʼim Jerusalɛm wɛl jɛj low na ok ɛm ecʼany af ee?»
Pↄl dad ninɛ: «Aŋa eke mʼinym es a, el Sesar eci jɛj ok usu nyam, ɛtŋ aŋa anake wɛl ki jɛj ɛm e low ok a. Ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ obi ŋ obi uw any ab af a, mi kokm Jwifɛl low ŋuŋ kaka.
Eke mi kok low ekʼow ɛm mi kʼuw, ke mʼɛgbrm eke mi kʼuw. Gbɛkↄ eke ów a eke -nʼam dad -lʼokʼm af a elm nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ocm im ↄↄm ɛl. Mʼam ibrm eke mi kʼɛkn Sesar!»
Sica eke Fɛstus dad ów in ecʼów ↄm ɛsɛl ab ab bake ow uwr a, li dad ninɛ: «Ibrm eke kʼɛkn Sesar, bʼow im in ecʼany af.»
Sɛgŋ bɛb bʼɛc a, ɛb ebu Erↄd Agripa lele lisijↄw Berenis ab ow Sesare eke kʼɛsŋn Fɛstus.
Eke -nʼanŋn yogŋ -li kokr sɛgŋ nↄnↄ a, Fɛstus dad Pↄl ecʼodad ok Agripa. Kin odad a: «Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ aŋa eke Felis ɛw es sobel ɛm.
Eke mʼim Jerusalɛm a, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ecʼagŋ ekpekp ab ab okʼr dedeku es ɛtŋ ibrm eke mi kʼↄbʼr low.
Mi dad ɛl eke ow ɛcam Rom eyŋ ab eke kʼɛlu ɛgŋ eke wɛl am cicr ab es ↄŋ agŋ eke okʼr dedeku es a, eke lʼↄbarm any wɛl ab; ow it eke wɛl kʼↄŋʼn abusu li dad in e cicr a ecʼodad yɛ.
Ow sosiɛm -lʼow aŋa ɛm ab ɛtŋ mʼirmnm lɛgŋ; eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, mʼim jɛj ok usu a ɛtŋ mʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼoc ɛgŋ a ow.
In eci cicr ɛsɛl a ow, gbɛkↄ -li cicrm ow ów eŋuŋ a ekʼow ɛm mʼↄny tutr a e kaka af.
-Lʼatar ów es ow ab ɛl obi eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛm lele ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Jesu eke uw ke Pↄl am at dad eke owʼn nʼanŋ owr a e low af.
Mʼuwm elel eke mi ki kokr low nɛnɛ ɛm ab any; na sosiɛm anake mʼibrm Pↄl eke kʼim Jerusalɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke yogŋ wɛl jɛ́j low na ok a.
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl ɛgŋm; lʼibrm eke li kʼel sobel ɛm ɛs toŋ ke Sesar ↄny low dadʼr. Mʼↄŋ abusu eke wɛl kʼɛwʼr es toŋ ke mʼↄ́ŋʼn nʼim Sesar ogŋ a.»
Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: «Mʼerur tasi ekʼɛm obi yɛji mi kʼiri ɛgŋ na nɛnym.» Fɛstus dad ninɛ: «Efi bʼow iriʼr nɛnym.»
Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, Agripa lele Berenis ab ow agŋ ekʼus any ab ɛtŋ ok luku as usu a ecʼarabu ab ɛm kumadaɛl lele ɛb ab ɛm ecʼany ɛsɛl ab. Fɛstus ibrm eke wɛl kʼoc Pↄl ow.
Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: «Ɛb ebu Agripa lele ↄny fɛŋ eke anŋn aŋa ɛy ab a, am ɛkan ɛgŋ na: in sosiɛm Jwifɛl nↄnↄ ow ɛknʼm Jerusalɛm lele aŋa ab, ɛtŋ am dad ekʼowʼn kʼánm owr ij.
Ɛm gbɛ, mʼɛkn eke li kokm low kaka ekʼow ɛm li kʼuw. Gbɛkↄ eke in obi lʼibrm eke li kʼɛkn Sesar a, mʼɛgŋ mʼeb eke mi kʼↄŋʼn nʼim yogŋ.
Mʼↄnym low tasi eke mi ki nↄn in e nuŋ af mʼↄŋ Sesar; na sosiɛm anake mʼocʼr mʼow ↄny ecʼany af, ŋ ɛb ebu Agripa ecʼany af tasi, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl bʼibrmʼn low, ke mʼↄ́ny low nyam mi nↄn.
Ow am ɛwʼm es adŋ sos ɛm eke tasi ɛm a, wɛl kʼoc sobel ɛm ɛs im Rom, ke wɛl kʼayalm ów a sosiɛm eke ow af wɛl am cicrʼr a!»
Erↄd Agripa dad Pↄl ninɛ: «Abusu ɛruʼŋ es eke ki dad odad dogŋn sos.» Ɛtŋ Pↄl igbl abu ogŋ am dogŋn sos sodad amua ɛm:
«Ɛb ebu Agripa, sos ɛm am iŋnʼm eke yɛfɛnyna mi kʼow ŋ ecʼany af mi dad odad mi dogŋn sos ów a fɛŋ eke ow af Jwifɛl am cicrʼm a eci.
Tasi ɛm a, uw Jwifɛl ecʼɛb ir owi lele ɛl eci ów es atar ab ab any. Ow sosiɛm, mʼam ŋↄŋnʼŋ eke kʼiri ɛm ecʼodad a ɛrm es ok ɛm.
Ɛm eci ŋgbafrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ ecʼes eke mʼan a, Jwifɛl fɛŋ uw any; -lʼuw elel eke nuŋ ↄb ɛm ɛtŋ mʼiir ɛm ecʼɛbr a ecʼaraŋn lele Jerusalɛm ab ab any.
-Lʼuwʼm any lɛgŋ kpekpe; eke -lʼerur, -lʼↄtu eke -li ki dad low nawrɛ: mʼel Farisiɛl ecʼogog ecʼɛgŋ
ekʼɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛw tuↄtuↄ akm ɛl lawlɛl a fɛŋ ecʼa.
Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm mʼanŋ jɛj ok ecʼany af aŋke mʼↄny ↄmn Nyam e low a ekʼɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl ɛw es ab ɛm.
Ɛy ecʼeb lɛw yony a ecʼagŋ a yɛji am ↄmn ɛwar na eke kʼɛy ↄkm; ow sosiɛm -nʼam igŋ Nyam nuŋ ari at ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab. Ɛb ebu Agripa, ↄmn ikŋ na sosiɛm ecʼanake Jwifɛl am okʼm ów af a!
Ɔny Jwifɛl, ke Nyam ígbm agŋ luw ɛm a, bla ɛtŋ am ubr ekʼow el low ekʼↄtu ee?
Ɛm obi yɛji, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, mʼↄny tutr eke akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm ow akpl eke mi kʼogŋ Nasarɛt e Jesu e nin a ar.
Low na anake mi kok Jerusalɛm a. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ↄŋʼm abusu akpasu mum nyam eke mi kʼok ↄmn ɛsɛl nↄnↄ sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ mi bʼɛlu abusu es lɛgŋ eke wɛl bʼↄb ɛl low luw ecʼa.
Sakp nↄnↄ mi bʼim Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu mʼↄŋ wɛl ijr ɛl gbre yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼↄwr sar ɛl ecʼↄmn ↄny ab ɛm. Ɛl ecʼɛrm bebl eke mʼↄny a agb nↄnↄ, toŋ ow bʼↄŋ mʼim sɛb ɛjecʼɛm mʼijr ɛl gbre.»
«Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ nyam egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ↄŋʼm abusu eke mi kʼim Damas mi kok juma.
Ɛb ebu Agripa, mʼus ejagb ɛtŋ lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, mʼɛkn usuayl ekʼanŋ afr am ɛjn ow; jɛjn a afŋn ligbn ecʼab es, ɛtŋ am ok ɛm lele agŋ a eke ɛl ab mʼus ejagb ab ab af.
Ɛy fɛŋ sʼok wus ɛtŋ mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼam ikŋ dadʼm Ebre ɛm ɛsɛ: “Sↄl, Sↄl, bla ɛtŋ am ijrʼm gbre ee? Kↄ bla ɛtŋ am ɛlu lɛc ↄkm ɛsɛ id eke in ecʼes ɛw ɛs bʼiyr likŋ af ee? Lɛc ↄfr ↄfr cɛ am ij.”
Mʼibrm mʼɛsɛ: “Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kↄ bwo el ŋ ee?” Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ: “Ɛm Jesu a eke am ij gbre a.
Sica ìgb inym es. Mʼɛlu sos ↄkm mi yɛgmʼŋ eke mi kʼocʼŋ el ɛm e juma kok ɛs; bʼow ij ɛm e daŋku dád ok agŋ elel eke ɛkanʼm
yɛfɛnyna, ke dád yecʼa eke ɛmɛny mʼow mi yɛgmʼŋ a yɛji.
Mʼow mʼↄsuʼŋ Jwifɛl ecʼany af lele agŋ ɛjecʼa eke mʼow mʼɛrmʼŋ ɛl ogŋ ab ab ecʼany af.

Mʼam ɛrmʼŋ eke kʼim fig fig ɛl anyamn, ↄny ot ɛl es ncebn ɛm ot ok ɛl usuayl ɛm, Satan ecʼabusu ab ɛm eke -nʼanŋn a ot ↄŋ ɛl Nyam. Eke -li bʼↄny ↄmn ɛm ɛm a, -li bʼow -nʼɛŋn ɛl e sikpl a ecʼoc ap lele es sig usu nyam agŋ a ekʼel Nyam ecʼab ab.” »
«Ɛb ebu Agripa, ɛbɛn a, es ɛkn owi a ekʼanŋ afr ow ke mʼɛkn a, mʼɛgbrm ow e low ij.

Kↄ mʼikŋ anym mi dad Nyam odad mʼok Damas ecʼagŋ a lele Jerusalɛm ecʼab ab, Jude ecʼagŋ a lele ɛb ɛjecʼɛm ecʼagŋ ab; ɛl fɛŋ, mʼibrm ɛl eke -li kʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm, -lʼɛwl -li lɛr Nyam, ke -li kok ów eke bi yɛgm ɛl ecʼitŋn ikŋ na tasi a.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a eke mʼanŋ a, Jwifɛl ↄnyʼm ke ↄl eke kʼibiʼm a.

Gbɛkↄ Nyam ↄsuʼm toŋ it yɛfɛnyna ɛtŋ mʼanŋ eke mi kʼij daŋku agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af, kʼow el agŋ ekʼↄny any, kʼow el agŋ ekʼↄnym any. Mi dadm odad ɛjeci ekʼow elm kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl lele Mois ab ecʼa eke dad eke bʼow ɛy a cɛ:
Mesi a bʼow ij gbre, bʼow el ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ekʼigb luw ɛm, bʼow ↄb usuayl a e kokoba ok ɛy ecʼɛb a lele ɛbr ɛjeci ecʼagŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a.»
Eke Pↄl am dad ów in e sos dogŋn ecʼa, Fɛstus barmʼn es lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm ninɛ: «Pↄl, nuŋ ɛm am uŋʼŋ! Wewr lɛl nↄnↄ toŋ ow am ɛwʼŋ nuŋ ɛm uŋ!»
Pↄl dadʼr ninɛ: «Ɛgŋ gbɛl, nuŋ ɛm uŋmʼm. Sodad a eke mʼam dad a el nuŋ ɛm es ok e sodad lele low nawrɛ tasi ab.
Ɛb ebu Agripa otar ów amua akr uw any, ow sosiɛm in ecʼany af mʼↄtu eke mi ki dad ↄmn ɛm. Mʼuw any tasi eke lʼuw ów a fɛŋ any, aŋke ow elm es lↄl ɛm e low.
Ɛb ebu Agripa, kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ecʼodad a eke dad a ub nawrɛ ee? Mʼuw any ekʼub nawrɛ!»
Agripa dad Pↄl ninɛ: «Am tutr eke lɛgŋ tɛl na ɛm cɛ ↄtu eke kʼitŋnʼm mʼel kretiɛn ee?»

Pↄl dadʼr ninɛ: «Kʼow él lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm oglog sɛgŋ nↄnↄ ɛm, mʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam ekʼow kʼélm ŋ sↄny cɛ, kↄ ↄny fɛŋ ekʼam irir ɛm ecʼodad yɛfɛnyna a anake kʼanŋn ɛsɛ elel eke mʼanŋn ab af a, kↄ ŋgbraka amua gbɛ kʼánm ɛm!»
Ɛb ebu a, es ɛw ɛs a, Berenis lele agŋ a eke -nʼanŋn yogŋ ab ab igb,
ɛtŋ eke -nʼimn saw ɛm a, -nʼam dadarir ɛl ↄfr ɛm -lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛgŋ na kokm low ↄbr owi ekʼow ɛm li kʼuw, oglog kʼow ɛm wɛl ɛluʼl sobel ɛm.»
Ɛtŋ Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: «Blel ɛgŋ na ibram eke kʼɛkn Sesar ana, ke blel wɛl ɛ́luʼl es.»

Sica wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke si bʼow sʼim Itali mijɛtŋ ɛm eci. Wɛl oc Pↄl lele sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ɛjeci bɛb ab abul srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛs nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Julius. Lʼel Rom eci srↄda eyŋ a ecʼeb a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ “Sesar Ogust eci eb” a ecʼanym ɛs.
Sʼok Adramit eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke kʼimn Azi e manu a ecʼa, ɛtŋ sʼim. Aritak yɛji anŋ ɛy ab; lʼel Tesaloni, Maseduan wus af a ecʼɛgŋ.
Eke lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, sʼow sʼok Sidↄn. Julius eke am ↄny Pↄl sɛnyn sɛnyn a, ↄŋʼn abusu eke li kʼim lʼɛkn lawlɛl yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl kók in e lís e low.
Eke ɛmɛny sʼanŋ yogŋ sʼigb sʼaam a, sʼaru Sipr lekr a eke bʼɛdŋn lɛf any a, aŋke lɛf am ɛlu ↄbr ɛy.
Sʼubr okij a eke titm Silisi wus lele Panfili wus ab a, ɛtŋ sʼim sʼok Mira, Lisi wus af.
Yogŋ, Julius ɛŋn Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam ekʼaam Itali ɛtŋ lʼot lʼok ɛy ɛm.

Sʼus mij pɛtɛ pɛtɛ sɛgŋ nↄnↄ ɛtŋ gbre ɛm kpa, sʼim sʼok Nid baŋn any af. Eke lɛf a yɛbm ɛy eke si kʼↄkŋ any sʼim kpekpe a, sʼɛcr wus a ekʼusm owr Salamone ɛb a ecʼa sʼok Krɛt lekr a ecʼesr ɛm a eke bʼɛdŋn lɛf any a.
Gbre ɛm ɛbɛn, sʼaru ligigl a sʼim sʼok usu nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Manu Amamn, ekʼanŋ Lase baŋn saw.
Sʼirmn lɛgŋ nↄnↄ, ɛtŋ mij us a yɛji am ɛw tuↄtuↄ aŋke lakpo am uwr.
Ow sosiɛm Pↄl am ɛwar ɛl dad ɛsɛ:
«Agŋ lawlɛl, mʼam ɛkn eke usu im a bʼow ɛw tuↄtuↄ: mijɛtŋ a lele sɛrɛkp ab ab bʼow uŋ, ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji sʼↄtu eke si kʼuw.»
Gbɛkↄ srↄda eyŋ ekŋ yen ecʼanym ɛs a ↄny ↄmn mijɛtŋ nyimn ɛs a lele mijɛtŋ ɛs ab ab ɛm akm Pↄl e sodad a.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny nanu a akplm eke lɛtŋ kʼanŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy na ɛm. Na sosiɛm agŋ nↄnↄ a ekʼanŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a erur eke kʼigb yogŋ: -lʼerur eke -lʼↄtu, ke -nʼim -lʼok Fenis, Krɛt eci nanu nyam eke ↄkŋ esr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog a lele afr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog ab ab. Yogŋ anake -li kʼanŋ -lʼuwar lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
Esr ɛm eci lɛf a am ɛlu pɛtɛ pɛtɛ, ɛtŋ -nʼam tutr eke ɛl eci tutr a bʼow ɛy af. -Nʼↄŋ mijɛtŋ a aam ɛtŋ am aru Krɛt eci ligigl a saw saw.
Gbɛkↄ wanci ab af cɛ lɛf ligbɛl nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ “afr ɛm e lidr ogog e lɛf” anŋ lekr a e mafɛny ab ɛm am ɛlu ow.
Lɛf a oc mijɛtŋ ab ab aam: ow ɛw tuↄtuↄ eke wɛl kʼↄny mijɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ si yɛb ow oc ɛy ab im.
Sʼɛcr esr ogog eci lekr liy nyam eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Koda a, ɛtŋ ow ɛdŋn ɛy abu any. Gbre ij kpa ɛm, sʼↄtu sʼↄny es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ likekli a ekʼucur mijɛtŋ gbɛl a.

Mij ɛsɛl a ɛwl oc ɛluʼl mijɛtŋ ab ɛm. Sica -lʼoc meb -li cucu mijɛtŋ gbɛl a -lʼɛlul ɛm. Eke -nʼam uru eke li kʼim -lʼitr es mrici af Libi ogog a, -lʼɛlu dondo nuŋ a erŋ ɛtŋ -li yɛb lɛf a am oc ɛl ab im.
Lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlul ɛy tuↄtuↄ toŋ lɛgŋ ɛnyn ɛy ɛtŋ -nʼam ot sɛrɛkp a -lʼok erŋ.
Lɛgŋ bʼɛny akr af a, ɛl obi ecʼabu ɛm -lʼot mijɛtŋ a e mob a -li wↄwl erŋ.
Sɛgŋ nↄnↄ eke wɛl ɛknm ligbn, ɛknm mílɛ́l ɛtŋ lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlu lɛc ɛm cɛ. Sʼↄnym ↄmn kaka eke si bʼow sʼↄtu sʼanŋ owr.

Lɛgŋ kpekpe ekʼagŋ a ekʼus mij a ijm ob kaka. Pↄl igb ɛl ecʼany af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: «Agŋ lawlɛl, blel irir ɛm ecʼodad a eke mʼam dad eke si kʼókmn ↄkm Krɛt a, ke blel sʼↄbrmn es abur na, sʼirmnmn mob.
Gbɛkↄ sicaca ɛm a, mʼam ibrm eke kʼↄnyn ɛrm susu, aŋke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼow irmnm in e sel a, kↄ mijɛtŋ a sↄny coco cɛ bʼow uŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, ncok a ɛm e Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e juma a ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs nyam owʼm saw
ɛtŋ dadʼm ninɛ: “Pↄl, erŋn kʼↄ́nyʼŋ! Ow it eke kʼim Sesar ecʼany af, ke Nyam ecʼerur a eke ↄny ŋ ecʼa sosiɛm, li sↄ́g agŋ a ekʼus mij ŋ ab a.”
Na sosiɛm, agŋ lawlɛl, ↄnyn ɛrm susu aŋke mʼↄny ↄmn Nyam ɛm: ow bʼow el ɛsɛ elel eke li dadrʼm ab af.
Gbɛkↄ si bʼow sʼuŋ sʼinym es lekr nyam af.»
Ncok lɛw yar ɛm eke sʼanŋ mij af ke lidgbegb a am oc ɛy ab im Mediterane eci okij ab af ana. Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, mij ɛsɛl a am ɛkn ɛsɛ wus cɛ wɛʼn am titm af.
