-Lʼɛlu meb eke wɛl ucu ob leg leg erŋ eke -li ki bɛbmn ɛtŋ -lʼɛkn eke mij a eci sibn a ij abu likŋ lele lɛw lↄbŋ ab; -li bʼim kpekpe tɛl a, ɛmɛny -lʼɛlu meb a erŋ ɛtŋ yogŋ ow ij abu likŋ lele niwn ab.
-Nʼam uru eke mijɛtŋ a kʼↄb lob, ow sosiɛm, lɛtŋ jam a -lʼɛlu magbis yar ɛrŋ eke -li kʼↄny lɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ -nʼam eku es ogŋ ɛm eke lɛgŋ kʼɛny.
Mij ɛsɛl a am ↄl eke kʼok ↄkm lɛtŋ ab ɛm; -lʼusm es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es erŋ ɛtŋ -nʼam ub nyandrɛ -lʼɛsɛ: «Sʼaam lɛtŋ a ecʼanym a sʼucur lɛtŋ es ↄnyn ob ab es.»
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl dad Julius lele srↄda eyŋ a ab ab ninɛ: «Eke agŋ amua anm mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, kʼow ↄtumn anmn owr.»
Ow sosiɛm, srↄda eyŋ a bubr simeb a ekʼↄnyn es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es a ɛtŋ -li yɛb ow im.
Gbuŋ ke usu ót es a, Pↄl ibrm ekʼagŋ a fɛŋ kʼij ob ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Kin, yɛfɛnyna ab a, sɛgŋ lɛw yar eke am ekur ɛrm mij ab ke kʼijmn ob kaka.
Mʼam ibrm eke kʼijr ob aŋke ow el ↄny e sel ɛŋn eci. Ɔny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼow irmnm in e sin nuŋ a e nyam.»
Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, lʼoc futufutu, lʼɛlu Nyam bia wɛl ecʼany af, lʼubr ɛm ɛtŋ nʼam ij.
Agŋ a fɛŋ sos at es ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -lʼij ob a.
Ɛy fɛŋ eke sʼanŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, sʼij agŋ ekŋ yen yen sakp yony agŋ ekŋ nyahan agŋ lɛw nↄhↄn.
Eke -lʼijr ob molok iy ɛl a, -lʼot egb a eke -lʼotr ab -nʼaam a -lʼok erŋ eke mijɛtŋ a kʼɛw fuɛfuɛ.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, mij ɛsɛl a uwm wus a eke -li titmn ab any, gbɛkↄ -nʼam ɛkn wus ekʼusm ɛw lↄy kʼɛlu mrici ɛtŋ -lʼerur ekʼabusu ɛru es, -lʼitr mijɛtŋ ab es yogŋ.
-Ni mↄmu magbis ab es -lʼok erŋ, ɛtŋ -ni mↄmu mɛtŋbar eke wɛl bi nyiman lɛtŋ a e simeb a yɛjʼes. Ɛbɛn a, -lʼɛw gbad lɛtŋ nɛny a eke lɛf kʼitr lɛtŋ a, ɛtŋ -nʼimn mrici a ogŋ.
Kↄ -nʼim -lʼↄbr sɛc ekʼanŋ mij any yony ecʼaraŋn ɛtŋ mijɛtŋ a abal inym es yogŋ. Lɛtŋ anym a ɛmn mrici ab ɛm ɛtŋ ↄtum iim ij, ɛtŋ mra am bↄbm lɛtŋ jam ab es lɛc ɛm.
Srↄda eyŋ a am erur eke kʼibi sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼábŋm mij ɛym ↄkm.
Gbɛkↄ Julius a am erur eke kʼeb Pↄl ɛlu es, ɛtŋ lʼɛdŋn wɛl eke -li ki kokmn low a eke -nʼↄnyn ow e tutr a. Nʼↄŋ agŋ a eke bʼabŋ mij a abusu eke kʼikŋ anym ok erŋ im ákpaf;
agŋ likpr a ot ↄgↄg og oglog mijɛtŋ a eci mob ekpr a us ɛl jam. Ɛbɛn ekʼagŋ a fɛŋ im itr es ke sos irm es ana.
Eke sica sʼok ↄkm es abur na ɛm a, sʼiri eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ lekr a Malt.
In ecʼɛb eyŋ a eb ɛy sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ eke mij am an ok wus ke lɛfr yɛji am ow a, -li fuf al ligbɛl nyam ekʼɛy fɛŋ sʼiwr sʼɛlul ɛm.
Pↄl oc milɛl eke wɛl abal eke kʼok al, kↄ al a ↄŋ lorŋn ɛy ↄkm arumʼn abu ab.
Eke lekr a ecʼagŋ a ɛkn lorŋn ekʼarum Pↄl abu ab a, -nʼam dad ɛl ↄfr ɛm -lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛgŋ na ɛgŋ ibiu tasi; lʼɛy ↄkm okij ab ɛm, kↄ Nyam ɛm e jɛj ok a ↄↄm abusu eke li kʼanŋ owr.»
Gbɛkↄ Pↄl ufŋ abu es ↄwl lorŋn a alm, ɛtŋ ob kaka kokmʼn.
Agŋ a am eku eke kʼɛknʼn lʼew oglog lʼɛy luw kpru ɛm. Gbɛkↄ eke -lʼekur ow ibn ke -lʼɛkan eke ob kaka kokm Pↄl a, -lʼitŋn tutr ɛtŋ -nʼam dad ekʼow el nyàm mum nyam.
Saw yogŋ, lekr a ecʼes ɛw ɛs gbɛl a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Publius a ecʼusu anŋ. Ɛgŋ ikŋ na eb ɛy erur ɛm ɛtŋ ↄŋ ɛy es ɛru usu toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
Publius ɛs a ɛru es aŋke lɛfr ↄl am ↄnyʼn ɛtŋ nʼam ↄs sob yɛji. Pↄl im ɛknʼn, atʼr abu nuŋ, ŋↄŋn Nyam ↄŋʼn ɛtŋ ewlmʼn.
Na bʼɛc a, lekr a ecʼↄ́lu ɛjecʼa yɛji ow ɛtŋ -lʼewl.
Agŋ a ɛlu ɛl ecʼɛlum fɛŋ ↄkm ɛy e lís, ɛtŋ wanci a eke sʼam ow sʼigb sʼim a, -nʼↄŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ekʼit usu imn ecʼa.
Eke ow kok awl nyahan a, sʼeb Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke anŋ lekr ab ɛm lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum a sʼim. Wɛl bʼɛsŋ mijɛtŋ a “Sinyam Oli”.
Sʼow sʼok Sirakus ecʼɛb ab ɛm, sʼanŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
Yogŋ sʼɛcr ligigl a eci sʼim sʼok Rejio ɛb ɛm. Lɛgŋ bʼɛny a, esr ɛm eci lɛf a ↄb nuŋ am ɛlu ɛtŋ sʼeb sɛgŋ yony sʼim sʼok Pusↄl.
Ɛb ab ɛm, sʼɛŋn agŋ lisijimɛl ekʼibrm eke si kʼanŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ lↄbŋ, ɛtŋ sica sʼigb sʼaam Rom.

Rom ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl a iri ɛy ecʼamani ɛtŋ ow toŋ ok usu eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Apius ecʼAn Ɔl Usu a ɛy ecʼↄbr eci. Agŋ ɛjeci ɛŋn ɛy usu eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Ɛŋanin Usu Nyahan a. Eke Pↄl ɛkn ɛl a, lʼɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ sos atʼr es.
Eke sʼow sʼok Rom a, wɛl ↄŋ Pↄl abusu eke kʼir in ogŋ a ke srↄda iy nyam am ↄsuʼr.

Ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Pↄl ɛw Rom eci Jwifɛl ecʼes ɛwɛl a abu in ogŋ a. Eke -lʼasr luku a, Pↄl dad ɛl ninɛ: «Agŋ lisijimɛl, mi kokm low ŋuŋ ɛy ecʼagŋ a e lís, ɛy lagŋɛl a ecʼɛb ir owi e lís ɛtŋ wɛl ɛwʼm abu af Jerusalɛm, ocʼm ↄŋ Rom eyŋ.
-Lʼibrm im ów ɛtŋ -lʼerur eke -li kʼɛluʼm es aŋke ɛm ɛm a, -nʼɛŋnm low ekʼow af -li kʼↄbʼm low luw eci.
Gbɛkↄ Jwifɛl a erurm ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ mʼibrm eke mi kʼɛkn Sesar ke wɛl ebr ɛm ecʼodad ab ɛm, kↄ ow elm ɛm ecʼɛb a eke mi kʼↄŋ dedeku eci.
Kin low a sosiɛm eke mʼerur eke mi kʼɛkn ↄny ke mi dad ↄny odad a. Tasi ɛm a, mʼanŋ ŋgbraka na ɛm ɛgŋ a eke Israɛl ecʼagŋ a bʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm a sosiɛm.»
-Li dad ow ninɛ: «Sʼɛŋnm ŋ e lís e lɛl kaka eke kʼanŋ Jude ow ɛtŋ ɛy lisijimɛl kaka anm yogŋ owm tↄkŋm ów okm ɛy oglog dadm ɛy ŋ ecʼodad ŋuŋ.
Kↄ sʼam erur eke ki dad low yecʼa ekʼam tutr a sʼiri, aŋke sʼuw any ekʼusu a fɛŋ agŋ erurm Nyam eb na ekʼanŋ ɛm a e low.»

-Lʼɛw lɛgŋ nyam Pↄl ab ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a bʼow a, -lʼow nↄnↄ -nʼɛŋn ow yogŋ a eke lʼir a. Ibribr toŋ ncebles, Pↄl am otar ów a akr ok ɛl: nʼam dad wɛl Nyam ecʼes ɛw a ecʼodad ɛtŋ Mois ecʼol a lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl e silɛl a eke nʼam dad ow ecʼodad ab ɛm, nʼam ↄl eke li kʼeb wɛl Jesu eci.
Agŋ bɛb ów a ok es sos ɛm, kↄ likpr a ɛgŋm eke kʼub nawrɛ.
Ɛl ↄfr ɛm a nɛny okrm ɛl af, ɛtŋ -lʼigb -nʼaam. Pↄl dad ɛl odad na ninɛ: «Abŋ Lala ↄny low ij tasi lɛgŋ a eke nʼam dad ↄny lagŋɛl odad kokoba ↄb ɛs Esayi e nɛny ɛm lʼɛsɛ:
Ìm dad agŋ amua a:
Ow bʼow ok ↄny ↄru ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn, kↄ kʼow irimn;
bʼow lɛɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn, kↄ kʼow ɛknmn.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua itŋn ɛw tuↄtuↄ;
-li babl ↄru es, -li bubur anyamn,
yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛl eci anyamn a kʼɛ́knm es,
ɛl ecʼↄru a kʼírim ów,
ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a kʼánm es,
-lʼɛwlmn -lʼowmn ɛm ogŋ bake mʼéwlm ɛl.»
Pↄl igŋ af dad ninɛ: «Sica úwr any eke Nyam eci sel ɛŋn ecʼodad a ow agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a eci:
ɛl gbɛ, -li bʼow -lʼiri!» [
Eke Pↄl dad ów amua a, Jwifɛl a ɛl ↄfr am atar ów es im lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm.]
Pↄl anŋ êl a eke lʼeb ab ɛm akpo yony. Li bʼeb agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼow ɛknʼn a.
Li bi dad Nyam eci es ɛw a ecʼodad ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm agŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist owi ↄmn ɛm tasi, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛdŋnmʼn.
Romans: Ɛm Pↄl Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, ɛm mʼam awŋ ↄny lɛl na. Nyam ɛsŋʼm eke mi kʼel ɛrm ɛs ɛtŋ lʼoc lʼɛwʼm saw eke mi kʼↄb in ecʼAmani Mamn a e kokoba.
Amani Mamn na, Nyam ɛcr in e kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ɛm ɛwar ow e low godʼɛtŋ in eci Silɛl lala ab ɛm.
Amani Mamn a am dad Jim Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad. Yecʼekʼel in e mew ɛm ecʼa, wɛl ewʼr ɛb ebu David, lagŋ ecʼeb ab ɛm.
Eke Abŋ Lala igbmʼn luw ɛm a, Nyam yɛgm eke lʼel Nyam ecʼIy ekʼↄny abusu fɛŋ.
Jesu Krist kokʼm bibm mʼel ɛrm ɛs, yecʼɛtŋ ke in e nin a e sos usr sosiɛm a, mʼↄ́ŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ecʼagŋ eke uwm Nyam any a, úbʼr nawrɛ ke ↄ́ny in ecʼɛlum.
Ɔny yɛji, anŋn agŋ amua ɛm, eke Jesu Krist ɛsŋ ↄny a sosiɛm.
Ɔny fɛŋ eke anŋn Rom a, ↄny eel Nyam ecʼɛrm erur ɛtŋ lʼɛsŋ ↄny eke kʼow anŋn in ecʼagŋ ab ɛm, ke íir ɛb in eci. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy!
Mʼam ikŋ anym mʼɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm mʼɛlu Nyam bia, ↄny fɛŋ eci, aŋke wɛl am dad ↄny ecʼↄmn a ecʼodad wus nimum af.
Tasi ɛm a, eke mi bʼↄb Nyam Jim ecʼAmani Mamn a, ke Nyam eci juma anake mʼam kok ɛm ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a.
Ɛtŋ in, lʼij ɛm e daŋku eke mʼↄ́pim ↄny ecʼↄkn ɛm e Nyam ŋↄŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
Mi bʼibrmʼn sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke li kʼↄŋʼm abusu mʼow ↄny ogŋ a, eke ow el in ecʼerur tasi,
aŋke ↄny ecʼɛkn am awʼm tasi yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼísm ↄny Abŋ Lala eci ob ap ab, ke ínymn es kikri.
Nawrɛ tasi ɛm a, kʼaw ke mi bʼow mʼɛŋn ↄny a, ↄmn a eke ↄny lele ɛm ab sʼↄny a, ↄ́ŋ ke sʼátarir sos es.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼerur eke kʼuwr any eke sakp nↄnↄ mi tutr eke mi kʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, kↄ toŋ sicaca ɛm a, mʼↄtum mʼɛŋnm ow ecʼabusu. Mʼam ↄmn eke ɛm e juma a, ↄny ogŋ yogŋ yɛji bʼow ↄsu ey amamn ɛsɛ ɛbr ɛjecʼɛm ecʼab af.
Ow it eke mi ki kok agŋ fɛŋ e juma, Grɛkɛl lele Barbarɛl ab,
agŋ ekʼuw low any lele agŋ eke uwm low any ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm anake, ow am awʼm tasi eke mi kʼↄb ↄny Amani Mamn e kokoba, ↄny yɛji eke iir Rom a.
Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn a ecʼↄb a ↄ́nym im ɛ́s, aŋke lʼel Nyam e lɛc ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a e sↄg eci: krɛkrɛ ɛm a Jwifɛl, ke sica agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
Amani Mamn a bi yɛgm elel eke Nyam bʼocr agŋ nyim nyim in ecʼany af a: ow bʼↄb nuŋ ↄmn a eke -li bʼoc -lʼɛlu ow ɛm ab ɛm ɛtŋ ow bʼuwr ↄmn ab ɛm cɛ. Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a wɛl bʼawl:
Afr kpekpe ɛtŋ Nyam am ɛlu in ɛcʼɛrm bebl a ↄkm aŋke agŋ el sikpl ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low ŋuŋ. Ɛl ecʼów eŋuŋ kok ab ɛm, -li bʼɛdŋn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke ki kok low.
Ɛɛ, low eke wɛl ↄtu eke kʼuw any Nyam e lís a, ayl ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam in obi ayal ↄŋ ɛl.

Nyam ecʼabusu a ekʼↄnym nuŋ a lele fɛŋ a eke in obi in obi a lʼel ab ab a, el ów nawrɛ eke wɛl ɛ́knm. Gbɛkↄ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄtu eke kʼɛkn ɛl eke li bi lɛr ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a. Ow sosiɛm a, agŋ ↄnym sos dogŋn eb kaka ij.

Tasi ɛm a, -lʼuw Nyam any, kↄ -lʼusrm ow sos ɛtŋ -nʼↄↄm ow bia. Ke ow tasi ekʼow it eke wɛl ki kok Nyam ecʼana. Kↄ ɛl e sow tutr a itŋn el nyamb e sow tutr, ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼɛrm a eke low any uw anm ɛm a, irmn usuayl a.
-Li bʼocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛwru, kↄ -lʼel eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl.
Ow a eke -li kʼigŋ anygbɛl e Nyam a ekʼúwm a nuŋ a, -lʼigŋ ekŋ ekpr nuŋ. Ekŋ ekpr amua wɛl aku ɛl nʼanŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke bʼuw, oglog ↄr, oglog mindey ekʼɛli akr yar lele morŋn ab af.
Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ɛl ecʼɛrm ɛm ecʼów eke bʼaw ɛl a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ɛl obi ɛm, -li bʼibar ɛl eci sos megl a ɛ́s ɛm.
-Nʼↄny Nyam e lís e low nawrɛ a -lʼitŋn ów yadŋ ɛm, yecʼa eke Nyam kok a -lʼigŋ ow nuŋ ɛtŋ -li kok ow e lís owi Kok Ɛs a ecʼusu a. Anygbɛl él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -lʼusr ów aw a eke bʼↄŋ ɛl ɛ́s a jam a. Ɛl ecʼↄyↄw a ɛ́ruam egŋ ab ij, kↄ ↄyↄw ɛjecʼab -li bʼɛru, ɛtŋ ow el low eke wɛl am kokm agŋ ɛm.
Egŋ yɛji bi kok low nyam a cɛ. -Lʼɛruamn ↄyↄw ab ij, kↄ ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ecʼerur bʼaw ɛl. -Li bʼɛru ɛl egŋ ↄfr ɛtŋ ow el ɛ́s! Ow ↄŋ -li bʼɛŋn ɛl obi ɛm a es abur eke ɛl eci es an ŋuŋ a ism ab.
Eke -lʼerurm eke -li kʼuw Nyam any a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -lʼus ɛl eci sow tutr yadŋ a jam, ɛtŋ -nʼam kok yecʼekʼitm eke wɛl ki kok a.

Ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony iy ɛl ɛm gbↄŋ. -Li bi kok low ŋuŋ, -li bʼerur ob ekʼel ɛl lawlɛl ecʼa, -lʼel agŋ eŋuŋ ɛtŋ nyamnɛyr iy ɛl ɛm gbↄŋ. -Li bʼibi agŋ, -li bʼatar ów es, -li bʼɛju ɛl lawlɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low mɛju ecʼabŋ ab. -Li bi dad ów eŋuŋ -lʼok agŋ af,
ɛtŋ -li bi cacak wɛl. -Lʼel Nyam ecʼefnu, -li bi wɛwr ɛl lawlɛl, es ɛfu iy ɛl ɛm, -li bʼij nɛny, ɛtŋ -li bʼɛcr akunda fɛŋ ɛm -li kok low ŋuŋ. -Lʼɛluamn agŋ a eke ew ɛl a.
-Lʼel anyambu, -lʼɛluamn ɛl eci nɛny eke -li bʼij a, ɛtŋ -lʼel agŋ eke ↄnym ɛrm lele sↄrŋ ikŋ ab.
Ke -lʼuw Nyam eci jɛj ok ab any tasi cɛ. Agŋ a eke bi kok nɛnɛ a it eke kʼuw. Sica -li bi kok ów amua, kↄ ɛmɛny, -li bʼerur agŋ a eke bi kok a yɛji.

Ow sosiɛm anake, ŋ eke bi jɛj awlŋɛl ecʼów ok a, ke él Jwif, ke kʼélm Jwif, ŋ ecʼa ↄnym sos dogŋn eb kaka, aŋke ŋ bi jɛj awlŋɛl ecʼów ok, kↄ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Na sosiɛm, eke bi jɛj ɛl ecʼów ok a, ow el ŋ sosi eke am ↄbr low.
Ɛɛ, ɛy sʼuw any eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a el tasi agŋ eke bi kok nɛnɛ a e lís.
Ŋ bi jɛj agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a ok, gbɛkↄ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Ŋ am ↄny ↄmn tasi eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a kʼow ↄbmʼŋ low ee?
Nyam ↄny ɛrm mamn, li bʼɛgŋ low lʼeb, ɛtŋ li bʼeku low. Kↄ na anake erurm ab ee? Kↄ ŋ, uwm any eke Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn na am ↄŋ abusu eke kʼitŋn ŋ ecʼes an ab ee?
Gbɛkↄ kʼerurm eke kʼiri, kʼerurm eke kʼitŋn. Na sosiɛm anake am eb ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛw es ŋ e lís ɛrm bebl e lɛgŋ a ecʼa. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam bʼow ɛlu ↄkm eke nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm li bi jɛj agŋ ecʼów lʼok.
Ɛtŋ

Agŋ bɛb bʼucu ↄny es kok low mamn, yecʼɛtŋ ke -nʼanŋ Nyam ecʼanygbɛl ab ɛm. -Li bʼↄl yɛjʼeke Nyam ki susm ɛl es, ɛtŋ -li bʼↄl owr anŋ a eke úwrm ab es. Agŋ amua, Nyam bʼow ↄŋ ɛl -nʼanŋ owr in ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Agŋ bɛb bʼↄbrʼr any, -lʼɛluamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam kↄ -li bi yɛb low ŋuŋ am nyimn ɛl. Agŋ amua ecʼa, Nyam bʼow yɛgm ɛl in ecʼɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
Gbre lele erŋn ab bʼow ↄny agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a, ow bʼow ↄb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
Sica Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a, es susm a lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ab, li bʼow nʼↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, ow bʼow ↄb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam okm ereb agŋ ɛm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke am kok sikpl ke úwm Mois e sol ab any a, bʼow uw eke -lʼuwm ol ab any yɛji. Gbɛkↄ agŋ a fɛŋ eke uw Mois ecʼol ab any ke ɛbɛn yɛji am kok sikpl a, ol a bʼow jɛj ɛl e low ok.
Bwo ecʼɛgŋ Nyam bʼoc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af ee? Ow elm agŋ a eke bʼiri Mois ecʼol a nɛnɛ cɛ a. Njaŋ, kↄ agŋ eke bʼɛlum ol a.
Agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl a uwm Mois ecʼol ab any. Gbɛkↄ ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb bi kok ɛsɛ elel eke ol a bi dad ab af. Agŋ amua -lʼuwm ol any, gbɛkↄ ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ol a cɛ wɛl yɛji wɛʼn uw any af.

Aŋa ɛm a, -li bi yɛgm low nyam: ów a eke ol bi dad a nↄn ɛl ecʼɛrm ab ɛm, sow tutr eke -li bʼↄny ɛl obi ɛm a bʼɛlu ow e low ↄkm. Sakp oglog ɛl e sow tutr a bi dad eke -lʼuwm kok, ke sakp bɛb ecʼa wɛl dad eke -lʼuw kok.
Ów amua fɛŋ eke mi dad a bʼow ok ↄkm kpata jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn na eke mʼam ↄb a am dad ab af. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam bʼow ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm jɛj fɛŋ a eke lↄl es agŋ ecʼɛb ir ɛm a e low ok.
Ŋ eke bʼij en ɛsɛ in Jwif a, ol af anake bʼeb lɛc a ɛtŋ ntotŋ bʼokʼŋ ŋ e Nyam a eci.
Ŋ uw yecʼa eke li bʼerur ab any, ɛtŋ ol bʼɛlumʼŋ abu sↄsum yecʼa eke akpl a oc.
Ŋ bi tutr eke ↄtu eke ki nyimn ány eflu, ke él agŋ ekʼanŋ ncebn ɛm a ecʼusuayl,
agŋ ekʼuwm low any a lel ɛl ekʼɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm ab ab eci low yɛgm ɛs. Ɛɛ, ŋ bi tutr eke ol eke ↄny a ↄŋʼŋ ↄny low any uw lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam tasi ab.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ŋ eke bi yɛgm awlŋɛl low a, ám yɛgmnmʼŋ sosi low! Ŋ bi dad eke ɛgŋ kʼiy mil, ke ŋ ám iy!
Ŋ bʼɛdŋn nfaci ij, ke ŋ ám ij. Ŋ bʼↄny sinyam yadŋ eci sifn, kↄ bʼiy ɛl e Sinyamel ab ɛm e simob a!
Ŋ ntotŋ bʼokʼŋ ol ekʼↄny a eci, gbɛkↄ ɛ́luam ol, ow bʼↄŋ ↄny Nyam ecʼany a oc es.
Tasi ɛm, kin yecʼeke wɛl bʼawl Nyam Lɛl ɛm:
Eke bi kok low yecʼa eke ol bi dad a, ke nawrɛ tasi likr es ubr el low akplu. Kↄ eke ɛ́luam ol, ɛtŋ ubr likr es bↄbↄ yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke ubrm es ab af.
Kin low nyam: ɛgŋ nyam ubrm likr es, gbɛkↄ li bʼɛlum Nyam ecʼol a. Kↄ Nyam kʼow ɛgŋm ebmʼn ɛsɛ likr cɛ owʼn ubr es af ee?
Ɛgŋ ikŋ na ubrm sos megl af e likr es, gbɛkↄ li bʼɛlum ol. Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, in anake li bʼow li jɛj ŋ owi lʼok, ŋ eke ɛluam ol a. Ke ŋ nana ↄny ol a eke wɛl nↄn a lele likr es ubr ab!
Tasi ɛm a, Jwif tasi a, elm ɛgŋ a eke bʼan es sos megl af ɛsɛ Jwif af a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a yɛji, elm sos lɛl a eke wɛl bʼubr es a.
Kↄ Jwif tasi a, in lʼel ɛgŋ a eke el Jwif ɛrm ɛm a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a, el ɛrm ɛm ecʼa.
Likr es ubr na, Nyam ecʼAbŋ ab ɛm li bʼanŋ lʼow, kↄ ow elm ol eke wɛl nↄn ab ɛm. Jwif tasi a ɛ́ŋnm in ecʼaw a agŋ ɛm, kↄ Nyam ɛm li bʼɛŋn.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke bla lowi Jwifɛl ↄny eke agŋ likpr a ↄnym ee? Ɛtŋ kↄ ob nyam anŋ eke wɛl bʼɛŋn likr es ubr ab ɛm ee?
Ɛɛ, wɛl bi lɛr ɛkn a, ob ligbɛl anŋ ɛm! Aŋke Jwifɛl anake Nyam ikŋ anym abul in e sodad ebl a.
Kↄ sica, eke Jwifɛl bɛb ijm nɛny nyam, ke ow bʼow ɛdŋn Nyam eke kʼij nɛny nyam ee?
Njaŋ ow kʼow elm ɛbɛn! Kin yecʼekʼit eke si kʼuw any: Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, kↄ agŋ a fɛŋ anake el ayadŋu a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam e lís ninɛ:

Kↄ eke ɛgŋ nyam bi tutr eke low ŋuŋ eke sʼam kok a am ɛlum abu wɛl ɛkn eke Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, wɛl ↄtu eke ki dad ɛsɛ Nyam ijm nɛny nyam eke li bʼↄr ɛy in ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm ab ee? (Aŋa mʼam dad odad ɛsɛ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ af.)
Njaŋ ow kʼow elm ɛbɛn! Tasi ɛm a, blel Nyam ijm nɛny nyam, ke ayaf lʼↄtu eke li ki jɛj wus e low lʼok ee?
Ɛgŋ nyam ↄtu eke ki dadr in sosi ɛsɛ: eke ɛm eci yadŋ ab ɛm Nyam e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a bʼɛy ↄkm kpata in ecʼanygbɛl a eci, ke sica bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ, ɛm, ɛmɛny mʼↄny es abur ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ee?
Ow otarir es eke wɛl ki dad ɛsɛ: «Si kók low ŋuŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke low nimamn ánŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm!» Agŋ bɛb bʼok ɛy ów af ɛtŋ bi dad ɛsɛ low na anake ɛs bi yɛgm a. Ow it eke agŋ amua na kʼɛŋn gbre.
Sica ayaf sʼↄtu eke si ki dadr a? Kↄ ɛy Jwifɛl, sʼagb sʼakm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ee? Njaŋ ow elm ɛbɛn! Mʼikŋ anym mʼɛlu low nyam ↄkm: Jwifɛl lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ab ab anŋ sikpl ecʼabu ɛm.
Ɛtŋ kin yecʼeke Nyam Lɛl dad:
Ɛgŋ kaka anm eke el nyim nyim, ɛgŋ nyamni bↄbↄ yɛji anm!
Ɛgŋ kaka ↄnym nuŋ ɛm,
ɛgŋ kaka ↄ́lm Nyam es!
Ɛl fɛŋ -nʼŋgboŋ ejagb mamn ab af,
ɛtŋ -nʼuŋ ɛl fɛŋ.
Ɛgŋ kaka am kokm low mamn, ɛgŋ nyamni bↄbↄ yɛji!
Ɛl eci ɛmn geg a el uwↄmu eke anŋ foŋ;
ɛl eci anm ab ɛm li bʼewl mɛju,
ɛtŋ ɛl eci nɛnym lokm a, labŋ eci sar a anŋ.
Ɛl e nɛny ab ɛm ofn e sodad lele sodad eke bi bubm ɛgŋ ew es ab iy gbↄŋ.
Ɛgŋ ibi ecʼa, -li bʼuru es fafa -nʼim -lʼibi.
-Li bi ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ ɛl eci ejagb ab af
ɛtŋ -li bʼewl gbre usu a fɛŋ.
Ɛl, -lʼuwm ɛrm es ɛy eci ejagb ab any,
ɛtŋ -lʼel agŋ eke ↄnym Nyam ecʼɛlum kaka.
Gbɛkↄ sʼuw any eke low fɛŋ eke ol am dad a, ow el agŋ a eke kʼɛlum ol a nʼam dad. Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum dogŋnm sos, kↄ wus nimum ɛy udu Nyam ecʼany af.

Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ yecʼeke kʼɛlum Nyam ecʼol a e low fɛŋ ekʼanŋ ɛm a, ke ow sosiɛm Nyam ócʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼanm eke kʼↄtu kok ɛbɛn a. Tasi ɛm a, ol, low nyam cɛ li bi kok: li bʼↄŋ agŋ abusu uw any eke -nʼↄny sikpl.
Sica gbɛ, Nyam ɛlu elel eke li bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼel nyim nyim in ecʼany af ke ow élm ol eci ɛlum ɛm a ↄkm. Ɛtŋ Mois ecʼol a lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab yɛji dad ow e low.
Nyam bʼↄŋ agŋ él nyim nyim in ecʼany af ɛl ecʼↄmn a eke -li bʼoc -lʼɛlu Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Li bi kok low na nʼↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼↄny ↄmn Krist ɛm a, aŋke ɛl fɛŋ -lʼel kpɛŋ kpɛŋ:
ɛl fɛŋ -nʼↄny sikpl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka ↄ́tum kokm low sↄbↄ a eke Nyam am ibrm a iym nɛny.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm, bʼɛcr Jesu Krist eke bi sↄg ɛl sikpl ecʼabu ɛm a, ↄŋ ɛl -lʼel nyim nyim ↄfr ɛm.

Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke Jesu kʼok in e mebl ab es egb waw ɛm. Ɛtŋ in ecʼegb waw ab ɛm, Jesu ɛŋn agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm a e sikpl a ecʼoc ap. Nɛnɛ a, Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm elel eke lʼel nyim nyim sɛgŋ fɛŋ a: lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, lʼeku low ɛtŋ lʼɛwm low nʼↄↄm agŋ ɛl e sikpl a eci. Kↄ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, Nyam am yɛgm elel eke li bʼↄŋ agŋ el nyim nyim in ecʼany af a. Tasi ɛm a, nʼam erur eke li kʼel nyim nyim ke nʼↄ́ŋ agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn Jesu ɛm a yɛji él nyim nyim.

Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke Jesu kʼok in e mebl ab es egb waw ɛm. Ɛtŋ in ecʼegb waw ab ɛm, Jesu ɛŋn agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm a e sikpl a ecʼoc ap. Nɛnɛ a, Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm elel eke lʼel nyim nyim sɛgŋ fɛŋ a: lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, lʼeku low ɛtŋ lʼɛwm low nʼↄↄm agŋ ɛl e sikpl a eci. Kↄ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, Nyam am yɛgm elel eke li bʼↄŋ agŋ el nyim nyim in ecʼany af a. Tasi ɛm a, nʼam erur eke li kʼel nyim nyim ke nʼↄ́ŋ agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn Jesu ɛm a yɛji él nyim nyim.
Sica, kↄ sʼↄny ów ɛjeci eke ow ɛm si kʼɛw sos ee? Njaŋ, ow anm ij! Bla sosiɛm ecʼee? Aŋke yecʼeke el ow tasi a, ow elm ol ecʼɛlum a, kↄ ke ↄ́ny ↄmn.
Ɛɛ, kin ow eke sʼam tutr a: agŋ bʼel nyim nyim aŋke -li bʼↄny ↄmn, kↄ ow elm eke -li bi kok ol ecʼów a fɛŋ ekʼam ibrm a sosiɛm.
Sica Nyam na, kↄ Jwifɛl sↄny cɛ eci Nyam lʼel ee? Kↄ lʼelm agŋ ɛjecʼa gbɛ e Nyam ee? Kaka! Lʼel ɛbr ɛjeci ecʼagŋ a yɛji e Nyam,

aŋke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ. In anake li bʼow nʼↄŋ Jwifɛl eke wɛl bubr ekr es a, él nyim nyim ɛl ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny in cɛ anake li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛbr ɛjeci ecʼagŋ a eke wɛl bubrm ekr es a yɛji él nyim nyim ɛl ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm a.
Nɛnɛ a, eke si bʼↄny ↄmn, ke ol ob ↄfr ↄfr sʼam ↄŋʼn lʼel ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Kↄ ol ecʼany a nana anake sʼam ɛlu ↄkm tasi a.
Sica bla lowi sʼↄtu eke si ki dad Abraham ɛy lagŋ eci lís ab ee? In obi e lɛc ɛm, bla obi lʼↄtu nʼɛŋn ee?
Blel ow el in ecʼów eke li kok a sosiɛm Nyam ocʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ana, lʼↄtu eke li kʼij nɛny, kↄ ow elm Nyam ecʼany af gbɛ.
Tasi ɛm a, bla Nyam Lɛl dad ee?
Eke ɛgŋ bi kok juma a, wɛl bi sↄgʼr labm. Labm sↄg na elm ob ap, kↄ ob ekʼit eke wɛl kʼↄŋʼn.
Sica, ɛgŋ nyam kí kokm juma kaka, ke nʼↄ́ny ↄmn Nyam eke bʼↄŋ sikpl ɛs él nyim nyim ab ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ na, Nyam bʼocʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, in ecʼↄmn a eke nʼↄny a sosiɛm.
Na sosiɛm anake David am dad ɛgŋ a eke Nyam bʼoc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ke ow élm in ecʼów kok sosiɛm a e low ɛsɛ:
Ehe ɛsɛl a el agŋ a eke Nyam ↄny ɛl ecʼów ↄbr oc es,
ke tɛtŋ ɛl eci sikpl ab es a.
Ehe el ɛgŋ a eke Nyam úsm in e low ↄbr
e low jam a eci.
Kↄ ehe na, Jwifɛl eke bi bubr ekr es a sↄny cɛ ecʼee? Agŋ ɛjecʼa eke am bubrm ekr es a ɛl gbɛ ow elm ɛl ecʼee? Mʼikŋ anym mi dad mʼɛsɛ:

Ɛtŋ kↄ bogŋ e lɛgŋ ɛm Nyam ocʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ee? Kↄ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke lʼubr likr es a, oglog ow a eke li kʼubrm es ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke lʼubr likr es a, kↄ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke li kʼubrm es a.

Gbuŋ ke lʼúbr likr es a, ke Abraham el nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af ŋ̂, in ecʼↄmn a eke lʼoc lʼɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ sica ow e jam a, nʼɛŋn likr a eke lʼubr es a eci mɛny ɛwr. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na bi yɛgm eke in ecʼↄmn a eke lʼoc lʼɛlu Nyam ɛm a sosiɛm ow ↄŋ ɛtŋ Nyam ocʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af. Nɛnɛ a ow ↄŋ Abraham el agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼↄny ↄmn Nyam ɛm a ecʼɛl ɛs, eke -lʼubrm likr es yɛji. Ɛtŋ agŋ amua ekʼubrm likr es a, Nyam bʼoc ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.

Ɛtŋ Abraham cɛ, el Jwifɛl eke bubr ekr es a ecʼɛl ɛs. Aŋa mʼerur eke mi ki dad agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr a elm sos af eci cɛ, kↄ ke ɛmɛny bʼucu ɛy ɛs Abraham eci sɛwl a ↄny es a e low: in, lʼikŋ anym lʼoc ↄmn lʼɛlu Nyam ɛm gbuŋ ɛtŋ lʼow lʼubr likr es.
Nyam ɛwar Abraham lel in ecʼalaw a eke bʼow ok ↄkm in ɛm a, eke -li bʼow -lʼij wus aja.
Gbɛkↄ low ɛwar na, ow elm eke Abraham ɛlum ol a sosiɛm Nyam dadm ɛwm es. Li dad aŋke lʼoc Abraham ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ow ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm.
Sica eke aja a eci ij a el ke kók ol ecʼów a eke am ibrm a, ke ↄmn elm low kaka, ɛtŋ Nyam eci low a eke ɛwar a yɛji elm low ij.
Tasi ɛm a, ol ecʼɛluam a bʼɛsŋ Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl, kↄ eke ol anm a, wɛl kʼↄtum ↄbm ol es.

Ow sosiɛm a, ↄmn eke wɛl bʼoc ɛlu Nyam ɛm a anake bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ij aja a, ɛtŋ ow el bibm eke wɛl bʼɛŋn ↄfr ɛm tasi. Na sosiɛm ob a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a el agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Abraham ecʼalaw a eci. Ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ a eke bʼɛlum ol a sↄny, kↄ agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ Abraham eke el ɛy fɛŋ eci ɛy ɛs af a yɛji.
Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Abraham el ɛy ɛs Nyam ecʼany af. Ow ɛm anake nʼↄny ↄmn a, Nyam a eke bʼↄŋ agŋ eke uw a igb anŋ owr, ke ↄny abusu eke ob ekʼanm wɛl ɛ́knm a, kok ow anŋ wɛl am ɛkn a.
Low ↄmn kaka anm low a eke Nyam ɛwar a eci lís ij, gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji Abraham ↄmn cɛ. Lʼoc in ecʼↄmn a lʼɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm, lʼel bieku nↄnↄ ecʼɛl ɛs. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɛtŋ eke ow anŋ akpo tɛl cɛ ke nʼↄny akpo ekŋ yen a yɛji, in ecʼↄmn a digrm kaka. Ɛtŋ lʼuw any yɛjʼeke in e sos megl a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke uw af, ɛtŋ ɛy Sara yɛji kʼↄtum ewm iy ij.
Ɛbɛn yɛji, Abraham irmnm in ecʼↄmn a ɛtŋ bɛbarm kaka, Nyam e low ɛwar a e lís. Catŋ nana anake in ecʼↄmn a obn ke li kↄklm Nyam a.
Lʼuw low nyam gbɛ any tasi: yecʼa eke Nyam ɛwar a, nʼↄny abusu nↄnↄ eke li ki kok.
Na sosiɛm
Ba Nyam Lɛl bi dad ɛsɛ:
ke sodad amua elm Abraham cɛ eci.
Kↄ ɛy yɛji ow ot ɛy es, ɛtŋ Nyam bʼow lɛr ɛy ecʼↄmn a. Tasi ɛm a, in eke lʼigbm ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu luw ɛm a, in ɛm sʼↄny ↄmn.
Ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Nyam ↄŋ wɛl ibi Jesu, gbɛkↄ Nyam igbmʼn luw ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼél agŋ nyim nyim.
Nɛnɛ anake Nyam oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛy ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm a; ɛtŋ sica sʼanŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm in ab, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Jesu anake kok ke sʼↄtu sʼucu ↄmn ɛm, bibm eke sʼɛŋn a sʼↄny es a. Ɛtŋ sʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm aŋke sʼam ↄmn eke si bʼow sʼanŋ Nyam ecʼanygbɛl ab ɛm.
Ow eke akpl tasi a el, si bʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm eke ow el gbre sʼam ij yɛji. Ɛtŋ sʼuw any tasi eke gbre ij bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ↄny ɛrm susu,
ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke bʼↄny ɛrm susu a, li bʼij lɛc eke ses babur bʼanŋ yɛji. Ɛgŋ eke bʼij lɛc es abur ɛm a, li bʼↄny low ↄmn,
ɛtŋ low ↄmn na ɛ́jum ɛgŋ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala ɛm Nyam ɛcr yibr ɛy e mɛrm a in ecʼerur a.
Tasi, eke sʼanŋ ke sʼↄnym lɛc kaka sikpl ecʼany af a, yogŋ anake Krist ɛgŋ eb uw ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl eci, lɛgŋ ab af eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw es a.
Sʼuw any eke ow ɛw tuↄtuↄ eke ɛgŋ kʼɛgŋ eb uw ɛgŋ nyim nyim eci. Sica ów amamn kok ɛs ecʼa, kʼaw ke ɛgŋ átr sos es ɛgŋ eb uw.
Gbɛkↄ kin elel eke Nyam yɛgm ɛy in ecʼerur eke nʼↄny ɛy ecʼa: nʼↄŋ Krist ow uw ɛy eci, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke sʼel sikpl ɛsɛl a.
Sica, eke in ecʼegb waw a ↄŋ ɛy sʼel agŋ nyim nyim, ow ayl tasi yɛjʼeke li bʼow li sↄg ɛy Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a e lís.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke sʼel Nyam ecʼefnu a, nʼↄny lʼokr ɛy ɛm in ab Jim eci luw ab ɛm. Sica eke nʼↄny lʼokr ɛy ɛm a, ow ayl tasi yɛji eke li bʼow li sↄg ɛy Jim eci sel ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Ɛy si bʼoc ɛy eci sos ɛm iŋn a sʼɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist sosiɛm, in eke sica nʼↄny lʼokr ɛy ɛm Nyam ab a.
Ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm anake sikpl ow wus af aŋa a. Ɛgŋ a el Adam. Ɛtŋ sikpl ism luw ab. Ɛtŋ luw ɛbmn agŋ fɛŋ es, aŋke agŋ fɛŋ ↄny sikpl.
Gbuŋ ke Nyam ↄ́ŋ Mois ol a, ke sikpl ikŋ anym anŋ wus na ŋ̂. Gbɛkↄ eke ol anm a, Nyam usm sikpl e low jam tasi.
Kↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, igŋ Adam e lɛgŋ ab ɛm toŋ Mois a, luw eb wus nimum ↄnym ab. Ɛtŋ agŋ eke kokm sikpl eke otarir es Adam ecʼa eke ɛgŋm ɛluam Nyam ecʼodad a yɛji, luw bʼibi ɛl.
Adam anake el ɛgŋ a eke kʼow a eci any ↄkŋnin a.

Gbɛkↄ ereb ligbɛl anŋ Nyam ecʼob ap ↄfr ɛm a lele Adam eci sikpl ab ab ecʼaraŋn. Ɛɛ, Adam, ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a sosiɛm cɛ anake agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl uw a. Gbɛkↄ Nyam ecʼob ap ↄfr ɛm a leg nↄnↄ ligbɛl. Ob ap na, Nyam ɛcr ɛgŋ nyam ɛm ɛluʼl ↄkm. Ɛgŋ a in lʼel Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, nʼↄmun in eci ów amamn ab es ↄfr ɛm agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl af.

Nyam ecʼob ap a bi kok low eke otarm es ɛgŋ nyam a eci sikpl a ecʼab ab. Tasi ɛm a, Adam ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a e jam a, Nyam eci jɛj ok a el ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ úw. Gbɛkↄ, kin eke ɛl e sikpl nↄnↄ gbɛl a e jam a, Nyam ecʼob ap ↄfr ɛm a ↄŋ ɛl -lʼeel agŋ nyim nyim.

Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ kok sikpl ɛtŋ luw ibi agŋ fɛŋ ɛgŋ nyam a cɛ e sikpl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkↄ, Jesu Krist ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm cɛ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl yɛji bʼɛŋn ów nↄnↄ Nyam e lís: -li bʼɛŋn Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn ligbɛl a, ɛtŋ ow eci ob ap ↄfr ɛm a bʼↄŋ ɛl -lʼel agŋ nyim nyim ow ecʼany af. Krist sosiɛm, -li bʼow -nʼanŋ owr ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼɛw es ow ab.

Ow eke si ki dad sʼuwar a el, sʼam ɛkn eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eci sikpl a eke kok a anake is agŋ fɛŋ e luw a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eci low nyim nyim e kok a, ↄŋ ɛtŋ Nyam oc agŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af, ɛtŋ li bʼↄŋ wɛl sel.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ɛgŋm eke kʼɛlum Nyam, ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl el sikpl ɛsɛl. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛlum Nyam a sosiɛm, agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl el nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af.
Sica ol ow, ɛtŋ sikpl ɛny eb es nↄnↄ ligbɛl. Gbɛkↄ yogŋ a eke sikpl ɛny eb es a, Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a bʼɛny bubu af.

Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, sikpl ↄny abusu fɛŋ eke kʼↄŋ agŋ uw. Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a ↄny abusu fɛŋ eke kʼↄŋ agŋ el nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, sʼↄtu eke si kʼɛŋn sel ekʼↄnym uwr Nyam ab, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kↄ sikpl ow it eke abu kʼanŋ ɛy ɛm sʼam kok yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam e sↄrŋ ikŋ a ám ɛny bobn ee?
Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Ɛy sʼɛcr luw eke ↄny kpab ɛy es sikpl e lís ab ɛm. Ayaf ɛmɛny sʼↄtu eke si kʼir sikpl ecʼɛb ee?
Ɔny uwr any tasi eke: eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm a, yogŋ ɛtŋ sʼokr af in e luw ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm, eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ a, sʼuw ɛtŋ wɛl oc ɛy es in ab. Gbɛkↄ, Nyam ecʼanygbɛl ecʼabusu ligbɛl a igbm Krist agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji, sʼↄ́ny ɛb ir owr.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼokr af nimum in ab lɛgŋ a eke sʼuw in ab a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, si bʼow sʼokr af in ab lɛgŋ a eke ɛy yɛji si bʼow sʼigb luw ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke lʼigb ab af a.
Sʼírir low na sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy ecʼelel eke sʼanŋn anym ɛm a, wɛl oc lele Krist ab ↄbm olikŋ. Ow ↄŋ, sikpl a eke anŋ ɛy ɛm a uŋ, ɛtŋ sʼelm in eci madu ij.
Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ eke uw a anm sikpl e low ɛm ij.
Eke sica sʼuw Krist ab a, sʼub nawrɛ eke ow el in ab si bʼow sʼanŋ owr.
Sʼuw any tasi eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Krist igb agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm a, li kʼow lʼuwm ij, ɛtŋ luw ↄnym abusu kaka in af.
Krist uw, ɛtŋ in e luw a ↄny kpabʼr es sikpl e lís nimum nimum, akp nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Sica nʼanŋ owr, ɛtŋ in ecʼowr anŋ a nimum el Nyam eci.
Ɔny yɛji, ocar ↄny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke sikpl ecʼabusu a ɛwm es ij, ke Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm am ir ɛb Nyam ecʼaf.
Ɔny, sikpl ↄtum eke kʼↄny abusu ↄny af ij. Ɔny eci sos megl a bʼow uw lɛgŋ nyam. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke kʼɛlumn in ecʼów eŋuŋ a eke bʼawʼr a ij.

Kʼòcr ↄny eci sos a eci susu susu a kʼɛwr es sikpl eci, ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low ŋuŋ kok ecʼaf. Kↄ nana, òcr ↄny nimum kokr Nyam e low, ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼanŋ luw ɛm igb anŋ owr af. Òcr ↄny eci sos a eci susu susu a ɛwr es ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low nyim nyim e kok ecʼaf.
Sica eke ow elm ol ɛwm ↄny es ij, ke ow el Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ ab anake ɛw ↄny es a, sikpl kʼↄtum ↄnym abusu ↄny af ij.
Nawrɛ, ɛy ow elm ol ɛwm ɛy es ij, kↄ Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a ɛw ɛy es. Ow sosiɛm a, kↄ abusu ɛ́ru ɛy es eke si ki kok sikpl ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!

Ɔny uwr any tasi eke, eke bʼɛgŋn ebr am kokr ɛgŋ eci juma ɛsɛ madu af a, ↄny eel ɛgŋ a eke am ɛlumn a eci madu. Ow sosiɛm a, oglog ↄny eel sikpl e madu, ke sikpl óc im ɛlu ↄny luw ɛm, oglog ↄny eel Nyam e madu, ke ↄ́nyn ɛb ir nyim nyim in ecʼany af, aŋke bʼↄnyn in ecʼɛlum.
Sʼↄ́ŋ Nyam bia! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ↄny eel sikpl eci madu. Jam aŋa ɛm a, ↄny ɛgŋn ebr eke kʼɛlumn ↄny ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, Amani Mamn a eke wɛl babul agŋ fɛŋ a.
Ɔny dogŋnin sos ebr sikpl ecʼabu ɛm ɛtŋ am kokr low nyim nyim eci juma.

Mʼam oc agŋ ɛm e low mi bɛbmn aŋke ↄny eci low iri a bʼↄtu nↄnↄ. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛsɛ madu af, ↄny ocr ↄny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el sikpl lele suksuk ab eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low ekʼanŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, el Nyam eci any ↄbr. Ɛbɛn, yɛfɛnyna yɛji ɛsɛ madu af, òcr ↄny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el low nyim nyim eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low eke bʼow anŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, bʼow el ɛb ir lala eke bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm.
Ow a eke eel sikpl eci madu a, low nyim nyim eci kok a áwm ↄny.
Ow e lɛgŋ ab af a, bogŋ ecʼey ↄsur ee? Yɛfɛnyna, ow am ↄny ↄny ɛ́s, aŋke ow eci ey eke ow ↄsu a el luw.
Sica jam aŋa, wɛl sↄg ↄny sikpl e lís ɛtŋ ɛwal eel Nyam eci madu. Na sosiɛm am ir ɛb eke bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ ow eci low ekʼanŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, el Nyam ab ecʼɛb ir sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Nawrɛ, aŋke sikpl eci labm sↄg ekʼanŋ ɛm a el luw; kↄ Nyam eci ob ap a el sel a ekʼↄnym uwr, ke li bʼↄŋ ɛy, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm mʼuw any eke ow el agŋ eke uw Nyam ecʼol ab any a, mʼam dad odad. Ol ↄny abusu ɛy af eke sʼanŋ owr a cɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low eke uwr any tasi.
Kin low ɛbmn nyam: ol ɛm a, yↄw eke ɛbi igŋ a okr af in ecʼigŋ ab ab eke igŋ a anŋ owr a. Kↄ eke igŋ a bʼuw a, yↄw a sos bʼok es ol a ekʼↄny okrʼr af ɛc ab a e lís.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke ɛc anŋ owr a, eke nʼim lʼɛbi igŋ ɛjeci, ke nfaci lʼij a. Kↄ eke ɛc uw a, ol ɛm a abusu ɛruʼr es; lʼↄtu eke li kʼɛbi igŋ ɛjeci gↄŋ, li kʼow lʼelm facyↄw.

Ɛm lisijimɛl, ↄny ecʼa yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ɔny okar af Krist eke uw ɛy sosiɛm olikŋ af ab ab; ow sosiɛm, ↄny kpabr es nimum Mois ecʼol a e lís. Sica eel ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eci; ɛgŋ ɛjecʼa, in lʼel ɛgŋ a ekʼigb luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn ɛm a sʼↄtu eke ɛy fɛŋ si kʼↄsu ey Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke sʼam kok ów eke bʼakpl ɛy sos ɛm a, Mois ecʼol a ecʼów a tasi eke bi dɛdŋn a bʼitr ów aw eŋuŋ a eke ki kok low ɛy e sos ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow e low ekʼanŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, el luw.

Gbɛkↄ sica, si kpab es nimum nimum Mois ecʼol a eke ↄny awŋ ɛy es a e lís; sʼↄtu eke sica si ki kok Nyam e low a sɛwl owr ɛm, sʼám ɛlum Abŋ Lala, ke si kí kokm Nyam e low a ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼa eke sʼanŋ ol a eke wɛl nↄn a eci es ɛw ɛm ab af.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kↄ Mois ecʼol na, sikpl eci juma nʼam kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkↄ ol anake ↄŋ mʼuw sikpl any a. Tasi ɛm a, blel ol dadm ɛsmɛ:
blel mi kʼuwm any eke ow el low ŋuŋ.
Gbɛkↄ sikpl ɛcr ol na ɛm ɛtŋ ↄsu ɛm ɛm ów aw eŋuŋ ↄrŋ ↄrŋ a fɛŋ, aŋke blel ol anm ana, sikpl blel ↄnym abusu kaka.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke mʼuwm ol any a, mʼel ɛgŋ ekʼanŋ owr. Kↄ sica eke mʼuw ol any a, sikpl anake ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a,
ɛtŋ ɛm, mʼel ɛgŋ eke uw. Ɛtŋ ol a eke ki nyimnʼm mʼanŋ owr a, nyimnʼm luw ɛm.
Ɛɛ, sikpl ɛcr ol ɛm ɛluʼm wus ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, nʼↄŋʼm mʼuw.
Gbɛkↄ ol, in obi a lʼel lala, ɛtŋ ów ey nyam nyam eke anŋʼn ɛm a yɛji el lala, nyim nyim lele nimamn ab.
Sica eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ob mamn ↄtu eke kʼismʼm luw ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkↄ sikpl ɛcr ob mamn ɛm ↄŋʼm luw. Nɛnɛ anake ol ↄŋ wɛl ɛkn elel eke sikpl e lɛc a el ob ŋuŋ kↄ kↄ kↄ a.
Ɛɛ, ɛy sʼuw any eke ol, Nyam ogŋ ow anŋ ow, gbɛkↄ ɛm, mʼel ɛgŋ fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ↄl ij ɛsɛ adu af sikpl ogŋ.
Nawrɛ tasi, yecʼa eke mʼam kok a mi kʼirim, aŋke yecʼa eke mʼam erur a, mi kókm, ɛtŋ mi bi kok yecʼa eke mʼérurm a.
Eke mi bi kok yecʼa eke mʼérurm a, mi bʼɛgŋ mʼeb eke ol el ob mamn.
Sica mʼuw any eke ow elm ɛm mi kókm ɛbɛn, kↄ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake bʼitrʼm mi kok ɛbɛn a.
Ɛɛ, mʼuw any eke low mamn irm ɛm ɛm, ɛm e sos ↄnym ab ɛm. Ɛm ecʼa, mi bʼerur eke mi ki kok ów eke akpl a, kↄ mʼↄ́tum mi kokm.
Tasi ɛm a, low nimamn eke mi bʼerur a, mʼↄ́tum mi kokm, ɛtŋ low ŋuŋ eke mʼérurm a, mi bi kok.
Sica, eke mi bi kok low eke mʼérurm a, ke ow elm ɛm mi kokm ɛbɛn, kↄ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake bʼitrʼm mi kok ɛbɛn a.
Ɛtŋ kin ol ɛjeci nyam eke mʼuyum ab: eke mi bʼerur eke mi ki kok low mamn a, ke low ŋuŋ kpɛkŋ inymʼm es any af.
Ɛm ecʼɛrm ab ɛm, mi bʼerur Nyam ecʼol a.

Gbɛkↄ ɛm obi ɛm a, mi bʼuyum ol ɛjeci nyam ab, eke bʼatarir Nyam ecʼol a eke in ab nɛny okr ɛy af ab ab. Ɛtŋ ol na, in lʼel sikpl ecʼol a eke bi kok juma ɛm ɛm, ke bʼↄnyʼm ɛsɛ in eci sobel ɛm ɛs af a.
Kin eke mʼel gbre ecʼɛgŋ! Bwo ecʼɛgŋ bʼow sↄgʼm sos megl na eke bʼoc im ɛluʼm luw ɛm a e lís ee?
Sʼɛ́lu Nyam bia, aŋke Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sↄgʼm! Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛm eci tutr ab ɛm, mi bʼɛgŋ Nyam ecʼol a mʼeb, gbɛkↄ ɛm eci sos ↄnym ɛm a, mi bʼɛlum sikpl ecʼol a.
Sica low ↄb kaka anm agŋ a eke okr af Jesu Krist ab a eci ij.
Nawrɛ tasi, eke wɛl okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke Abŋ Lala ecʼol a anake bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ sel a, ɛtŋ ol na sↄgʼm sikpl ecʼol a eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ luw a ecʼabu ɛm.

Mois ecʼol a ↄtum eke ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke agŋ eci sos ↄnym a ↄↄmʼn ow e kok ecʼabusu. Gbɛkↄ Nyam ↄtu kok: lʼɛrm Jim ɛli sos eke otarir es sikpl ɛsɛl ecʼab ab ow sↄg ɛl sikpl ecʼabu ɛm. Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Nyam ↄŋ sikpl a eke am kok juma agŋ e sos ɛm a abur es.
Li kok nɛnɛ, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼↄ́ny abusu sʼir ɛb nyim nyim a eke ol am ibrm a. Sica, ow elm elel eke agŋ bʼir ɛb a sʼirm ij, kↄ ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala bʼerur ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke bʼir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke -nʼam ɛkan ab af a, bʼɛlum ɛl ecʼów eke bʼakpl ɛl sos ɛm a, gbɛkↄ agŋ eke bʼir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala bʼerur ab af a, bʼɛlum yecʼa eke Abŋ Lala bʼerur a.
Ɛgŋ eke bʼus ów eke li bʼerur a jam a, li bʼim luw ɛm, kↄ eke li bʼus Abŋ Lala jam a, li bʼim sel eke ↄnym uwr lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ogŋ.
Tasi, ɛgŋ ecʼów eke bʼerur a ókrm af Nyam ecʼab ab, -lʼɛluamn Nyam ecʼol a. Ɛl ecʼa, ow el low eke -li kʼↄtumn -li kokmn.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke bʼus ów aw amua jam a, e low kʼↄtum akplm Nyam sos ɛm ij.
Gbɛkↄ ↄny ecʼa, írmn ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke bʼerurir ab af, kↄ ɛsɛ Abŋ Lala ecʼelel eke bʼerur ab af, aŋke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a anŋ ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm. Eke Krist ecʼAbŋ a anm ɛgŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, lʼelm Krist eci.
Nawrɛ eke ↄny e sos megl a bʼow uw sikpl sosiɛm, gbɛkↄ eke Krist anŋ ↄny ɛm a, Abŋ Lala bʼow ↄŋ ↄny sel, aŋke Nyam oc ↄny ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm. Eke in ecʼAbŋ a anŋ ↄny ɛm, in a cɛ eke lʼigbm Jesu agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm a, li bʼow lʼɛcr Abŋ Lala ɛm nʼↄŋ ↄny e sos megl a eke bʼow uw a bↄbↄ yɛji sel.
Na sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼↄny labm. Gbɛkↄ ow elm ɛy ecʼów a eke bʼaw ɛy a e labm sʼↄnym. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke si kʼir ɛb eke ɛy ecʼów aw a bʼerur a.
Eke am iir ɛb ów a eke bʼaw ↄny ke bʼerurir a e kok eci, bʼow uwr; kↄ eke Abŋ Lala ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm waal ↄny e sos megl ecʼów a e bʼerur e ki kok a ɛlul es a, bʼow anŋn owr.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a bi nyimn a, el Nyam ecʼey.
Ɛtŋ Abŋ a eke ɛŋan a, ↄ́ↄm ↄny elmn madu eke ɛmɛny am uru Nyam, kↄ li bʼↄŋ ↄny eel Nyam ecʼey. Ɛtŋ Abŋ na eci abu ɛlum ɛm, si bʼɛlu Nyam lebl si dad sʼɛsɛ: «Aba!
Ɛs!»
Abŋ Lala in obi bʼij daŋku dad ɛy ecʼabŋ a eke sʼel Nyam ecʼey.

Ow sosiɛm, eke sʼel Nyam ecʼey a, si bʼow sʼij aja a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw in ecʼagŋ es a, ɛtŋ aja na, Krist ab si bʼow sʼij. Ɛɛ, eke sʼanŋ in e gbre ij a e low ɛm, si bʼow sʼanŋ in ecʼanygbɛl a yɛji e low ɛm.
Ayaf sʼↄtu eke si kʼoc yɛfɛnyna e gbre a si bɛbmn lɛgŋ ekʼam ow ab ɛm eci anygbɛl a eke Nyam bʼow yɛgm ɛy kpata ab ab ee? Ɛm e sos ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e gbre a elm low kaka.
Am ɛkan eke wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a am eku lɛgŋ a eke Nyam bʼow ɛlu in ecʼey ecʼanygbɛl ↄkm a.
Mob amua fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a, itŋn el mob ↄfr ↄfr. Ow elm mob a eke Nyam kok a erurm ɛbɛn, kↄ Nyam anake ↄŋ ɛl -nʼanŋn nɛnɛ a.
Gbɛkↄ wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a ↄtu eke ɛmɛny kʼↄmn low.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke adu bʼŋgboŋ adu el ɛm a, mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a bʼow ŋgboŋ ɛl e mob ekʼam ugŋn ɛl es ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ -li bʼow -nʼanŋ Nyam ecʼey a e lewi ij a lele anygbɛl ab ab e low ɛm.
Sʼuw any tasi eke mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a am ikŋ sↄmu ɛtŋ ɛmɛny am ij gbre caca ɛm a, ɛsɛ yↄw eke bʼew iy ab af,

gbɛkↄ ow elm ɛl sↄny cɛ. Ɛy obi yɛji, sʼam ikŋ sↄmu ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm, ɛtŋ sʼam eku eke Nyam kʼeb ɛy ɛsɛ in ecʼey tasi af, ke sʼél ewi kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ. Gbɛkↄ sʼikŋ anym sʼɛŋn Abŋ Lala, ɛsɛ ob ap a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab ɛm eci krɛkrɛ af.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼɛŋn sel, kↄ ow el low ↄmn ɛm cɛ. Eke wɛl bʼɛkn ob eke wɛl am ↄmn a, ke wɛl úbmʼn ɛsɛ low ↄmn ob af ij. Ob eke wɛl am ɛkn a, kↄ wɛl ↄtu eke ɛmɛny wɛl kʼↄmnʼn ee?
Gbɛkↄ eke sʼam ↄmn ob eke sʼɛknm a, si bʼanŋ ow eci eku ɛm ɛrm susu ɛm.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛy eke sʼↄnym sos a, Abŋ Lala bʼɛlum ɛy abu. Sʼúwm any si ŋↄŋnm Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke ow it ab af. Ow bʼↄŋ Abŋ Lala in obi bi ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛy usu iy, íbrm ów sↄmu ikŋ ebl ɛm eke ɛgŋ e nɛny kʼↄtum dadm.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam eke bʼɛkn mɛrm lokm a, bʼuw yecʼeke Abŋ Lala erur eke kʼibrm ab any. Ɛɛ, Abŋ Lala bi ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam bʼerur ab af ↄŋ agŋ a eke el Nyam ecʼa.

Ɛmɛny sʼuw any eke agŋ a ekʼↄny Nyam ecʼerur ecʼa, low fɛŋ eke bʼɛŋn ɛy a, Nyam anake bi kok a, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu sʼɛŋn low nimamn. Ow el agŋ a eke lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm wɛl ecʼɛsŋ e low lʼɛw es a.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua eke Nyam ikŋ anym sↄsum ot ecʼa, lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm yɛji eke li ki kok wɛl, wɛl ot in ecʼIy ab es, ke ow ↄ́ŋ in ecʼIy a el bosu ligbɛl a e liy likpekp.
Sica agŋ a eke Nyam ikŋ anym sↄsum ot a, lʼɛsŋ wɛl yɛji. Agŋ a eke lʼɛsŋ a, lʼot wɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke lʼot ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a, lʼot lʼok wɛl in ecʼanygbɛl a yɛji ɛm.
Bla odad iy si ki dad sʼigŋ af ee? Eke Nyam anŋ ɛy ecʼogog, ke bwo ↄtu eke ki kok ɛy low ŋuŋ ee?
In eke lʼɛdŋnm in ecʼIy lokm a abu any, ke nʼↄŋ ow uw ɛy fɛŋ e sel ɛŋn sosiɛm ecʼa, ayaf eke sʼokr af ow ab, li kʼow nʼↄↄm ɛy ↄfr ɛm, ów amamn fɛŋ ee?
Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄtu eke kʼok agŋ a eke Nyam sↄsum ot a ów af ee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Aŋke Nyam in obi ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄtu eke kʼↄb agŋ low luw ecʼee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist uw, gbɛkↄ nʼanŋ luw ɛm lʼigb, nʼanŋ Nyam e lidr abu af a ɛtŋ nʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛy eci.

Bla obi ↄtu eke kʼↄny kpab ɛy es Krist ecʼerur ekʼↄny ɛy ecʼa e lís ee? Kↄ es abur oglog ɛrmij ebr ee? Kↄ agŋ eci milↄlu e bʼↄnyn ɛy ɛy ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm ab ee? Kↄ namn oglog gbↄr ee? Kↄ low ɛyr eke bʼokr ɛy es a oglog luw ee?
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ fɛŋ ɛm a, si bʼok ↄkm agbawru, ɛgŋ a eke erur ɛy a eci abu ɛlum ɛm.
Ɛɛ, mʼↄny ↄmn tasi, eke ob kaka kʼↄtum ↄnym kpabm ɛy es erur a eke Nyam ɛlu ↄkm, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm a e lís. Ke ow él luw oglog owr anŋ, ke ow él afr ɛrm ɛsɛl

oglog es ɛw ɛsɛl oglog lɛc ekʼanŋ lɛf ɛm, ke ow él lɛgŋ na ɛm, lɛgŋ ekʼanŋ anym am ow ab ɛm, ke ow él afr e lɛc oglog wus aŋa e lɛc, ke ow él mob mob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ob kaka kʼↄtum ↄnym kpabm ɛy es Nyam ecʼerur ekʼↄny ɛy ecʼa e lís!
Ɛɛ, mʼↄny ↄmn tasi, eke ob kaka kʼↄtum ↄnym kpabm ɛy es erur a eke Nyam ɛlu ↄkm, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm a e lís. Ke ow él luw oglog owr anŋ, ke ow él afr ɛrm ɛsɛl

oglog es ɛw ɛsɛl oglog lɛc ekʼanŋ lɛf ɛm, ke ow él lɛgŋ na ɛm, lɛgŋ ekʼanŋ anym am ow ab ɛm, ke ow él afr e lɛc oglog wus aŋa e lɛc, ke ow él mob mob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ob kaka kʼↄtum ↄnym kpabm ɛy es Nyam ecʼerur ekʼↄny ɛy ecʼa e lís!
Ɛm mʼel Krist eci, ow sosiɛm, low a eke mʼam mʼow mi dad a el low nawrɛ, mi kʼↄtum mʼↄnym yadŋ. Ɛm e tutr a eke Abŋ Lala am nyimn a yɛji am dadʼm eke ow el low nawrɛ.
Ɛm ecʼɛrm a sos ↄw es nↄnↄ ligbɛl ɛtŋ mʼam ij gbre eke úwrm.
Mi bʼow mʼɛgŋ mʼeb eke Nyam kʼigŋ ↄwlʼm ke mi kpáb es Krist e lís, eke ow ↄtu cɛ eke kʼeb ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛlu es.

Bla ecʼee? -Lʼel Israɛl eyŋ, Nyam ot ɛl -lʼel ow ecʼey. Wɛl ecʼaraŋn nʼanŋ in ecʼanygbɛl ab ɛm, lʼɛgŋ sinm wɛl ab, nʼↄŋ wɛl in ecʼol a, li yɛgm wɛl sɛwl yecʼɛm eke wɛl kʼigŋʼn nuŋ a, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ów eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es wɛl ecʼa.
Ɛl -lʼel ɛl lagŋɛl ekpekp a eci alaw.
Ɛl ecʼaraŋn anake wɛl ew Krist ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af, in eke lʼel Nyam ekʼanŋ ob fɛŋ e nuŋ af a! Kↄklm él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
Ow elm ke wɛl dad ɛsɛ Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es a ɛlu ok es. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Israɛl ɛm a, ɛl fɛŋ -lʼelm Israɛl eyŋ tasi.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a bↄbↄ eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Abraham ecʼeb ab ɛm a yɛji, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ -lʼelm ow ecʼey tasi, aŋke Nyam dad Abraham ninɛ:
Kin sodad na ecʼiri tasi a: ow elm ey a eke wɛl ew igŋ nyam lele yↄw nyam ab ecʼerur ɛm a elm Nyam ecʼey. Kↄ ey tasi a, ɛl -lʼel Nyam ecʼɛwar ecʼey a.
Kin ɛwar a e sodad a:
Ɛtŋ ow elm na sↄny cɛ: kↄ Rebeka ecʼa yɛji. Lʼew ey yony ɛy lagŋ Isak ab.
Ey yony a, wɛl kʼewm kokm ɛl wus, -li ki kokm low ŋuŋ oglog low nimamn. Gbɛkↄ Nyam dad Isak ɛw es eke:
Ɛtŋ usu ɛjecʼɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:

Low na ɛcr nɛnɛ, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es a ɛ́li any. Nyam bi sↄsum agŋ ot ɛsɛ elel eke li bʼerur ab af, ɛtŋ sↄsum oc a elm agŋ a ecʼów e bi kok a sosiɛm, kↄ Nyam cɛ eke bʼɛsŋ ɛgŋ ab ɛm ow bʼanŋ ow.
Ey yony a, wɛl kʼewm kokm ɛl wus, -li ki kokm low ŋuŋ oglog low nimamn. Gbɛkↄ Nyam dad Isak ɛw es eke:
Ɛtŋ usu ɛjecʼɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:

Low na ɛcr nɛnɛ, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es a ɛ́li any. Nyam bi sↄsum agŋ ot ɛsɛ elel eke li bʼerur ab af, ɛtŋ sↄsum oc a elm agŋ a ecʼów e bi kok a sosiɛm, kↄ Nyam cɛ eke bʼɛsŋ ɛgŋ ab ɛm ow bʼanŋ ow.
Ey yony a, wɛl kʼewm kokm ɛl wus, -li ki kokm low ŋuŋ oglog low nimamn. Gbɛkↄ Nyam dad Isak ɛw es eke:
Ɛtŋ usu ɛjecʼɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:

Low na ɛcr nɛnɛ, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es a ɛ́li any. Nyam bi sↄsum agŋ ot ɛsɛ elel eke li bʼerur ab af, ɛtŋ sↄsum oc a elm agŋ a ecʼów e bi kok a sosiɛm, kↄ Nyam cɛ eke bʼɛsŋ ɛgŋ ab ɛm ow bʼanŋ ow.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kↄ Nyam ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs lʼel ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
Tasi ɛm a, li dad Mois ninɛ:
Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam e sↄrŋ ikŋ a ánm agŋ e low e bʼerur ab ɛm, oglog sos eke bʼatr es ab ɛm, kↄ Nyam cɛ eke ↄny sↄrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm ow bʼanŋ ow.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm, Nyam dad Ejipt ecʼɛb ebu a ninɛ:
Wɛl bʼɛkn eke Nyam bʼikŋ ɛgŋ eke lʼerur eke li kʼikŋ sↄrŋ a sↄrŋ, ɛtŋ li bʼↄtur ɛgŋ eke lʼerur eke li kʼↄtur ɛrm a ɛrm.
Gbɛkↄ, kʼaw ke ɛgŋ íbrm im ɛsɛ: sica, eke ow el nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛmɛny Nyam kʼɛnym ɛy abr ee? Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄtu eke ki dogŋn low eke li bʼerur ab ee?
Kↄ ŋ gbɛ, bwo elʼŋ eke kʼatar Nyam ab ee?
Kↄ mijel kok ɛs ↄtum eke ki kok low e lʼerur kpeŋ ab ab ee? Kↄ lʼↄtum eke kpeŋ nyam a cɛ, li kʼitl li kok lɛ́w sↄbↄ nyam oglog lɛ́w kprakasa nyam ee?
Nyam erur eke kʼɛlu in ecʼɛrm bebl ↄkm ke yɛ́gm in ecʼabusu a. Gbɛkↄ agŋ a eke nʼↄny ɛrm bebl wɛl ab, ke it eke kʼirm ↄgbu es a, lʼɛgŋ wɛl e low lʼeb low eku ligbɛl ɛm.
Lʼɛgŋ low nɛnɛ lʼeb, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼɛ́lu in eci anygbɛl a e sagb a ↄkm agŋ eke lʼerur eke li ki yɛgm in e sↄrŋ ikŋ a e lís. Ow el agŋ a eke lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm lʼɛw es eke kʼɛŋn anygbɛl na a.
Ɛtŋ ɛy sʼel agŋ amua eke lʼɛsŋ a. Ow elm Jwifɛl ecʼaraŋn cɛ lʼɛsŋm ɛy, kↄ agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ecʼaraŋn ecʼagŋ a yɛji.
Nyam dad low na kokoba ↄb ɛs Ose e lɛl ab ɛm:
Agŋ a eke elm ɛm ecʼagŋ a,
mi bʼow mʼɛsŋ ɛl “ɛm ecʼagŋ”.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke mʼérurm a,
mi bʼow mʼɛsŋ ɛl “agŋ e mʼerur”.
Ɛtŋ yogŋ a eke wɛl dad agŋ eke:
«Ɔny elmn ɛm ecʼagŋ a,»
wɛl bʼow ɛsŋ ɛl Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ecʼey.
Esayi, in am ɛlu lebl Israɛl ecʼagŋ e lís ɛsɛ:
Eke batŋ Israɛl eyŋ ɛny nↄnↄ ɛsɛ okij any e mirici af yɛji,
agŋ tɛl a eke wal es a cɛ bʼow ɛŋn sel.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Admaga bʼow kok low a eke li dad a wus af aŋa,
li bʼow li kok fafa toŋ lʼigŋ nuŋ.
Ɛtŋ low na anake Esayi yɛji ikŋ anym dad a:
blel Nyam Abusu Ɛs okm ɛy alaw bɛb es,
ke blel sʼánŋ ɛsɛ Sodↄm eyŋ af,
ke sʼótarir es Gomↄr eyŋ ab.
Ke ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Nawrɛ, agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl a, ↄ́lm eke kʼel nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af. Gbɛkↄ -lʼɛkn eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb ɛl, ɛl ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm.
Ke Israɛl ecʼagŋ a am ↄl eke kʼel nyim nyim eke -li bʼɛlum Nyam ecʼol a sosiɛm. Kↄ ɛl -lʼↄwl -lʼok es.
Bla sosiɛm ee? -lʼↄwl -lʼok es, aŋke -lʼↄlm nyim nyim el na es ↄmn ɛm, -li tutr eke ɛl ecʼów kok ɛm -li bʼow -nʼɛŋn. Ɛbɛn a, -lʼuyum lebn a eke bʼɛlu ɛgŋ wus ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Siↄn ɛb ɛm, mʼam ɛw lebn nyam eke bʼeb agŋ akr,
lob eke bʼɛlu ɛgŋ wus es.
Ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼoc ↄmn ɛluʼl ɛm a,
sos kʼow ↄwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼam erur ɛm ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm eke Jwifɛl kʼɛŋn sel, ɛtŋ mʼam ibrm Nyam low na ɛl eci.
Nawrɛ, mʼↄtu eke mi kʼij ɛl e lís e daŋku mʼɛsɛ: Nyam e kok owi anŋ ɛl ɛrm ɛm tasi, kↄ -lʼuwm ow ecʼejagb ab any tasi.
-Lʼirim elel eke Nyam bʼocr agŋ nyim nyim a, ɛtŋ -lʼↄl ɛl ecʼelel eke agŋ bʼeel nyim nyim ab es. Ow ↄŋ -lʼɛgŋm -lʼebm elel a eke Nyam bʼocr agŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist kok Mois ecʼol a e low iy nɛny, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam óc agŋ fɛŋ eke bʼub Krist nawrɛ a agŋ nyim nyim.
Mois in obi nↄn elel eke wɛl ↄtu eke kʼeel nyim nyim ol ecʼɛlum sosiɛm a ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ kin yecʼeke li dad agŋ a eke Nyam bʼoc ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛl ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm a e lís:
Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kↄ bwo bʼow uyu afr ↄny Krist usm es ee?
Ɛmɛny
Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kↄ bwo bʼow us es yogŋ ↄny Krist ɛlu ↄkm agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm ee?
Ow elm ɛbɛn, aŋke wɛl nↄn:
Ɛtŋ odad na, in anake lʼel ↄmn ecʼamani a eke sʼam ↄb a.
Eke ŋ e nɛny bi dad agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af ɛsɛ Jesu el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ,
ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ ŋ ecʼɛrm ab ɛm eke Nyam igbmʼn luw ɛm a, ow bʼow ↄŋʼŋ ɛŋn sel.
Tasi ɛm a, eke si bʼub nawrɛ ɛy ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a, Nyam bʼoc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ eke si bʼɛlu ɛy ecʼↄmn a ↄkm agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af a, li bi sↄg ɛy.
Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ow sosiɛm a, ereb anm Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab ecʼaraŋn ij. Ɛl fɛŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nyam cɛ -nʼↄny, ɛtŋ li bʼↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼɛluʼl lebl a in ecʼów amamn a.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:

Sica ayaf -li bʼow -lʼɛlul Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ lebl, eke -lʼubm ow nawrɛ ee? Ɛtŋ ayaf -li bʼow -lʼub ow nawrɛ, eke -lʼirim ow e lís owi ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ayaf -li bʼow -lʼiri ow e lís owi, eke ɛgŋ ↄbm ɛl ow ecʼamani ee?
Ɛtŋ ayaf ɛgŋ kʼↄbr ow ecʼamani, eke wɛl ɛram ɛgŋ ow ecʼee? Ow sosiɛm wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm:
Gbɛkↄ, ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛluam Amani Mamn a. Tasi ɛm a, Esayi dad ow e low ninɛ:
Njɛ, eke ɛgŋ bʼiri amani a, ow anake li bʼub Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nawrɛ a, ɛtŋ amani na, ow ow el Krist e lís ecʼodad a.
Ow sosiɛm mʼam ibrm mʼɛsɛ: kↄ Jwifɛl amua, -lʼirim odad na e low ee? Yadŋ, -lʼiri! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Wɛl iri ɛl e lebl wus nimum af
ɛtŋ ɛl e sodad ebl im toŋ ok wus e nuŋ.
Ow sosiɛm ɛmɛny mʼam ibrm mʼɛsɛ: Kↄ Israɛl ecʼagŋ na, -li kʼirim low a kʼokm ɛl es sos ɛm ee? Ke Mois ikŋ anym dad ɛl Nyam ecʼodad a ninɛ:
Mi bʼow mʼↄŋ nyamn ɛyr ↄny ↄny agŋ na ekʼel agŋ ekʼↄnym any a e lís.
Mi bʼow mʼↄŋ ɛrm ebl ↄny
agŋ ekʼↄnym low any uw kaka a e lís.
Ɛtŋ Esayi oc lokm susu ɛm dad ninɛ: kin low eke Nyam dad:
Agŋ a eke ↄlmʼm es a, ɛl -nʼɛŋnʼm.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛlu sos ↄkm mi yɛgm agŋ a eke ibram im
low kaka a.
Gbɛkↄ Israɛl ecʼagŋ a e lís a, Nyam dad ninɛ:
Lɛgŋ nimum a,
mʼɛgŋm abu es bieku nyam
eke ɛ́luam low, ke ɛ́gŋm ɛm e low ebm a e lís.
Sica mʼam ibrm mʼɛsɛ: kↄ Nyam in ecʼagŋ na es lʼigŋ lʼok wɛl ee? Njaŋ! Aŋke ɛm mʼel Israɛl iy, Abraham e lilaw lele Bɛnjamɛ ecʼeb ɛm ecʼɛgŋ ab.
Nyam igŋm in ecʼagŋ a eke in obi lʼikŋ anym li sↄsum lʼot a, lʼɛlum es. Eke mʼↄnym yadŋ, ke uwr Eli e sodad eke anŋ Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab any, yogŋ a eke nʼam ok Israɛl eyŋ dedeku es Nyam ogŋ a.
Ɛtŋ kin odad a:
Ɛtŋ Nyam ecʼeke dad ↄŋʼn a el bogŋ ecʼee?
Yɛfɛnyna yɛji low nyam a cɛ. Agŋ tɛl anŋ eke Nyam in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɛdŋn ɛw es.
Eke Nyam in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm sↄsum ot ɛl, ke ow elm ɛl ecʼów eke -li kokr a sosiɛm. Blel ow el ɛbɛn, ke Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn ɛm ecʼob ap a elm bibm ↄfr ɛm ij.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Israɛl eyŋ ɛŋnm ob a eke -nʼam ↄl es a, kↄ agŋ a cɛ eke Nyam sↄsum ot a ɛŋn ob a; agŋ likpr a ↄny ɛrm tuↄtuↄ,
ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af:
Ɛb ebu David yɛji dad ninɛ:
Sica mʼam ibrm mʼɛsɛ: kↄ Jwifɛl na wus -lʼok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab ee? Njaŋ! Gbɛkↄ ɛl eci low any ↄbr a ↄŋ ɛtŋ bieku ɛjeci ecʼagŋ a ↄtu ɛŋn sel. Ɛbɛn a, ow ↄŋ Israɛl eyŋ am ogŋ ɛl ŋkre.

Israɛl eci low any ↄbr a ism wus ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab, ɛtŋ in eci wus ɛy a ism agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke Jwifɛl a fɛŋ bʼow ɛwl ɛgŋ Nyam e low eb a, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam ecʼów amamn ɛgbɛl a ɛmɛny bʼow agb bobn.
Sica, ↄny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, ↄny anake mʼam dad ↄny odad a. Ɛm mʼel Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ mʼↄny sos ɛm iŋn ɛm e juma na ɛm.
Juma na eci kok ɛm a, mʼam ↄny tutr eke mi bʼow mʼobn ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl eci ŋkre ogŋ a, ke ow ↄ́ŋ mʼeb agŋ nyam nyam ɛl ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, eke Nyam ɛw ɛl saw a, lʼokr ɛm wus ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke li bʼow lʼɛwl lʼeb wɛl a, bla lowi bʼow ɛy ab ee? Agŋ eke uw a bʼow ɛwl anŋ owr.
Eke futufutu ecʼogog nyam el Nyam eci, ke futufutu a nimum yɛji in ecʼana.
Ɛtŋ eke likŋ nyam eci min a fɛŋ el Nyam eci, ke ál a yɛji in ecʼana.

Israɛl eyŋ anŋ ɛsɛ olivie ikŋ eke wɛl ewl ↄgm, ke Nyam bubr in ecʼál bɛb es af. Ɛtŋ ŋ, eke elm Jwif ke anŋ ɛsɛ akp ↄfr ɛm ecʼolivie ikŋ af a, lʼoc lʼujrʼŋ likŋ lis ab ɛm, wuwlm ekŋ ál tasi a eke cucu likŋ lis a eke wɛl ewl ab ab. Ɛtŋ sica, ↄtu eke in ecʼekŋ ál ab ab kʼɛ́ŋn mij a eke bʼanŋ in e min ab ɛm ow a.
Ow sosiɛm, kʼìm ekŋ ál a ecʼany af kʼíj en! Eke erur eke kʼij en, ↄkn eke ow elm ŋ ecʼabu ɛm likŋ a e min a anm, kↄ ŋ likŋ a e min a ecʼabu ɛm anŋ.
Ŋ bʼow dad ɛsɛ: wɛl bubr ekŋ ál es ɛtŋ ɛm, wɛl oc ujrʼm likŋ lis ab ɛm.
Na low nawrɛ! Wɛl bubr ɛl es aŋke -nʼↄnym ↄmn, ɛtŋ ŋ akŋm likŋ lis ab ab, aŋke ↄny ↄmn. Ŋ kʼɛ̀w sos, kↄ erŋn anake kʼↄnyʼŋ a.
Ɛɛ, aŋke eke Nyam ɛgbm Jwifɛl eke el likŋ caŋ a ecʼál ab es, ŋ yɛji li kʼow lʼɛgbmʼŋ es.

Ɛ̀bmn nyamn ɛkn elel eke Nyam bʼɛlu in ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny lel in e tuↄtuↄ el ab ab ↄkm a: lʼɛlu in e tuↄtuↄ el a ↄkm agŋ eke ok wus a e lís, ɛtŋ lʼɛlu ɛrm mamn ↄkm ŋ e lís. Gbɛkↄ ow it eke kʼanŋ in ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny ab ɛm, ekʼow elm ɛbɛn, ŋ yɛji li bʼow lʼubrʼŋ es ɛsɛ likŋ lal af.
Eke batŋ Jwifɛl igŋ ɛl eci ɛrm tuↄtuↄ a ɛlu es, Nyam bʼow ɛwl oc ujr ɛl yogŋ a eke anym ɛm a -nʼanŋn a, aŋke nʼↄny abusu eke li kʼujr wɛl ɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, ŋ, akp ↄfr ɛm e likŋ lal el. Nyam ubrʼŋ es ɛtŋ oc ujrʼŋ likŋ eke wɛl ewl ɛm, ŋ ecʼa ow elm elel eke wɛl ki kokr a. Jwifɛl ecʼa, ɛl -lʼel likŋ a eke wɛl ewl a ecʼál. Ow sosiɛm, ow bʼow ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke Nyam kʼujr ɛl likŋ na eke ow el ow ɛm -lʼɛlil -lʼokr ↄkm a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin Nyam e lís e low e lↄl es ke mʼerur eke mi ki yɛgm ↄny uwr any, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, kʼócrmn ↄny sosi eke eel ɛsɛwru. Israɛl eyŋ ecʼogog nyam kʼow ɛgŋm eke kʼiri low, ɛtŋ ow bʼow anŋ ibn toŋ bake ɛb ɛb ɛjecʼa e nɛny a nimum ɛwl ow Nyam ogŋ.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a Israɛl eyŋ tasi a fɛŋ bʼow ɛŋn sel, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af:
Ɛtŋ Admaga igŋ af dad ninɛ:
-Lʼɛgŋm Amani Mamn a -lʼebm, ow ↄŋ -lʼɛwl -lʼel Nyam ecʼefnu ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ↄny, ow akpl ↄny eci. Ke Nyam eke sↄsum ot ɛl a, in ecʼagŋ eke wɛl kʼel eci. Li bʼerur wɛl ɛl lagŋɛl sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam ɛwlm ébm ob eke li bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke li bi sↄsum lʼot a, lʼígŋm lʼɛlum wɛl es lɛgŋ kaka.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ↄny ↄbar Nyam any, kↄ caca ɛm a, Jwifɛl anake ↄbr Nyam any, ke ow ↄŋ, ↄny ɛŋan Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a.
Ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼa yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ ow bʼow el: sica ɛl yɛji, -li bʼow -lʼↄtu -nʼɛŋn Nyam e sↄrŋ ikŋ a, ↄny eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a eke Nyam ↄny a sosiɛm eci.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ ↄnym ɛlum, ow sosiɛm Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ów eke -lʼerurir a, yecʼɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm wɛl fɛŋ in eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a.

Nyam ecʼob ↄny a agb nawrɛ tasi! In e sɛwr a lel in e low any uw ab ab ↄtu nↄnↄ, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum uwm in ecʼów eke li bi dad lʼucu es ab any, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum irim in ecʼów eke li bɛbm lʼok es a. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɛgŋ kaka, aŋke in ɛm fɛŋ bʼanŋ ow, in ɛm fɛŋ ɛcr anŋ ɛtŋ el in eci. Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!

Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ↄny ɛy eci sↄrŋ ikŋ. Ow sosiɛm, mʼam ↄm ↄny ów eke kʼocr ↄny ecʼɛgŋ el a nimum lele ↄny ecʼowr anŋ ab ab ápr ir, ɛsɛ egb waw ekʼayl ke akpl af. Na anake el nuŋ igŋ tasi a ekʼit eke kʼↄŋn in a.
Kʼùsr wus eke sʼir af a ecʼagŋ ɛm ecʼów a jam, kↄ yɛ̀br Nyam itŋn ↄny e tutr a nimum. Ɛbɛn ke ↄ́tur uwr yecʼeke lʼerur ab any: yecʼeke akpl, yecʼeke akplʼl sos ɛm lele yecʼeke iy nɛny bɛbmn ab ab.
Bibm ɛm ecʼob ap ↄfr ɛm a eke Nyam ↄŋʼm a sosiɛm, mʼam dad ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ eke kʼocrm in sosi ɛgŋ ligbɛl. Kↄ òkr nuŋ ɛm es, ke jɛ́jr ↄny sosi okr ↄmn a eke Nyam ↄŋ ɛy ab ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy e sos megl ab ɛm susu ogog nↄnↄ anŋ, kↄ ɛl fɛŋ -li kokmn juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
Nɛnɛ anake sʼanŋ Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm a. Sʼɛny nↄnↄ, kↄ ɛy fɛŋ a sʼel sos megl nyam. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ sʼokr af ɛy ↄfr ɛm, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ecʼusu ekʼanŋ a, ɛsɛ sos megl nyam ecʼogog ogog ecʼab af.
Bibm ɛm, Nyam ↄŋ ɛy sob ap ↄfr ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛŋn in eci.
Ow sosiɛm, ekʼɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ekʼel odad dad eci ɛsɛ kokoba ↄb ɛs af a, ke li dád yecʼa eke okr af ɛy ecʼↄmn ab ab a.
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ekʼel juma ecʼabu ɛlum eci, ke nʼám kok abu ɛlum ɛs e juma, ekʼɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ekʼel low yɛgm eci, ke nʼám yɛgm agŋ low,

ke ɛgŋ ekʼɛŋn bibm ɛgŋ e sos es atr ecʼa, ám atr agŋ sos es. Ɛgŋ ekʼam ↄŋ agŋ ob a, ↄ́ŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛgŋ ekʼam nyimn agŋ a, nyímn ɛl gbragbra kok ɛm. Ɛgŋ ekʼam ɛlum ↄgbↄru abu a, ɛ́lum ɛl abu sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Ke ↄny ecʼerur a él nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm; ìfan low ŋuŋ kok, ke úcur low mamn e kok ↄnyn es.
Èrurir ↄny ↄfr ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm, ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl af. Èel agŋ eke bʼogŋ es ɛlum ɛl lawlɛl.
Kòkr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci juma gbragbra kok ɛm, ke sos am kaka kʼánm ɛm, ke ow él ↄny ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm.
Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ↄny e low ↄmn a sosiɛm. Ɔ̀nyn ɛrm susu gbre ij ɛm, ùcur Nyam ŋↄŋn ↄnyn es.
Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ecʼagŋ ekʼↄny es abur a abu, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos ebr agŋ a eke bʼow ↄny ogŋ a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ìbrmn Nyam e low mamn ↄŋn agŋ eke bʼijr ↄny gbre a, ìbrmn low mamn, kↄ ow kʼél low ŋuŋ.
Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm agŋ a eke bʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab ab, ke íkŋn ↄŋn, agŋ a eke am ikŋ ↄŋn ab ab.
Nɛny ókr ↄny af ↄny ↄfr ɛm. Kʼèel es ɛfuu, kↄ ɛ̀gŋn es is ɛm e juma kok ebr.
Kʼↄ̀nyn tutr eke ↄny eel agŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any.
Low ŋuŋ eke ɛgŋ kok ↄny a, kì kokr kʼↄbar ir any, kↄ ↄↄl low mamn kok es agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af.
Eke ow el ↄny obi ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ↄtu eke ow kʼel ɛbɛn, ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm agŋ fɛŋ ab.
Erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lawlɛl, low eke ɛgŋ kok ↄny a, ↄny obi kì kokr ir, kↄ ɛ̀gbr Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl ab es kok ow e low. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ li dad yɛjʼeke:
Kì yɛb low ŋuŋ kʼakmʼŋ es, kↄ òc low mamn akmn low ŋuŋ es.
Ow it ekʼɛgŋ fɛŋ kʼɛlum agŋ ekʼↄnym es ɛw ab a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛm es ɛw fɛŋ bʼanŋ ow, ɛtŋ agŋ a ekʼↄnym es ɛw ab a, bʼɛw agŋ es aŋke Nyam ↄŋ abusu.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam am ↄny low es ɛw ɛsɛl ab a, ke Nyam e low a eke ɛgŋ eb ab ab anake nʼↄny low a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ɛ́gŋm ɛluam ɛl a, ɛl obi ɛl obi am eb jɛj ok ɛw sos.
Eke wɛl am kok low mamn, wɛl ↄtum eke kʼuru agŋ ekʼɛw ɛy es a, kↄ wɛl ↄtu eke kʼuru ɛl eke wɛl am kok low ŋuŋ. Erurm eke kʼuru es ɛw ɛsɛl ee? Ekʼow el ɛbɛn a, kòk low mamn, -li bʼow -lʼawʼŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl am kok Nyam eci juma yecʼɛtŋ ke -ni nyimnʼŋ ɛy low mamn ɛm. Gbɛkↄ eke am kok low ŋuŋ, ow it eke erŋn kʼↄnyʼŋ. Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl ↄny abusu eke kʼɛw low ↄŋʼŋ,
ɛtŋ ow elm ↄfr ↄfr nɛnɛ cɛ! Eke es ɛw ɛsɛl bʼɛw low ↄŋ ɛgŋ, ke -nʼam kok Nyam e juma, -nʼam ɛlu Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a ↄkm ɛgŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a e lís.
Na sosiɛm ow it eke si kʼɛlum es ɛw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a eke si kʼaru sʼɛgb es a cɛ eci, kↄ eke ɛy e tutr ɛm a, sʼuw any eke ow el low mamn a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ low na sosiɛm yɛji anake bʼɛnmn nɛmpo a. Tasi ɛm a, juma kok ɛsɛl a eke bʼibr ow eci labm a, Nyam in obi abul ɛl ow e juma.

Ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ yecʼa ekʼit eke ki kokr ↄŋn in a: nɛmpo fɛŋ ekʼit eke ki sↄgr ↄŋn in a, sↄgr ↄŋn in; ke kↄprɛ ekʼit eke ki sↄgr ↄŋn in a, sↄgr ↄŋn in. Eke ow el ɛlum kʼɛlumn ɛgŋ, ɛ̀lumn in. Ɛtŋ ekʼow el sos kʼusar ɛgŋ, ùsar ir sos.
Kʼↄ̀nymn ɛgŋ kaka ecʼob ab, ekʼow elm erur eke kʼↄnyn ↄny ↄfr ɛm a cɛ e labm. Ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼerur agŋ ɛjecʼa, kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.
Tasi ɛm a, sol a fɛŋ eke uwr any ɛsɛ:
lele ɛjecʼa fɛŋ ab, ↄb okr af anŋ ol nyam na ɛm:
Eke ɛgŋ ↄny erur, li kʼↄtum li kokm ɛgŋ ɛjeci low ŋuŋ, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow bʼↄŋ wɛl kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.
Ɔny uwr lɛgŋ eke sʼanŋ ɛm ab any: ow el wanci eke kʼufŋmn es ↄny e mɛmn ɛru ab ɛm! Tasi ɛm a, sel ɛŋn a titm ɛy akm lɛgŋ a eke sʼub Krist nawrɛ a.
Ow kʼow ibnm, lɛgŋ uk bʼow uwr ɛtŋ lɛgŋ owr bʼow ɛy ↄkm. Ow sosiɛm, sʼíil ɛy ecʼów eŋuŋ a fɛŋ eke si bi kok ncok ɛm ab es. Ke si bɛ́bm sos usuayl ɛm ecʼɛb ir eci.

Sʼíir ɛb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ owr fitaŋ af: sʼáru ob ij nↄnↄ lele mar ɛgŋ nↄnↄ ab sʼɛgb es. Si kʼágbr lↄsŋn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, si kʼír ɛb suksuk kok owi ɛm, ke si kʼánm ów es atar lele uwerŋ ogŋ ab e low ɛm.
Ànŋn ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist anŋ ab af. Eke ów aw eŋuŋ a ekʼanŋ ↄny ɛm a bʼerur eke kʼↄdu im ok ↄny low ŋuŋ ɛm, kʼↄ̀ŋan in abusu.
Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a ebr, ke kí dadmn low ŋuŋ in e tutr eke li bʼↄny ab af.
Oglog ke ɛgŋ nyam ↄny tutr eke lʼↄtu e li kʼij ob fɛŋ, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a, kʼíjm ndey ke nʼam ij suw obi.
Ɛgŋ a eke bʼij ob fɛŋ a itm eke kʼifn ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a itm eke ki jɛj ɛgŋ a eke bʼij ob fɛŋ a e low ok, aŋke Nyam in obi ɛgŋ ebʼr.
Ŋ, bwo elʼŋ eke ki jɛj Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma kok ɛs e low ok ee? Ke nʼínym es afr oglog ke lʼɛ́y wus, na in ecʼEs Ɛw Ɛs a e low. Ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼinym es afr, aŋke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄny abusu eke kʼucu ↄnyʼn es.
Ɛgŋ nyam ↄtu ekʼam tutr eke sɛgŋ bɛb ↄny any akm sɛgŋ ɛjecʼa, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam in am tutr eke -li bɛbmn ɛl fɛŋ.
Ow akpl cɛ ekʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ kʼↄny ↄmn tasi ow eke nʼam tutr ab ɛm.

Ɛgŋ a ekʼam ok ereb sɛgŋ ecʼaraŋn a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci. Ɛgŋ a ekʼam ij ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci, aŋke li bʼↄŋ Nyam bia in ecʼob ij a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ekʼíjm ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci, aŋke in yɛji li bʼↄŋ Nyam bia.
Ɛy ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka ánm owr in obi eci, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka úwm in obi eci.
Eke sʼanŋ owr, ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci sʼanŋ owr, eke sʼam uw, ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci sʼam uw. Fɛŋ ɛm a, sʼel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci.
Ɛɛ, Krist uw ɛtŋ nʼanŋ luw ɛm lʼigb, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼɛ́w agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼubʼr nawrɛ ab es, ɛl a eke uw lele ɛl a eke anŋ owr ab ab.
Kↄ ŋ, bla sosiɛm am jɛj esŋ jim e low ok ee? Ɛtŋ ŋ gbɛ, bla sosiɛm am ifn esŋ jim ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ si bʼow sʼim Nyam ecʼany af, ke li jɛ́j ɛy e low lʼok.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl nↄn:
Ow sosiɛm, ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ bʼow jɛj in e lís e low ok Nyam ecʼany af.
Sica sʼɛ̀wr ɛy ↄfr eci jɛj ok owi ab es. Ke ow tasi eke kʼɛgŋn ebr a el: kʼócmn ob kaka ɛwmn es ↄny lisijim anym in eci wus ɛlu eci oglog in e low ŋuŋ ɛm ɛy eci.
Mʼuw any ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ɛm ow aylʼm sos ɛm eke ob kaka in obi ɛm a elm ob ekʼaylm. Gbɛkↄ ekʼɛgŋ nyam am tutr ekʼob nyam el ob ekʼaylm, ke ow el ob ekʼaylm in eci.
Eke am ↄŋ esŋ jim ij gbre ob ekʼam ij a sosiɛm, ke irm ɛb erur ɛm ij. Ob ij owi nuŋ af, kì ŋuŋn esŋ jim nyam eke in sosiɛm Krist uw a!
Ob yecʼeke am ɛkan ɛsɛ ↄny ecʼob mamn af a, ↄtum eke kʼↄŋ agŋ ɛjecʼa abusu cak ↄny.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm ob ij lele mar ɛgŋ ab e low. Kↄ Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, nyim nyim el, ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn a eke wɛl bʼɛŋn Abŋ Lala ɛm a e low.
Ɛgŋ a eke bʼigŋ Krist nuŋ ɛbɛn a e low bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ yɛji bʼawʼr.
Ow sosiɛm, sʼↄ́ↄl low yecʼa eke bʼis ɛrm es ɛy, ke bʼɛlum ɛy abu sʼokr af sʼimn anym eci ↄmn ɛm ab es.
Kì ŋuŋn Nyam eci juma a ob ij owi nuŋ af! Tasi, ob a fɛŋ wɛl ↄtu eke kʼij, gbɛkↄ ow akplm eke wɛl kʼij ob, eke ow bʼow ↄŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ɛy low eke nʼam ɛkn ɛsɛ sikpl af ab ɛm.
Ow akpl eke kʼíjm ndey,
kʼɛ́gŋm mar, sʼúbr es sʼɛsɛ: kí kokm low kaka fɛŋ ekʼↄtu eke kʼↄŋ esŋ jim ɛy wus a.
Yecʼeke am tutr low na af a, ow ánŋʼŋ ɛrm ɛm Nyam ecʼany af. Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke low ɛ́ym sos ɛm wanci ab af eke li bʼucu low nʼↄny eke li ki kok a eci.
Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ nyam ekʼam ij ob ke am bɛbar in ɛm eke ow akplm a, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, Nyam bʼow ↄbʼr low. Tasi ɛm a, lʼel ɛgŋ eke nɛny okrm af in ecʼↄmn ab ab, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ eke wɛl am kok ke elm ↄmn ɛm a, el sikpl.
Sica, ɛy a eke sʼij lɛc ↄmn ɛm a, ow it eke si kʼɛgŋ ɛl a ekʼↄnym lɛc na a ecʼelel eke bʼɛkan ów a sʼéb, ke si kʼↄ́lmn ɛy e low eke si bʼerur a cɛ es.
Ow it eke ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋ fɛŋ ki kok low eke bʼakpl lawl sos ɛm in e low nimamn eci, ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu sʼokr af sʼimn anym eci ↄmn ɛm.
Krist ↄlm low eke lʼerur ab es. Kↄ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a:
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ sig ɛm e Nyam e Silɛl a fɛŋ eke wɛl nↄn a, el ɛy e low yɛgm eci. -Lʼit eke -li kʼↄŋ ɛy ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼↄ́ny low ↄmn.
Ke Nyam ekʼin ɛm ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab anŋ a, ↄ́ŋ ↄny ↄtur ↄny ↄfr ɛm a iir ɛb nɛny af okr ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu Krist yɛgm ↄny sɛwl ab af.
Ɛtŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm lele lebl nyam ɛm ab, bʼow ↄtur kↄklmn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼƐs ecʼanygbɛl a.
Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀gŋn ebarir ↄny ↄfr, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist eb ↄny Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a ecʼab af.
Mʼam dad ↄny, Nyam ij nɛny nyam. Ow sosiɛm Krist ow el Jwifɛl e juma kok ɛs,
yecʼɛtŋ ke ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kók ow iy nɛny.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a am kↄklm Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a, in e sↄrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e Silɛl ab ɛm wɛl nↄn:
Na sosiɛm, mi bʼow mi kↄklmʼŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ecʼaraŋn
ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼɛgŋ ŋ e nin a ecʼɛj.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam e Silɛl a dad ninɛ:
Ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn Nyam ecʼagŋ ab ab.
Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ, kↄklmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ!
Ke agŋ a fɛŋ kↄ́klmʼn!
Ɛtŋ Esayi yɛji dad ninɛ:
Jese eci bosu ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam bʼow ow.
Li bʼow lʼigb lʼɛw ɛbr ɛbr ab es,
ɛtŋ ɛbr ɛbr a bʼow oc ɛl eci low ↄmn a ɛwʼr af.
Ke Nyam eke bʼↄŋ agŋ low ↄmn a yíbr ↄny ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn ab, ↄny ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn ke ow ↄ́ŋ low ↄmn iy ↄny ɛm Abŋ Lala e lɛc ab ɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm obi ɛm a, mʼuw any tasi eke ↄny, ↄnyn low erur tasi ↄny obi ɛm, uwr ów nↄnↄ any ɛtŋ ↄtur eke kʼↄmnin ów ↄny ↄfr ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ lɛl na e susu bɛb ɛm a, mʼↄtu mi dad ɛrm susu ɛm ów bɛb ekʼit eke mi ki kↄkn ↄny a. Mi kok ɛbɛn, aŋke Nyam, in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm

ɛwʼm Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a eci. Lʼoc lʼɛwʼm saw eke mi kʼↄb Nyam ecʼAmani Mamn a e kokoba, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a él egb waw ekʼapkl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala anake bi kok ke ob ap na bʼel Nyam ecʼa.
Na sosiɛm, eke mʼokr af Jesu Krist ab a, ntotŋ ↄtu eke kʼokʼm, juma a eke mi kok mʼↄŋ Nyam a eci.

Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛrm susu ɛm mʼↄtu mi dad low nyam, ke ow el yecʼa cɛ eke Krist ɛcr ɛm ɛm kok a. Lʼɛcr ɛm ɛm, nʼↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ↄny Nyam ecʼɛlum. Li kok low na sodad ebl ɛm lele ów kok ɛm ab,
li yɛgm in e lɛc a simɛny ɛwr ɛm lele ów any iti owi ɛm ab,
Nyam ecʼAbŋ a e lɛc ab ab. Ɛtŋ ow igŋ Jerusalɛm im toŋ ok Iliri e wus ab af,
mi cɛcr Krist ecʼAmani Mamn ab es nimum.
Gbɛkↄ mʼerur eke mi ki cɛcr Amani Mamn ab es susu a cɛ eke agŋ kʼuwm Krist any a. Mi kok ɛbɛn eke mi kʼúsm êl ɛgŋ ɛjeci ecʼêl lebn eke ɛlu nↄmu ɛm ab af.
Mi kok ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af:
Agŋ a eke wɛl ↄbm in ecʼamani a okm a bʼow ɛknʼn,
ɛtŋ agŋ ekʼirim in e lís owi kaka a bʼow iri.
Sica susu nↄnↄ eke mʼim mʼↄb Nyam e kokoba a, el low a eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄ́ↄm im abusu eke mi kʼow ↄny ogŋ a.
Caca ɛm a, mʼuwar ɛm e juma ogog aŋa. Ɛtŋ eke akpo nↄnↄ ɛm mʼerur eke mi kʼow ↄny ogŋ a,

ɛm eci Ɛspany wus af eci ɛc im ɛm a, mi bʼow mʼow yogŋ. Ɛɛ, mʼↄny ↄmn eke mi kʼɛkn ↄny, ɛm e yogŋ eci ɛc im ɛm a, ɛtŋ mʼam ↄmn ↄny ecʼabu eke kʼɛlumnʼm ke mʼim a. Kaka fɛŋ yɛji, mʼerur eke mi kʼanŋ ↄny ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
Gbɛkↄ caca ɛm a, mʼaam Jerusalɛm, Nyam ecʼagŋ a ekʼanŋ yogŋ a ecʼabu ɛlum eci.
Tasi ɛm a, Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ↄmn ɛsɛl a bɛbm eke kʼↄkl os ↄ́ŋ Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ecʼↄgbↄru ekʼanŋ a.

-Li bɛbm eke -li kʼɛlum wɛl abu, gbɛkↄ nawrɛ ɛm a, ow el labm ekʼanŋ ɛl af. Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ↄmn ɛsɛl a elm Jwifɛl, gbɛkↄ, -nʼɛŋn Jerusalɛm e Jwifɛl eke bʼus Krist jam a ecʼabu ɛm, ob ↄny a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa. Sica ɛl yɛji, ow akpl eke ɛl e wus af aŋa ecʼob eke -nʼↄnyn a, -li ki cɛc wɛl ab.
Mi bʼoc os a eke -lʼↄkal a mʼɛlu Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ecʼagŋ a abu ɛm a, sica ow e jam a, mi bʼow mʼim Ɛspany a, mi bʼow mʼɛcr ↄny ogŋ a.
Ɛtŋ mʼuw any eke lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ a, mi bʼow mʼow lele Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a nimum ab.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yecʼeke mʼam ibrm ↄny a, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist sosiɛm lele Abŋ Lala ecʼerur a eke bʼↄŋ ɛy ab ab sosiɛm: dògŋnin ɛm ab Nyam eke bʼow ŋↄŋan ↄŋnʼm ab ɛm.
Ŋↄŋan, yecʼɛtŋ ke mi kʼɛ́ym Jude wus ab af ecʼagŋ a eke úbm Krist nawrɛ a ecʼabu ɛm.
Ŋↄŋan, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam ecʼagŋ a ɛ́gŋ abu ɛlum a eke mʼam oc mʼim Jerusalɛm a eb,
ow ↄ́ŋ ke mʼↄ́tu mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ eke Nyam erur, ke mʼↄ́tu mʼeb sel bɛb ↄny ab.
Ke ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab! Amɛn!
Ɛm obi mʼam ɛrm ɛy lisijↄw sɛnyn Febe, eke el abu ɛlum lis Saŋkre e Nyamel ab ɛm a.
Èbr ir Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it Nyam ecʼagŋ ecʼaraŋn ab af. Ɛ̀lumn in abu sakp sakp fɛŋ eke li bʼↄny ↄny ecʼes abur a, aŋke lʼɛlum agŋ nↄnↄ abu ɛtŋ ɛm obi yɛji lʼɛlum im abu.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Prisil lele ɛc Akilas ab,
eke sʼam kok juma nyam Jesu Krist ecʼa.
-Lʼow eke -li kʼirmn ɛl e sel a ɛm ecʼa e sↄg sosiɛm eci, ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm sↄny cɛ ow itm eke mi kʼɛlu ɛl bia. Sinyamel a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji it eke kʼↄŋ ɛl bia.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Nyamel a yɛjʼeke bʼas luku ɛl ecʼakŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ a.
Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛm lawl Epenɛt yɛji. In lʼel ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ekʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm el Krist eci Azi wus ab af.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Mari eke kok juma nↄnↄ ↄny ecʼa.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Andronikus lele Junias ab.
-Lʼel ɛm ecʼagŋ ɛtŋ ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm anake lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm sʼanŋ sobel ɛm a. -Lʼel ɛrm ɛsɛl eke leg nↄnↄ,
ɛtŋ -lʼikŋ anym -lʼub Krist nawrɛ gbuŋ ɛtŋ mʼanŋ jam.
Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ amua fɛŋ yɛji: Ampliatus ekʼel ɛm lawl sɛnyn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm.
Urbɛn ekʼam kok Krist eci juma ɛy ab a lele ɛm lawl Sakis ab.
Apelɛs ekʼɛlu in e cɛcɛ kok ↄkm Krist e nawrɛ ub ɛm, lele Aristobul ecʼakŋ ecʼagŋ ab ab.
Erodiↄn ekʼel ɛm ecʼɛgŋ a, lele Narsis ecʼakŋ ecʼagŋ ekʼub Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nawrɛ ab ab.
Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ lisijↄwɛl a ekʼel Trifɛn lele Trifↄs ab a. -Nʼam kok juma nↄnↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci. Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ ɛsɛ: ɛm lisijↄw sɛnyn Pɛrsida eke in yɛji kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci juma nↄnↄ a.
Rufus ekʼel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼɛgŋ sɛnyn eke sↄsum oc,
lele lis ekʼɛm yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm lis af a.
Asɛnkrit, Flegↄn, Ɛrmɛs, Patrobas, Ɛrmas lele agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijↄwɛl ekʼanŋ ɛl ab a.
Filolↄg lel ɛy Juli ab, Nere lele lisijↄw ab, Olɛmpas lele Nyam ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ ɛl ab a.
Ɛ̀sŋnin ↄny ↄfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijↄwɛl ab af. Krist e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ↄny.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low yecʼeke mʼam dad ↄny: ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm agŋ a eke bi bubr Nyamel ecʼagŋ ɛm a e lís. -Lʼↄtu eke -li kʼↄny ↄmn ɛsɛl a -lʼok wus, sodad a eke -li bʼow -li dad -lʼok low yɛgm a eke ɛŋan ab af a. Kpàbr es ɛl e lís,

aŋke agŋ amua am kokm Krist ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci juma ij. Ɛl obi e lok a e juma nana -li bi kok. Ɛl e sodad ebl eke -li bʼok mij ab ɛm lele ɛl e nɛnym ↄb e sodad eke bʼiŋn sos ɛm ab ab, -li bʼɛju agŋ a ekʼuwm low ŋuŋ any a.
Nawrɛ, ↄny ecʼɛlum a, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any; ow ↄŋ, ↄny sosiɛm, mʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Gbɛkↄ mʼam erur eke sɛwr kʼiy ↄny ɛm gbↄŋ low mamn kok eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́wr ɛrm arur low ŋuŋ ɛgbr es.
Ow kʼow ibnm, ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a bʼow kikn Satan es ↄny ecʼakr ew.
Timote ekʼam kok juma ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ↄny. Lusius, Jasↄn, lele Sosipatɛr ab ekʼel ɛm ecʼagŋ a, ɛl yɛji am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Ɛm, Tɛrsius eke mi nↄn lɛl na a,
mʼam ɛsŋn ↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ekʼↄny okr ɛy af ab ɛm.
Gayus am ɛsŋn ↄny,
mʼij utu in ogŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ Nyamel nimum bʼas luku in ecʼakŋ a. Eras ekʼel ɛb ecʼos es ɛw ɛs a lele ɛy lisijim Kartus ab am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.]
Anygbɛl él Nyam eci! Nʼↄny abusu eke li kʼↄŋ ↄny ijr lɛc ↄmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke mʼam dad Amani Mamn ab ɛm Jesu Krist e lís ab af. Amani Mamn na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu low a eke lↄl es godʼɛtŋ a ↄkm,
ɛtŋ sica, ow ɛru es usuayl ɛm. Sica agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ↄtu eke kʼuwʼr any kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ɛm. Nyam a ekʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ɛlu abusu na es, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ úbʼr nawrɛ ke ɛ́lumʼn.
Anygbɛl él Nyam ekʼin sↄny coco ↄny sɛwr a eci! Anygbɛl él in eci Jesu Krist ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci! Amɛn!
I Corinthians: Ɛm Pↄl, Nyam ɛsŋʼm aŋke lʼerur eke mi kʼel Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs. Ɛy lisijim Sↄstɛn ab e nin ɛm,

mʼam awŋ Nyamel ekʼanŋ Korɛnt, agŋ a eke el Nyam eci ɛl ecʼↄmn a eke okr af Krist ɛm a, lɛl na. Nyam am ɛsŋ ɛl eke -li kʼir ɛb ow eci, ɛsɛ agŋ a eke usu fɛŋ bi ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm ab af. Lʼel wɛl eci Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, ɛsʼelel eke ɛy yɛji lʼel ɛy ecʼab af.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy!
Mʼↄ́pim eke mi kʼɛlu Nyam bia ↄny eci, ów amamn a eke Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm nʼↄŋ ↄny a eci.
Ɛɛ, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm ↄŋ ↄny ów amamn fɛŋ in e juma a eci, ke ow el in ecʼejagb a ecʼany uw, ke ow el lɛc eke wɛl kʼↄny ↄb mɛwl ɛm in ecʼodad a e kokoba.
Low nawrɛ, aŋke wɛl ↄb Krist ecʼamani ok ↄny ɛtŋ ucur ow e low ↄnyn es kikri.
Ow ↄŋ caca ɛm a, Nyam ecʼob ap kaka anm ekʼakm ↄny, lɛgŋ na eke am ekur eke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu kʼɛlu sos ↄkm a.
In anake li bʼow nʼↄŋ ↄny ínymn es kikri toŋ ókr nuŋ a. Ɛbɛn a kʼow ↄnymn low ↄbr kaka, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist bʼow ow a.
Nyam el cɛcɛ, in anake lʼɛsŋ ↄny eke ki cɛcr sel ɛŋn Jim ekʼel ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny eke nɛny kʼokr ↄny af, ke ɛm bubr owi kʼánm ↄny ecʼaraŋn a. Òkar af tasi abŋ ɛm lele tutr ɛm ab.
Ɛɛ, agŋ lisijimɛl, Klowe ecʼakŋ ecʼagŋ a dadʼm eke irirm in anŋ ↄny ɛm.

Kin low a eke mʼerur eke mi ki dad a: ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad in ecʼekʼerur. Ɛgŋ na bʼigb ke dád ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, Pↄl eci.» Ɛjeci na bʼigb ke dád ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, Apolↄs eci.» Ɛjeci na bʼigb ke dád ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, Piɛr eci.»
Ɛjeci nyam yɛji bʼigb ke dád ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, Krist eci.»
Kↄ Krist e li cɛc ee? Kↄ Pↄl wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ↄny ecʼee? Kↄ Pↄl e nin ɛm wɛl ok ↄny mij nuŋ ee?
Mʼam ↄŋ Nyam bia, aŋke mʼokm ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka mij nuŋ, ekʼow elm Krispus lele Gayus ab cɛ.
Nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum dadm eke ɛm e nin ɛm wɛl ok ↄny mij nuŋ.
Ɛɛ! Nawrɛ, mʼam ↄkn eke mʼok Stefanas ecʼakŋ a yɛji mij nuŋ.
Ow e jam a, mi kʼↄnym ↄmn eke mi kʼok ɛgŋ ɛjeci mij nuŋ.
Krist ɛram im mij ok nuŋ owi ɛm, kↄ Amani Mamn a ecʼↄb eci lʼɛrmʼm, ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ e “sɛwr”
e sodad a nʼↄↄm im abusu eke mi kʼoc mi kokr juma, yecʼɛtŋ ke Krist ecʼolikŋ af e luw a kʼírmnm in ecʼabusu a.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist ecʼolikŋ af e luw a ecʼodad a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, agŋ a ekʼam irm kpab es Nyam e lís a eci. Gbɛkↄ ɛy a eke sʼanŋ sel ɛŋn ecʼejagb af a ecʼa, si bʼɛkn Nyam ecʼabusu ↄny a.
Kin yecʼeke wɛl nↄn Nyam Lɛl ɛm:
Mʼow mʼↄŋ ɛsɛwru e sɛwr a sel at
ɛtŋ mʼow mʼↄny nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛsɛl eci nuŋ ɛm ↄny a
mʼoc es.

Sica bla lowi ɛsɛwru ↄtu eke ɛmɛny ki dad ee? Bla low any uw ɛsɛl ↄtu eke ki dad ee? Ɛtŋ bla ów ɛm apl ɛsɛl ↄtu eke ki dad ee? Bla lowi tasi -lʼↄtu eke ɛmɛny -li ki dad ee? Nyam yɛgm eke wus na eci sɛwr a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ.

Tasi ɛm a, Nyam in e sɛwr ab ɛm kok eke wus na ecʼagŋ a ↄtum uwmʼn any ɛl obi e sɛwr ab ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, Nyam ɛgŋ eb sↄg agŋ a eke bʼub amani a eke sʼam ↄb a nawrɛ a, eke agŋ am tutr eke amani a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi bↄbↄ yɛji.
Jwifɛl am ibrm simɛny ɛwr eke bʼiti any, ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl am ↄl yecʼa eke -li bʼɛsŋ “sɛwr” ab es.
Ɛy ecʼa gbɛ, Mesi a eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ecʼamani sʼam ↄb. Na, low eke Jwifɛl kʼↄtum ɛgŋm ebm, ke Grɛkɛl bʼɛkn ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ecʼa, -lʼuw any eke Krist el Nyam ecʼabusu ↄny a lele sɛwr ab ab.
Ɛɛ, yecʼa eke wɛl bʼɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ “nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ” af a, ↄny sɛwr akm agŋ eci sɛwr a; ɛtŋ yecʼa eke wɛl bʼɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ “sos ↄnym” af a, ↄny lɛc akm agŋ e lɛc a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny eke ɛgŋn Nyam ecʼɛsŋ a ebr a, ɛ̀kan ↄny ecʼob eke eel. Ɔny ɛm a, “ɛsɛwru” ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ bʼɛkan ab af a, nↄnↄ anm, lɛc ɛsɛl nↄnↄ yɛji anm, ɛtŋ agŋ nↄnↄ eke wɛl ew bosu amamn ɛm a yɛji anm.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam sↄsum yecʼa ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ af wus aŋa a, kokr ɛsɛwru ɛ́s. Nyam sↄsum yecʼa ekʼↄnym sos wus na a, kokr agŋ a ekʼↄny lɛc a ɛ́s.
Ɛtŋ Nyam sↄsum yecʼa eke ↄnym any a oc, yecʼa eke ↄny sifn, elm ob kaka a, ŋuŋn yecʼa eke agŋ bʼɛkn ɛsɛ ob ekʼↄny any af a.
Nyam kok ɛbɛn, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́lum mɛgŋel ↄkm in ecʼany af.

In anake lʼokr ↄny af Jesu Krist ab a, ɛtŋ ɛy ecʼa, Krist el sɛwr a eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Nyam bʼɛcr in ɛm, óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af. Krist ɛm, li bʼayal ɛy sʼir ɛb in eci, ɛtŋ li bi sↄg ɛy sikpl ecʼabu ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af:
Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke kʼɛw sos,
ke lʼɛ́w sos Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sosiɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ a eke ɛm obi mʼow ↄny ogŋ a eke mi kʼↄb ↄny Nyam e low a eke lↄl es ecʼamani a,
ow elm sodad ebl amamn mʼotm oglog agŋ e “sɛwr” a mʼocm.
Tasi ɛm a, ↄny ecʼaraŋn eke mʼanŋ a, low nyam cɛ mʼɛgŋ mʼeb eke mi kʼↄb ow ecʼamani: Jesu Krist lel in ecʼolikŋ af e luw ab ab.
Ɛtŋ eke mʼow yogŋ a, mʼↄnym sos, erŋn am ↄnyʼm ɛtŋ ɛrm mij am okʼm.
Ɛm ecʼodad a lele low yɛgm ab ab ↄnym low kaka agŋ e “sɛwr” a e sodad ebl amamn ab ab. Gbɛkↄ Abŋ Lala ecʼabusu ɛm anake irir yecʼa eke mi dad a ayl ↄny sos ɛm a.
Nɛnɛ a, ↄny ecʼↄmn a kʼↄtum anm agŋ e “sɛwr” ab af, kↄ tasi a, Nyam ecʼabusu ↄny ab af.
Sica ɛy, sɛwr tasi nyam sʼam yɛgm agŋ a eke iy nɛny ↄmn ɛm a, gbɛkↄ sɛwr na elm wus na ecʼa; ow elm wus na ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl e “sɛwr” a eke wɛl bʼow ŋuŋn a.
Ɛy, sʼam yɛgm agŋ sɛwr a eke am dad Nyam e low a e lↄl es agŋ ecʼany af a e low. Gbɛkↄ gbuŋ ke wus ánŋ a, ke Nyam kok sɛwr na ŋ̂, yecʼɛtŋ ke si cɛ́c in ecʼanygbɛl a in ab.
Wus na ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl ab ɛm e kaka uwm sɛwr ikŋ na any, aŋke blel -lʼuwr ow any ana, blel -nʼↄↄm wɛl ɛwm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ a eke anygbɛl fɛŋ el in ecʼa olikŋ af.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
ów amua tasi anake Nyam bɛbm ok agŋ a
ekʼↄny in ecʼerur ab es a.
Ɛtŋ ɛy anake Nyam ɛcr in ecʼAbŋ Lala ab ɛm yɛgm ɛy ów amua a. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala uw fɛŋ any, toŋ yecʼeke lↄl es Nyam e tutr ɛm a yɛji, lʼuw any.
Kↄ ɛgŋ e lokm e tutr e lↄl es a, bwo bʼuw any ekʼow elm ɛgŋ a in obi ecʼabŋ a cɛ ee? Ɛbɛn nyam coco, Nyam e tutr e bʼↄny a yɛji, ow bʼel Abŋ Lala cɛ bʼuw any.
Gbɛkↄ ɛy, Nyam ↄŋ ɛy in ecʼAbŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake sʼam tutrm ów ɛsɛ wus ecʼagŋ ecʼab af a. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm yɛji anake sʼↄtu eke si kʼuw sob ap a eke Nyam ↄŋ ɛy ab any a.

Ɛtŋ sʼam dadm sob ap amua e low agŋ e “sɛwr” e sodad ebl eke sʼuw any ab ɛm; si bi dad ɛl e low sodad ebl eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a bi yɛgm ɛy ab ɛm. Nɛnɛ a, si bʼotar Nyam ecʼAbŋ a ecʼów akr sodad ebl eke bʼanŋ Abŋ ikŋ na ɛm cɛ ow a.

Ɛgŋ eke bʼus in ecʼów eke bʼawʼr a cɛ jam a, ɛ́gŋm yecʼa eke bʼanŋ Nyam ecʼAbŋ a ogŋ ow a ebm. In ecʼa, na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, ɛtŋ li kʼↄtum lʼirim kaka. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala cɛ bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ uw ów amua e jɛj ok owi any.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yecʼeke Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛm a, ↄtu eke ki jɛj ów fɛŋ ok, kↄ in, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum jɛjm in e low okm.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ ɛy, sʼↄny Krist e tutr a anŋ ɛy ɛm.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm ecʼa, mʼↄtum mi dadm ↄny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ Lala a am nyimn af. Kↄ mi dad ↄny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke erur eke kʼir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼↄnym Abŋ Lala af. Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ ey abu ɛm af yecʼekʼel ↄny ecʼↄmn Krist ɛm a.
Mʼↄŋ ↄny mɛny mij ɛgŋn, ow eke ow kʼel ob ij leg leg a, aŋke kʼↄtumn ijmn ob leg leg. Ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, kʼↄtumn cɛ,

aŋke am erurir eke kʼiir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼↄnym Abŋ Lala af. Tasi ɛm a, ekʼↄny ↄfr ɛm a, nyamnɛyr lele ów ɛsu ab bʼanŋ, ke anmn ɛsɛ agŋ ɛjecʼab af ee? Ke ↄny ecʼɛb ir a anm sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ a ekʼↄnym Abŋ Lala ecʼab af ee?
Eke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, Pↄl eci mʼel,» ɛtŋ ɛjeci nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛm gbɛ Apolↄs eci mʼel a,» ke ki dadmn odad ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ ɛjecʼa bi dad ab af ee?
Apolↄs, ke bwo ee? Ɛtŋ Pↄl, ke bwo ee? Ɛy Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl cɛ. Ɛy ɛm Nyam ɛcr ↄŋ ↄny eel ↄmn ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam kok juma in ecʼob ap a eke Nyam ↄŋʼn ab ɛm.
Ɛm, mʼewl egb a, ɛtŋ Apolↄs okʼr mij, kↄ Nyam anake ↄŋʼn lʼagb a.
Ow anake ɛgŋ a ekʼewl egb a lele ɛgŋ a eke okʼr mij ab ab elm low kaka a. Kↄ ɛgŋ a ekʼↄŋʼn lʼagb a anake kok low a fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in lʼel Nyam.
Ɛgŋ a eke bʼewl a lele ɛgŋ a eke bʼok mij ab ab el kpɛŋ. Nyam bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e juma a eke kok a e labm sↄg.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ Nyam ab sʼam kok juma, ɛtŋ ↄny eel Nyam eci ↄgm a. Ɔny cɛ ɛmɛny eel in ecʼêl a eke lʼus a.
Ɛm ecʼob ap a eke Nyam ↄŋʼm ab ɛm, mi sigm lebn nↄmu ɛm ab es ɛsɛ êl us ɛs mamn af, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci fɛŋ am us af yogŋ. Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́w ɛrm, af yogŋ ecʼus ab ɛm.
Lebn nↄmu ɛm a anŋ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ: ow ow el Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ɛlum lebn ɛjeci nↄmu ɛm.
Ɛgŋ ↄtu eke kʼoc sika, jɛtɛ, mebn ey amamn, oglog likŋ, bɛny oglog papo, us lebn nↄmu ɛm na af.
Gbɛkↄ, ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma a bʼow ɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, aŋke lɛgŋ a, al ligbɛl nyam bʼow anŋ eke bʼow ɛlu ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma e kok a e sakpl a ↄkm.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam us êl ekʼij lɛc al a ecʼany af, li bʼow nʼɛŋn ob ap.
Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ in e juma a ɛtu al ab ɛm a, li bʼow lʼirmn fɛŋ. In, li bʼow nʼɛŋn sel, gbɛkↄ ow bʼow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uru es ubr al ɛm af.
Ɔny uwmn any eke eel Nyam ecʼêl a, ke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a ir ↄny ɛm ee?
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam ŋuŋn Nyam ecʼêl a, Nyam bʼow ŋuŋnʼn,
aŋke in ecʼêl a el lala ɛtŋ êl a, ow ow el ↄny.
Ɔny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́jur in sosi. Ekʼɛgŋ nyam ↄny ecʼaraŋn a am ocr in sosi sɛwru, ɛsɛ wus ecʼagŋ ecʼelel eke bi tutar ab af, ow akpl eke “nuŋ ɛm kʼuŋʼn” ke lʼél sɛwru tasi.
Tasi ɛm a, wus ecʼagŋ e sɛwr a, Nyam ecʼa nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɛtŋ Nyam Lɛl cɛ ɛmɛny dad ninɛ:
Ɛgŋ kaka ↄtum eke kʼɛw sos eke nʼam us any ɛs kaka fɛŋ jam a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, fɛŋ el ↄny eci:
Pↄl, Apolↄs oglog Piɛr, wus na, sel, luw, caca ɛm lele lɛgŋ ekʼanŋ anym am ow ab ab.
Fɛŋ el ↄny eci, gbɛkↄ ↄny, eel Krist eci ɛtŋ Krist el Nyam eci.
Ow akpl cɛ eke ki lɛɛr ɛy ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl lele ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl eke lʼabul Nyam ecʼów nawrɛ eke lↄl es ab af.
Low cɛ eke wɛl bʼibrm ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl a el: ke -lʼel cɛcɛ.
Ɛm ecʼa, ↄtur eke ki jɛjr ɛm e low okr, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ↄtu eke ki jɛj ɛm e juma a ok, ow ↄnym any kaka; tasi a, mi jɛjm ɛm obi e juma mʼokm.
Tasi ɛm a, mʼam ɛkn eke ɛm e tutr ɛm a, mʼↄnym low kaka eke mi kʼokr ɛm sosi ów af, gbɛkↄ ow elm ke ɛbɛn a mi kʼↄ́nym low ↄbr eci. Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ anake bi jɛj ɛm e low ok a.

Ow sosiɛm a, gbuŋ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e lɛgŋ a kʼow a, kì jɛjr kʼokr. In anake li bʼow lʼɛlu yecʼa eke lↄl es ncebn ɛm a ↄkm a, ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼↄny sow tutr ekʼanŋ mɛrm ɛm a lʼok ↄkm usu ayl ɛm. Ɛtŋ Nyam bʼow aw ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ab af.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, low a eke mi dad a ecʼa, ↄny sosiɛm mʼoc Apolↄs lele ɛm obi ɛm obi ab mʼↄkŋn any. Mʼerur eke mi ki yɛgm ↄny nyandrɛ na e liy a: «Kʼàfŋ ow a eke wɛl nↄn ab es kʼim.» Ɔny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́w sos ki dad kʼɛsɛ low yɛgm ɛs na ↄny any akm lawl nyam a.
Tasi ɛm a, bwo am ↄŋ agb akm awlŋɛl ɛjecʼa jɛj ɛl owi ok ee? Kↄ fɛŋ a ekʼↄny a, ow elm Nyam ↄↄmʼŋ ee? Ɛtŋ ekʼow el Nyam ↄŋʼŋ, bla sosiɛm kʼɛw sos, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn owʼn elm ob eke ŋ ɛŋn ↄfr ɛm af ee?
Am kokr ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ów a fɛŋ cɛ ↄny uwr any af. Am ocar ↄny sosi ób ↄnyu! Ɔbr nuŋ kpɛkŋ am eel ɛ́b ebu ekʼɛy sʼanm ɛm yɛji! Ow akpal ↄny gbɛ! Blel ↄny eel ɛ́b ebu ana, ɛy yɛji, blel sʼel ↄny ab!
Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, ɛy ɛrm ɛsɛl a, Nyam ot ok ɛy agŋ a ekʼↄsŋ es a e jam, ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl ↄb low luw ecʼaf. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɛw ɛy an wus nimum ecʼany af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼany af ab.

Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy ɛsɛ “eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ” ɛsɛl af Krist sosiɛm, kↄ ↄny, am otar ↄny sosi ɛsɛ “ɛsɛwru” af ↄny lel Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm. Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy agŋ fuɛfuɛ, kↄ ↄny, am otar ↄny sosi lɛc ɛsɛl. Ɔny, wɛl bʼɛlum ↄny nↄnↄ, kↄ ɛy, wɛl úbm ɛy.
Toŋ sicaca ɛm, ɛmɛny namn am ↄny ɛy, mij amn am ↄny ɛy, sʼↄnym mob sus ɛm. Wɛl am ijr ɛy gbre ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ sʼam adŋ es sʼɛc.
Sʼam ij gbre si kok juma ɛy obi ecʼabu ɛm.
Wɛl bi wɛwr ɛy, ke sʼám ibrm Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ sʼↄŋ agŋ a. Wɛl bʼijr ɛy gbre, ke sʼám ɛgŋ sʼeb.
Wɛl bi cak ɛy, kↄ si bʼatr agŋ ɛjecʼa sos es. Toŋ yɛfɛnyna, agŋ ecʼa, sʼanŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af suw egŋun eke agŋ papl es ↄwl ab af.
Mi nↄnm ów amua mʼawm ↄny ɛ́s eke mi kʼↄŋ ↄny eci. Kↄ eke eel ɛm ecʼey amamn eke mi bʼerur a, ow sosiɛm anake mʼam ɛwar ↄny a.

Tasi ɛm a, eke agŋ fandi lɛw am ow yɛgm ↄny Krist ab ecʼɛb ir owi yɛji, ↄnymn ey ɛsɛl nↄnↄ. Kↄ ow elm ɛm anake ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛs af, mʼↄŋ ↄny sel ɛŋn a ekʼanŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke mʼis ↄny Amani Mamn ab ee?
Ow sosiɛm a, mʼam ibrm ↄny eke kʼebr ɛm e sɛwl a.

Ɛtŋ ow nuŋ af, mʼɛrm Timote ɛm ecʼiy e mʼerur tasi ke el cɛcɛ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm a ↄny ecʼaraŋn. Li bʼow li kↄkn ↄny sebr a eke bi nyimnʼm ɛm lele Krist ab ecʼɛb ir ab ɛm a, yecʼa eke mi bi yɛgm susu fɛŋ lele Sinyamel fɛŋ ɛm ab a.
Ɔny ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb tutr eke mi kʼow mʼɛwlm mʼowm ↄny ogŋ a ij, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm am ɛw sos.
Gbɛkↄ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur, waa na ɛm cɛ, mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼɛkn tasi sós ɛwu amua e sodad ebl a, ke mʼɛkn tasi ɛl ecʼabusu a yɛjʼeke -nʼↄnyn eke -li ki kokr Nyam e juma a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm sodad ebl e low, kↄ abusu ↄny e low.
