Lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ a, bla lowi am erurir ee? Kↄ mʼábu likŋni ab mʼow oglog kↄ mʼów ɛrm ekʼerur iy ɛm gbↄŋ lele ɛrm frↄrↄ ab ee?
Wɛl am iri usu a fɛŋ ekʼↄny ecʼaraŋn a, nfaci ij owi nyam in anŋ, ɛtŋ low ikŋ a, in el low ŋuŋ kↄ kↄ kↄ eke Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ecʼaraŋn bↄbↄ yɛji in anm. Ɔny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam in am ɛrum ow ɛs ɛy ab.
Ɔny, low nɛnɛ na am ok ↄny ntotŋ! Sos nana ow it eke ow kʼↄwr ↄny es; ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na, ow it eke ki kokr elel eke ↄtur eke ki kokr bake ógŋn in ↄny ecʼaraŋn a!
Ɛm ecʼa, eke mʼanŋ kpekpe yɛji, abŋ ɛm a mʼanŋ ↄny ab. Ow ↄŋ ɛgŋ a eke kok low nɛnɛ a, mi jɛj in owi mʼok godʼɛtŋ, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ↄny ecʼaraŋn cɛ ɛm anŋ af.
Àsr luku Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm, mʼow mʼanŋ ↄny ab abŋ ɛm. Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼabusu ab ab,
ócr ɛgŋ ikŋ na ɛlul Satan abu ɛm
eke li kʼij gbre in e sos megl ab ɛm,
yecʼɛtŋ ke in e liy a ɛ́ŋn sel, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow ow a.
Sica ↄny, eke am ɛwr sos ke ↄnyn low ↄbr! Ɔny, uwr elel eke lijru tɛl cɛ bʼↄŋ farin a nimum inŋ ab any;

ↄnyn sikpl e lijru sig a ocr es, ke éel agŋ ekʼayl. Ɛbɛn a bʼow anŋn ɛsɛ futufutu owr eke wɛl kok ke lijru anm ɛm ab af, aŋke Nyam yↄyↄg ↄny es ɛtŋ Krist ecʼegb waw e luw a anŋ ɛsɛ ɛy e Pak e licɛbli ab af.
Ow sosiɛm, si kókr Pak a futufutu eke lijru anm ɛm lele ɛrm ekʼayl ke ij nawrɛ ab. Si kʼíjr futufutu eke wɛl kok lijru sig ab a ij, lijru ekʼel ów eŋuŋ lele ɛrm suŋ ab ecʼa.
Ɛm e lɛl a eke mʼikŋ anym mʼawŋ ↄny ab ɛm,
mi nↄn eke kʼↄ́nymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke bʼij nfaci ab ab.

Gbɛkↄ lɛl ab ɛm a, mi dadm ↄny eke ki kpabr es wus ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ e lís! Nawrɛ, agŋ anŋ eke bʼij nfaci, bʼerur os owi nↄnↄ, bʼɛju agŋ eb ob ij, ke bʼigŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ. Blel ow el agŋ amua ana, ke wus na af kʼŋgbroŋn nimum nimum a!

Njaŋ, mʼerur cɛ e mi ki dad ↄny eke kʼↄnymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke bʼij nin ekʼel Krist ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, ke bʼij nfaci, bʼiy mil, bʼigŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ oglog bi cak ɛl lawlɛl a. Agŋ a eke bʼɛgŋ mar afŋn es oglog bʼɛju agŋ eb ob ij a, kʼùsr abu agŋ nɛnɛ ab, kʼìjr ob bↄbↄ yɛji!
Tasi ɛm a, kↄ ɛm ow it eke mi ki jɛj agŋ a ekʼubm Nyam nawrɛ a e low mʼok ee? Ɛl ecʼa, Nyam anake bʼow jɛj ɛl owi ok a. Ɔny, agŋ a ekʼel ↄny ecʼaraŋn ecʼagŋ a e low ki jɛjr okr. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Tasi ɛm a, kↄ ɛm ow it eke mi ki jɛj agŋ a ekʼubm Nyam nawrɛ a e low mʼok ee? Ɛl ecʼa, Nyam anake bʼow jɛj ɛl owi ok a. Ɔny, agŋ a ekʼel ↄny ecʼaraŋn ecʼagŋ a e low ki jɛjr okr. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Eke odad bʼanŋ ↄny ↄfr ɛm a, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ bʼocr low a im ↄŋn jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke uwm Nyam any a jɛj ok, ow a eke kʼoc imn agŋ a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa ogŋ ab ee?
Ɔny, uwmn any eke agŋ a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa bʼow jɛj wus e low ok ee?
Ɛtŋ eke bʼow jɛjr wus e low okr, ke ów ekekey nɛnɛ anake kʼↄtumn jɛjmn okmn ab ee?
Ɔny, uwmn any eke si bʼow si jɛj afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼów sʼok ee? Sica ayaf si kʼↄtum si jɛjm wus aŋa ecʼów sʼokm ee?
Gbɛkↄ, eke bʼↄnyn jɛj ok owi ów amua ecʼa, bʼimn otr jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke ↄnym low kaka Nyamel ab a!
Ɛtŋ na eke mʼam dad a, ↄny ecʼɛ́s. Ɔny ecʼaraŋn aŋa, ɛgŋ nyamni yɛji anm elm sɛwru eke kʼↄtu jɛj low eke bʼanŋ agŋ lisijimɛl ↄfr ecʼaraŋn a ok ee?
Kↄ ow akpl tasi eke Krist ɛm ecʼɛgŋ lisijim nyam kʼↄŋ lawl nyam dedeku jɛj ok ɛsɛl ekʼuwm Nyam any a ogŋ ee?

Ɔny ecʼa, ow akpl ekʼuwr any eke ↄny ↄfr e dedeku ↄŋanin a el low ekʼɛlu ↄny wus! Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ kʼɛ́gŋmn ɛnyɛmbri yony e jɛj ok a nana ebmn ee? Bla sosiɛm kʼɛ́gŋmn eke ↄny lawlɛl ɛjecʼa kʼiy ob ekʼel ↄny ecʼa nana ee?
Ɔny nana anake eel ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl a, ↄny anake am iyr agŋ ɛjecʼa mil a! Ke agŋ ɛjecʼa, Krist ɛm ecʼↄny lisijimɛl cɛ.

Ɔny uwmn any eke ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl kʼow ijm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ecʼaja ab ee? Ɛgŋ kʼɛ́ju ↄny! Agŋ a eke bʼij nfaci, bʼigŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, igŋ oglog yↄw eke bʼɛju lawl mɛbi owi ɛm, egŋ a eke bʼɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab ɛsɛ ɛl ecʼↄyↄw af a lele egŋ a eke bʼagbr lↄsŋn ŋgbafrɛ oto ab a, kʼow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco elu, agŋ a eke bʼerur os owi nↄnↄ, már ɛgŋu, agŋ a eke bi cak ɛl lawlɛl lele agŋ a eke bʼɛju agŋ eb ob ij ab ab yɛji, kʼow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a!

Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, nɛnɛ anake ↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb anŋ a. Gbɛkↄ ɛy e Nyam a yↄyↄg ↄny e sikpl ab es, lʼayal ↄny eke kʼir ɛb in ab, nʼↄŋ ↄny eel nyim nyim in ecʼany af. Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm lele Abŋ Lala ab ecʼabusu ɛm li kok.
Ɔny ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: «Fɛŋ e kok ecʼabusu ɛruʼm es.» Nawrɛ, gbɛkↄ ɛm, mʼam dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. Mi kʼow mi yɛbm ob kaka fɛŋ ↄↄm im mʼelm in ecʼadu.

Bi dadr yɛji ɛsrɛ: «Ob ij, lok eci nʼanŋ, ɛtŋ lok yɛji anŋ ob ij eci.» Nawrɛ, gbɛkↄ lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam bʼow ŋuŋn ɛl a yony mum. Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ anake kok ɛy e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ɛy e sos megl a el in eci. Li kokm ow nfaci ijr eci.
Nyam eke igbm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ luw ɛm a, bʼow oc in ecʼabusu ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji igbm ɛy luw ɛm.
Ɔny uwmn any eke ↄny e sos a el Krist e sos ogog ogog ab ee? Kↄ mʼↄtu eke mi kʼoc Krist e sos ogog nyam mʼokr af facyↄw ab ee? Njaŋ, mi kʼↄtum!
Uwmn any eke ɛgŋ nyam eke okr af facyↄw ab a el sos megl nyam in ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼokr af Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab a, bʼel nyam coco in ab abŋ ɛm.

Kʼòcr ↄny e sos megl a kʼijmn nfaci ab. Sikpl ɛjeci fɛŋ eke agŋ ↄtu eke ki kok a, elm sikpl eke wɛl bi kokm sos megl ab. Kↄ eke ɛgŋ nyam oc in e sos megl a am ijm nfaci ab, ow el low ŋuŋ eke nʼam kok lʼↄbr in e sos megl a.
Uwmn any eke ↄny e sos megl a el usu lala a ekʼel Abŋ Lala ecʼɛb ir usu ab ee? Abŋ Lala na anŋ ↄny ɛm ɛtŋ lʼel Nyam ecʼob ekʼↄŋ ↄny. Ow sosiɛm a, ↄny, elmn ↄny obi ↄny obi ecʼij.
Nyam ↄl ↄny an ligbɛl ɛm eke kʼeel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, òcr ↄny e sos megl a ɛlul in ecʼanygbɛl a ↄkm.
Sica, mʼam mʼow mi dad ↄny ów a eke bibrmnʼm ↄny e lɛl ab ɛm a e low.
Ɔny bi dadr eke owʼn akpl eke ɛgŋ igŋ in kʼↄ́nym yↄw.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ eke bʼij nfaci a sosiɛm, ke igŋ fɛŋ ↄ́ny in e yↄw, ke yↄw fɛŋ ↄ́ny in ecʼigŋ.
Ke igŋ fɛŋ kók low yecʼekʼel igŋ ecʼeke ki kók in e yↄw e lís a, ke yↄw fɛŋ yɛji kók in ecʼigŋ e lís ecʼekʼit a,
aŋke yↄw kʼↄtum ocm in e sos a kokrm low yecʼeke lʼerur a: in e sos a, in ecʼigŋ a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, igŋ yɛji kʼↄtum ocm in e sos a, kokrm low yecʼeke lʼerur a: in e sos a in e yↄw a eci.

Ɛgŋ lawl kʼↄ́nyn sos es lawl e lís, ekʼow elm Nyam eke kʼↄnyn abusu ŋↄŋan eci cɛ. Eke bʼow kokr ɛbɛn lɛgŋ tɛl eci yɛji, ke ow él nɛny af okr ɛm ki kokr. Kↄ ow e jam a, ɛ̀wal am ɛrur usu nyam; ekʼow elm ɛbɛn, kʼↄtumn ↄnynmn sos es ij, ɛtŋ Satan ↄtu eke kʼebr ow ɛm ɛju ↄny.
Low na eke mʼam dad a, elm ol eke mʼam ↄŋ ↄny, kↄ low cɛ eke mʼam ɛw es mʼↄŋ ↄny.
Mʼam erur tasi eke agŋ a fɛŋ kʼanŋ ɛl sↄny ɛsɛ ɛm af, gbɛkↄ Nyam bʼↄŋ ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ bibm nyam eke kʼel in sↄny cɛ eci.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ a ekʼanŋ ɛl sↄny a lele eŋnyↄw ab ab, mʼam dad ↄny mʼɛsɛ: eke bʼanŋn ɛsɛ ɛm af, ow el low nimamn ↄny eci.
Gbɛkↄ eke kʼↄtumn ↄnynmn sos es a, ɛ̀birir! Ow akpl eke kʼɛbirir, ow a eke kʼanŋn low ám aw ↄny ijr ↄny gbre a.

Agŋ a eke ɛbirir a, mʼam dad eke kʼanŋn usu nyam, ɛsʼelel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ in obi dad ab af. Igŋ itm eke kʼogŋ in e yↄw a, ɛtŋ yↄw itm eke kʼɛlu in ecʼigŋ ab es. Eke lʼɛlu in ecʼigŋ ab es a, ke nʼánŋ in sↄny oglog ke lʼɛ́gŋ lʼeb lʼokr ɛm ow ab.

Agŋ a eke ɛbirir a, mʼam dad eke kʼanŋn usu nyam, ɛsʼelel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ in obi dad ab af. Igŋ itm eke kʼogŋ in e yↄw a, ɛtŋ yↄw itm eke kʼɛlu in ecʼigŋ ab es. Eke lʼɛlu in ecʼigŋ ab es a, ke nʼánŋ in sↄny oglog ke lʼɛ́gŋ lʼeb lʼokr ɛm ow ab.

Agŋ a eke ɛbirir ke ɛl e yↄw a oglog igŋ a ubm Nyam nawrɛ a, mʼↄny ów eke ɛl yɛji mi kʼↄm ɛl, ɛtŋ na ecʼa, ow elm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dadm, kↄ ɛm mʼam dad. Eke Krist ɛm ecʼɛgŋ lisijim nyam ↄny yↄw eke ubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow kʼir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li kʼogŋ ow, ekʼow elm nawrɛ ub lis a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ↄny igŋ ekʼubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow kʼir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li kʼŋgboŋ ow ab, ekʼow elm nawrɛ ub ɛs a sosiɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, yↄw ɛc na ekʼelm nawrɛ ub ɛs a titm Nyam nↄnↄ, in e yↄw a eke lʼɛbi a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, igŋ ɛy a ekʼelm nawrɛ ub lis a yɛji titm Nyam nↄnↄ, in ecʼigŋ a eke lʼɛbi a sosiɛm. Blel ow elm nɛnɛ ana, ↄny ecʼey a blel anŋ ɛsɛ ey ekʼitm eke Nyam kʼɛgŋ eb af, kↄ nawrɛ ɛm a, -lʼɛbm eke Nyam kʼɛgŋ eb ɛl.

Gbɛkↄ, ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam ekʼubm Nyam nawrɛ a am erur eke kʼim a, lʼↄtu eke li kʼim. Eke ow ɛcr nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ lisijim a oglog ɛgŋ lisijↄw a ↄnym low kaka ɛgŋ yecʼab ab ij. Ùwr any cɛ eke Nyam, in ecʼa ɛrm es ɛy ecʼɛb ir ɛm lʼɛsŋ ↄny.
Kↄ igŋ ɛy, ↄtu eke kʼuw any eke bʼow sↄg ŋ ecʼigŋ ab ee? Ɛtŋ kↄ yↄw ɛc, ↄtu eke kʼuw any eke ŋ yɛji bʼow sↄg ŋ e yↄw ab ee?

Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny a, ↄny ecʼelel a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛwr ↄny anŋn ab ɛm, am iir ɛb. Sica, eke ow elm mɛbi e low na eke mi dad a, ow it ekʼɛgŋ fɛŋ kʼir ɛb elel eke nʼanŋn ab ɛm. Ol na anake mʼam ɛw es Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm a.
Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋʼŋ a, ke ubr likr es ŋ̂ ee? Ekʼow el ɛbɛn, ànŋ elel a ekʼanŋn a! Eke lʼɛsŋʼŋ a, ke kʼubrm likr es ee? Ekʼow el ɛbɛn, kʼìm catŋ kʼubr es!
Ke wɛl úbr likr es oglog ke wɛl kʼúbrm es, elm low a eke el low tasi a. Low tasi a eke wɛl ki kok a el Nyam e low a eke dad a ecʼɛlum a.
Ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ecʼelel a eke nʼanŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋʼn a.
Eke Nyam ɛsŋʼŋ a, kↄ adu el ee? Eke ow el adu el ke kʼèbr ow e low ɛrm mij! Kↄ ekʼↄtu ekʼel lewi, ke él kpɛkŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ekʼel adu ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛsŋ a, el lewi ɛtŋ el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, ɛgŋ nyam ekʼel lewi ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛsŋ a, el Krist ecʼadu.
An ligbɛl Nyam ɛnm ↄŋ ↄny eel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, kʼèel ɛgŋ ɛjeci e madu.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ecʼelel a eke nʼanŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋʼn a.

Ibrmn ɛm ecʼelel eke mʼam ɛkan ededyↄw oto eke ɛbim egŋ a e lís owi. Mʼɛŋnm ol kaka anm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ogŋ owm low na eci. Gbɛkↄ mʼam dad ↄny ɛm ecʼelel eke mʼam ɛkan low a. Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a ekʼↄny ɛm e lís a sosiɛm, ↄtur eke kʼↄnyn ↄmn ɛm ɛm.
Kin yecʼeke mʼam tutr a: lɛgŋ na ɛm e ses babur a sosiɛm, ekʼagŋ ɛbirm, ow akpl ɛbɛn. Ɛɛ, ow akpl ekʼɛgŋ fɛŋ kʼanŋ ɛsɛ elel eke nʼanŋn ab af.
Kↄ ɛbi yↄw ee? Ekʼɛbi yↄw ke kʼↄ̀l in ecʼes ɛlu ij. Ɛbim yↄw ee? Ekʼɛbim yↄw ke kʼↄ̀l e kʼɛbi ij.

Gbɛkↄ, eke am ɛbi yↄw, ow elm sikpl kokm. Ɛtŋ eke dedyↄwli nyam ɛbi igŋ, in yɛji ow elm sikpl li kokm. Gbɛkↄ agŋ a eke ɛbirir a bʼow ij gbre nↄnↄ ɛl e sɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼɛb ir ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm, mʼerur eke low nɛnɛ kʼɛ́ŋnm ↄny.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼam dad ↄny eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e mowrer e sɛgŋ a ↄfum ij. Caca ɛm ecʼagŋ ekʼɛbi ↄyↄw a, kók ɛsɛ wɛʼn ɛbim af.
Ɛl a ekʼam ikŋ ↄŋn a, kók ɛsɛ wɛʼn ikŋm ij af. Ɛl a ekʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, kók ɛsɛ owʼn iŋnm wɛl af. Ke ɛl a ekʼam ↄl mob a, kók ɛsʼɛbɛn mob a eke wɛʼn ↄl a in elm wɛl ecʼaf.
Ɛl a eke am ɛŋn ob ij wus ecʼɛb ir na ɛm a, kók ɛsʼɛbɛn wɛʼn ɛŋnm in ijm af. Ɛɛ, wus na ecʼów a ecʼelel eke anŋn yɛfɛnyna a, kʼow anm ɛbɛn sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Mʼam erur eke kʼↄnymn ɛrm mij kaka. Ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbim yↄw a, bʼebr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼów ɛrm mij nↄnↄ, kok elel eke in owi kʼawr ow.
Kↄ ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbi yↄw a, bʼebr wus ecʼów ecʼɛrm mij nↄnↄ, kók elel eke in owi kʼawr in e yↄw a,

ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ów yony a ecʼaraŋn li bi cɛc. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, yↄw nyam oglog dedyↄwli nyam eke ɛbim igŋ a, bʼebr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼów ɛrm mij nↄnↄ. -Li bʼerur eke -li kʼel ow eci nimum nimum, -lʼoc ɛl ecʼɛgŋ el a pupukpaŋ -nʼↄŋ ow. Kↄ yↄw nyam ekʼɛbi igŋ a, bʼebr wus ecʼów ɛrm mij nↄnↄ, kók elel eke in owi kʼawr in ecʼigŋ a.
Mʼam dad low na ↄny e nimamn eci, kↄ ow elm gbre eke mi kʼↄŋ ↄny ijr eci. Mʼam erur eke ki sↄsumn yecʼeke akpl a ocr, ow ↄ́ŋ ke úcur Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄnyn es, éel in sↄny coco eci.

Sica, eke igŋ nyam ekʼɛsu yↄw a, ow ecʼerur a am afŋn in es, ɛtŋ nʼam uru eke li ki kok low ↄbr ow e lís eke -li kʼanm ow yony a, ow akpl eke igŋ a ki kok low e nʼam ɛkn ekʼel low tasi a. -Lʼↄtu eke -li kʼɛbirir -lʼok es. Eke -lʼɛbirir a, ke na elm sikpl eke -li kokr.

Gbɛkↄ lʼↄtu eke li dad nʼↄŋ in ecʼɛrm a eke li kʼow lʼɛbim in e dedyↄw a, lʼɛruam ow ab yɛji. Eke li dad tasi nʼↄŋ in ecʼɛrm a, ekʼow elm atrm ɛm ɛtŋ lʼↄtu eke li kʼↄnyn sos es ow ecʼerur a eke bʼawʼr afŋn es a e lís, eke lʼɛbim ow ke ow akpl ɛbɛn.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ a ekʼɛbi in e dedyↄw a kok low mamn, gbɛkↄ in a ekʼɛgŋm eke kʼɛbi in e dedyↄw a kok ow akpl nↄnↄ.
Igŋ ɛy fɛŋ bʼanŋ in ecʼigŋ ab sɛgŋ a nimum eke nʼanŋ owr a. Eke in ecʼigŋ a bʼuw a, nʼↄny abusu eke li kʼɛbi igŋ eke lʼerur a, gbɛ ke lʼél igŋ ekʼↄny ↄmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm cɛ.
Gbɛkↄ ɛm ɛm ecʼa, mʼam ɛkn eke li bʼow nʼanŋ ehe ɛm eke nʼanŋ ɛsɛ elel eke nʼanŋn ab af. Ɛtŋ mʼↄny tutr eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a anŋʼm ɛm.
Sica ↄny e lɛl ekʼawŋnʼm ab ɛm, ibrmnʼm eke wɛl ↄtu ekʼij mindey eke wɛl bi kokr egb waw ↄŋ sinyam yadŋ a. Ow a eke am dadr a, low nawrɛ: «Ɛy fɛŋ sʼↄny low na ecʼany uw tasi.»
Gbɛkↄ low any uw na bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ɛw sos. Kↄ erur bʼↄŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ a agb ↄmn ɛm.
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam am ↄny tutr eke in uw low nyam any, ke li kʼuwm elel eke wɛl bʼuwr low any a.
Gbɛkↄ ekʼɛgŋ nyam bʼerur Nyam, ɛgŋ a, in yɛji Nyam bʼuwʼr any.
Low a ekʼibrmnʼm a el: «Kↄ wɛl ↄtu eke kʼij ndey eke wɛl wawr egb ↄŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?» Ɛy sʼuw any tasi eke Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛtŋ sinyam yadŋ a elm low kaka.
Nawrɛ, agŋ bɛb bi dad eke sinyam in anŋ afr lele wus aŋa ab. Ɛl ecʼa, sinyam a nↄnↄ gbɛl ɛtŋ -li bʼoc wɛl ɛsɛ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ af.

Gbɛkↄ ɛy ecʼa, sʼuw any eke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ, ekʼel ɛy Ɛs. In anake li kok ob ob fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ in eci anake sʼanŋ owr a. Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ yɛji, nyam cɛ anŋ, in lʼel Jesu Krist. In e sabu ɛm li kok ob ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ɛy yɛji, in ecʼabu ab ɛm sʼanŋ owr.

Gbɛkↄ ow elm ↄmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ uwm low nawrɛ na any! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, agŋ bɛb sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ a ɛcm ab. Ow ↄŋ caca ɛm a, eke -li bʼij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw a, ke -nʼam ↄny tutr eke ndey a, sinyam nawrɛ tasi wɛl oc kokr egb waw ↄŋ. Ɛtŋ eke -lʼeel fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a, -li bi tutr eke ndey a bʼↄŋ -lʼel agŋ ekʼaylm Nyam ecʼany af.
Ke ow elm ob ij kʼow ↄↄm ɛy si titam Nyam. Eke sʼijm yɛji, sʼirmnm ob kaka, ɛtŋ eke sʼij yɛji, si kʼow sʼɛŋnm ob kaka.
Abusu ɛru ↄny es low fɛŋ ekʼerurir e kok eci. Gbɛkↄ ɛ̀wr ɛrm, abusu na ekʼɛru ↄny es a itm eke kʼↄny agŋ a ekʼɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a ok wus!

Tasi ɛm a, ŋ ekʼↄny “low any uw” a, eke ɛgŋ nyam ekʼɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a ɛknʼŋ ekʼanŋ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ usu am ij ob, kↄ ow kʼow atrmʼn sos es eke li kʼij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw ↄŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?
Ŋ e low any uw a sosiɛm, esŋ jim a eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ↄmn ɛm a, bʼow ɛy wus, in eke Krist uw in sosiɛm a!
Eke bi kokr sikpl ɛrŋ na ↄbar ↄny lisijimɛl, ↄ́ŋn ɛl ecʼↄmn fuɛfuɛ a abur es, ke Krist anake am kokr sikpl ↄbar a.
Na sosiɛm anake ob nyam eke mi bʼow mij, ke bʼow ↄny ɛm lisijim nyam ɛlu sikpl ɛm a sosiɛm, mi kʼow mʼijm ndey ij, yecʼɛtŋ ke mi kʼɛ́lumʼn wus a.
Ɛm yɛji, abusu ɛruʼm es eke mi ki kok low eke mʼerur. Kↄ mʼelm ɛrm ɛs ee? Kↄ mʼɛknm ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ee? Kↄ elmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma eke mʼam kok a ecʼey ekʼↄsu ee?
Eke agŋ bɛb ecʼa mʼelm ɛrm ɛs yɛji, ↄny ecʼa gbɛ, mʼel. Tasi ɛm a, ↄny anake eel ɛm e juma eke mʼuw kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼa, ecʼey eke ↄsu a.
Kin odad eke mʼam dad agŋ a eke am okʼm ów af a:
Kↄ ɛy sʼↄnym abusu eke si kʼɛŋn ob ij lele mar ab ɛy e juma a ecʼee?
Kↄ ɛy sʼↄnym abusu eke si kʼɛbirir nawrɛ ub lís nyam ab ee? Ɛrm ɛsɛl bɛb a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ lisijimɛl a lele Piɛr ab kok ɛbɛn!
Kↄ ɛm lele Barnabas ab cɛ anake ow it eke si ki kok juma ɛjeci gbuŋ ke sʼɛ́ŋn ob sʼij ab ee?
Eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ ɛgŋ aŋgase a, ɛgŋ a am sↄgm labm kokm aŋgase e juma. Eke wɛl bʼewl likŋni a, wɛl bʼij in ecʼey a. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl bʼↄsu mɛbob a, wɛl bʼɛgŋ ɛl e mɛny mij a.
Kↄ ów amua eke mʼam dad a, agŋ ecʼɛb ir ɛm cɛ ow anŋ ee? Kↄ Mois ecʼol a am dadm low nyam coco ab ee?
Tasi ɛm a, Mois ecʼol ab ɛm wɛl nↄn:
Am tutar eke Nyam, sed ecʼɛrmij nʼam ebr ee?

Oglog ɛy e low nʼam tutr sodad na ɛm ee? Nawrɛ ɛm a, ɛy sosiɛm wɛl nↄn sodad amua. Ɛgŋ eke bʼewl egb a, bʼↄmn egb ey eke li kʼɛŋn lʼub. Ɛtŋ in a eke egb ub e lɛgŋ a, bi kok juma a yɛji bʼↄmn egb ey a eke kʼɛbmʼn a.
Ɛsɛ agŋ eke bʼewl egb af, sʼewl Abŋ Lala ecʼów amamn a ekʼanŋ afr ow a ↄny ɛm. Eke sʼam ub ↄny e wus af aŋa e mob a ekʼↄnyn a e tɛl, ke ow ɛny nↄnↄ gbɛl ee?

Eke agŋ bɛb ↄny abusu kok ɛbɛn ↄny af, ke ɛy tasi anake sʼↄny abusu na sʼakm ɛl a! Gbɛkↄ ɛy sʼɛgŋm sʼɛlum abusu na e sʼↄny a e low ↄkm. Kↄ sʼɛgŋ nana low fɛŋ sʼeb, Krist ecʼAmani Mamn a e wus eke kʼɛym eci.
Ɔny, uwr any ekʼagŋ a e bi kok juma Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, bʼɛŋn ɛl ecʼob ij, mob a eke wɛl bʼis Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a.
Ke ɛl a eke bi kok segb waw a, bʼɛŋn ow eke kʼɛbm ɛl a segb waw a eke -li bi kok ow e low ab ɛm.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋ abusu eke agŋ ekʼam ↄb Amani Mamn a, kʼɛŋn ɛl ecʼob ij juma na eke -nʼam kok ab ɛm.

Gbɛkↄ ɛm, abusu na eke mʼↄny a, mʼibram ow e low kaka, ɛtŋ eke mi nↄn ow e low aŋa, ke ow elm ow ecʼibrm eci. Njaŋ, mʼátm mʼibram ɛm ecʼabusu na e mʼↄny a, ɛtŋ ow bʼokʼm ntotŋ. Mi bʼow mʼerur e mi kʼuw, ow a eke mi ki yɛb ɛgŋ ↄny ɛm eci ntotŋ na oc es a.
Ow elm ów mʼerurm eke mi kʼↄpr Amani Mamn a eke mʼam ↄb a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, ow el low ekʼit eke mi ki kok. Gbre él ɛm eci eke mʼↄbm Amani Mamn a e kokoba!
Blel ow el ɛm obi mi sↄsum juma na mʼoc mʼam kok, mʼↄ́ny ow e labm sↄg. Kↄ ekʼow el juma ekʼit eke mi ki kok a, mʼam kok yecʼa cɛ ekʼit a.
Ɛtŋ ɛm e labm sↄg el bogŋ ecʼee? Ɛm e labm sↄg a el ke mʼↄ́b Amani Mamn a ↄfr ɛm, ke mi kʼúsm ɛm ecʼabusu ecʼów ekʼanŋ ɛm a e low jam.
Ɛm, mʼelm ɛgŋ kaka ecʼadu; gbɛkↄ mʼerur eke mi kʼel agŋ fɛŋ ecʼadu, yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼéb agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl mʼↄŋ Krist.
Eke mʼanŋ Jwifɛl ab, mʼám ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwif af, ɛl ecʼeb sosiɛm eci. Ow elm ke mʼanŋ ɛl ecʼol a ecʼes ɛw ɛm, kↄ eke mʼanŋ ɛl ab, mi bʼɛlum ol a yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼéb agŋ a eke bʼɛlum ol a.

Gbɛkↄ eke mi bʼanŋ ɛl a eke uwm Mois ecʼol ab any ab ab a, mʼám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm anm ol ecʼes ɛw ɛm af, agŋ a ekʼuwm ol ab any a ecʼeb eci. Gbɛkↄ ow elm ke mi kʼɛ́luam Nyam ecʼol a, aŋke mi bʼɛlum Krist ecʼol a.
Eke mʼanŋ ↄmn fuɛfuɛ ɛsɛl ab,
mʼám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm yɛji ↄmn fuɛfuɛ ɛm ↄny af, ɛl ecʼeb sosiɛm eci. Mi bi kok fɛŋ a eke mʼↄtu eke mi ki kok a, yecʼɛtŋ ke saaŋ agŋ nyam nyam ɛ́ŋn sel.
Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, Amani Mamn a sosiɛm cɛ mi bi kok, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji mʼánŋ in e bibm a e low ɛm.
Uwr any eke es uru usu, ow el es uru ɛsɛl a fɛŋ bʼuru es, gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ bʼɛŋn ow e nin awr ob a. Ow sosiɛm, ùrur es nin awr ob a ecʼɛŋn eci!

Es uru ɛsɛl fɛŋ, sos bɛbm ɛm a, bi dɛdŋn ɛl sosi ów nↄnↄ e kok. -Li bʼↄnyn ɛl sosi milↄlu nin awr ob nyam eke íbnm sosiɛm eci. Kↄ ɛy, sʼam atr sos es eke si kʼɛŋn nin awr ob nyam eke bʼow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Na sosiɛm, ɛm, mʼam uru es, kↄ ow elm marɛm marɛm. Mʼanŋ ɛsɛ mum ogŋ ɛs af, kↄ mi wↄ́wlm kukuta marɛm marɛm.
Ɛm, mʼam ↄnyn ɛm e sos a milↄlu, mʼakmʼn es nↄnↄ, yecʼɛtŋ ke mi kʼↄ́bm Amani Mamn eci kokoba mʼokm agŋ, ke ɛm wɛl kʼébm im.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼerur eke mi kʼↄkn ↄny low yecʼa eke ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl Mois e lɛgŋ ɛm a. Jru a ekʼanŋ afr ow a nyimn ɛl,
ɛtŋ -lʼubr okij ebl a,
ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ mij nuŋ eke wɛl ok ɛl af, Mois e jam us eci.
Ɛl fɛŋ -lʼij ob nyam a ɛtŋ -lʼɛgŋ mar nyam a ekʼanŋ Nyam ɛm ow a. Tasi ɛm a, lob a ekʼanŋ Nyam ɛm ow am us ɛl jam ab ɛm -lʼɛgŋ mij ɛl fɛŋ,
ɛtŋ lob a, in anake lʼel Krist a.
Ɛl fɛŋ -lʼij ob nyam a ɛtŋ -lʼɛgŋ mar nyam a ekʼanŋ Nyam ɛm ow a. Tasi ɛm a, lob a ekʼanŋ Nyam ɛm ow am us ɛl jam ab ɛm -lʼɛgŋ mij ɛl fɛŋ,
ɛtŋ lob a, in anake lʼel Krist a.
Gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ nↄnↄ kokm Nyam ecʼerur, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm -lʼuw loj ab ɛm.
Ów amua fɛŋ ɛy eke kʼel sɛwl ɛy eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke si kí kokm ów eŋuŋ eke bʼaw ɛy a ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ecʼab af.
Kʼìgŋn sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb kok ab af. Kin yecʼeke Nyam Lɛl dad:
Si kʼócr ɛy e sos a si kí kokr nfaci ij owi, ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb kok, ke agŋ fandi likŋ lele nyahan ab uw lɛgŋ nyam coco ab af.
Si kʼɛ́bmn Krist,
ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb kok, ke morŋn gúgŋ ɛl -lʼuwr ab af.
Ow ecʼuwr ɛm a, mʼam dad mʼɛsɛ: si kʼɛ́nyn abr, ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb kok, ke afr ɛrm ɛs a ekʼism luw ab a, ibi ɛl ab af.
Ów amua ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow él sɛwl ɛy eci. Wɛl nↄn ɛw es ɛy ecʼɛwar eci, ɛy eke sʼanŋ sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ yeci ekʼam tutr eke nʼinym es kikri a, ɛ́w ɛrm ke li kʼɛ́ym wus.

Ɛbm ɛkn a fɛŋ eke ↄbar a el ow a eke bʼɛŋn agŋ fɛŋ a. Nyam el cɛcɛ ɛtŋ li kʼow li yɛbm eke wɛl kʼɛbm ↄny toŋ ow afŋ ↄny e lɛc ab es. Eke ɛbm ɛkn bʼow owr ↄny a, Nyam bʼow ↄŋ ↄny lɛc inymn es kikri ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼↄŋ ↄny sos dogŋn ecʼabusu.
Ow sosiɛm a, erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lawlɛl, àrur sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ owi ɛgbr es!
Mʼam dad ↄny odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm es ok ɛsɛl af. Ɔny obi yɛji ↄnyn odad eke mʼam dad a igbal ogŋ ɛkan.

Ob ij lala ab ɛm, eke si bʼↄŋ Nyam bia mij kpↄk a e si bʼɛgŋ a ecʼa, ke ow elm af sʼokrm Krist eci mebl ab ab a ee? Kↄ futufutu a eke si bi cɛc sʼↄŋanin ob ij ɛm a, ↄ́nym okrm ɛy af Krist e sos megl ab ab ee?
Futufutu a, nyam coco. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ sʼokr af sʼel sos megl nyam coco, aŋke futufutu nyam coco a ɛy fɛŋ si bʼij.
Lɛ̀ɛr Israɛl eyŋ: ɛl a eke bʼij mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb anŋ egb waw usu a, okr af Nyam ab.
Nɛnɛ a, bla lowi mʼam erur eke mi ki dad ee? Kↄ mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb ↄŋ sinyam yadŋ a lele sinyam yadŋ a ɛl obi ab a el low tasi ee?
Njaŋ! Mʼerur cɛ eke mi ki dad eke segb waw amua, abŋ eŋuŋ a wɛl bi kok ↄŋ, kↄ ow elm ɛy e Nyam a. Ɛtŋ mʼerurm eke kʼokar af abŋ eŋuŋ ab ab.
Kʼↄtumn am ɛgŋn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e mij kpↄk a, ke ám ɛgŋn abŋ eŋuŋ e mij kpↄk a yɛji. Kʼↄtumn am ijr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼob ij lala a, ke ám ijr abŋ eŋuŋ ecʼob a yɛji.
Kↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sʼam erur eke si kʼↄŋ nyamnɛyr ↄny ee? Kↄ sʼↄny lɛc sʼakmʼn ee?
Ɔny ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: «Fɛŋ e kok ecʼabusu ɛru es.» Nawrɛ, gbɛkↄ ɛm, mʼam dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. «Fɛŋ e kok ecʼabusu ɛru es.» Nawrɛ, kↄ ow elm fɛŋ ↄↄm Nyamel agbm ↄmn ɛm.
Ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄ́l in obi cɛ e low mamn es, kↄ ke lʼↄ́l agŋ ɛjecʼa nana ecʼes.
Ndey fɛŋ eke wɛl bʼↄl ij an ɛjɛm a, ìjr ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl kaka kʼánm ɛm.
Kin low ɛbmn nyam: eke Nyam any uwm ɛs nyam ɛsŋ ↄny ob ij ɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ebr imn a, ow akpl eke kʼijr ob a eke wɛl ↄŋ ↄny a ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl kʼánm ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ eke ɛgŋ nyam dad ↄny ninɛ: «Ndey a ekʼam ijr a sinyam yadŋ ecʼegb waw,» ow akpl eke kʼíjmn ɛgŋ a e dad ↄny odad a e sos keskes eke ow kʼɛwm lele in ecʼelel eke li bʼɛkan ów ab ab sosiɛm.
Eke batŋ fɛŋ akpl ↄny eci yɛji, ow ↄtu eke kʼákplm ɛgŋ a eci. Sica bla sosiɛm ɛgŋ ki yɛb ɛgŋ ɛjeci, in ecʼelel eke li bʼɛkan ów ab ɛm, jɛj in ecʼabusu a ekʼɛruʼr es a e low ok ee?
Eke lʼↄtu eke li kʼↄŋ Nyam bia ob a eke nʼam ij a eci, bla sosiɛm wɛl ki cacakʼr ob ij a sosiɛm ee?
Ow cɛ eke mi ki dad a: eke am ijr ob, am ɛgŋn mar ɛtŋ am kokr low fɛŋ yɛji, kòkr fɛŋ Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a eci.
Kʼɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus ↄny ecʼelel eke bi kokr ab ɛm: ke ow el Jwifɛl, ke ow el agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl, ke ow el Nyamel; kʼɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus.
Kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af! Mi bi kok eke ɛm e low kok fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm e low kʼakpl agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm. Mʼↄ́lm ɛm obi e low mamn es, kↄ agŋ fɛŋ e low mamn mi bʼↄl es yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛl fɛŋ -nʼɛŋn sel.
Wèwrmnʼm ów, ɛsɛ elel eke mʼam wewrm Krist ów ab af.
Mʼam aw ↄny eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ bʼↄkan ɛm e low, ke bʼↄsur ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛsɛ elel eke mʼↄŋn ↄny ab af.
Gbɛkↄ kin low e mʼam erur eke kʼirir sɛnyn sɛnyn: igŋ fɛŋ ecʼes ɛw ɛs el Krist, yↄw fɛŋ ecʼes ɛw ɛs el igŋ, ɛtŋ Krist ecʼes ɛw ɛs a el Nyam.
Eke igŋ nyam bubur nuŋ es am ŋↄŋn Nyam oglog am dad odad eke Nyam ↄŋʼn a, lʼɛluam Krist ekʼel in ecʼes ɛw a.
Sica eke yↄw nyam buburm nuŋ es in e Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm oglog odad eke Nyam ↄŋʼn a e dad ɛm a, lʼɛluam in ecʼes ɛw ɛs a ekʼel in ecʼigŋ a. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn nuŋ kprokpro cɛ owʼn ɛr af.
Eke yↄw nyam erurm eke ki bubur nuŋ es, lʼɛ́gŋ lʼeb lʼɛr nuŋ kprokpro cɛ gↄŋ! Gbɛkↄ ow el ɛ́s owi yↄw nyam eke bubr sin es oglog ɛr nuŋ kprokpro a eci; ow sosiɛm li búbur nuŋ es cɛ gↄŋ!
Igŋ ecʼa ow ibram eke li ki bubur nuŋ es eke lʼel Nyam ecʼes otarir lel ow ecʼanygbɛl ab a sosiɛm. Kↄ yↄw, in igŋ ecʼanygbɛl lʼel.
Tasi ɛm a, ow elm yↄw ɛm Nyam kokm igŋ, kↄ igŋ ɛm li kok yↄw.
Ɛtŋ Nyam kokm igŋ yↄw sosiɛm eci, kↄ yↄw li kok igŋ sosiɛm eci.
Low na sosiɛm lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke bi lɛr ↄny e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ab ab sosiɛm, ow it eke yↄw kʼɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam nuŋ af yɛgm eke nʼↄny abusu Nyam ŋↄŋn eci.
Gbɛkↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼany af a, yↄw anŋ igŋ eci ɛtŋ igŋ yɛji anŋ yↄw eci,
aŋke ekʼow el igŋ ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok yↄw, ke yↄw ɛm anake igŋ bʼɛcr wɛl ewʼr a; ów a fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow bʼanŋ ow.
Ɔny obi ɛm yɛji, ↄnyn igbal ogŋ ɛkan: eke yↄw nyam am ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛtŋ li buburm nuŋ es ke ow akpl gbɛ ee?
Eke igŋ nyam ↄfur sin nuŋ, ow el ɛ́s owi! Wus ecʼów a bↄbↄ yɛji am yɛgm eke ow el ɛ́s owi.
Gbɛkↄ yↄw ecʼa eke sin ↄfuʼr nuŋ, ke anygbeŋ ana! Tasi ɛm a, yↄw sin bʼↄfu nuŋ yecʼɛtŋ ke ow él in e nuŋ es bubur ob.
Ɛtŋ ekʼɛgŋ nyam erur eke kʼatar ów es low na af a, lʼúw any eke ɛy e Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm ow ɛcam ɛy ab eke yↄw nyam kí buburm nuŋ es ke ŋↄ́ŋn Nyam.
Eke ow el ↄny e siluku as a ecʼów mʼam dad a, low nyam anŋ eke ow sosiɛm mi kʼↄtum mʼawm ↄny. Tasi ɛm a, ↄny e siluku as a bi kok ↄny low ŋuŋ akm low mamn.
Eke bʼasr luku usu nyam a, bʼinymn es eb eb a eke bubar ɛm a.
Mʼiri ow e low wɛl ɛsɛ ɛm, ɛtŋ mʼↄny ↄmn eke low nawrɛ tɛl anŋ ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛm bubr ↄtu eke kʼanŋ ↄny ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl ↄ́tu ɛkn kpata agŋ a eke el cɛcɛ tasi ↄny ecʼaraŋn a.
Eke bʼasr luku usu nyam a, ow elm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼob ij lala a íjmn.
Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ bʼogŋ es eke kʼij in obi eci ob a, ɛtŋ eke agŋ bɛb, ɛl namn bʼↄny a, likpr ɛl bʼɛgŋ mar am ↄny.

Ɔny na, ↄnymn mel eke kʼanŋn yogŋ ijr ke ɛgŋn ee? Kↄ Nyamel am erurir eke ki kokar miyɛr ee? Kↄ agŋ a ekʼel ↄkↄpm agŋ a erurir eke ki kokr ɛ́s ee? Bla am ekur eke mi ki dad ↄny ee? Kↄ aw mi kʼaw ↄny ee? Njaŋ, low na af gbɛ mi kʼáwm ↄny!
Tasi ɛm a, kin low yɛgm a eke mʼeb Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ogŋ ke mʼↄŋ ↄny a: Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ncok a eke wɛl ↄl ijʼr a, lʼoc futufutu,
lʼɛlu Nyam bia, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, lʼubr futufutu ab ɛm li dad ninɛ: «Futufutu na el ɛm e sos megl. Lʼel ↄny eci. Ìjr ke ám ↄkan ɛm owi.»
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke -lʼijr ob uwr a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ oc vɛn kpↄk a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: «Vɛn kpↄk na el ɛm e mebl a, ɛtŋ Nyam ocʼr am kok in e sinm owr a ↄny ab. Sakp sakp fɛŋ eke bʼow ɛgŋn a, ↄ́kan ɛm owi.»
Tasi ɛm a, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke bʼijr futufutu na ke bʼɛgŋn vɛn kpↄk na a, ow el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e luw a ecʼamani ekʼam ↄbr toŋ ke lʼɛ́wl lʼow.
Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ ekʼam ij Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci futufutu na, oglog am ɛgŋ in e kpↄk na ke ow elm elel ekʼow it a, el ɛgŋ ekʼam eb sikpl ok sos Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci sos megl a lel in e mebl ab ab ecʼany af.
Ow akpl ekʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ kʼotar in sosi akr gbuŋ ke lʼíj futufutu na, ke lʼɛ́gŋ kpↄk na.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yecʼekʼam ij futufutu na ke am ɛgŋ kpↄk na, ke uwm low ekʼanŋ ɛl Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci sos ab ab ecʼaraŋn a, el ɛgŋ ekʼam eb jɛj ok ɛw es in e lís.
Low na sosiɛm anake ↄny ecʼaraŋn a, ↄ́lu nↄnↄ lele sos ɛ́yru ab anŋ, ke agŋ nↄnↄ uw a.
Eke si bʼɛkan ɛy ecʼes an ab ɛm, Nyam kʼow jɛjm okm ɛy.
Gbɛkↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bi jɛj ok ɛy ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy e low, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl kʼↄ́bm ɛy low wus nimum ab.
Ow sosiɛm erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ eke bʼasr luku usu nyam ob ij ecʼa, èkurir ↄny ↄfr.

Eke ɛgŋ nyam namn am ↄny nↄnↄ, ow akpl eke li kʼij ob in ogŋ a, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄny e luku as usu nyam a kʼɛ́sŋm Nyam e jɛj ok a ism ↄny. Ów likpr a eke bibrmnʼm a ecʼa, lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ a, mi bʼow mʼɛkn ow e low.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, yecʼekʼel Abŋ Lala e sob ap ecʼa, mʼerurm eke kʼúwmn ow e lís e low kaka any.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke kʼuwmn Nyam any a, wɛl bʼↄdum ↄny ab imn sinyam yadŋ ekʼam dadm odad ogŋ, ɛtŋ am dogŋnmn sos kaka.

Ow sosiɛm mʼerur eke mi ki dad ↄny low nyam: eke ɛgŋ nyam dad: «Ke abu ɛyr ɛ́ŋn Jesu!», ow kʼↄtum elm Abŋ Lala ↄↄmʼn eke li ki dad ɛbɛn. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kʼↄtum dadm: «Jesu el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ!», eke ow elm Abŋ Lala nyimnmʼn.
Sica yecʼekʼel Abŋ Lala e sob ap ecʼa, Nyam ↄŋ agŋ in e bibm ab ɛm sob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, gbɛkↄ Abŋ nyam a cɛ bʼↄŋ agŋ sob ap a.
Ow ↄny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nyam a cɛ e juma.
Ów ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkↄ Nyam nyam a cɛ bi kok juma ɛy fɛŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ bʼɛlum ɛy abu fɛŋ a eke si bi kok ab ɛm.
Abŋ Lala bʼↄŋ ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋ fɛŋ bibm nyam in sↄny cɛ eci, agŋ likpr a e nimamn eci.
Li bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad sɛwr ɛm eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm, ke Abŋ nyam a cɛ, nʼↄ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam low any uw a eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm.
Abŋ nyam a cɛ bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam ↄmn leg leg e bibm, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam agŋ ewlm ecʼa.

Li bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam akrowa kok e bibm, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam odad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e dad ecʼa, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam yɛji eke kʼuw ów yecʼekʼel Nyam ecʼAbŋ ecʼów ab any lele ɛl ekʼelm ab ab e bibm. Li bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam am ↄtu ɛbr sɛbr e wɛl uwm any e bibm, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam ow ecʼitŋn e bibm.
Gbɛkↄ amua fɛŋ a, Abŋ Lala nyam coco a cɛ bi kok ow e low. Li bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ in e sob ap a ɛsɛ elel eke li bʼerur ab af.
Aŋa sʼóc low nyam sʼɛbmn. Ɛgŋ e sos megl a el ob nyam coco, gbɛkↄ nʼɛnyn susu nↄnↄ cɛ. Ɛtŋ eke nʼɛnyn susu yɛji, susu susu a fɛŋ okr af el sos megl nyam; Krist ecʼa yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ.
Ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl, agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl, madu lele ewi ab, Abŋ Lala nyam ab ɛm cɛ sʼɛŋn mij ok nuŋ, sos megl nyam coco eke si kʼokr af sʼel Krist ɛm a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ, sʼɛŋn Abŋ nyam coco na anŋ ɛy ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, sos megl nimum a ↄ́nym sos ogog nyam cɛ, kↄ sos ogog nↄnↄ li bʼɛli.
Lakr ↄtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, eke mʼelm abu a, mʼelm sos megl ecʼogog nyam.» Kↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, lʼel sos ogog nyam cɛ.
Lↄru ↄtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛm, eke mʼelm nyamn a, mʼelm sos megl ecʼogog nyam.» Kↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, lʼel sos ogog nyam cɛ.
Blel sos megl a nimum el anyamn, ayaf sʼↄtu e si kʼirir low ee? Ɛtŋ blel ow el ↄru ↄfr cɛ, ke ayaf sʼↄtu eke si kʼↄdur ob sↄsŋ sʼeb ee?
Gbɛkↄ, Nyam sisigm sos ogog ogog fɛŋ es sos megl a nimum ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke lʼerur ab af.
Eke sos megl a nimum el sos ogog nyam cɛ, ke lʼelm sos megl ij.
Sos ogog ogog a anake bʼokr af el sos megl nimum nyam a.
Nyamn kʼↄtum dadm abu ɛsmɛ: «Ɛm, mʼↄnym ŋ ecʼes abur!» Ɛtŋ nuŋ kʼↄtum dadm akr ɛsmɛ: «Ɛm, mʼↄnym ↄny ecʼes abur!»
Nawrɛ ɛm a, sos ogog ogog a ekʼↄnym any nↄnↄ a bↄbↄ yɛji, ↄny low e bi kok sos a nimum ɛm.
Susu a eke si bʼɛkn ɛsɛ ɛl ekʼelm low kaka af a, si bi tat ɛl abu af nↄnↄ. Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ↄtum eke kʼɛkn a, si bʼↄny mɛwl si sus ɛl mob.
Ɛy e sos a e susu susu a e wɛl ↄtu eke kʼɛkn a, ibram mob sus na fɛŋ. Gbɛkↄ Nyam eke kok sos megl a, nʼↄŋ susu a eke wɛl bʼɛkn ɛsɛ susu eke elm low kaka af a ɛlum nↄnↄ.
Ɛbɛn a, sos megl a ow elm ɛm ow bubrm. Kↄ nana, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ bʼebr ɛl ↄfr ecʼɛrm mij.
Eke sos ogog nyam am ij gbre, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ am ij gbre in ab. Eke wɛl kok sos ogog nyam anygbeŋ, sos ogog likpr a fɛŋ am kok sos ɛm iŋn in ab.
Ɔny ecʼa, eel Krist e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam nyam el sos megl a ecʼogog nyam.

Ow sosiɛm anake Nyamel ɛm, Nyam ikŋ anym krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛw: ɛrm ɛsɛl, yony ɛm: kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl, nyahan ɛm: low yɛgm ɛsɛl. Ke sica ow e jam a, wɛl bʼɛŋn sakrowa kok ɛsɛl lel ɛl a ekʼɛŋn ɛgŋ ewlm e bibm ab a. Sica ow ↄny abu ɛlum ɛsɛl lele agŋ nyimn ɛsɛl ab, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke ɛŋn sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ecʼɛbr e bibm a yɛji anŋ.
Kↄ ɛl fɛŋ -lʼel ɛrm ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -lʼel kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi yɛgm agŋ low ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi kok sakrowa ee?
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ yɛji -lʼewlamn ↄ́lu, -li dadmn odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, -lʼitŋnmn sodad a.
Ow sosiɛm a ↄↄl sob ap ekʼↄny any a ecʼɛŋn es!
Gbɛkↄ sica, mʼam ow mi yɛgm ↄny ejagb nyam ekʼel sↄbↄ akm bɛb a fɛŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, blel mʼↄtu eke mi kʼɛbr agŋ e sɛbr a fɛŋ lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼab ab yɛji, eke mʼↄnym erur agŋ ɛjecʼa eci, ke mʼanŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo ↄbr cɛ eke wɛl am ar ke am ikŋ, baŋ kpakpaca ekʼam bↄbar af.

Blel mʼↄtu eke mi kʼeb odad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a mʼↄŋ agŋ, mʼɛ́ŋn low any uw a fɛŋ eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, mʼíri ów a eke lↄl es Nyam ɛm a okʼm es sos ɛm, ke mʼↄ́ny ↄmn a ekʼↄtu eke kʼↄny mafɛny fafŋn susu a yɛji, eke mʼↄnym erur agŋ ɛjecʼa eci, mʼelm low kaka!
Ɛtŋ blel mʼↄtu eke mi ki cɛc ɛm ecʼob fɛŋ eke mʼↄny a mʼↄ́ŋ agŋ a eke namn am ↄny a, ke mʼóc ɛm e sos a mʼɛw awoba ke ow íŋnʼm sos ɛm yɛji,
eke mʼↄnym erur agŋ ɛjecʼa eci, ow elm im low kaka!
Erur bʼeku low, ɛrm mamn iyʼr ɛm gbↄŋ, lʼógŋm uwerŋ, lʼɛ́wm sos, lʼɛ́lum mɛgŋel ↄkm.
Erur am kokm ɛ́s owi. Lʼↄ́lm in e low mamn cɛ es, lʼéblm ɛrm ɛtŋ lʼébm low ŋuŋ lʼɛwm es lokm.
Erur sos ɛm íŋnm ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony eci, kↄ sos ɛm gbɛ bʼiŋnʼn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eci.
Erur bʼɛgŋ low fɛŋ eb, bʼub low fɛŋ nawrɛ, bʼↄmn low fɛŋ ɛtŋ bʼusur ɛrm low fɛŋ ɛm.
Lɛgŋ nyam sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si bʼeb sʼↄŋ agŋ a bʼow ɛc. Sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ke wɛl bʼɛbr e bibm a bʼow irm, ɛtŋ Nyam e lís e low fɛŋ eke wɛl uw any a yɛji bʼow uwr. Gbɛkↄ erur ↄnym uwr.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼuwm ów a fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow si dad a yɛji iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ.
Gbɛkↄ, lɛgŋ a eke fɛŋ bʼow iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ a, yecʼa fɛŋ ekʼiym nɛny igŋm nuŋ a, bʼow oc es.
Sica, kin low a eke mʼam ow mi dad a: ow a eke mʼel iy likekli a, mi bi tutr ów ɛtŋ mi bi dad ów ɛsɛ iy likekli af. Sica eke mʼel any es ɛdŋu a, mi kókm ɛsɛ iy likekli af ij.
Lɛgŋ na ɛm, si kʼɛknm Nyam ecʼów a lala ɛm tasi, sʼam ɛkn ɛl ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ flaŋ ɛm af,
gbɛkↄ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si bʼow sʼɛkn any af any af. Sicaca ɛm a, mʼuwm fɛŋ any, kↄ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, mi bʼow mʼuw Nyam any mʼigŋ nuŋ ɛsɛ elel eke lʼuwrʼm any ab af.
Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ów nyahan anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ: ↄmn, low ↄmn lele erur ab. Gbɛkↄ ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a el erur.
Ow sosiɛm a, ìkŋn anym ↄↄl erur es. Ɔ̀ↄl ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ Lala e sob ap ab es, ab brobro sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si bʼeb sʼↄŋ agŋ a, ecʼob ap a.
Eke batŋ ↄny ɛm a ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ow elm agŋ li dadm odad, kↄ Nyam nʼam dad, aŋke ɛgŋ kaka irim. Abŋ Lala ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm, li bi dad ów ekʼↄtu nↄnↄ ke lↄl es.
Gbɛkↄ eke ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ke agŋ nʼam dad lʼok, lʼɛ́lum abu agb ↄmn ɛm, lʼátr sos es ke lʼɛ́yr ɛrm es.
Ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, am ↄtur in sosi cɛ sos. Kↄ ɛgŋ a ekʼin am dad odad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ok agŋ a, am ↄtur Nyamel a nimum sos.

Mʼerur eke ↄny fɛŋ kʼɛbar sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a, gbɛkↄ yecʼeke mʼerur tasi a el ke ám dadr sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Dád sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, akpl nↄnↄ akm sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ecʼɛbr a. Sica ekʼɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke kʼitŋn ɛbr a eke wɛl uwm any ecʼodad a, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow ↄ́ŋ Nyamel a nimum agb ↄmn ɛm a, ke ow akpl.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼócr low nyam sʼↄbar any: eke mʼow mʼam ɛkn ↄny ɛtŋ mʼam dad ↄny odad ɛbr nyam eke írimn ɛm, ke mi kok low nyam mʼↄŋ ↄny ee? Gbɛkↄ eke mʼotar ów a eke Nyam ↄŋʼm a akr sɛnyn sɛnyn irir, oglog eke mi dad ↄny Nyam e lís ecʼany uw e low ayl, oglog mi dad ↄny odad eke bʼanŋ in ogŋ ow a, oglog eke mi yɛgm ↄny low, ow ↄtu eke kʼɛlum ↄny abu.
Simob eke wɛl bʼot ɛgŋn ɛj a yɛji, am ↄŋ ɛy low any ↄbar nyam: ɛsɛ kete af oglog saŋgo af, eke ɛl ecʼikŋ a kpakpabm es aylm, ayaf wɛl kʼuwr ɛj yecʼeke -nʼam afl ab any ee?
Ɛtŋ eke kↄkr a ecʼikŋ a aylm okm es, bwo ecʼɛgŋ bʼow bɛbm ar ogŋ e sos ee?
Ɔny ecʼa yɛji ɛbɛn! Eke am dadr ów sodad ebl eke wɛl írim ab, ayaf wɛl kʼuwr yecʼa ekʼam dadr ab any ee? Ow anŋ ɛsɛ odad ekʼam dadr okr wus af.
Sɛbr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ -li bi dad ów eke bʼok agŋ a e bʼiri a es sos ɛm.
Eke mʼuwm ɛgŋ a ekʼam dadʼm odad a ecʼɛbr ab any, mʼel utu ɛgŋ in ecʼany af ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji lʼel utu ɛgŋ ɛm ecʼany af.
Ɔny yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ! Sica eke am erurir Abŋ Lala eci sob ap a, ìbrmn Nyam atrm ɛm ɛl a ekʼↄtu eke kʼↄŋ Nyamel agb a.
Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ki ŋↄŋn Nyam, ow ↄ́ŋʼn odad itŋn e bibm a.
Eke mi bi ŋↄŋn Nyam sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ɛm ecʼabŋ a bi ŋↄŋn Nyam a, kↄ ɛm e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a am kokm low kaka.
Ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? Mi bʼow mi ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛm ecʼabŋ ab ab, gbɛkↄ mi bʼow mi ŋↄŋn sodad ebl eke bʼok es ɛm. Mi bʼow mʼɛgŋ ɛj ɛm ecʼabŋ ab ab, gbɛkↄ mi bʼow mʼɛgŋ ɛj a sodad ebl e bʼok es ɛm.
Sica ekʼow el abŋ ɛm bʼↄŋ Nyam bia, ɛgŋ a eke irim low a ɛwm es, ke uwm yecʼeke am dad ab any a, ayaf li kʼↄtu li dad «amɛn», ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋↄŋn a ecʼee?
Eke ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋↄŋn a akpl nↄnↄ yɛji, ow ɛ́luam agŋ ɛjecʼa abu agbm ↄmn ɛm.
Mʼam ↄŋ Nyam bia eke mi bʼɛbr sɛbr nↄnↄ eke wɛl uwm any mʼakm ↄny fɛŋ.
Gbɛkↄ Nyamel bʼas luku a, mʼerur eke mi ki dad sodad ebl yen eke ayl wɛl bʼiri mi yɛgmn agŋ low, ow a eke mi ki dad sodad fandi lɛw eke wɛl írim kaka a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kì tutar ów ɛsɛ etuey af, kↄ tùtar ów ɛsɛ agŋ any es ɛdŋu af. Sica low ŋuŋ ecʼa gbɛ, ànŋn ɛsɛ etuey eke ɛknm low ɛm af.
Nyam ecʼol ab ɛm
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ:
Mi bʼow mʼɛcr agŋ eke bʼɛbr etu ecʼɛbr ɛm,
mi dad Israɛl eyŋ odad,
mi bʼow mʼoc etu agŋ e nɛny mi dadr ɛl odad.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, -li kʼow -lʼirimn ɛm owi.

Ow am yɛgm eke sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ecʼɛbr a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ekʼubm nawrɛ a eci, gbɛkↄ ow elm low kaka nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ekʼel nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci, gbɛkↄ ow elm low kaka agŋ ekʼubm nawrɛ a eci.
Kʼaw ke Nyamel nimum ás luku, ke agŋ a pupukpaŋ ám dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm. Eke agŋ ekʼirim ɛy e low a oglog agŋ eke ubm nawrɛ ow ok ↄny ɛm, -li bʼow -li tutr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ ↄny!
Gbɛkↄ eke agŋ a fɛŋ am dad sodad ekʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam ekʼubm nawrɛ oglog irim ɛy e low a kaka ow ɛy ↄny ɛm, li bʼow lʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm sodad eke nʼam iri a sosiɛm.
Ow bʼow ↄŋ ɛtŋ ów a eke lↄl es in ecʼɛrm ab ɛm a bʼow ayl, ɛtŋ li bʼow lʼok ↄwrↄkp wus, lʼubu any es. Li bʼow lʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ ke li dád lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛɛ, Nyam anŋ ↄny araŋn tasi!»

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Eke bʼasr luku Nyam nuŋ igŋ ecʼa, ɛgŋ nyam ↄtu eke kʼɛgŋ ɛj nyam, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́ŋn low e ki yɛgm agŋ, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́lu Nyam e lís e low nyam ↄkm, ɛjeci nyam dád odad ɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ke ɛjeci nyam, in ítŋn odad a eke wɛl dad a. Gbɛkↄ ke fɛŋ ɛ́lum Nyamel a abu agb ↄmn ɛm.
Eke wɛl am dad ów sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ↄtu eke ki kok, kↄ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam, ke ɛgŋ ánŋ am itŋn yecʼa eke -nʼam dad a.
Sica ekʼɛgŋ anm yogŋ eke kʼitŋn ɛl e sodad a, ow akpl eke -li ki yewal tiŋ agŋ a ecʼaraŋn, ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ dad odad a lokm ɛm in obi in obi lele Nyam ab eci.
Agŋ a eke ɛl, bi dad sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a ecʼa, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ↄtu eke ki dad ów a eke -nʼɛŋan a, ke agŋ likpr a ↄ́ny ɛl e dad ebl a igbl ogŋ ɛkn.
Eke agŋ ab ɛm, Nyam ↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad eke ki dad, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam odad anŋ nɛnym am dad a, lʼók odad ab es ke yecʼa yɛji dád.
Nawrɛ, ↄtur eke ↄny fɛŋ kʼɛŋan sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, gbɛkↄ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam ki dad, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ íri low yɛgm ekʼanŋ ɛm a, ke ↄ́ny sos es atr.
Agŋ a eke bʼɛŋn sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ↄtu eke kʼↄnyn sos es bibm a eke -nʼɛŋan a e low kok ɛm.
Nyam elm ów wuwal ɛs, kↄ ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ow bʼɛcr Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl fɛŋ ecʼaraŋn ab af,
ow it eke ↄyↄw ki yewal tiŋ agŋ araŋn. -Nʼↄnym abusu eke -li kʼigb -lʼeb odad -lʼibrm low, kↄ -lʼok es tiŋ ke -lʼiri low, ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl ecʼol a am dad ab af.
Eke -nʼↄny low eke -li kʼibrm -lʼiri a, -lʼibrm ɛl ɛcɛl akŋ ɛm. Ow akplm eke yↄw kʼigb agŋ araŋn eb odad.
Ɔny bi tutar a ke Nyam odad a, ↄny ogŋ yogŋ ow anŋ ow ee? Ɔny sↄny cɛ eel agŋ ekʼɛŋnʼn ee?
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam am ocr in sosi Nyam e kokoba ↄb ɛs, oglog ɛgŋ ekʼɛŋn Abŋ Lala ecʼob ap ab ɛm e nyam, ke lʼↄtu eke li kʼɛkn odad na eke mʼam nↄn mʼawŋ ↄny a ɛsɛ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼol af.
Gbɛkↄ eke lʼuwm any ɛbɛn a, in yɛji Nyam kʼow uwmʼn any.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ecʼuwrm ɛm a, mʼam dad mʼɛsɛ: ow akpl eke kʼerurir ɛŋan sodad eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a; ke kʼɛ́dŋnmn agŋ a eke bʼɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a.
Gbɛkↄ, ke ↄny ecʼaraŋn a, ów a fɛŋ él sɛjɛm sɛjɛm lele sisigm ɛm ab.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼam ↄkn ↄny Amani Mamn a eke mʼↄb ↄny in e kokoba a. Ɛgŋn ebr ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ucur ↄnyn in es.
Amani Mamn na bʼeb ɛlu ↄny es, eke bʼɛgŋn ucur ↄnyn in es ɛsɛ elel eke mʼↄŋn ↄny ab af cɛ. Ekʼow elm ɛbɛn, nawrɛ ↄfr ↄfr cɛ am ubr.
Mʼikŋ anym mʼↄŋ ↄny low yɛgm a eke ɛm obi yɛji mʼɛŋn a: ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Krist uw, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
Wɛl ɛluʼl uwↄmu ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam igbmʼn luw ɛm sɛgŋ nyahan ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
Lʼokm sos ↄkm li yɛgm Piɛr
ɛtŋ ow e jam a ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a yɛji ɛknʼn.
Ɛmɛny, lʼokm sos ↄkm li yɛgm in e jam ɛsɛl ekŋ yen yen sakp yen ekʼanŋ usu nyam a ɛknʼn wanci nyam af. Ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam uw, gbɛkↄ nↄnↄ gbɛl anŋ owr cɛ.
Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, lʼokm sos ↄkm li yɛgm Jak lele ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ab ɛknʼn.
Sica eke lʼokm sos ↄkm li yɛgm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ toŋ bake ow uwr a, ɛm yɛji lʼokm sos ↄkm li yɛgmʼm, ɛm eke mʼitm tasi a.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛm, ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ɛm e likekli tasi. Mʼitm yɛjʼeke wɛl kʼɛsŋʼm ɛrm ɛs, aŋke mʼijr Nyamel gbre nↄnↄ.

Gbɛkↄ Nyam e sↄrŋ ikŋ a anake ↄŋ ke mʼel ɛgŋ na eke mʼel a, ɛtŋ in e bibm na eke mʼɛŋn a ↄsu ey amamn ɛm ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi kok juma mʼakm ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ. Gbɛkↄ ow elm ɛm obi tasi mi kokm juma a, Nyam e bibm a ekʼanŋ ɛm ab a kok.
Amua fɛŋ a, ekʼow el ɛm mʼↄb Amani Mamn a e kokoba oglog ɛm lawlɛl likpr a ↄb yɛji, ow elm na elm low a. Nɛnɛ anake si bʼↄb Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ anake ubr nawrɛ a.
Ɛy sʼam ↄb amani si dad sʼɛsɛ: Krist igb luw ɛm. Gbɛkↄ ↄny ɛm a, agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: agŋ ekʼin uw a, in ↄnym igb ij. Ayaf -lʼↄtu eke -li ki dad low nɛnɛ ee?
Eke agŋ ekʼuw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke tasi Krist igbm luw ɛm, ke ɛy e Nyam odad eke sʼam dad a ↄnym liy kaka, ɛtŋ low a ekʼↄnyn ↄmn ow ɛm a yɛji, ↄnym liy kaka.
Ɛmɛny eke agŋ ekʼuw a ígbm luw ɛm, ow am yɛgm yɛjʼeke sʼel Nyam ecʼadaŋku ayadŋu. Sʼel adaŋku ayadŋu, aŋke lʼigbam Krist luw ɛm ɛtŋ si dad eke lʼigbm ow.
Ɛɛ, ekʼagŋ ekʼuw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke Krist igbm luw ɛm ke ↄmn ↄfr ↄfr cɛ ↄnyn, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny anŋn ↄny e sikpl ab ɛm cɛ.
Ow am yɛgm yɛjʼeke agŋ a ekʼoc ɛl ecʼↄmn a nimum ɛlu Krist ɛm gbuŋ ke ca uw a irm.
Ɛtŋ ekʼow el owr anŋ na cɛ eci sʼoc ɛy e low ↄmn a sʼɛlu Krist ɛm, ke sʼel agŋ fɛŋ ɛm e gbre ɛsɛl tasi!
Gbɛkↄ nawrɛ ɛm a, Krist igb luw ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm, Krist anake ikŋ anym igb a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow yɛgm eke agŋ likpr a ekʼↄny ↄmn ke uw a yɛji bʼow igb.
Low na wɛl am ɛkn ɛbɛn, aŋke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ekʼel Adam ab ɛm anake luw anŋ ow a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ekʼel Krist ab ɛm anake agŋ bʼow igb luw ɛm a.
Agŋ fɛŋ bʼuw, aŋke -lʼokr af Adam ab. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, agŋ fɛŋ bʼow ɛŋn sel, aŋke -lʼokr af Krist ab,
gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ecʼelel eke ow ↄsŋ es anŋ ab ɛm: Krist anake ikŋ anym igb luw ɛm a. Ow e jam a, lɛgŋ a eke li bʼow lʼɛwl mɛny lʼow a, agŋ a ekʼel in ecʼa, ɛl yɛji bʼow igb gↄŋ.
Sica nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, Krist bʼow ŋuŋn es ɛw eŋuŋ fɛŋ, abusu eŋuŋ fɛŋ lele lɛc eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab ɛy af.
Ɛtŋ li bʼow lʼoc in ecʼes ɛw a nʼↄŋ Ɛs Nyam.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke Krist kʼↄnym es ɛw ab ab toŋ ke Nyam ót in ecʼefnu a fɛŋ okʼr akr ew.
Es abal el ɛm ecʼifnu eke wɛl bʼow ŋuŋn a el luw.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin ow eke wɛl bʼawl:
Gbɛkↄ eke Lɛl a bi dad eke Nyam in ot “fɛŋ” in ok ow es akr ew, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam anm “fɛŋ” ab ɛm, aŋke Nyam, in anake li bʼↄŋ Krist abusu ów a fɛŋ af a.
Ɛtŋ eke Iy a bʼow ↄny abusu ów a fɛŋ af a, in obi in obi a, li bʼow lʼis es Nyam ekʼↄŋʼn abusu na a ecʼany af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam bʼow ɛw fɛŋ es nimum nimum.
Sica eke ow elm nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm agŋ bɛb bʼɛgŋ eb wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ agŋ ekʼuw a ecʼee? Bla ow bʼow eel ɛl eke agŋ ekʼuw a ígbm luw ɛm ee?
Ɛtŋ ɛy obi gbɛ, bla sosiɛm sɛgŋ a fɛŋ sʼam ir ɛb ekʼↄtu eke kʼibi ɛy ee?
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, luw anŋʼm saw. Agŋ lisijimɛl na low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low nawrɛ yɛjʼeke ntotŋ bʼokʼm ↄny eci, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm.
Efɛs ɛb ɛm, mʼogŋ mum agŋ ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af ab. Eke ow el agŋ ɛm ecʼów cɛ eci, ke bla mʼɛŋn ɛm tasi ee? Eke agŋ e bʼuw a ígbm luw ɛm, si dád sʼɛsɛ:
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ↄny ecʼów e dad ɛm! Mɛcrer ŋuŋ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ ekʼam ir ɛb sɛnyn a.
Ɛ̀wal ebar ↄny e nuŋ ɛm es ok ab ɛm ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ab af, ke kí kokmn sikpl ij! Ɛɛ, ↄny ɛm a agŋ anŋ ekʼuwm Nyam any. Ɛtŋ na eke mʼam dad a, ↄny ecʼɛ́s.
Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ nyam ↄtu eke kʼibrm ɛsɛ: ayaf agŋ ekʼuw a bʼigbr luw ɛm ee? Bogŋ e sos megl -li bʼow -lʼɛli ee?
Kì tutr ów ɛsʼɛgŋ ekʼↄnym nuŋ ɛm af! Eke bʼewl egb liy a, ow elm eke li bʼuw yɛ, gbuŋ ɛtŋ li bʼɛli lʼel likŋ ekʼanŋ owr ee?
Ɛtŋ bla bʼewl ee? Ow elm likŋ a eke bʼow agb a éwlm, kↄ egb liy nyam cɛ bʼoc ɛlu wus ɛm, ow ↄtu eke kʼel ble liy oglog egb liy kaka fɛŋ.
Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, Nyam bʼↄŋ egb liy a sos yecʼeke lʼerur e li kʼↄŋ ow a, ɛtŋ li bʼↄŋ egb liy fɛŋ sos eke kʼel ow ecʼa.
Mob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ owr a ɛ́lim sos nɛny nyam. Agŋ e sos a lele mindey ecʼab ab elm nɛny nyam; ɛtŋ ↄr lele sↄcn ab ecʼa yɛji bɛbmnm.
Eke wɛl ↄtu e ki dad ɛsɛ mob ekʼanŋ afr a ɛli “sos” ɛsɛ wus aŋa ecʼa ekʼanŋ ab af yɛji, ɛl e jɛjn a elm nɛny nyam.
Ligbn e jɛjn a elm kpɛŋ awl ecʼab ab, ɛtŋ ɛl yony mum e jɛjn elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ecʼab ab. Ɛtŋ lɛ́l nyam nyam e jɛjn a bↄbↄ yɛji elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ɛjecʼa ecʼab ab.
Lɛgŋ a ekʼagŋ bʼow igb luw ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke ow bʼow ɛcr ana. Yecʼa eke wɛl bʼɛlu nↄmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl ekʼit eke kʼugŋ es. Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼigb luw ɛm a, li kʼↄtum lʼugŋm es ij.

Yecʼa eke wɛl bʼɛlu nↄmu ɛm a, el sos megl ekʼelm low kaka. Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼigb luw ɛm a, anygbɛl bʼiyʼr ɛm gbↄŋ. Yecʼa eke wɛl bʼɛlu nↄmu ɛm a, el sos megl ekʼↄnym sos kaka. Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼigb luw ɛm a, lɛc bʼiyʼr ɛm gbↄŋ.

Sos megl eke wɛl bʼɛlu nↄmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼigb luw ɛm a, Abŋ Lala bʼↄŋʼn nʼanŋ owr. Ow ↄny sos megl nyam ekʼel sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkↄ ow ↄny sos megl nyam yɛji eke bʼɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ Adam es abal el a, in ɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm ɛtŋ li bʼↄŋ agŋ ɛjecʼa owr anŋ.
Gbɛkↄ ów a ecʼes ↄsŋm ɛm a, Adam a eke bʼikŋ anym ow a elm in a eke Abŋ Lala ↄŋ anŋ owr a, kↄ Adam a ekʼel ɛgŋ nɛnɛ cɛ a. In e jam a gbuŋ ɛtŋ Adam es abal el a eke Abŋ Lala ↄŋ anŋ owr a bʼow.
Nyam kok krɛkrɛ ecʼɛgŋ a wus e siflefl ab, gbɛkↄ yony ɛm ecʼɛgŋ a afr nʼanŋ lʼow.
Wus ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ɛli sos megl ekʼotarir es ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ wus ɛm ɛy ↄkm ecʼab ab. Afr ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ a ɛli sos megl ekʼotarir es ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ afr ow ecʼab ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke si bʼotarir es ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ wus ɛm ɛy ↄkm ab ab a, lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si bʼow sʼotarir es ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ afr ow ab ab yɛji.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low tasi eke mʼam dad: ob yecʼeke wɛl kok sos megl lele mebl ab ɛm a, kʼↄtum ɛym Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a. Ɛtŋ yecʼa eke bʼugŋ es a, kʼↄtum ɛŋnm owr anŋ ekʼↄnym uwr a.
Sica mʼam ow mi dad ↄny low nyam eke lↄl es: si kʼow sʼuwm ɛy fɛŋ, gbɛkↄ Nyam bʼow itŋn ɛy fɛŋ e sos megl a.
Low na bʼow ɛc fafa, ow bʼow ɛc fafa marɛm, wanci ab af eke kↄkr es abal el a bʼow ikŋ a. Ɛɛ, kↄkr a bʼow ikŋ ɛtŋ agŋ a ekʼuw a bʼow igb owr anŋ ekʼↄnym uwr a eci, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ si bʼow sʼitŋn.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke ɛy e sos megl a eke bʼuw ke bʼugŋ es a, kʼitŋn el sos megl eke kʼow uwm lɛgŋ kaka ke kʼow ugŋm es ij.
Sica ɛy e sos megl a ↄtu eke kʼuw ke ugŋ es, gbɛkↄ, -li bʼow -lʼitŋn -lʼel sos megl eke bʼow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Eke low na bʼow ɛy a, ow bʼow ↄŋ ów a fɛŋ ɛy ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af:
Luw eci mbe a, sikpl ogŋ ow bʼanŋ ow, ɛtŋ sikpl bʼɛŋn in ecʼabusu a ol ogŋ.
Gbɛkↄ sʼↄ́ŋ Nyam eke bʼɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm ↄŋ ɛy any eb a bia.
Ow sosiɛm, erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, ɛ̀lul lɛc ↄkm, ìnymn es kikri! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kòkr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma a mɛwl ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke in e juma eke am kokr a, elm gbre ↄfr ↄfr ekʼam ijr.
Sica si dádr os a eke wɛl am ↄkl eke kʼɛlum Jerusalɛm e Nyamel a ecʼↄmn ɛsɛl a abu a e low. Kòkr low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ eke mi dad mʼↄŋ Sinyamel ekʼanŋ Galasi wus af a:
dimas fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ akŋ ɛtŋ, bʼow oc os am ɛw es saw; ow ↄ́ŋ ke wɛl kʼékum eke mi kʼanŋ mʼow gbuŋ ke wɛl ás os a luku.
Lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow a, agŋ a eke sↄsumn otr a, mi bʼow mʼɛrm ɛl Jerusalɛm. Mi bʼow mʼↄŋ ɛl abusu e lɛl, ke -lʼoc ↄny ecʼob ap a -nʼim.
Sica ekʼow it ekʼɛm obi yɛji mi kʼim a, ke -nʼim lel ɛm ab.
Mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ eke mi bʼɛc Maseduan a, aŋke mi bʼow mʼɛcr yogŋ eci.
Kʼaw ke mʼánŋ ↄny ab sɛgŋ bɛb, oglog ke ow él lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum. Ow ↄ́ŋ ke ɛ́lumnʼm abu mʼↄkŋ any mʼim ɛm ecʼusu a.
Tasi ɛm a, mʼerurm eke ow kʼel ɛkn cɛ mi kʼɛkn ↄny ke mʼáfŋ es mʼaam. Mʼam ↄny tutr eke mi kʼanŋ ↄny ab sɛgŋ bɛb eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛgŋ cɛ.
Gbɛkↄ mi bʼow mʼanŋ Efɛs toŋ ke Pantekↄt ecʼes gbɛgbl a ów,
aŋke ɛm e juma kok ecʼabusu nↄnↄ ɛruʼm es aŋa, eke agŋ nↄnↄ am atar ɛm ab yɛji.
Eke Timote ow a, ɛ̀wr in e lís e low ɛrm, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼɛ́kn eke ebr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, aŋke in yɛji Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma nʼam kok ɛsɛ ɛm af.
Ɛgŋ kaka ↄny ɛm a kʼíir ir es. Kↄ ↄŋan in ob eke kʼɛlumʼn abu, lʼɛ́wl lʼow nʼɛŋnʼm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, aŋke mʼam ekuʼr in lele agŋ lisijimɛl a eke bʼow ɛwlʼl ab ab.
Sica ɛy lisijim Apolↄs e lís ecʼa,
mʼatrʼr sos es sakp nↄnↄ eke li kʼow lʼɛkn ↄny agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab, gbɛkↄ sicaca ɛm a, li kʼerurm eke li kʼim usu. Eke abusu bʼow ɛruʼr es a, li bʼow lʼow.
Ànŋn any owr, ìnymn es kikri ↄmn ɛm! Àtar sos es, ↄnyn lɛc!
Kòkr fɛŋ erur ɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny kin low ↄm nyam: ↄny uwr any eke Stefanas lel in ecʼakŋ ab ab el Akayi
wus ogog ecʼagŋ krɛkrɛ eke itŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke ɛgŋ ↄmn ɛsɛl ɛjecʼa e juma eke -li ki kok -nʼↄŋ a e low -lʼebr.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛ̀lumn agŋ nɛnɛ a lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke am atr sos es kok juma ɛl ab a.
Sos ɛm am iŋnʼm Stefanas, Fↄrtunatus lele Akayikus ab ecʼow na eke ow am ɛknʼm a eci.
Ɛl eci saw eke -nʼanŋnʼm a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ↄny yɛji saw cɛ ↄny anŋnʼm af.
Ɛɛ, -nʼↄŋʼm ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ ↄny yɛji -nʼↄŋ ↄny. Ow akpl eke kʼuwr agŋ nɛnɛ a e leg ab any.
Azi wus af
e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ↄny. Akilas, Prisil lele agŋ a eke bʼas luku ɛl ecʼakŋ a, am ɛsŋn ↄny sɛnyn sɛnyn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm.
Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ aŋa a am ɛsŋn ↄny. Ɛ̀sŋninin ↄny ↄfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl lele lisijↄwɛl ab af.
Ɛm Pↄl, ɛm obi ecʼabu ɛm mi nↄn ɛsŋn na.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam érurm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, ke Nyam ígŋ ↄwlʼl!
Ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ òw.
Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ!
Mʼerur ↄny fɛŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm.
II Corinthians: Ɛm Pↄl, mʼel Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, mʼam awŋ Nyamel ekʼanŋ Korɛnt a lele Nyam ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ Akayi nimum ab a lɛl na.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy!
Si kↄ́klm Nyam ekʼel ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼƐs a! Lʼel ɛgŋ Ɛs ekʼij gbreŋgbi sↄrŋ ikŋ ɛm ɛtŋ lʼel Nyam eke bʼatr ɛy sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Li bʼatr ɛy sos es ɛy e ses babur fɛŋ ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji sʼátr agŋ ekʼam ij gbre a sos es. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si bʼↄŋ ɛl yecʼa eke ɛy obi yɛji si bʼeb Nyam ogŋ a.
Tasi ɛm a, elel a eke si bʼij gbre nↄnↄ Krist e nin a ecʼa, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam si bʼɛŋn sos es atr nↄnↄ in ɛm.
Eke sʼanŋ es abur ɛm, ke ↄny e sos es atr lele ↄny e sↄg ab eci. Eke sʼam ɛŋn sos es atr, ke ↄny e sos eke si kʼatr ↄny es ɛ́gŋn gbre nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke sʼam ij ɛsɛ ↄny af a ebr eci.
Sʼↄny ↄmn tasi ɛy ɛm eke si bi tutr ↄny e lís owi a, aŋke sʼuw low nyam any: ekʼam ijr gbre ɛy ab a, ↄny yɛji sos es atr eke sʼɛŋn a el ↄny eci.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it e kʼuwr any eke Azi wus af a,
sʼɛgŋ gbre ijr ɛgbɛl nↄnↄ sʼeb, gbre ijr ekʼɛl e leg a agb afŋn ɛy e lɛc ab es, toŋ ke sʼirmn owr anŋ ecʼↄmn fɛŋ.
Ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji sʼuw any tasi eke si bʼow sʼuw. Ɛbɛn a, si kʼↄtum sʼocm ɛy ecʼↄmn sʼɛlum ɛy obi ɛm ij, kↄ Nyam eke bʼigbm agŋ luw ɛm a sↄny coco ɛm si kʼoc sʼɛlu.
Nyam anake ↄny oc ɛy es luw na ɛm a ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li bʼow nʼↄny lʼoc ɛy es. Ɛɛ, sʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm eke ɛmɛny li bʼow nʼↄny lʼoc ɛy es.
Ɔny yɛji, eke bi ŋↄŋan Nyam ↄŋn ɛy, ke abu ɛlumn ɛy a. Ɛtŋ si bʼow sʼɛŋn bibm Nyam ɛm, agŋ nↄnↄ eci ŋↄŋn a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm agŋ nↄnↄ bʼow ↄtu ↄŋ Nyam bia ɛy eci.

Eke low nyam anŋ eke kʼↄŋ ntotŋ ok ɛy, ke ɛy ecʼów tutr a ecʼów eke ókm ɛy af a. Nʼam dad ɛy tasi eke si kok low ɛlum ɛm lele nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ab agŋ fɛŋ ab, ab brobro ↄny e lís. Na low ekʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, Nyam eci ɛrm mamn a anake nyimn ɛy a, kↄ ow elm agŋ e sɛwr a gbɛ.

Tasi ɛm a, awal yecʼa eke si nↄn ɛy e silɛl ab ɛm a, irir ɛtŋ si lↄlam ↄny low kaka es ɛm yogŋ. Low nyam gbɛ anŋ eke irimn okm ↄny es sos ɛm, kↄ mʼam ↄny ↄmn eke ow bʼow ok ↄny es sos ɛm tasi: lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu bʼow ow a,
ntotŋ bʼow ok ↄny ɛy eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji ow bʼow ok ɛy ↄny ecʼab af.

Tasi ɛm a, awal yecʼa eke si nↄn ɛy e silɛl ab ɛm a, irir ɛtŋ si lↄlam ↄny low kaka es ɛm yogŋ. Low nyam gbɛ anŋ eke irimn okm ↄny es sos ɛm, kↄ mʼam ↄny ↄmn eke ow bʼow ok ↄny es sos ɛm tasi: lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu bʼow ow a,
ntotŋ bʼow ok ↄny ɛy eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji ow bʼow ok ɛy ↄny ecʼab af.

Eke mʼuw ↄny eci ntotŋ ab any tasi a, mi bɛbm eke mi kʼikŋ anym mʼɛc ↄny ogŋ a, ke mʼanŋ yogŋ mʼim Maseduan, ba ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, ke mi gbár es ↄny ogŋ yogŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ow bʼow ↄŋ ↄny abusu kokr sos ɛm iŋn sakp yony ɛtŋ bʼow ɛlumnʼm abu mʼim Jude.

Eke mʼuw ↄny eci ntotŋ ab any tasi a, mi bɛbm eke mi kʼikŋ anym mʼɛc ↄny ogŋ a, ke mʼanŋ yogŋ mʼim Maseduan, ba ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, ke mi gbár es ↄny ogŋ yogŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ow bʼow ↄŋ ↄny abusu kokr sos ɛm iŋn sakp yony ɛtŋ bʼow ɛlumnʼm abu mʼim Jude.
Eke mi bɛbm low na a, kↄ mi tutrm ów ee? Oglog eke mi bi bɛbm ów a, kↄ ɛm obi ecʼerur a eke mi ki kok a sosiɛm mi bʼɛgŋ “ɛɛ”, ke ɛmɛny mʼítŋn mʼɛsɛ “njaŋ” ee?
Mʼam eb Nyam daŋku, odad eke sʼam dad ↄny a, elm “ɛɛ” lele “njaŋ” ab.
Silas, Timote lele ɛm ab, sʼↄb ↄny Nyam Jim Jesu Krist ecʼamani a. Ow akpl ke úwr any eke Jesu elm “ɛɛ” lele “njaŋ” ab, kↄ sɛgŋ fɛŋ “ɛɛ” cɛ li bʼel.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu el ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy ɛw es a eci “ɛɛ”. Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛm anake si bi dad ɛy eci “amɛn” a, ke si bi kↄklm Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a.
Nyam in obi anake bʼↄŋ ke ↄny lele ɛy ab, si bʼↄny lɛc Krist ɛm a. In anake li sↄsum lʼot ɛy,
ke lʼɛw ɛy in e mɛny ɛwr a ekʼam yɛgm eke sʼel in ecʼa af a. Lʼoc Abŋ Lala lʼɛlu ɛy ɛrm ɛm, eke kʼel aja a eke li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ mi kʼɛwlm mi kʼowm Korɛnt ee? Mʼam eb Nyam daŋku, lʼuwʼm any ɛtŋ lʼuw any eke mʼↄnym yadŋ. Mi kʼowm, aŋke mʼerurm eke mi kʼijr ↄny gbre.
Sʼↄlm eke si kʼↄŋ ↄny low lɛc ɛm ubr nawrɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ijr lɛc ↄmn ɛm, gbɛkↄ sʼam erur eke si kʼokr af si kok juma ↄny e sos ɛm iŋn a eci.
Kin low yecʼeke mi bɛbm a: mʼerurm eke mi kʼɛwl mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, eke ɛmɛny ow bʼow ↄwr ↄny sos es.
Eke ɛm mʼↄwr ↄny sos es, ke bwo ecʼɛgŋ bʼow ↄŋʼm sos ɛm iŋn, eke ow elm ↄny a cɛ eke mʼↄwr ↄny sos es ab ee?
Mʼerurm eke mi kʼow mʼɛkn ↄny, ke mʼↄwr ↄny sos es. Ow akplm ekʼagŋ a ekʼit eke kʼↄŋʼm sos ɛm iŋn a, kʼel agŋ a eke bʼↄwrʼm sos es a. Na ecʼanake mʼawŋ ↄny lɛl es abal el a.
Mʼuw any tasi eke low yecʼeke bʼↄŋʼm sos ɛm iŋn a, ↄny yɛji bʼↄŋ ↄny sos ɛm iŋn.
Ɛɛ, mikŋ ab mi nↄn lɛl a mʼawŋ ↄny, sos es ↄw lel ɛrm mij ab iyʼm ɛrm ɛm gbↄŋ. Gbɛkↄ mʼawŋm ↄny lɛl a eke mi kʼↄwr ↄny sos es, mʼawŋ ↄny yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛ́kan erur ligbɛl a eke mʼↄny ↄny ecʼa.
Nawrɛ, ɛgŋ na eke is sos es ↄw owi na a, ow elm ów a mʼerurm eke mi kʼagbr gbɛ, kↄ mʼam dad mʼɛsɛ li kok Nyamel low ŋuŋ lʼakm ɛm obi a. Ɛtŋ ekʼow elm ↄny fɛŋ yɛji, ↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ bɛb gbɛ low a ↄn es.
Ɛgŋ ikŋ a ecʼa, abr a cɛ eke ↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ ɛnymʼn a ↄdŋ cɛ ŋ̂.
Ow sosiɛm, caca ɛm a, ow akpl eke kʼocr apr ir ke atar ir sos es; ekʼow elm ɛbɛn, sos es ↄw ligbɛl ↄtu eke kʼↄwrʼr sos es nimum nimum.
Sica mʼam ibrm eke kʼɛlul erur ↄkm in e lís.
Tasi ɛm a, kin low a nuŋ af eke mʼawŋ ↄny lɛl a: mʼerur eke mi kʼɛkn eke bʼow ↄnyn ɛlumn low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Eke bʼapr ɛgŋ low, ɛm yɛji mi bʼapʼr. Eke low anŋ eke mi kʼap yɛji, mi bʼoc mʼap ↄny sosiɛm, Krist ecʼany af.
Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Satan ↄ́tum ɛjum ɛy. Ɛɛ, sʼuw in e sow tutr ab any tasi.
Eke mʼim mʼɛy Troas ɛb ɛm, Krist ecʼAmani Mamn a ecʼↄb ecʼa, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋʼm mʼɛŋn juma na e kok ecʼabusu mamn.
Gbɛkↄ mʼↄny ɛrmij nↄnↄ, aŋke mʼↄtum mʼɛŋnm ɛy lisijim Tit. Na sosiɛm mʼibrm Troas ecʼagŋ a abusu ɛtŋ mʼeb ejagb mʼim Maseduan wus af.

Sʼↄ́ŋn Nyam bia! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, li bʼɛcr Krist ɛm lʼot lʼok ɛy in ecʼagŋ a ekʼeb any ke am ij facue ab ɛm, ɛtŋ li bʼɛcr ɛy ɛm nʼↄ́ŋ wɛl uw Krist any usu a fɛŋ. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ sↄsŋ mamn eke bʼeb es usu a fɛŋ af.
Ɛɛ, ɛy sʼanŋ ɛsɛ mijey sŋↄsŋↄ eke Krist am ↄŋ Nyam af. Ɛtŋ ow eci sↄsŋ a ok sakp yony: agŋ a ekʼanŋ sel ɛŋn ecʼejagb ab af a lele ɛl a ekʼam irmn ɛl e sel ab ab eci.
Agŋ a ekʼam irm ecʼa, ow el luw e sↄsŋ eke bʼism luw ab. Kↄ agŋ likpr a ecʼa, ow el owr anŋ e sↄsŋ eke bʼism owr anŋ ab. Ɛtŋ kↄ bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄny abusu eke ki kok juma nɛnɛ ee?

Ɛy sʼanm ɛsɛ agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl eke bʼoc Nyam odad am ↄↄl an, os eke -li kʼɛŋn sosiɛm ecʼab af. Ɛy, Nyam am ɛkn eke sʼam dad odad eke bʼanŋ in ogŋ ow a nɛny nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ sʼam dad lele Krist ecʼabusu ab ab.
Nɛnɛ eke sʼam dad a, kↄ ɛy obi ɛy obi sʼam aw abusu sʼeb ab ee? Agŋ bɛb ecʼa ow it eke -li ki yɛgm ↄny ɛl ecʼabusu ↄny e silɛl oglog -lʼibrm ↄny e lís. Kↄ ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn si ki kok ab ee?
Ɛy e lɛl a, ow ow el ↄny. Ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm wɛl nↄn, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any ɛtŋ bʼawl.
Ɛɛ, ow ayl, Krist in obi nↄn lɛl na, ɛtŋ ɛy anake sʼoc sʼow a. Nʼanm ɛsɛ lɛl eke wɛl oc lɛl mij nↄn ab af, kↄ Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ecʼAbŋ a lʼoc ni nↄn. Ow elm lebn af ni nↄnm,
kↄ agŋ e mɛrm ab ɛm ni nↄn.
Nyam ecʼany af a, sʼↄny ↄmn low na ɛm, aŋke Krist ↄŋ ɛy ↄmn ↄny ligbɛl.
Si kí tutrm eke si kʼↄny abusu si kok low ɛy sↄny coco, kↄ Nyam anake ↄŋ ɛy sʼↄny abusu si kok low a eke sʼam kok a.
In anake nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼↄny abusu sʼam kok sinm owr na e juma a. Sinm na anm ol eke wɛl nↄn a e low ɛm, kↄ Abŋ Lala e low ɛm nʼanŋ. Ol eke wɛl nↄn a bʼism luw ab, kↄ Abŋ Lala, in, bʼism sel ab.

Ol a eci sodad a lebn af wɛl nↄn, ɛtŋ luw cɛ lʼism ab. Gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a jɛjn Mois ecʼany ab af. In ecʼany a am jɛjn afŋn es toŋ Israɛl ecʼey a ↄ́tum eke ki lɛrʼr, eke jɛjn a ↄb nuŋ am is es a bↄbↄ yɛji.
Gbɛkↄ Abŋ Lala e juma a eke am kok a bʼow ɛŋn anygbɛl agb akm na.
Eke ol eke bʼism agŋ luw ab a e juma a ɛŋn anygbɛl ligbɛl, ow ayl tasi eke Abŋ Lala eke bʼↄŋ agŋ el nyim nyim a eci juma a, bʼow ɛŋn anygbɛl eke bʼow agb nↄnↄ ligbɛl.
Ow ↄŋ a, anygbɛl a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a jɛjn a, elm low kaka ij anygbɛl liplemu na ecʼany af.
Eke ów a eke íbnm a anygbɛl iy ɛm gbↄŋ, ɛbɛn ke ɛl a eke bibn a, bʼow ɛŋn anygbɛl ekʼagb nↄnↄ ligbɛl.
Low ↄmn na ab, sʼↄny ↄmn iy ɛy ɛm gbↄŋ.
Ɛy si kókm ɛsɛ Mois eke oc gbad bubur any es, yecʼɛtŋ ke Israɛl ecʼey a kʼↄ́nym abusu ɛknm anygbɛl a e jɛjn a eke ibnm, ke am uwr a.
Gbɛkↄ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a ↄ́tum irim low kaka. Ɛtŋ toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, eke -li bʼawl sinm sig e silɛl a,
gbad nyam a cɛ ɛmɛny bi bubur ów a es, aŋke gbad a, Krist ab ecʼaf okr a cɛ bʼↄny ocʼr es.
Tasi ɛm a, toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke Israɛl eyŋ bʼawl Mois e silɛl a, gbad nyam bi bubur ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny ab es.
Gbɛkↄ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam bʼɛwl ow Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ogŋ a, gbad a bʼoc es.
Odad na eke el “Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ” a, ke Abŋ Lala ana. Ɛtŋ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼAbŋ a anŋ usu nyam, in anake li bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼŋgboŋ ɛy e madu el ab ɛm a.

Ɛy fɛŋ ecʼany a gbɛ gbad anm buburm es, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼanygbɛl a am ↄŋʼn li jɛjn ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ ɛm ɛs am lɛr af. Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ekʼel Abŋ a bʼitŋn ɛy. Li bʼↄŋ sʼanŋ ɛsɛ in af, anygbɛl ligbɛl nyam eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ anŋ ɛsɛ in ecʼab af ab ɛm.
Nyam, in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm, abul ɛy juma na; ow sosiɛm anake sos ↄwm ɛy es a.

Ɛy si wal yadŋ owi fɛŋ eke wɛl bʼoc kokr ɛ́s owi es lↄl ɛm a sʼɛlu es. Sʼam kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ɛtŋ sʼↄ́nym Nyam ecʼodad ebl a sʼitŋnm. Kↄ nana, si bʼɛlu low nawrɛ ↄkm kpata, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow bʼↄŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl e tutr ab ɛm, bʼuw agŋ yecʼeke sʼel ab any.
Gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛy ecʼAmani Mamn a bʼel ob eke lↄl es agŋ bɛb a eke am irmn ɛl e sel a eci.

-Nʼↄnymn ↄmn aŋke Satan, wus na e nyàm ŋuŋ a efal ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a any, ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ -lʼɛknmn Amani Mamn ab ɛm ecʼusuayl a eke am jɛjn ow a. Amani Mamn a am dad Krist ekʼin obi a el Nyam ecʼes otarir kpɛŋ ecʼanygbɛl a ecʼodad.
Tasi ɛm a, amani a eke sʼam ↄb a, ow elm ɛy obi, kↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist sʼam ↄb. Ɛtŋ ɛy, sʼel ↄny e juma kok ɛsɛl Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Nyam dad ninɛ:
Ɛtŋ ow el in obi eke lʼafŋ ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm ɛy ecʼes ɛkan eci, ke nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼɛkn in ecʼanygbɛl a ekʼam jɛjn Krist ecʼany a.
Gbɛkↄ ɛy eke sʼam abu ob ↄny na a, sʼanŋ ɛsɛ kpeŋ ɛm mɛw af. Ow bʼↄŋ wɛl bʼuw any sɛnyn sɛnyn eke abusu gbɛl na ow elm ɛy ɛm ow ánm ɛym ↄkm, kↄ Nyam ogŋ a ow bʼanŋ ow.
Ses babur bʼeb ɛy susu fɛŋ, gbɛkↄ -li kiknmn ɛy es. Ɛtŋ eke si bʼanŋ sel at ɛm a bↄbↄ yɛji, sʼígŋm low a sʼɛlum es.
Wɛl bʼijr ɛy gbre ɛy ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkↄ Nyam ígŋm ɛlum ɛy es. Wɛl bʼↄny ok ɛy wus, kↄ sʼúwm gbɛ.
Gbre ij na ɛm, si bʼuw Jesu e luw a ekʼanŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm ab any, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼↄ́tu sʼuw in ecʼowr anŋ a ekʼanŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm a yɛji any.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼanŋ owr, gbɛkↄ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bʼↄny low luw ab eke sʼam us Jesu jam a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a yɛji, ow bʼↄŋ wɛl bʼɛkn eke Jesu anŋ owr ɛy e sos megl a eke bʼuw ab ɛm.
Low eke wɛl bʼɛkn ɛm a el: luw eke am kok low ɛy ɛm, ke owr anŋ in am kok low ↄny ɛm a.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɔmn nyam a cɛ bʼↄŋ ɛy si kok low. Ɛy yɛji sʼↄny ↄmn, ow sosiɛm sʼam dad.
Ɛɛ, sʼuw any eke Nyam ekʼigbm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu luw ɛm a, ɛy yɛji bʼow igbm ɛy luw ɛm in ab, ɛtŋ ↄny lel ɛy ab, li bʼow lʼot lʼok ɛy es ow e saw.
Gbre fɛŋ eke sʼam ij a ↄny sosiɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam ecʼów amamn a eke am agb eb es a, ↄ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am ɛnyn nↄnↄ ↄŋn in bia, ke ókar af ↄny fɛŋ kↄklmn in.
Na sosiɛm anake sos ↄ́wm ɛy es a. Ɛtŋ eke ɛy e sos megl a am uŋ tɛl tɛl yɛji, yecʼa ekʼel ɛy ecʼabŋ ɛm ecʼa, lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ bʼel owr.
Ɛɛ, ɛy e yɛfɛnyna ɛm e gbre ij nↄnↄ a ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ bibn sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ, gbɛkↄ ow bi bɛbm anygbɛl liplemu nyam ɛy eci. Anygbɛl ikŋ a bʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛtŋ lʼagb nↄnↄ lʼakm ɛy e yɛfɛnyna e gbre ij a fɛŋ.
Ɛy, sʼↄ́lm yecʼa eke wɛl ↄtu eke kʼɛkn ab es, kↄ yecʼa eke wɛl ɛ́knm a sʼam ↄl es. Tasi ɛm a, yecʼa eke wɛl ↄtu eke kʼɛkn a íbnm nↄnↄ, kↄ yecʼa eke wɛl ɛ́knm a bʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Wus af aŋa, sʼir sos megl nyam ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ ndey lɛl ɛm êl
eke lɛgŋ nyam bʼow ufŋ es ab ɛm. Gbɛkↄ sʼuw any eke afr Nyam ɛw ɛy êl nyam eke bʼow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab es. Êl eke Nyam us in obi, ke ow elm agŋ ecʼabu usm.
Sicaca ɛm a, sʼam ikŋn sↄmu,
ɛtŋ sʼam ↄↄl ɛy e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm eke si kʼoc mob sus ɛm ɛjecʼa sʼɛw sos af, mob sus ɛm a ekʼel ɛy ecʼafr ecʼêl a.
Ɛɛ, low na anake sʼam ↄↄl es a, yecʼɛtŋ ke si kʼélmn abŋ eke ↄnym sos megl.

Lɛgŋ na ɛm eke sʼiir ɛy e wus aŋa ecʼêl ab ɛm a, sʼam ikŋn sↄmu ɛsɛ ɛrɛkp leg leg ecʼew ɛs anŋ af. Ow elm ke sʼam erur eke si kʼuw ke si kʼↄnymn sos megl eci. Njaŋ, sʼam erur eke si ki sus ɛy ecʼafr e sos megl a ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, yecʼɛtŋ ke sel ekʼↄnym uwr a ↄ́ny ɛy e sos megl a eke bʼuw a ɛmn.
Nyam in obi anake bɛbm ɛy ɛb ir na eci sos a. Ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala eke el aja a eke li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
Ow sosiɛm a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbↄŋ. Gbɛkↄ ɛy sʼuw any, lɛgŋ na ɛm eke sʼiir ɛy e sos megl na ɛm a, si kpab es Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e lís.
Tasi ɛm a, ↄmn ɛm sʼam ir ɛb, kↄ ow elm es eke sʼam ɛkn ab ɛm.
Ɛɛ, sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbↄŋ ɛtŋ sʼam erur tasi eke si kʼŋgboŋ sos megl na ɛm, sʼim sʼir ɛb Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci saw.
Gbɛkↄ low krɛkrɛ eke sʼam erur a el ke ɛy owi awʼr, eke sʼanŋ sos megl na ɛm ɛtŋ sʼanm ɛm yɛji.
Ɛy fɛŋ ow ibrm eke si bʼow sʼimn Krist e jɛj ok a ecʼany af, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛ́ŋn yecʼa ekʼit eke kʼɛbmn, in ecʼów amamn lel eŋuŋ eke li kok in e wus aŋa ecʼɛb ir ab ɛm a.

Ɛ́lum Nyam ↄmn ɛm a, sʼuw low yecʼeke ow am dad ab any. Na sosiɛm anake sʼam ↄl elel eke si ki dadr ow e low ok agŋ es sos ɛm a. Nyam uw ɛy any igŋ nuŋ ɛtŋ lʼuw any eke sʼↄny nɛny nyam, ↄny yɛji mʼam ↄmn eke ↄny e mɛrm ab ɛm, uwr any ɛbɛn.

Ɛy, ɛmɛny si kʼow sʼↄlm eke si kʼaw abusu sʼeb, kↄ sʼam erur eke si kʼↄŋ ↄny abusu ntotŋ ok ↄny ɛy eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́nyn low dadr ↄŋn agŋ a eke bʼɛw sos ów eke wɛl bʼɛkn nyamn ɛm a eci, ke ow elm ów a eke bʼanŋ ɛgŋ ɛrm ɛm ecʼa.
Eke agŋ am dad eke eŋ ɛm in uŋ ɛy, ke Nyam sosiɛm eci. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl am ot ɛy ány es oku, ke ↄny e low nimamn eci.
Erur eke Krist ↄny ɛy ecʼa am ucu ↄny ɛy es, aŋke sʼuw any tasi eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ uw agŋ fɛŋ eci; ɛgŋ a el Krist, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ in e luw a el ɛy eci.
Lʼuw ɛy fɛŋ eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ ekʼanŋ owr a kʼírm ɛb ɛl obi ɛl obi ecʼij, kↄ ke -lʼir ɛb Krist ekʼuw ke igb luw ɛm ɛl ecʼa eci.
Low na sosiɛm anake jam aŋa, si kʼow si lɛrm ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ekʼagŋ bi lɛɛr ɛgŋ ab af a. Ɛtŋ ekʼow el ɛbɛn anake si lɛr Krist a, ke jam aŋa, ow elm ɛbɛn sʼam lɛrmʼn ij.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam okr af Krist ab, nʼanŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke Nyam kokr ɛm af. Low yecʼeke el lisig a uwr, ɛtŋ yecʼa ekʼel owr a eb usu.
Amua fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow bʼanŋ ow. Lʼɛcr Krist ɛm nʼↄny lʼokr ɛy ɛm in obi in obi ab, ɛtŋ lʼabul ɛy agŋ ɛjecʼa lele in ab ecʼɛm okr a e juma.
Nawrɛ, Nyam ɛrm Krist ow in lele agŋ ab ecʼɛm okr a eci, ɛtŋ lʼúsm wɛl ecʼów ↄbr in e lís a e low jam ij. Ɛtŋ lʼabul ɛy in ecʼɛm okr ecʼamani ↄb a.
Ɛy sʼanŋ ɛsɛ ɛ́rmu eke Krist am ɛrm af. Ɛtŋ Nyam bʼɛcr ɛy ɛm dad ↄny odad ɛsɛ: «Krist e nin ɛm, sʼam ok ↄny mɛrm sabu af, yɛ̀br Nyam ↄny ↄkr ↄny ɛm in ab!»
Krist ↄnym sikpl kaka, gbɛkↄ Nyam ↄbʼr low luw eci ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ɛy usu iy, yecʼɛtŋ ke si bʼokr af Krist ab a, Nyam ót ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Sica ɛy eke sʼam kok juma Nyam ab a, sʼam dad ↄny eke kʼocr bibm a ekʼɛŋan in ecʼabu ɛm a kokar low sɛnyn.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ:
Lɛgŋ mamn ɛm a, mʼɛgŋʼŋ nɛnym,
ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a yɛji, mʼeb mʼɛluʼŋ es.
Sica yɛfɛnyna tasi anake el lɛgŋ mamn a, yɛfɛnyna anake el sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a.
Eke sʼerurm ekʼagŋ ki cak ɛy e juma a, ow ↄŋ ɛy e low fɛŋ ɛm, si kok elel eke si kʼelm lirikp ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
Kↄ nana, si bi yɛgm low fɛŋ ɛm eke sʼel Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si bʼɛgŋ ɛrm susu ɛm sos es ↄw, ses babur, ɛrm mij ebr,
ↄr eke wɛl bʼↄr ɛy, sobel ɛm eke wɛl bʼok ɛy lele dedeku ecʼaf eke bʼok ɛy ab ab e low sʼeb. Si bʼɛgŋ sos es kikn ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, mɛmn ɛrum lele namn ab sʼeb.
Si bʼir ɛb lala ɛm si yɛgm eke sʼuw Nyam e lís ecʼów any; sʼↄny low eku, sʼel ɛrm mamnu, Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛy ab, sʼↄny erur tasi,
ɛtŋ si bʼↄb low nawrɛ e kokoba, Nyam ecʼabusu ab ɛm. Si bʼoc yecʼa ekʼel nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af a, ɛsɛ ar ogŋn ob af, sʼim agŋ ar oglog si dogŋn sos.
Wɛl bʼusr ɛy sos oglog wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛ́s. Wɛl bi dad ɛy e low ŋuŋ lel ɛy e low mamn ab. Wɛl bʼot ɛy ayadŋu, ke low nawrɛ cɛ si bi dad.
Wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl uwm any af, ke wɛl uw ɛy any sɛnyn sɛnyn cɛ. Wɛl bi lɛr ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼam uw af, gbɛkↄ si bʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Wɛl bʼↄr ɛy ɛy ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkↄ wɛl íbim ɛy.
Wɛl bʼɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke sos ↄw es af, gbɛkↄ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Wɛl bʼot ɛy ↄgbↄru, gbɛkↄ si bʼↄŋ agŋ ɛjecʼa ↄny ob. Wɛl bi tutr eke sʼↄnym ob kaka, ke ɛy nana anake sʼↄny ob fɛŋ a.
Korɛnt ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm si fig ɛy ecʼɛrm a si dad ↄny odad.
Sʼablm ɛy ecʼɛrm a ↄny e lís, kↄ ↄny anake bʼabal ↄny ecʼa ɛy e lís a.
Sica mʼam dad ↄny odad ɛsɛ iy ɛs lel in ecʼey ab af mʼɛsɛ: kòkr ɛsɛ ɛy af, ↄny yɛji fìgr ɛy ↄny e mɛrm a foŋ.
Kʼɛ̀wr mɛcrer agŋ a ekʼↄnym ↄmn Nyam ɛm ab ab, kʼↄtumn okrmn ɛb ir af ɛl ab. Kↄ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ↄtu eke kʼokr af ɛnyɛmbri yony owi eke Nyam érurm ab ab ee? Kↄ usuayl lele ncebn ab bʼↄtu okr af ee?
Kↄ Krist nɛny ↄtu eke kʼokr af Satan ab ee?
Kↄ nawrɛ ub ɛs nyam lele nawrɛ ubm ɛs nyam ab ecʼaraŋn a low ↄtu eke kʼanŋ ee?
Bogŋ ecʼiririr kʼanŋ Nyam ecʼêl a lele sinyam yadŋ ecʼab ab ecʼaraŋn ee? Ɛy anake sʼel Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ecʼêl a, ɛsɛ elel eke in obi li dad ninɛ:
Mi bʼow mʼanŋ ɛl araŋn ke mʼír ɛb ɛl ab.
Mi bʼow mʼel ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼel ɛm ecʼagŋ.
Ow sosiɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ:
Ŋ̀gbroŋn agŋ amua ecʼaraŋn ke kpábr ɛl es lís!
Kʼìtŋnin ob yecʼeke aylm a abu,
ɛtŋ ɛm, mi bʼow mʼeb ↄny.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam Abusu Ɛs dad ninɛ:
Mi bʼow mʼel ↄny Ɛs,
ɛtŋ ↄny bʼow el ɛm ecʼey egŋ lel ↄyↄw ab.
Erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, ów ɛwar amua fɛŋ el ɛy eci. Ow sosiɛm a, si yↄ́yↄg ob fɛŋ eke bʼibar ɛy e sos a lel ɛrm ab ab a es, ke sʼéel Nyam eci nimum nimum ɛlum ɛm.
Kòkr ɛy usu ↄny e mɛrm ab ɛm! Si kokm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi ɛgŋ kaka e lís, si ŋuŋnm ɛgŋ kaka ecʼↄmn, ɛtŋ sʼebm ɛgŋ kaka ecʼob sʼijm.
Mi dadm odad nɛnɛ low e mi kʼↄb ↄny eci. Ɛsɛ elel eke mʼikŋ anym mi dad ab af: ↄny owi anŋ ɛy ɛrm ɛm, ɛtŋ sʼokr af owr anŋ ɛm toŋ luw ɛm.
Mʼↄny ↄmn ligbɛl ↄny ɛm ɛtŋ ntotŋ bʼokʼm ↄny eci. Eke sʼↄny ses babur nↄnↄ yɛji, mʼↄny sos es atr nↄnↄ ɛtŋ sos ɛm iŋn iyʼm ɛm gbↄŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, eke sʼim sʼok Maseduan a, sʼɛŋnm sel es ok kaka. Kↄ nana, gbre ɛrŋ ɛrŋ sʼɛŋn ɛsɛ: agŋ eke ok ɛy af lele ɛrm ɛm ecʼerŋn ab.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam eke bʼatr agŋ eke sos bʼↄw es a sos es a, atr ɛy sos es Tit ecʼow a ekʼanŋ ow ab ɛm.

Ɛtŋ ow elm Tit ecʼow a sↄny cɛ atrm ɛy sos es, kↄ ↄny e sos a eke atar ir es ecʼamani a eke nʼↄŋ ɛy a yɛji. Li dad eke ↄny ↄnyn ɛm ecʼɛkn ecʼerur nↄnↄ. Ɛtŋ li dad ɛy ↄny e sos ɛm ɛy owi low a ekʼɛy a eci lele ɛm e dogŋn eke dogŋninʼm gbragbra kok ɛm ab ab. Ów amua anake ↄŋ ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a agb nↄnↄ a.
Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛm e lɛl es abal el a ↄwr ↄny sos es, ke ɛm, ow e low ɛym im sos ɛm ij.
Ɛɛ, mʼuw any tasi eke lɛl a ↄwr ↄny sos es lɛgŋ tɛl eci, ɛtŋ nawrɛ ow e low ɛyʼm sos ɛm,

gbɛkↄ caca ɛm a, mʼanŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ow elm ↄny e sos es ↄw a sosiɛm, kↄ eke ↄny e sos es ↄw a ↄŋ ↄny itŋnin es an a sosiɛm. Sos es ↄw a eke Nyam bʼerur in ecʼagŋ ecʼab ana, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, ow am yɛgm eke si kokm ↄny low ŋuŋ.

Tasi ɛm a, sos es ↄw a eke bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm a, bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼitŋn es an ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy sel ɛŋn ɛm. Sos es ↄw nɛnɛ a ↄtum eke kʼɛy ɛy sos ɛm. Gbɛkↄ wus ecʼów ecʼɛrm mij ebr a eci sos es ↄw a, ekʼítŋnm ɛgŋ ecʼes an a, bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm.

Ɔny eci sos es ↄw a akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Sica lɛ̀ɛr ow ecʼey eke ow ↄsu: ow ↄŋ ↄny low es ogŋ kok lele low oc ap ecʼibrm ab! Ow ↄŋ ↄny low sos ɛm ɛy lele low uru low kok ɛm ab! Ow ↄŋ ↄny ɛm ecʼɛkn ecʼaw lele ɛm e dogŋn gbragbra kok ɛm ab! Ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ ↄny low ŋuŋ kok ɛs a eci low ɛw ↄŋ! Low na ɛm a, yɛgmn eke ↄnymn low af ok kaka.
Sica mʼawŋm ↄny lɛl ɛgŋ a eke kok low ŋuŋ a sosiɛm oglog ɛgŋ a eke wɛl kok low ↄbr a sosiɛm. Kↄ mʼerur eke mi ki yɛgm ↄny Nyam ecʼany af, ɛkan eke bʼerurir ɛy owi tasi.
Na anake el low ekʼatr ɛy sos es a.
Ɛtŋ sos es atr na e low ekʼigŋ af, ke obn ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn a el Tit eci sos ɛm iŋn a ekʼɛŋn a. Ɛɛ, ↄny fɛŋ ɛyar ir ɛrm es.

Nawrɛ, in ecʼany af mi dad ↄny ecʼodad nɛny ij ɛm, ɛtŋ ↄↄmnʼm ɛ́s. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bi dad ↄny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kin ow e low ekʼow ism ab: mʼↄny low ij eke mi dad ↄny e lís owi nɛny ij ɛm Tit ecʼany af.
Nʼam ↄkn elel a eke ↄny fɛŋ ɛlumn low lele ↄny ecʼelel a eke ebr ir ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm lele sos ufŋ ɛm ab a. Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm in ecʼerur a e nʼↄny ↄny ecʼa ɛmɛny agb obn.
Sos ɛm am iŋnʼm eke mʼↄtu eke mi kʼↄmn ↄny low fɛŋ ɛm a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yecʼeke sʼam erur eke kʼuwr any: Nyam ɛlu in ecʼɛrm mamn a ↄkm bibm eke nʼↄŋ Maseduan e Sinyamel ab ɛm.
-Lʼↄbr ses babur nↄnↄ ɛsɛ ɛbm ɛkn af, gbɛkↄ ↄmn ɛsɛl a sos ɛm iŋn iy ɛm gbↄŋ. -Lʼij gbↄr nↄnↄ, gbɛkↄ -lʼɛlu ɛrm mamn ↄny nↄnↄ ↄkm ɛl ecʼob eke -lʼapr ab ɛm.
-Nʼↄŋ yecʼa eke -lʼↄtur a, ɛtŋ -nʼↄŋ ow afŋ es yɛji, mʼij ow e daŋku. Ow elm lɛc ɛm wɛl ↄnym ɛl -nʼↄↄm; kↄ ɛl obi tasi ecʼerur ɛm -li kok.
Tasi ɛm a, -lʼibrm ɛy atrm ɛm eke ɛl yɛji, ɛl ecʼabu kʼanŋ Jerusalɛm ecʼↄmn ɛsɛl a ecʼabu ɛlum owi ab ɛm.
-Lʼikŋ anym -lʼocr ɛl sosi -nʼↄŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, -lʼocr ɛl sosi -nʼↄŋ ɛy yɛji, ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur ab af. Ɛtŋ na el low eke sʼↄmnm kaka.
Na sosiɛm anake sʼatr Tit sos es eke li kʼɛwl lʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, ke lʼúwar ↄny ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny e juma mamn a eke lʼↄb nuŋ a.

Ɔny ijr lɛc ów ów a fɛŋ ɛm: ijr lɛc ↄmn ɛm, Nyam odad dad ɛm, uwr Nyam ecʼów ab any, sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛbmn sos low kok eci, ɛtŋ ↄnyn ɛy ecʼerur yɛji. Na sosiɛm, ow it eke ki yɛgmn ↄny e lɛc ij a, ↄny ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny ab ɛm yɛji.
Ow elm ol mʼɛwm mʼↄↄm ↄny, kↄ Nyamel bɛb a ecʼelel eke gbragbra kok ɛm kokr low a cɛ mʼam dad ↄny. Nɛnɛ ke mʼↄ́ŋ ↄny abusu yɛgmn eke ↄny ecʼerur a el nawrɛ tasi.
Tasi ɛm a, ↄny uwr ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e bibm a lele ɛrm mamn ab ab any. Lʼel gbreŋgbi, gbɛkↄ ↄny sosiɛm lʼɛgŋ gbↄr lʼeb, yecʼɛtŋ ke in e gbↄr a ↄ́ŋ ↄny eel egbreŋgbi.
Ɛm ecʼelel eke mʼam ɛkan low a el, ke kókr low a ekʼↄbr nuŋ lakpo jam a yibar, aŋke ↄny eel agŋ krɛkrɛ eke is ob ap na e tutr a, ɛtŋ ↄny cɛ eel ɛmɛny agŋ krɛkrɛ ekʼↄb nuŋ kok ow e low.
Eke isr ow e low a, yɛgmn ↄny ecʼerur ekʼↄnyn a. Ow sosiɛm erur nyam ab ɛm cɛ, ùcur low a ↄnyn es toŋ ke ígŋn nuŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ecʼob ekʼↄny ab ɛm.
Eke wɛl bʼↄŋ ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm a, Nyam bʼɛkn ow e sʼↄny a ɛtŋ li bʼeb ow eke si bʼap a. Lʼíbram eke si kʼap ow eke sʼↄnym a.
Ow elm ke wɛl ↄ́ŋ ↄny ijr gbↄr agŋ ɛjecʼa ecʼabu ɛlum a sosiɛm. Njaŋ, kpɛŋ kpɛŋ eke kʼeel a wɛl am ↄl.
Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ow a ekʼↄnyn bubu af a ↄtu eke kʼɛlum agŋ ɛjecʼa ekʼↄnym a abu, yecʼɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ nyam ↄnyn es abur ɛtŋ ɛl -nʼↄny ob nↄnↄ a, ke ɛl yɛji -lʼɛlum ↄny abu. Nɛnɛ ke ↄny fɛŋ éel kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɛgŋ a eke ot nↄnↄ a, ↄnym ob ij afŋnm es.
Ɛgŋ a eke ot tɛl a, ↄpim ob ij lɛgŋ kaka.
Mʼam ↄŋ Nyam bia, aŋke nʼↄŋ Tit gbragbra kok nyam a cɛ eke li kʼoc lʼɛlum ↄny abu, lʼakm ɛm obi ecʼa e mʼↄny a.
Tit ɛgŋ ɛy ecʼɛrm a ekʼel ↄny ecʼow ɛkn a ɛmɛny eb, ɛtŋ nʼam ogŋ es eke kpɛkŋ li kʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ.
Sʼam ↄŋʼn lʼow ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ab. Ɛgŋ lisijim a, Sinyamel a fɛŋ bʼawʼr, in ecʼAmani Mamn ecʼↄb e juma kok a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Sinyamel a sↄsum ocʼr, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼígŋ ɛy ab sʼoc bibm na sʼim. Ow el juma eke si ki kok, ke ám ɛlu Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ in obi ecʼanygbɛl ↄkm, ke ám yɛgm ɛy ecʼabu ɛlum ecʼerur e sʼↄny a.
Wɛl abul ɛy os nↄnↄ, ɛtŋ sʼam erur eke wɛl kí cakm ɛy ecʼelel eke sʼam kokr ow e juma a.
Sʼam ↄl low yecʼeke akpl ab es, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ecʼany af cɛ, kↄ agŋ ecʼany af yɛji.

Sʼↄŋ ɛy lisijim nyam yɛji igŋ Tit lele ɛgŋ lisijim nyam a eke kʼɛwlʼl ab ab af. Ɛgŋ lisijim na yɛgm ɛy sakp nↄnↄ in ecʼelel eke li bʼerur tasi lʼɛlum agŋ ɛjeci abu a. Caca ɛm a, li bʼerur es ogŋ ɛm tasi lʼɛlum agŋ abu, aŋke nʼↄny ↄmn nↄnↄ ↄny ɛm.
Mʼam ↄŋ Tit ekʼel ɛm lawl ke bi kok juma ɛm ab ↄny sosiɛm ecʼa, lele agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjeci amua ekʼel Sinyamel ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl a ow ɛkn ↄny. Ɛl fɛŋ Krist ecʼanygbɛl a e juma -nʼam kok.
Ow sosiɛm yɛ̀gmn ɛl eke bʼerurir ɛl, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow ↄ́ŋ Sinyamel a úw any nawrɛ, ke -lʼɛkn yɛjʼeke ntotŋ ↄtu eke kʼok ɛy ↄny eci.
Jerusalɛm ecʼↄmn ɛsɛl a ecʼabu ɛlum eke wɛl kʼoc im ↄŋ ecʼa,
ow ɛbam eke mi kʼawŋ ↄny ow e lɛl.
Mʼuw ↄny e sow tutr amamn ab any. Maseduan ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl a ecʼany af, mʼij nɛny mi dad ɛl eke Akayi
ogog ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl a, lakpo jam ɛtŋ bɛbm sos abu ɛlum na ecʼos a eci. Ɛtŋ ↄny e low na eke ogŋn es ɛgŋn ebr a, atr agŋ nↄnↄ sos es.
Ow sosiɛm mʼɛrm agŋ lisijimɛl amua,
yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼɛkn tasi eke bɛbmn sos. Ow ↄ́ŋ ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ɛy e nɛny a e sʼij ↄny ecʼa elm ↄfr ↄfr.
Sica eke Maseduan ecʼagŋ igŋʼm ab ow ɛtŋ ɛkn eke bɛbamn sos, ow bʼow ↄny ɛy ɛ́s nↄnↄ eke sʼoc ↄmn sʼɛlu ↄny ɛm, ɛtŋ ↄny yɛji ow bʼow el ↄny ecʼɛ́s.

Na sosiɛm mʼↄny tutr eke ow akpl ke mʼíkŋ anym mʼↄŋ agŋ lisijimɛl amua ów ↄny ecʼaraŋn bɛ́bm ob ap mamn a eke dadr ow e low ɛwr es a, ba mi bʼanŋ mʼow a, ke fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂, ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ow el ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm ↄŋn, kↄ ow elm atrm ɛm.
Kin yecʼekʼit eke kʼuwr any: ɛgŋ eke bʼewl tɛl a, bʼub tɛl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke bʼewl nↄnↄ a, bʼub nↄnↄ.
Ow akpl ekʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ kʼↄŋ ɛsɛ elel eke li tutr in ecʼɛrm ɛm ab af, ow kʼelm sos es ↄw ɛm lele atrm ɛm ab. Tasi ɛm, Nyam bʼerur ɛgŋ eke bʼↄŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a.
Nyam ↄny abusu eke kʼↄŋ ↄny ów amamn fɛŋ ow afŋn ↄny es. Ow ↄ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄnyn ow ekʼit a, ke ↄ́nyn ow bubu af, ócr kokr ów amamn.
Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam ecʼɛgŋ e lís ninɛ:
Li bʼↄŋ ↄgbↄru ɛrm mamn ↄny ɛm,
ɛtŋ li bi kok sɛgŋ fɛŋ yecʼekʼel nyim nyim a.

Nyam anake bʼↄŋ egb ewl ɛs egb ey lele futufutu eke li kʼij ab ab a. Ɔny yɛji in cɛ li bʼow nʼↄŋ ↄny egb ey, li kok ow ɛny ke nʼↄ́ŋ ow agb. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ↄny ecʼów nyim nyim e kok a bʼow ↄsu ey amamn nↄnↄ.
Kaka fɛŋ, Nyam bʼow ↄŋ ↄny ↄnyn ob, ɛtŋ bʼow ɛlul ↄny ecʼɛrm mamn ↄny a ↄkm. Ɛtŋ agŋ nↄnↄ bʼow ↄŋ Nyam bia sob ap amua eke si bʼow sʼↄŋ ɛl ↄny e nin ɛm a eci.
Ob ap na ɛm, am ɛlumn Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a abu. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke ↄ́ŋn ɛl fɛŋ a eke -nʼↄnym a cɛ, kↄ ɛmɛny bʼatar ɛl sos es eke -li ki ŋↄŋn Nyam nↄnↄ -lʼɛlu ow bia.

Ów amua fɛŋ sosiɛm, -li bʼow -lʼɛkn juma na e leg a ɛtŋ -li bʼow -li kↄklm Nyam, aŋke bi cɛcr ɛrm mamn ↄny ɛm yecʼa eke ↄnyn a, Jerusalɛm ecʼↄmn ɛsɛl a lele ɛjecʼa fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ am yɛgmn eke bʼɛlumn Krist ecʼAmani Mamn a.
Nyam in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm ↄŋ ↄny in e bibm a ow bubu af. Ow sosiɛm, -li bʼow -li yɛgm ↄny ɛl ecʼerur a, Nyam eke -li bi ŋↄŋn -nʼↄŋ ↄny ab ɛm.
Sʼↄ́ŋn Nyam bia in ecʼob ap mamn a eke wɛl kʼↄtum ocm bɛbmnm ab a eci.
Ɛm Pↄl, ɛm anake mʼam ibrm ↄny low Krist ecʼɛrm frↄrↄ lel ɛrm mamn ab ab ɛm a. Wɛl am dad eke ɛm bʼanŋ tiŋ eke ɛm bʼanŋ ↄny ecʼany af a, kↄ ɛm bʼanŋ akpoj a, nɛny in bʼↄtuʼm nↄnↄ.

Mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny, kʼↄ̀ŋn mi kʼɛw gbagba lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ecʼaraŋn a! Agŋ bɛb bi tutr eke sʼam kok low ɛsɛ wus ecʼagŋ ɛs el af. Ɛɛ, agŋ nɛnɛ e lís a, mʼam tutr eke mi bʼow mʼɛlu ɛm ecʼɛrm susu a ↄkm ɛtŋ ekʼow it yɛji mi bʼow mʼɛw gbagba.
Nawrɛ eke sʼel agŋ gↄŋ, kↄ mum a eke sʼam ogŋ a elm agŋ ɛm eci.
Mum a e mob a eke sʼam ot sʼogŋn a elm agŋ ecʼa. Ɛl e lɛc a, Nyam ogŋ a ow bʼanŋ ow ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ eke bʼatar in ab a. Si bi ŋuŋn sow tutr yadŋ ɛm a fɛŋ.
Si bʼↄny tutr fɛŋ e bʼↄl eke kʼɛdŋn agŋ Nyam ecʼany uw a sʼoc es. Tutr fɛŋ eke bʼatar Nyam ab a, si bʼↄnyʼn lɛc ɛm eke li kʼɛlum Krist.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, sʼinym es eke low ɛluam fɛŋ ecʼa, si kʼɛw low sʼↄŋ ɛgŋ, gbɛkↄ ow akpl eke kʼↄnyn abusu ɛ́lul ↄny ecʼɛlum a nimum ↄkm yɛ.
Lɛ̀ɛr ów a ecʼelel ekʼanŋn a sɛnyn sɛnyn! Eke ɛgŋ nyam ↄny tutr eke in sↄny cɛ lʼel Krist eci, ow it ke ɛmɛny li tútr sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy yɛji sʼel Krist eci ɛsɛ in af.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋ ɛy abusu eke si kʼↄŋ ↄny e Nyamel a agb ↄmn ɛm, kↄ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci. Nawrɛ eke low na ↄŋ ntotŋ okʼm nↄnↄ, gbɛkↄ mi kʼow mʼururm ɛ́s na sosiɛm.
Mʼerurm eke kʼɛkanʼm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke bʼok agŋ erŋn lokm, in e silɛl e li bʼawŋ ab ɛm af.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: «Pↄl e silɛl a bʼɛw kpaŋ kpaŋ lele lɛc ɛm ab. Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼanŋ ɛy ecʼaraŋn a, li bʼɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ sodad eke li bi dad a élm low kaka.»
Ke ɛgŋ a ekʼam dad odad nɛnɛ a, úw low na gbɛ any: eke si bʼanŋ kpekpe a, si bʼawŋ silɛl kpaŋ kpaŋ. Lɛgŋ eke si bʼow sʼanŋ ↄny ecʼany af a, si bʼow si kok ɛbɛn kpɛŋ.
Agŋ bɛb bʼawr ɛl sosi nↄnↄ, si kʼↄtum si bɛbmnm ɛl ab oglog sʼotm ɛl es. -Li bʼocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ ob bɛbmn ob af -li bɛbmn ɛl sosi, ke -nʼↄnyn ɛl sosi -lʼigbl ogŋ -lʼɛkn. Na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ!
Ɛy ecʼa, si kʼow si yɛbm ɛy eci ntotŋ ok a iim nↄnↄ nɛnɛ. Eke Nyam nyimn ɛy sʼow sʼɛŋn ↄny a, li yɛgm ɛy yogŋ ekʼɛy e juma e lʼabul ɛy a kʼim ok a, ɛtŋ si bʼow sʼoc ereb a ɛsɛ ɛy ecʼob bɛbmn ob af.
Blel sʼowm toŋ sʼokm ↄny ogŋ aŋa ana, wɛl ↄtu e kʼↄny tutr dad eke sʼam afŋ ɛy ecʼabusu a ecʼereb ab es. Kↄ ɛy tasi anake sʼikŋ anym sʼoc Krist ecʼAmani Mamn a sʼism ↄny ab a.

Ɛbɛn a, ɛy sʼɛwm sos ɛsɛ ɛbɛn agŋ ɛjeci e juma e kok a e low cɛ ɛs am ibrm af. Kↄ ɛy sʼam ↄmn eke ↄny ecʼↄmn a bʼow obn ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sʼↄtu eke si ki kok juma nↄnↄ ↄny ogŋ yogŋ. Gbɛkↄ sʼerurm eke si kʼafŋ ereb a eke Nyam ɛw ↄŋ ɛy ab es.
Ow e jam a, si bʼow sʼim sʼↄb Amani Mamn a e kokoba susu eke ibn akm ↄny ogŋ aŋa. Sʼerurm eke si ki kok juma agŋ ɛjeci e juma kok usu a, ke sʼɛw sos ów a eke -lʼikŋn anym -li kokr a eci.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke kʼɛw sos, ke lʼɛ́w sos Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ow elm ɛgŋ a eke bʼawr in sosi a wɛl áwm, kↄ ɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼaw a.
Oy! Blel kʼɛ́gŋn ebr ke ɛm yɛji mi dád ów ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af! Ɛɛ, na ecʼa ɛ̀gŋn ebrʼm ɛbɛn!

Erur eke mʼↄny ↄny ecʼa bʼogŋ uwerŋ, ɛtŋ el uwerŋ eke bʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow. Tasi ɛm a, igŋ ɛbiu nyam cɛ mʼɛwar ↄny in e low mʼɛw es: in lʼel Krist. Ɛɛ, mi bʼow mʼoc ↄny mi yɛgmʼn ɛsɛ dedyↄwli ekʼitam ɛm kaka af.
Gbɛkↄ ↄkan low na: lorŋn oc yadŋ ɛm ɛju Ɛv. Ow ↄŋ erŋn am ↄnyʼm ekʼↄny yɛji, wɛl ki dad ↄny sow tutr yadŋ, ke ow ↄ́ny kpab ↄny es ów cɛcɛ a lele lala ab ab eke ɛŋan Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm a e lís.

Sʼↄb ↄny Jesu ecʼamani, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛtŋ ubr Amani Mamn a nawrɛ. Kↄ sica bʼow ɛgŋn ebr fafa nɛnɛ eke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam kʼow dad ↄny Jesu ɛjeci nyam ecʼodad, abŋ ɛjeci nyam ecʼodad, ke ↄb ↄny amani ɛjeci nyam eke irimn ow e low lɛgŋ kaka ab ee?
Kↄ ɛm e tutr ɛm a gbɛ, mi kʼɛknm eke ↄny eci “ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl” a kʼↄny any akm im.
Nawrɛ eke nɛnym okm im es odad dad ɛm ɛsɛ ɛl af, gbɛkↄ Nyam ecʼany uw ecʼa, in yɛji low ɛjeci! Ɛtŋ na, lɛgŋ fɛŋ si yɛgm ↄny kpata low fɛŋ eke si kok ab ɛm.
Eke mʼↄb ↄny Nyam ecʼAmani Mamn a, ɛm mʼis es aŋke mʼibram ↄny os kaka. Gbɛkↄ ow el sos eke mi kʼusr ↄny eci. Kↄ na low ɛyr e mi kok ana ee?
Eke mʼam kok juma ↄny ogŋ a, Sinyamel ɛjeci anake ↄŋʼm os a, ɛtŋ mʼoc ɛl ecʼos a mʼɛlum ↄny abu.

Ke ↄny ecʼaraŋn eke mʼanŋ a, mʼↄny os ecʼes abur cɛ, gbɛkↄ mʼibram ↄny low kaka. Maseduan ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl ekʼanŋ ow a ismʼm fɛŋ a eke mʼↄny ow ecʼes abur ab ab. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi kok elel eke mi ki legm ↄny ɛtŋ mʼerur eke lɛgŋ kaka mi ki legm ↄny.
Ntotŋ am okʼm ow eci ɛtŋ Akayi wus ogog a ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ↄbm im yadŋ ↄnym ɛm eci ntotŋ na ocm es.
Low nawrɛ tasi mʼam dad aŋke mʼↄny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ekʼanŋ Krist ɛm a.
Bla sosiɛm mʼam dad odad nɛnɛ ee? Eke mʼerurm ↄny a sosiɛm ecʼee? Njaŋ, Nyam uw any eke mi bʼerur ↄny.
Ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼucu mʼↄny es mʼam kok ɛbɛn, ow ↄ́ŋ agŋ ekʼam ↄl abusu eke kʼɛru es ke ij nɛny eke ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm si bɛbmn a, kʼɛ́ŋnm abusu na kaka!
Agŋ amua el ɛrm ɛsɛl ayadŋu lele juma kok ɛsɛl ekʼↄny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ab. -Li bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ Krist ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl cɛ wɛʼn el af.
Nawrɛ, low kaka ↄnym any iti aŋa, aŋke Satan in obi yɛji bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ usuayl ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs cɛ owʼn el af.

Ɛtŋ in e juma kok ɛsɛl ecʼa yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ow ɛwm any iti eke -nʼam kok nyandrɛ -lʼel juma kok ɛsɛl ekʼam kok yecʼekʼel nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af a. Gbɛkↄ ɛl ecʼowr anŋ a bʼow uwr ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it eke kʼɛbm ɛl ab af, ɛl ecʼelel eke -li kokr ab ɛm.
Mʼam ebr ɛm mʼɛsɛ: kì tutar eke nuŋ ɛm uŋʼm! Oglog ɛ̀gŋn ebr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋʼm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji mʼↄ́tu mʼij nɛny tɛl.
Sica odad na eke mʼam ow mi dad a, mi dadm ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur ab af, kↄ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af. Gbɛkↄ mʼↄny ów tasi e mʼↄtu eke mi kʼeb ow af mʼam ij nɛny.
Agŋ nↄnↄ bʼij nɛny agŋ ɛm ecʼów sosiɛm, ow sosiɛm ɛm yɛji mi bʼow mʼij nɛny.
Ɔny eke bʼocar ↄny sosi ɛsɛwru a, ↄny obi ɛm bʼɛgŋn eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl ebr!
