Bʼɛgŋn ebr wɛl kok ↄny ɛsɛ madu af, wɛl eb ↄny ob fɛŋ ekʼↄnyn a, wɛl iy ↄny mil! Bʼɛgŋn ebr wɛl itar ↄny any, wɛl dɛdŋ ↄny any af!
Ɛ́s am ↄnyʼm eke mi ki dad, eke sʼↄnym sos si kokm ɛbɛn a!
Eke ɛgŋ nyam am ɛgŋ eb ij nɛny low nyam eci, aŋa mʼam dad odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af, ɛm yɛji mi bʼow mʼɛgŋ mʼeb mi kok ɛbɛn.
-Lʼel Ebre eyŋ, ɛm yɛji mʼel! -Lʼel Israɛl eyŋ, ɛm yɛji mʼel! -Lʼel Abraham ecʼalaw, ɛm yɛji mʼel!

-Lʼel Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl, ɛm mʼel mʼakm ɛl fɛŋ! Ɛtŋ low na eke aŋa mʼam mʼow mi dad mʼusr af a yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af: mi kok juma mʼakm ɛl fɛŋ, mʼɛy sobel ɛm sakp nↄnↄ mʼakm ɛl. Ɔr yɛji, ɛm wɛl ↄrʼm sakp nↄnↄ akm ɛl, ɛtŋ sakp nↄnↄ ar okrʼm es akm ɛl.
Sakp yen eke Jwifɛl iyrʼm ŋgbre likŋ lele lɛw libarm ab.
Sakp nyahan eke Rom eyŋ ↄrʼm lɛc ɛm lɛc ɛm, akp nyam eke wɛl wↄwlʼm mebn ɛm ecʼibi eci. Sakp nyahan eke mij blel ocʼm, ɛtŋ akp nyam ecʼa, mʼanŋ lɛgŋ owr nyam lele ncok nyam ab mij ɛm.

Ɛm eci usu im nↄnↄ ab ɛm, ar okrʼm es sakp nↄnↄ: simij ecʼany af, agŋ ibiu ecʼany af, ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛm oglog ɛl ekʼelm Jwifɛl ɛm. Mʼↄbr ar ɛb ɛb ɛm, loj ɛm, okij af lele agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ab e lís.
Mi kok juma eke kiknʼm sos es ɛtŋ sakp oglog mʼↄtum mʼɛrum mɛmn. Namn lele mij amn ab ↄnyʼm ɛtŋ sakp oglog mʼↄtum mʼɛŋnm ob mʼijm. Lɛfr ↄnyʼm ɛtŋ mʼↄnym mob mi susm.
Ɛtŋ mi dadm low a tasi ekʼↄny any a ecʼodad: sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi bʼebr ɛm e Sinyamel a fɛŋ e low ecʼɛrm mij.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛw fuɛfuɛ, ɛm yɛji kpɛkŋ mʼɛ́w fuɛfuɛ. Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm, ow e low ám ɛyʼm sos ɛm nↄnↄ.
Ekʼow it nɛny ij, mi bʼow mʼij nɛny eke mʼel fuɛfuɛ.
Mʼↄ́nym yadŋ, Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼƐs uw any. Si kↄ́klmʼn akpo akpo fɛŋ!
Eke mʼanŋ Damas ɛb ɛm a, ɛb ↄsu ɛs ekʼam kok es ɛw ɛs Aretas e juma a, ↄŋ wɛl am ↄsu ɛb a e masany a fɛŋ ɛm ecʼɛdŋn eci.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ lisijimɛl a ↄŋ wɛl ↄny ɛluʼm ulu ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ usmʼm es finɛtr ɛm, ɛb a e lakp ogog kpakp a e jam a, ɛtŋ mʼↄtu mʼakmʼn.
Kↄ ow it eke mi kʼij nɛny ee? Ow kʼow elm im low kaka. Gbɛkↄ mʼam mʼow mi dad ów eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ yɛgmʼm mʼɛkn lele ow eke nʼↄny lʼok ↄkm ab ab e low.
Mʼuw Krist e jam us ɛs nyam any,
ɛtŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yar ŋ̂, Nyam ↄny ɛgŋ na uyum afr kpekpe. Kↄ in e sos megl ab ab ee? Mʼuwm any. Kↄ ow elm in e sos megl ab ab ee? Mʼuwm any, kↄ Nyam gbɛ uw any.

Mʼuw any gbɛ eke Nyam oc ɛgŋ a im afr ecʼusu mamn a. Kↄ in e sos megl ab ab oglog ow elm ow ab ee? Mʼuwm any, kↄ Nyam gbɛ uw any. Yogŋ, lʼiri sodad eke ɛgŋ e nɛny kʼↄtum dadm. Ow el sodad eke ɛgŋ kaka ↄnym abusu eke ki dad.

Mʼuw any gbɛ eke Nyam oc ɛgŋ a im afr ecʼusu mamn a. Kↄ in e sos megl ab ab oglog ow elm ow ab ee? Mʼuwm any, kↄ Nyam gbɛ uw any. Yogŋ, lʼiri sodad eke ɛgŋ e nɛny kʼↄtum dadm. Ow el sodad eke ɛgŋ kaka ↄnym abusu eke ki dad.
Ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na eci gbɛ mi bʼow mʼij nɛny. Gbɛkↄ ɛm ecʼa, elel eke mʼanŋn a sosiɛm mi bʼow mʼij nɛny ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a eci.

Eke batŋ mʼerur nɛny eke mi kʼij a, mi kʼow mʼijm nyamb, low eke el nawrɛ a cɛ mi bʼow mi dad. Gbɛkↄ mʼijm nɛny, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl dád ɛm e lís owi, ow a cɛ eke wɛl am ɛknʼm mi kok lele ow a cɛ eke wɛl am iri mi dad ab ab af, ke low ɛjeci kaka kʼígŋm af.

Ów a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ yɛgmʼm mʼɛkn a agb nↄnↄ. Gbɛkↄ lʼerurm eke mi kʼij nɛny na eci. Ow sosiɛm lʼoc ɛbm ɛkn nyam lʼɛluʼm sos ɛm, bʼijrʼm gbre ɛsɛ mirŋ eke bʼub es anŋ ɛgŋ sos ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ Satan ecʼɛrm ɛs nyam eke wɛl ↄŋ eke kʼↄrʼm ke ɛ́dŋnʼm nɛny ij af.
Sakp nyahan eke mi ŋↄŋn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eke kʼↄny ocʼm es gbre ij na ɛm,

kↄ li dadʼm ninɛ: «Ɛm ecʼɛrm mamn a cɛ ↄdŋʼŋ. Eke bʼanŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm tasi anake ɛm e lɛc a bʼɛy ↄkm a.» Ow sosiɛm, ɛm e nɛny ij a tasi bʼow el ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a, yecʼɛtŋ ke Krist e lɛc a ánŋʼm af.

Na sosiɛm mʼam ɛgŋ fɛŋ mʼeb sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: lɛc ↄnym, wɛwr, ses babur, ɛm ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm e gbre ijr lele ɛrm mij ebr fɛŋ ab. Mʼam ɛgŋ fɛŋ mʼeb Krist sosiɛm eci, aŋke eke mi bʼanŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm anake mi bʼij lɛc a.

Sica am ɛkan eke mʼam kok nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi a! Ɔny anake ↄŋn ke mʼam kok ɛbɛn a. Ɔny anake blel dadr ɛm ecʼów amamn ekʼanŋʼm ɛm a, aŋke eke mʼelm low kaka yɛji, low kaka anm eke ↄny eci “ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl” a ↄny akmʼm!
Ɔny ogŋ yogŋ ɛkan ɛm ecʼɛrm susu ligbɛl a, simɛny ɛwr a, ów any iti owi a lele sakrowa ab ab. Ów amua fɛŋ am yɛgm eke mʼel ɛrm ɛs wɛwɛ tasi.
Bla obi Sinyamel ɛjecʼa ↄny eke ↄny ↄnymn ee? Ɛɛ, nawrɛ gbɛ, mʼↄↄm ↄny labm kaka! Kↄ na anake el low ŋuŋ ab ee? Ɛbɛn ke òc aprʼm ↄ!
Mi bɛbm ↄny ogŋ yogŋ e sakp nyahan ɛm ecʼow e sos
ɛtŋ mi kʼow mʼↄↄm ↄny labm kaka. Ɛm, ow elm ↄny ecʼos a mʼↄlm es, kↄ ↄny obi ↄny obi. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ow elm etuey am kokm os ↄↄm ɛl ɛsɛl, kↄ ey ɛsɛl anake it eke ki kok os ↄŋ ɛl ecʼey a.
Ɛm gbɛ, sos ɛm bʼow iŋnʼm eke mi kí ŋuŋn os ↄny eci, ke mʼóc ɛm obi e sel a nimum yɛji mʼigŋ af. Kↄ eke mʼerur ↄny nↄnↄ nɛnɛ a sosiɛm anake ↄny kʼow erurmnʼm nↄnↄ ab ee?
Nawrɛ eke mʼↄↄm ↄny labm kaka, gbɛkↄ agŋ bɛb dad eke yadŋ ɛm am ↄny ɛtŋ ɛm e kprakpr ab ɛm, ɛm ɛju ↄny.
Kↄ eke bʼɛwr nyamn ɛkan agŋ a fɛŋ eke mʼↄŋ ow ↄny ecʼaraŋn a, ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke mʼɛcr in ɛm mʼij ↄny os ee?
Mi dad toŋ Tit ɛgŋ eb eke kʼow ɛkn ↄny, ɛtŋ mʼↄŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam igŋʼn ab ow.
Kↄ Tit ij ↄny os ee? Kↄ in lel ɛm ab, sʼↄnym tutr nyam coco ejagb nyam a eke sʼↄkŋ any ab ɛm ee?
Ow ibn ekʼam tutar eke sʼam dogŋn sos ↄny ecʼany af. Njaŋ! Nyam ecʼany af sʼam dogŋn sos ɛsɛ Krist e jam us ɛsɛl af. Erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, sʼam kok ɛbɛn eke si kʼɛlum ↄny abu agbr ↄmn ɛm.

Lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ a, ow am ↄnyʼm erŋn eke mi kʼɛ́ŋnm ↄny ɛsɛ elel eke mʼam erur eke kʼanŋn ab af. Ke oglog ɛm yɛji, kʼérurmn ɛm eci elel eke mi bʼow mi kokr a. Erŋn am ↄnyʼm eke yogŋ mi kʼuyum ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr, ɛrm bebl, agŋ ecʼów ↄnyanin, agŋ wɛwr owi, agŋ cacak owi, mɛgŋel lele suksuk owi ab.

Ɛmɛny low nyam ecʼerŋn yɛji am ↄnym: ɛm ecʼow ab ɛm, oglog ke Nyam kókʼm ɛ́s ↄny ecʼany af. Mʼam uru eke mi kʼikŋ ↄŋn ↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ nↄnↄ eke abu anŋ ɛm am kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm e sikpl a eci. Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna yɛji -li kʼɛwlm -li ki lɛrm Nyam. -Nʼam ir ɛb eke ↄ́ↄm ɛl -lʼaylmn, -nʼam ij nfaci ɛtŋ -nʼam ɛbirir marɛm marɛm.
Mʼam bɛbm sos eke mi kʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ sakp nyahan ɛm,
ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af:

Sica lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼagŋ a eke kok sikpl a lele agŋ ɛjecʼab ab anake mʼam dad odad a. Yɛfɛnyna mʼanm ↄny araŋn, gbɛkↄ ɛmɛny mʼam ebr low a eke mi dad eke mʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ sakp yony ɛm a mʼɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a eke mi bʼow mʼɛwl mʼow a, mi bʼow mi kok lɛc owi ↄny fɛŋ ab,
aŋke am erurir eke kʼɛkan low ekʼam yɛgm eke Krist bʼɛcr ɛm ɛm dad odad a. Eke li bi kok low nʼↄŋ ↄny a, lʼelm sos ↄnymu, kↄ nana, li bʼɛlu in ecʼabusu ↄny a ↄkm ↄny ecʼaraŋn.

Nawrɛ, wɛl ɛw Krist olikŋ af, eke nʼↄnym sos a sosiɛm, gbɛkↄ nʼanŋ owr Nyam ecʼabusu ab ɛm. Ɛy yɛji, in ab eke sʼokr af a anake sʼↄnym sos a; gbɛkↄ si bʼow si yɛgm ↄny eke sʼanŋ owr in ab Nyam ecʼabusu ab ɛm.
Sica ìbrmn ↄny sosi low eke am iir ɛb ɛsɛ ↄmn ɛsɛl af, ìgbal ↄny sosi ogŋ ɛkan. Kↄ kʼɛknmn eke Krist anŋ ↄny ab ee? Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ke es ↄwal okr a.
Gbɛkↄ ɛy ecʼa, mʼam ↄny ↄmn eke bʼow ɛgŋn uwr any eke ɛy sʼↄwlm sʼokm es.
Ɛy sʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam eke kí kokmn low ŋuŋ kaka. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke si yɛ́gm ↄny eke sʼↄny low ij. Njaŋ, low mamn cɛ sʼerur eke ki kokr. Ɛtŋ ↄfr ↄfr eke low a am yɛgm eke sʼↄny lↄbr.
Tasi ɛm a, si kʼↄtum si kokm low kaka low nawrɛ ecʼany af, in e juma cɛ sʼↄtu eke si ki kok.
Ɛɛ, sos ɛm bʼiŋn ɛy sakp sakp fɛŋ eke si bʼanŋ sos ↄnym ɛm ke ↄny bʼↄnyn lɛc a. Ow sosiɛm yecʼeke sʼam ibrm ɛy e ŋↄŋn ɛm a el: ke ɛmɛny ɛ́wal ijr lɛc ↄmn ɛm.

Low na sosiɛm anake mʼam awŋ ↄny lɛl eke mʼanŋ kpekpe a. Mʼerurm eke mi kʼɛlu lɛc ↄkm lɛgŋ eke mi bʼow mʼanŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn a. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋʼm abusu eke mi kʼɛlum Nyamel a abu agb ↄmn ɛm, kↄ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɔ̀ↄl ↄmn ɛm e lɛc eke kʼↄnyn es, àtarir sos es ke nɛny ókr ↄny af ↄny ↄfr ɛm. Ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab e Nyam a bʼow anŋ ↄny ab.
Ɛ̀sŋninin ↄny ↄfr, ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijↄwɛl ab af. Agŋ lala a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ, Nyam ecʼerur lel Abŋ Lala ecʼaf okr a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab.
Galatians: Ɛm Pↄl, lel ɛm lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ aŋa ab ab e nin ɛm, mʼam awŋ Galat e Sinyamel a lɛl na. Mʼel ɛrm ɛs, gbɛkↄ ow elm agŋ mum oglog ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛwmʼm ɛrm ɛs. Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist in obi lel Ɛs Nyam ekʼigbmʼn luw ɛm ab ab, ɛwʼm ɛrm ɛs.

Ɛm Pↄl, lel ɛm lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ aŋa ab ab e nin ɛm, mʼam awŋ Galat e Sinyamel a lɛl na. Mʼel ɛrm ɛs, gbɛkↄ ow elm agŋ mum oglog ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛwmʼm ɛrm ɛs. Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist in obi lel Ɛs Nyam ekʼigbmʼn luw ɛm ab ab, ɛwʼm ɛrm ɛs.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ɛ́ŋan ɛrm es ɛy.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ɛwr in sosi awoba, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼéb lʼɛlu ɛy es ɛy e sikpl ab ɛm. Li sↄg ɛy wus na e suŋ ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛy Ɛs erur ab af.
Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny bibm a ekʼɛŋan Krist sosiɛm a eci; sica ow am ɛwʼm any iti eke kʼupŋn in ij fafa nɛnɛ, ke ɛ́wal am lɛɛr “Amani Mamn” ɛjeci nyam.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, Amani Mamn tasi ɛjeci anm; agŋ gbɛ anŋ ekʼam wuwal ↄny nuŋ ɛm, ke am erur ekʼitŋn Amani Mamn a eke bi dad Krist ecʼodad a.
Na sosiɛm, ekʼɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ↄny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ekʼelm ow a eke si dad ↄny a ecʼodad, ke Nyam ógŋ ↄwlʼl, ekʼow el ɛy oglog ɛrm ɛs nyam ekʼanŋ afr ow bↄbↄ yɛji.
Mʼikŋ anym mi dad ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼam dadr ɛm: ekʼɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ↄny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ecʼodad ekʼótarm es yecʼa eke sʼↄŋ ↄny ab ab, ke Nyam ógŋ ↄwlʼl.
Sica kↄ agŋ ecʼaw eke kʼawʼm a mʼam ↄl es, kↄ Nyam ecʼab ee? Kↄ agŋ mʼam ↄl eke kʼerurʼm ee? Njaŋ! Blel mʼam ↄl ekʼagŋ kʼↄny ɛm ecʼerur ana, mi kʼↄtum mʼelm Krist e libↄwi.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, mʼam dad ↄny eke kʼuwr any ekʼAmani Mamn a eke mʼↄb mʼok ↄny a, elm ɛgŋ e low eke ↄkn.
Ow elm ɛgŋ ogŋ mʼebm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ yɛji yɛgam im ow e low, kↄ Jesu Krist in obi ɛlu ow e low ↄkm yɛgmʼm.
Ɛtŋ irir wɛl dad ↄny elel eke mi kokr lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke mʼanŋ Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm a e low. Uwr elel eke mʼijr agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼel Nyamel ecʼagŋ a gbre, ke mʼɛw lɛc ɛm eke mi ki ŋuŋn ɛl ab any.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, wɛl bʼɛkn tasi, eke mʼafŋ ɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ ekʼel ɛm ecʼↄwↄrŋ ab es, Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ecʼów fɛŋ e kok ɛm. Mʼↄny lɛc mʼakm ɛl fɛŋ ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm e sol esig e dogŋn owi ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ, gbuŋ ke wɛl éwʼm a ɛtŋ Nyam sↄsum ocʼm in eci sↄrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ lʼɛsŋʼm eke mi ki kok in e juma.
Ɛtŋ eke lʼɛgŋ lʼeb eke li kʼɛlu Jim ↄkm li yɛgmʼm, yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼↄ́tu mʼim mʼↄb in ecʼAmani Mamn a e kokoba mʼok agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a, mʼiim mʼibram ɛgŋ kaka eke ki yɛgmʼm low.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛwlm mʼiim Jerusalɛm mʼɛknm agŋ a ekʼikŋ anym el ɛrm ɛsɛl gbuŋ ke ɛm yɛji mʼel a; kↄ kpɛkŋ mʼↄkŋ any mʼim Arabi wus af, yogŋ anake mʼanŋ mʼɛwl mʼow Damas ɛb ɛm a.
Akpo nyahan ɛc gbuŋ ɛtŋ mʼim mʼɛy Jerusalɛm; yogŋ anake mʼuw Piɛr
any, ke mʼanŋ in ab toŋ sɛgŋ lɛw yen a.
Mʼɛknm ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci kaka, ekʼow elm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ lisijim Jak cɛ.
Low na eke mʼam awŋ ↄny ow e lɛl a, el low nawrɛ tasi; mʼam eb Nyam daŋku ekʼow elm yadŋ mʼↄnym.
Ow e jam a, mʼim Siri lele Silisi ab eci wus ab af.
Gbɛkↄ Jude ecʼagŋ a ekʼub Krist nawrɛ a, kʼɛknm im any af lɛgŋ kaka.
Low cɛ eke -lʼirir wɛl dad ɛm e lís a el: «Ɛgŋ a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, bʼijr ɛy gbre a, lɛgŋ na ɛm am dad Amani Mamn a eke sʼub nawrɛ ke lʼerur eke li ki ŋuŋn a e low.»
Ɛtŋ -nʼam kↄklm Nyam ɛm sosiɛm.
Sica ekʼakpo lɛw yar ɛc a, mʼɛwl mɛny mʼim Jerusalɛm Barnabas ab; mʼoc Tit yɛjʼab mʼim.

Mʼɛwl mɛny mʼim aŋke Nyam ɛlu ow e low ↄkm yɛgmʼm eke mi ki kok ɛbɛn. Jerusalɛm yogŋ, luku eke mʼas saw ɛm Nyamel ecʼidr ɛsɛl ab a, mʼotar Amani Mamn a eke mʼam ↄb mʼok agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a e low akr mʼok ɛl. Tasi ɛm a, mʼerurm ekʼɛm e juma eke mʼam kok lel ow eke mi kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm ab ab a, e low kʼél ↄfr ↄfr.
Ɛtŋ Tit ekʼanŋ ɛm ab, ke el Grɛk iy, ke wɛl ubrm likr es a, wɛl ↄnymʼn lɛc ɛm eke li kʼubr likr es.

Gbɛkↄ agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ekʼanŋ ɛy ecʼaraŋn a erur eke wɛl kʼubrʼr likr es. Agŋ amua ow anŋ ɛy ɛm es lↄl ɛm, eke kʼotar ɛy akr úw ɛy ecʼewi e sʼel Jesu Krist ɛm a e low any. -Nʼam erur eke si kʼel ol e madu.
Ɛtŋ sʼɛlum ɛl abusu es wanci kaka, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼúcu Amani Mamn a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a sʼↄny es ↄny eci.
Gbɛkↄ, Nyamel ecʼidr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ↄↄm im low owr kaka eke mi ki kok. Ɛtŋ ɛm ecʼa, ow elm ɛl ecʼidr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl eke -lʼeel a elm low tasi ɛm ecʼany af, aŋke Nyam ecʼany af a, agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
Kↄ tasi ɛm a, -lʼɛkn nana eke Nyam abulʼm agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ecʼAmani Mamn e kokoba eke mi kʼↄb, ɛsɛ elel eke lʼabul Piɛr eke kʼↄb ok Jwifɛl ab af.
Ɛtŋ -lʼiri yɛjʼeke Nyam ɛwʼm agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ecʼɛrm ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke lʼɛw Piɛr Jwifɛl ecʼɛrm ɛs ab af.

Jak, Piɛr lel Jan ab, eke wɛl bʼoc ɛsɛ Nyamel ecʼes ɛwɛl af a, uw any ɛkn eke Nyam anake bibm ɛm abulʼm juma na a; -lʼeb ɛy abu, ɛm lele Barnabas ab, -li yɛgm eke -lʼerur. Sica si dad sʼokarir ɛy fɛŋ eke, ɛy si bʼow sʼim si kok juma agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a ecʼaraŋn, ke ɛl -nʼimn Jwifɛl ɛm eci.
Low cɛ eke -lʼibrmn ɛy a el, ke sʼↄ́kn Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ecʼↄgbↄru a e low. Ɛtŋ ɛm obi mi kok ow e low ɛrm nyam ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ eke Piɛr ow Antiↄs ekʼanŋ Siri wus af a, mʼatar in ab agŋ fɛŋ ecʼany af, aŋke nʼↄny low ↄbr.

Tasi ɛm a, gbuŋ ke agŋ nyam nyam eke Jak ɛrm a ow a, Piɛr am us abu agŋ lisijimɛl ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab. Gbɛkↄ lɛgŋ ekʼagŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a ow a, Piɛr ocr sos es ɛtŋ ɛgŋm eke kʼij ob agŋ lisijimɛl ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab ij, aŋke nʼↄny agŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a e muru.
Jwifɛl ab ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl bɛb yɛji am kok ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛsɛ Piɛr af, ɛtŋ Barnabas in obi yɛji igb ɛy ɛl ecʼɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛm.

Ɛtŋ eke mʼɛkn eke ɛl ecʼes an a kʼelm nyim nyim ke kʼotarm es Amani Mamn e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab ab a, agŋ a fɛŋ ecʼany af mi dad Piɛr mʼɛsɛ: «Ŋ ekʼel Jwif a, ir ɛb aŋa ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab af ɛtŋ kokm yecʼa eke Jwifɛl ecʼol a dad a. Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am erur eke kʼↄny agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a lɛc ɛm ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwifɛl af ee?»
Ɛy sʼel Jwifɛl ɛy e mew ɛm, kↄ sʼelm bieku ɛjeci ecʼagŋ ekʼuwm Nyam ecʼol ab any a.

Gbɛkↄ sʼuw any ekʼɛgŋ ecʼelel eke Nyam bʼocʼr ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af a, anŋ ɛgŋ a ecʼↄmn eke bʼↄny Jesu Krist ɛm a, kↄ ow elm Mois ecʼol a eke li bʼɛlum a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛjʼeke sʼel Jwifɛl a, sʼub Jesu Krist nawrɛ, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼúw ɛy any ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛy ecʼↄmn eke sʼↄny Krist ɛm a eci, ke ow kʼélm eke si kok ol a ecʼów a fɛŋ iy nɛny a eci. Tasi ɛm a,
eke li kok ol a ecʼów fɛŋ ekʼam dad a iy nɛny yɛji.
Ɛy, sʼam ↄl eke Nyam kʼoc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af Krist sosiɛm. Sica, eke wɛl bʼɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ sikpl ɛsɛl af a, ke ayaf wɛl ki dadr ab ee? Ke Krist sikpl e juma nʼam kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
Tasi ɛm a, eke mʼɛwl mɛny mʼim ol a eke mʼigŋ mʼɛlu es ab ɛm, ke ɛm sosi mʼam ↄbr low a.
Ɛm, ol sosiɛm anake mʼerurm eke mi kʼir ɛb ol ecʼij a.
Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ ɛcr ɛbɛn, yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼír ɛb Nyam eci. Ɛm mʼuw olikŋ af Krist ab,

ɛtŋ mʼanŋ owr, gbɛkↄ ow elm ɛm mʼanm owr ij, kↄ Krist anake anŋ owr ɛm ɛm a. Jam aŋa, ɛm ecʼowr anŋ a, mi bi kok ow e low Nyam Jim e nawrɛ e mʼub ab ɛm, in eke lʼerurʼm toŋ ke lʼoc in e sel a lʼirmn ɛm sosiɛm a.
Mi kʼↄtum mʼocm Nyam e bibm na mʼↄwlm. Tasi ɛm a, ekʼow el ol ɛm ɛgŋ bʼɛcr el nyim nyim ɛs Nyam ecʼany af, ke Krist e luw a, ↄfr ↄfr ana!
Ɔny Galat eyŋ, kↄ nuŋ ɛm am uŋ ↄny! Ɔny bwo ecʼɛgŋ kokr ↄny agn ee? Ke, ↄny ecʼany af kpata wɛl otar Jesu Krist ecʼolikŋ af e luw a e low akr.
Mʼam erur eke ki kpabr low ibrm na es: kↄ ↄny ecʼAbŋ Lala a ekʼɛŋan a, ol ecʼów a fɛŋ eke kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm oglog Amani Mamn a ekʼirir ke ↄnyn ↄmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ee?
Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ kʼↄtumn ↄnymn nuŋ ɛm ee? Ɔny, ↄbr nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm, sica ↄny obi e lɛc ɛm am erurir eke kʼuwarir ab ee?
Ów amua fɛŋ ekʼɛŋn ↄny a, ↄfr ↄfr cɛ ow kʼel ee? Ow itm ekʼow kʼel ↄfr ↄfr.
Nyam bʼↄŋ ↄny in ecʼAbŋ a, ɛtŋ li bi kok sakrowa ↄny ecʼaraŋn. Kↄ ol ecʼów a fɛŋ eke bi kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm li bi kok ów amua nʼↄŋ ↄny oglog Amani Mamn a ekʼirir ke ↄnyn ↄmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ecʼee?
Kin yecʼeke Nyam Lɛl dad Abraham e lís:
Sica ow it eke kʼuwr any ekʼagŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼir ɛb ↄmn ɛm a, el Abraham ecʼalaw tasi.
Nyam Lɛl ɛwar eke Nyam bʼow oc agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a, ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af, ɛl ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym ↄb Amani Mamn na ok Abraham eke:
Eke Abraham ub nawrɛ a, wɛl ɛdŋʼn ↄwrↄ; ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, wɛl bʼɛdŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a ↄwrↄ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ɛdŋn Abraham ab af.
Sica agŋ eke bi tutr eke, eke bʼɛlum ol ke Nyam ócʼŋ ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs af a, musue el ɛl eci. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ɛtŋ ow ayl yɛjʼeke, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum elm nyim nyim Nyam ecʼany af ol ecʼɛlum a sosiɛm, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Gbɛkↄ ol ↄnym low kaka ↄmn ab. Ow eke Nyam Lɛl nana dad a el:
Gbɛkↄ Krist sↄg ɛy an ligbɛl ɛm ol e musue a e lís. In anake ɛy e musue a eke kʼɛŋn ɛy a, ɛyʼr af a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad:
Na sosiɛm anake ↄwrↄ a eke Nyam ɛwar eke kʼɛdŋ Abraham a, bʼow ɛbm agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a yɛji Krist sosiɛm, ke ɛy fɛŋ si bʼɛŋn ↄmn ɛm Abŋ Lala a eke Nyam ɛwar a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼocr ɛy ecʼɛb ir ɛm e low nyam sʼↄbar any: ekʼɛgŋ nyam kok aja e lɛl ɛw es ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ab af, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ↄnym aja e lɛl na tɛtŋm es oglog nↄnm low ɛjeci ɛlum ɛm.
Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham lele iy a eke kʼanŋ in ɛm ɛy ↄkm ab ab e low ana. Wɛl dadm ɛsmɛ:
, ɛsɛ agŋ nↄnↄ owi af. Njaŋ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ e low. Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl bʼawl a el:
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in lʼel Krist.

Kin low a e mʼerur eke mi ki dad a: Nyam kok aja e lɛl nyam ɛw es, ɛtŋ ɛwar eke bʼow ucu ow e low ↄny es. Ol a eke akpo duw akpo likŋ lele lɛw ab ɛc, gbuŋ ke ɛy ↄkm a, kʼↄtum ↄnym abusu tɛtŋm low a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es ab es.
Sica, ekʼob ap a eke Nyam ↄŋ ɛsɛ aja af a, el ol sosiɛm, ke ow elm ɛwar a sosiɛm ij. Ke, tasi ɛm a, ɛwar a sosiɛm Nyam ɛlu in ecʼɛrm mamn ↄkm Abraham e lís.

Ɛtŋ ekʼow el ɛbɛn, ke bla sosiɛm Nyam ↄŋ agŋ ol ee? Ol el ob eke Nyam igŋ af, yecʼɛtŋ ke nʼↄ́ŋ agŋ uw ɛl ecʼów ekʼakplm in ecʼany af ab any, ɛtŋ ow it eke li kʼanŋ toŋ ke ɛgŋ a eke kʼanŋ Abraham ɛm ɛy ↄkm a ów; aŋke in sosiɛm wɛl ɛwar low a ɛw es. Ol a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛlu ow e low ↄkm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ow ecʼaraŋn a.
Gbɛkↄ ow ibram ekʼɛgŋ nyam kʼanŋ ow ecʼaraŋn ij, eke ow el ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eke low a ot es a, ɛtŋ Nyam cɛ anake low a ot es a.

Sica low na e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ecʼee? Ol lele Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es ab ab okrm af ee? Ow elm ɛbɛn! Blel ol nyam ↄtu eke kʼↄŋ ɛgŋ sel, ɛtŋ blel agŋ ɛŋn ol ikŋ na ana, ke blel nimamn ana, blel ol a ↄ́ŋ ɛl -lʼel nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ecʼany af.

Gbɛkↄ, Nyam Lɛl dad eke wus nimum in anŋ sikpl ecʼabusu a ecʼew. Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke Nyam e low a ekʼɛwar ɛw es a, kʼel tasi agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a eci, ɛl ecʼↄmn eke -nʼↄnyn Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
Gbuŋ ke ↄmn e lɛgŋ a ów a, ol ↄnym ɛy ab ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ sʼam eku lɛgŋ a ekʼↄmn kʼɛlu sos ↄkm a.
Ow ↄŋ, ol el ɛy e nyimn ɛs toŋ Krist ow; yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ecʼany af ɛy ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm.
Sica eke ↄmn e lɛgŋ ow a, si kʼↄtum sʼanm nyimn ɛs na ecʼabu ɛm ij.
Ɔny fɛŋ, eel Nyam ecʼey ↄmn a ekʼↄny okr ↄny af Jesu Krist ab a sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ↄny fɛŋ okar af Krist ab mij nuŋ a eke wɛl ok ↄny ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛwal anŋn ɛsɛ Krist in obi af.
Sica ereb anm agŋ ekʼel Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm ab ecʼaraŋn, madu lel ewi ab ecʼaraŋn, ↄyↄw lel egŋ ab ecʼaraŋn; ↄny fɛŋ, eel nyam coco Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ekʼeel Krist eci, ke ↄny eel Abraham ecʼey ɛtŋ eel aja ij ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab af.
Kin ɛm e tutr e mʼↄny a: ekʼiy a ekʼel aja ij ɛs a anŋ gↄŋni a, li bʼɛw ɛsɛ adu af. Ke tasi ɛm a, ob a fɛŋ in eci cɛ.
Gbɛkↄ, ow it ke nʼám ɛlum agŋ a ekʼam ɛkn in e lís e low, ke am ↄsu in ecʼob a fɛŋ a, toŋ ke lɛgŋ a ekʼɛs ɛw a ów.
Ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn nɛny nyam. Eke sʼanŋ ɛsɛ etuey af a, sʼel wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc a e madu.
Gbɛkↄ, eke lɛgŋ a e Nyam bʼɛbm ɛw es a ow a, lʼɛrm Jim ow. Wɛl ewʼr yↄw ɛm ɛtŋ lʼir ɛb ol ɛm,
yecʼɛtŋ ke li sↄ́g agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ ol ecʼabusu ab ɛm a, ke sʼↄ́tu sʼel Nyam ecʼey.
Gbɛkↄ, ke wɛl úw any eke eel in ecʼey a, Nyam ↄŋ Jim ecʼAbŋ a ow ɛy ɛy ecʼɛrm ab ɛm; ɛtŋ Abŋ na anake bʼↄŋ ɛy si dad «Aba!» ow e nyandrɛ el, «ɛm Ɛs!»
Ow sosiɛm a, ŋ elm adu ij, kↄ iy; ɛtŋ ekʼel iy a sosiɛm, Nyam bʼow ↄŋ aja eke li bɛbm lʼɛw in ecʼey ab es a.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, uwmn Nyam any ɛtŋ eel sabusu ekʼelm sinyam tasi yɛjʼa e madu.
Sica yɛfɛnyna ɛm ekʼuwr Nyam any, oglog yɛfɛnyna ɛm eke Nyam uw ↄny any a, ayaf ow it eke kʼɛwal ɛlumn wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ekʼelm low kaka ab ee? Ayaf ɛmɛny ↄtur eke kʼɛwal eel ɛl e madu ee?
Bʼucur sɛgŋ bɛb, awl bɛb, akpo e sɛgŋ bɛb lel akpo bɛb ab e low ↄnyn es.
Mʼam ↄny ɛrmij ↄny eci: eke juma e mi kok ↄny ecʼaraŋn a kʼélm ↄfr ↄfr sosiɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny, kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af, aŋke ɛm yɛji mi kok ɛsɛ ↄny af. Kokmnʼm low ŋuŋ kaka.
Ɔny, am ↄkan low ɛm eke mʼↄg es mʼↄb ↄny Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ow el ɛm ecʼↄl ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɛm e sos megl a eke ɛm ecʼↄl ab ɛm itm eke wɛl ki lɛr a, ↄnym ↄny nɛnŋn walmn ɛlumnʼm es. Kↄ ↄny kↄtↄkↄ, ebrʼm ɛsɛ Nyam ecʼɛrm ɛs nyam af, oglog ɛsɛ Jesu Krist af.
Lɛgŋ a, anŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɛtŋ sica bla lowi ɛŋn ↄny ee? Mʼↄtu eke mi dad mʼɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a, blel ↄnyn abusu eke ki sↄsmn ↄny ecʼanyamn ab es ↄŋnʼm, blel kokr.
Kↄ sica ↄny ecʼifnu mʼɛwl mʼel low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e mʼam dad ↄny a sosiɛm ee?
Agŋ amua
ekʼam kok ɛsɛ ↄny e lís e low cɛ wɛʼn am ɛw any af a, ɛl e sow tutr a akplm ↄny eci. Ɛl e low eke -nʼam ↄl a cɛ el: ke -nʼↄny -li kpab ↄny es ɛm e lís, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́tur lɛɛr ɛl.
Tasi, ow akpl ekʼɛgŋ kʼↄny ↄny e lís ecʼerur, gbɛkↄ ke ow el low nimamn eci, ow it ekʼow kʼel sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kↄ ke ow kʼélm lɛgŋ eke mi bʼanŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn a cɛ.
Ɛm ecʼey, ɛmɛny mʼam ij ↄny e gbre, gbre ekʼotarir es ɛsɛ yↄw ekʼam ew iy ecʼab af, ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼanŋ ɛm ɛbɛn toŋ ow áylʼm sos ɛm ekʼↄny fɛŋ Krist ir ↄny ɛm.
Mʼerur eke blel mʼanŋ ↄny saw wanci na af, ke mʼↄ́tu mi dad ↄny odad akunda ɛjecʼɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi kʼuwm elel eke mi ki kokr ↄny e lís ab any.
Dàdrʼm, ↄny ekʼam erurir ekʼol kʼɛw ↄny es a: irimn yecʼa ekʼol a am dad ab ee?
Nyam Lɛl dad eke Abraham in ew ey yony, Agar ekʼel adyↄw ab ab owʼn ew nyam ɛtŋ Sara ekʼel yↄw lewi ab ab yɛji owʼn ew nyam.
Adyↄw iyŋ a, wɛl ewʼr igŋ nyam lele yↄw nyam ab ecʼerur ɛm, kↄ yↄw lewi a ecʼiy a, wɛl ewʼr Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ab ɛm.
Odad na ↄny akr otar ɛjeci. Ɔyↄw yony a anŋ ɛsɛ sinm yony af. Krɛkrɛ e sinm a, el Sinayi lafɛny af ecʼa, ɛtŋ li bʼew ey eke bʼel madu: ke Agar ana,
ɛtŋ Agar anake el Sinayi lafɛny a ekʼanŋ Arabi wus af a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ anake yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, nʼanŋ ɛsɛ Jerusalɛm
ecʼɛb a ekʼin ecʼey ab ab el madu a.
Kↄ Jerusalɛm ekʼanŋ afr a el lewi, ɛtŋ in anake lʼel ɛy lis a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Sos ɛm íŋnʼŋ itr yↄw!
Ɛ̀lu sos ɛm iŋn e lebl,
ŋ ekʼuwm iy ew e dudu any a;
aŋke yↄw a eke wɛl igŋ ɛlu es a,
bʼow ew ey akm yↄw a ekʼↄny igŋ a.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ↄny ecʼa, ɛsɛ Isak af, eel ey eke wɛl ew ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ab af.
Gbɛkↄ ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼa eke Abraham ecʼiy a eke wɛl ew igŋ lele yↄw ab ecʼerur ɛm a, ijr iy a eke wɛl ew Nyam ecʼAbŋ ecʼerur ɛm a gbre a, yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ɛbɛn cɛ ow anŋ.
Kↄ Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ayaf wɛl dadr ee? Wɛl dad ninɛ:
Na sosiɛm a, agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy sʼelm adyↄw a ecʼey, kↄ ɛy yↄw lewi a ecʼey.
Krist sↄg ɛy, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼél ewi tasi. Na sosiɛm ìnymn es kikri lewi el na ɛm, ke ↄ́nyn sos ↄsu, ke kʼɛ́wlmn elmn madu ij.
Ɛm Pↄl, mʼam dad ↄny: eke yɛbr wɛl ubr ↄny likr es, ke Krist elm low kaka ↄny ecʼij.
Ɛmɛny mʼam usr lebl af mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bʼɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ow it eke li kʼɛlum ol a nimum.
Ɔny ekʼam ↄↄl eke kʼeel nɛny nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ecʼany af ol ecʼɛlum ɛm a, ↄny obi ɛm anake kpabr es Krist e lís a; ɛtŋ ↄny irmnin Nyam e bibm a ekʼɛŋan a.
Sica ɛy ecʼa, sʼoc ɛy e nawrɛ ub a sʼɛlu Nyam ɛm. In li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼel nɛny nyam ɛsɛl in ecʼany af; low na anake sʼam eku Abŋ Lala ecʼabusu a eke bʼɛcr ɛy ecʼↄmn ab ɛm kok juma a.
Mʼam dad tasi ɛm mʼɛsɛ, eke sʼokr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke wɛl úbr ɛy likr es oglog ke wɛl kʼúbrm ɛy likr es, ow elm low kaka. Kↄ low tasi a cɛ el: úb nawrɛ, ke yɛ́gm ŋ ecʼↄmn a erur owi ɛm.
Ɔny ↄbr nuŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn! Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ɛdŋn ↄny eke kʼɛ́luamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ee?
Low yecʼa eke wɛl dad ↄny ke ok ↄny es sos ɛm a, anm Nyam ekʼɛsŋ ↄny a ogŋ owm.
Ow anŋ ɛsɛ: «Lijru tɛɛli cɛ eke bʼanŋ ma ɛm, ke bʼↄŋ ma a nimum inŋ ab af.»
Gbɛkↄ, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ obnʼm ↄmn ↄny e lís: kʼow ↄnymn tutr ɛjeci eke kʼow otarm es ɛm ecʼab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ekʼam mumu ↄny a, ke ow el in ecʼelel eke nʼanŋn a, Nyam bʼow ↄbʼr low gbre ij eci.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kↄ ɛm, likr eke wɛl kʼubr ↄny es e kokoba ɛmɛny mʼam ↄb ↄny ee? Ekʼow el nawrɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl am ijrʼm gbre ee? Tasi ɛm a, eke mʼam ↄb likr es ubr owi e kokoba ke Krist ecʼolikŋ a elm ɛgŋ kaka e wus ɛlu owi ij.
Mʼam erur ekʼagŋ amua ekʼam mumu ↄny likr es ubr sosiɛm a, blel -li kok ow afŋ na es; -li kok -lʼel egŋ agbru.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny in e lewi ij ab ɛm, gbɛkↄ lewi ij ikŋ na itm eke kʼↄŋ ↄny abusu kokr ↄny e sos af ecʼów eke bʼaw ↄny a. Ow tasi eke ki kokr a el, ke erur ɛm, kókr ów ↄŋanin ↄny ↄfr.
Ol na nimum anŋ ol nyam na ɛm:
Sica eke bi kokr ɛsɛ akp ɛm ndey af, ám gugŋnin ke ám ↄnyn ijarir ↄny ↄfr, ke ɛ̀wr ɛrm, bʼow ŋuŋanin ↄny ↄfr.
Na sosiɛm mi dad mʼɛsɛ: yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala nyimn ↄny ecʼɛb ir a, yecʼɛtŋ ke ki kókmn ↄny e sos af ecʼów eke bʼaw ↄny a.

Sos af ecʼów amua eke bʼaw ↄny a, ɛ́gŋm Abŋ Lala e low ebm ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala yɛji ɛ́gŋm sos af ecʼów amua eke bʼaw ↄny a e low ebm. Ɛl yony mum ecʼaraŋn a atarir, ɛtŋ ow e liy eke bʼanŋ ɛm ɛy ↄkm a el, ke kʼↄtumn kokmn yecʼa ekʼam erurir a.
Gbɛkↄ eke Abŋ Lala bi nyimn ↄny, ke ↄny anmn ol ecʼes ɛw ɛm ij.
Ów a eke ɛy e sos af ecʼów aw bʼↄsu, ke wɛl bʼɛkn a el: agŋ e lↄsŋn e bʼagbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛb eke -li bʼir sikpl ɛm, ów ↄbr ↄbr eke -li bi kok ɛl ecʼerur ɛm;
sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ, agn kok owi; agŋ ecʼifn owi, ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr ↄnyanin; ɛrm bebl, agŋ fɛŋ ecʼes ɛw owi, ɛm bubr owi lel ɛl ↄfr ɛm ecʼijarm owi ab.

-Nʼam erur eke ɛl lawlɛl ecʼob ekʼↄny a ɛl yɛji -nʼↄny, -lʼel mar ɛgŋu, ob iju, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -li bi kok ów ɛjeci nↄnↄ ekʼotarir es amua eke wɛl dad ab ab. Mʼam ɛwar ↄny ɛtŋ mʼikŋ anym mi dad yɛji: agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a, kʼow ɛŋnm usu Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
Sica kin ey yecʼeke Abŋ Lala bʼↄsu ɛy ɛm: erur, sos ɛm iŋn, ɛrm es ɛy, low eku, ɛrm mamn, low kok ↄŋ ɛgŋ, cɛcɛ el,
ɛrm frↄrↄ, sos es ↄnyn. Mi kʼↄnym ↄmn eke ol kʼifn ów amua.
Agŋ a ekʼel Jesu Krist ecʼa, oc ɛl e sos af ecʼów aw a eke bʼirmn ɛl a ɛw olikŋ af.
Sica, ekʼow el Abŋ Lala ɛm sʼam ir ɛb a, ke si yɛ́b Abŋ ikŋ na nyimn ɛy.
Si kʼéel és ɛfuu, ów ɛsu kʼánŋ ɛy ecʼaraŋn, nyamnɛyr ↄnyanin yɛji kʼánŋ ɛy ecʼaraŋn.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, eke bʼɛkan ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam ekʼam kok low ekʼakplm a, ↄny eke Nyam ecʼAbŋ a am nyimn ↄny a, ɛ̀lumn in abu lʼɛ́wl lʼeb ejagb mamn a; gbɛkↄ ke ow él ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm. Ɛtŋ mʼam dad eke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ fɛŋ kʼɛ́w sos ɛrm, ke kí yɛbmn mɛju owrm ↄny.
Òkmnin sel es ↄny e sɛrɛkp leg leg ecʼuyu ɛm: ow ɛm anake bʼow ɛlumn Krist ecʼol a.
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam bi tutr ɛsɛ in el any ɛs ɛtŋ lʼelm ob kaka a, ke in sosi nʼam ɛjur.
Ow akpl ekʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ kʼↄny in ecʼes an a igbl ogŋ ɛkn; ekʼow akplʼl sos ɛm, ke ow él in sↄny eci, kↄ ke li kʼócm lʼↄbarm lawlɛl ecʼab ab,
aŋke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ bʼow uyu in obi ecʼɛrɛkp.
Ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼɛŋn Nyam ecʼodad a e low yɛgm a, it eke ki cɛc in ecʼob e nʼↄny a, ɛgŋ a eke bi yɛgmʼn low ab ab.
Kʼɛ̀jurir ↄny sosi: ow itm eke wɛl ki kokr Nyam miyɛr. Ɛgŋ, ow a cɛ eke li bʼewl a, li bʼub.
Eke ɛgŋ ewl ów eŋuŋ eke bʼawʼr a in ecʼↄgm a, li bʼow lʼub luw; kↄ eke lʼewl yecʼa ekʼAbŋ Lala bʼerur a, li bʼow lʼub sel ekʼↄnym uwr.
Sos kʼám ɛy low nimamn e kok ɛm, aŋke e sʼamnm sos, ow e wanci bʼow a, si bʼow sʼub.
Na sosiɛm, eke sʼↄny abusu a, si kók ɛgŋ fɛŋ low nimamn, ab brobro ↄmn ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl a.
Sica ɛm obi ecʼabu ɛm anake mʼam nↄn lɛl a, ɛsɛ elel eke lɛl mↄni a e sagb a am yɛgm ab af.
Agŋ a ekʼam erur ekʼↄny ↄny lɛc ɛm ubar likr es a, el agŋ ekʼam erur eke kʼij any agŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ -nʼam kok ɛbɛn, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl kʼíjrm ɛl gbre Krist ecʼolikŋ a sosiɛm.
Agŋ amua ekʼɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ɛl obi a -lʼɛluamn ol a; -lʼerur eke kʼubar likr es, yecʼɛtŋ ke -nʼↄny abusu -lʼↄpr ów, eke lɛc ɛm ɛgŋn mɛny ɛwr ikŋ na e low ebr.

Ɛm ecʼa, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼolikŋ af e luw a ecʼów cɛ mʼerur eke mi kʼↄpr, aŋke Krist ecʼolikŋ af e luw a, ɛm ecʼa, ow ɛw ɛsɛ wus ecʼob a fɛŋ eke wɛʼn uw af, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji mʼɛw ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw wus ecʼob a fɛŋ ecʼany af af.
Na sosiɛm, eke wɛl ubrʼŋ likr es oglog wɛl ubrmʼŋ es yɛji, low kaka anm ɛm, kↄ yeci tasi ekʼel low a el: ke él ɛgŋ owr.
Sica agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼɛlum ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛl ecʼɛb ir ɛm a, mʼam dad eke: Nyam ecʼɛrm es ɛy a lel ɛrm mamn ab ab kʼánŋ ɛl af, ɛl, lel agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼel Nyam ecʼIsraɛl ab ab.
Yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ kʼow kʼijrʼm gbre ij, aŋke ɛm e sos af e mɛny ɛwr amua, el Jesu e gbre e mʼij a e mɛny ɛwr.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a, ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.
Ephesians: Ɛm Pↄl, Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur, mʼam awŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ lala ekʼanŋ Efɛs baŋn,
ke bʼus Jesu Krist jam nɛny nyam ɛm a, lɛl na.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy.
Si kↄ́klmn Nyam eke el ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼƐs a! Nʼↄŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala ecʼↄwrↄ fɛŋ eke anŋ afr a, ɛy lele Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm.
Gbuŋ ke wɛl kok wus a, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm sↄsum ot ɛy sʼel in eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼél lala ke si kʼítam ɛm kaka in ecʼany af. Nyam erur ɛy ɛtŋ lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm
eke li bʼow lʼɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm lʼeb ɛy ɛsɛ in ecʼey af. In ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm lʼerur low na,
yecʼɛtŋ ke si kↄ́klm Nyam, in ecʼanygbɛl ecʼów amamn e sagb a eci. Ów amamn fɛŋ, in ecʼIy e lʼerur ab ɛm li bʼɛcr nʼↄŋ ɛy.
Sʼanŋ Krist ɛm ɛtŋ in e mebl ab ɛm li sↄg ɛy,
lʼoc ɛy e sikpl a lʼap ɛy; ɛtŋ ow ɛlu Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn ligbɛl a eke ↄny a e low ↄkm.
Ɛɛ, Nyam ↄnyn ɛy ɛrm mamn afŋn es. Nʼↄŋ ɛy sɛwr fɛŋ lele low any uw ab.
Nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼuw in e low a eke lↄl es ab any, low a eke in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm, lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm lʼɛw es eke li kʼɛcr Krist ɛm li kok a.
Low ikŋ a eke Nyam ki kok uwar lɛgŋ a eke li sↄsum lʼɛw es ab ɛm a, el ke lʼás ob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ afr lele wus ab a luku es ɛw nyam coco eke el Krist ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɛy eci Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm a, Nyam ↄŋ ɛy aja a eke kʼɛbm ɛy,
ke lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm ow e low lʼɛw es a. Li kok low na fɛŋ aŋke lʼɛgŋ lʼeb ɛtŋ lʼerur,
yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy e sʼel agŋ krɛkrɛ ekʼoc ɛl ecʼↄmn ɛlu Krist ɛm a, si kↄ́klm Nyam, in ecʼanygbɛl a eci!
Ɔny yɛji, anŋn Krist ɛm aŋke irir odad tasi a ekʼel Amani Mamn a eke bi sↄg ↄny a. Eke ocr ↄny ecʼɛrm a ↄŋn Krist a sosiɛm, Nyam ɛw ↄny mɛny ɛwr nyam af.
Mɛny ɛwr a, ow ow el Abŋ Lala a eke lʼɛwar eke li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛy a.

Abŋ Lala na, el aja a eke si bʼow sʼɛŋn Nyam ecʼabu ɛm a eci krɛkrɛ. Ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm ɛy tasi eke si bʼow sʼɛŋn aja na lɛgŋ a eke Nyam bʼow sↄg ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm a. Ow sosiɛm si kↄ́klmn Nyam, in ecʼanygbɛl a eci!
Ow sosiɛm, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke mʼiri wɛl dad eke ↄny ↄnyn ↄmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ɛm ɛtŋ ↄny bʼerurir agŋ a ekʼin el Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a,
mʼↄ́pim eke mi kʼɛlu Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄny eci ɛm e Nyam ŋↄŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
Mʼam ibrm ekʼɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e Nyam a, anygbɛl ecʼƐs a kʼↄŋ ↄny sɛwr, ke lʼɛ́lu sos ↄkm li yɛgm ↄny, yecʼɛtŋ ke úwr ir any tasi.
Mʼam ibrmʼn eke li kʼɛkan ↄny ecʼɛrm ɛm e tutr ab es, yecʼɛtŋ ke úwr low ↄmn a eke nʼↄŋ ↄny lɛgŋ a eke lʼɛsŋ ↄny a, ke úwr in ecʼaja ecʼob ↄny ligbɛl sↄbↄ a eke lʼɛw es agŋ lala a ecʼab any.
Ɛtŋ ↄny bʼow uwr lɛc liplemu a eke Nyam ɛlu ↄkm ɛy eke si bʼubʼr nawrɛ ecʼa. In ecʼabusu a lel in e lɛc ab ab,
lʼɛlu ow e low ↄkm Krist ɛm, lɛgŋ eke lʼigbm ow luw ɛm, ke nʼↄŋ ow ow sigʼr es lidr abu af afr a.
Yogŋ, Krist anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ, abusu fɛŋ, lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ lele nin ɛjeci fɛŋ eke wɛl ↄtu eke kʼɛsŋ a e nuŋ af. Tasi, nʼanŋ ob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ a e nuŋ af,
ɛtŋ ow elm yɛfɛnyna e lɛgŋ na ɛm cɛ, kↄ lɛgŋ eke bʼow ow ab ɛm yɛji.
Ɛɛ, Nyam oc mob mob a pupukpaŋ ɛw es Krist ecʼakr ew a,
ɛtŋ lʼɛw ow ɛsɛ Nyamel nimum eci nuŋ af,
ɛtŋ Nyamel el Krist eci sos megl a. In ɛm wɛl bʼɛkn Krist nimum, ɛtŋ Krist, in iy afr lele wus ab nimum.
Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm, uwr ↄny ecʼów ↄbr lel ↄny e sikpl ab ab sosiɛm.

Ɔny iir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke wus ecʼagŋ bʼir ɛb ab af; ɛlumn sabusu eŋuŋ ecʼes ɛw ɛs a ekʼin ecʼes ɛw anŋ lɛf ɛm a. Es ɛw ɛs a, in lʼel low ŋuŋ ecʼabŋ a eke caca ɛm a am kok juma agŋ a ekʼɛ́luam Nyam ab ɛm a.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji sʼanŋ ɛsɛ agŋ amua af, ow a eke sʼam ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛy ecʼów aw eŋuŋ bʼↄŋn ɛy ab af a. Sʼɛlum ɛy ecʼów aw eŋuŋ a lel ɛy e sow tutr eŋuŋ ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛy ecʼelel tasi a eke sʼanŋn a sosiɛm, sʼit eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a kʼↄŋ ɛy sʼabur es ɛsɛ agŋ likpr ab af.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a agb nↄnↄ ɛtŋ in ecʼerur eke nʼↄny ɛy ecʼa ↄnym any ↄkŋnin;
na sosiɛm anake ɛy eke sʼanŋ ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼuw abŋ ɛm ɛy ecʼów eŋuŋ a sosiɛm a, nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼanŋ owr Krist ab a. Ɛɛ, Nyam e sↄrŋ ikŋ a anake sↄg ɛy a.
Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm Nyam igbm ɛy luw ɛm, ɛtŋ Krist ab cɛ nʼↄŋ ɛy si sig es afr.
Nyam ɛlu in ecʼɛrm mamn eke nʼↄnyn ɛy a ↄkm Jesu Krist ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm ɛy sɛgŋ fɛŋ in e sↄrŋ ikŋ ligbɛl ab ɛm eci gbreŋgbi eke lʼij a.
Tasi ɛm a, in eci sↄrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm anake li sↄg ↄny a, aŋke ↄny ubr nawrɛ. Ow elm ↄny ɛm ow anm owm, kↄ Nyam in obi eci bibm eke ↄŋ ↄny.
Sel ɛŋn na, ɛŋnmn in ↄny ecʼów kok ɛm; ow sosiɛm a ɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́w sos.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm anake Nyam kok ɛy a. Li kok ɛy yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼír ɛb ów amamn kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ ów amamn amua, Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke si ki kok.

Ɔny uwr any eke Jwifɛl el agŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es, ke bʼerur ɛsŋn ɛl sosi “agŋ ekʼubr likr es”. Ɔny ekʼelmn Jwifɛl mew ɛm ɛtŋ a, wɛl ubrm ↄny likr es ɛtŋ ow bʼↄŋ -li bʼɛsŋ ↄny “agŋ ekʼubrm likr es.” Ow sosiɛm, ↄny ↄkan lɛgŋ ab ɛm ecʼob eke eel a:
ↄny eel agŋ ekʼuwm Krist any, agŋ eke wɛl awlm Nyam ecʼagŋ ab ɛm, ke anm sinm a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar a e low ɛm, ↄnym low ↄmn kaka, ke uwm Nyam any ɛl ecʼɛb ir ɛm wus af aŋa.
Gbɛkↄ sica, Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm, ↄny eke lɛgŋ ab ɛm kpabr es a, lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Krist eci mebl a ↄŋ ↄny okar af.
Ɛɛ, in lʼel ɛy ecʼɛrm es ɛy. Li kok Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab el agŋ nyam coco. Li bubm sifn e lakp a
eke cɛc ɛl ab es, in eci sos megl a eke li wawr egb olikŋ af ab ɛm.
Nʼↄny Mois ecʼol a ecʼes ɛw a lel ow ecʼów kpɛti kpɛti ab ab lʼↄwr es. Ɛtŋ Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab, li kok wɛl el agŋ nyam coco ekʼokr af in ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow el ɛrm es ɛy.
In ecʼolikŋ af e luw ab ɛm, nʼↄny Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab lʼokr af el sos megl nyam coco ɛtŋ nʼↄny lʼokr wɛl ɛm Nyam ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a lʼibi ifanin.
Ow am yɛgm eke Krist, ɛrm es ɛy ecʼAmani Mamn e kokoba lʼow lʼↄb lʼok ↄny ekʼelm Jwifɛl ke kpabr es Nyam e lís a, lele Jwifɛl eke titm Nyam ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛm anake si kʼɛcr ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl ab ab, ke sʼↄ́tu si titm Nyam ɛy Ɛs, Abŋ Lala nyam a cɛ ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm a, ↄny ekʼelmn Jwifɛl a, elmn etu agŋ ij oglog gbeŋ ecʼagŋ. Kↄ ↄny anŋn Nyam ecʼagŋ lala ab ɛm, ↄnyn ów a fɛŋ ecʼabusu ɛtŋ eel Nyam e bosu ab ɛm ecʼagŋ.
Sica ↄny eel êl a ekʼin eci misigrer a el Krist ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab ab a. Ɛtŋ lↄy ɛm eci lebn tasi a, el Jesu Krist in obi.
Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm anake êl a eci mebn a fɛŋ bʼokr af inym es kikri a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ li bʼↄŋ êl a agb el Nyamel lala eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ oc ɛw saw.
Eke okar af Krist ab a sosiɛm anake ↄny yɛji anŋn êl a eke wɛl us ab ɛm a. Ɛtŋ agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ab, okar af eel êl eke Nyam ɛcr in ecʼAbŋ ab ɛm ir ɛm.
Ɛm Pↄl, mʼel Jesu Krist e sobel ɛm ɛs, ↄny ekʼelmn Jwifɛl a sosiɛm eci.
Ɔny, mʼↄny ↄmn eke irir juma eke Nyam, in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm abulʼm eke mi ki kok ↄny ecʼa e low.
Lʼɛlu low a eke lↄl es a ↄkm mʼɛkn, low a eke mi nↄn ow e low tɛl cɛ afr ɛm a.
Ɛm e lɛl a ecʼawl ɛm, bʼow ɛkan elel eke mʼuw Krist e lís e low eke lↄl es ab any a.

Low ikŋ a, lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛlumʼn ↄkm yɛgam ɛy lagŋɛl. Kↄ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, lʼɛcr in ecʼAbŋ ab ɛm lʼɛlu ow ↄkm, li yɛgm in ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl lala ab ab eke li sↄsum lʼot lʼok saw a.

Kin low a eke lↄl es a: agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl ke okr af Jesu Krist ab Amani Mamn ab ɛm a, bʼow ɛŋn aja nyam a cɛ ɛsɛ Jwifɛl ab af. -Li bʼow -lʼel sos megl nyam ecʼagŋ, ɛtŋ low a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a -li bʼow -nʼanŋ ɛm.
Nyam, in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm, ↄŋʼm abusu eke mi kʼel Amani Mamn na e juma kok ɛs, in e lɛc a ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm.
Ɛm, mʼel nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl ab ɛm ecʼɛgŋ saka sakali. Gbɛkↄ mʼɛŋn bibm na eke mi kʼↄb Krist ecʼob ↄny a ekʼↄnym nuŋ a ecʼamani, mʼok agŋ a ekʼelm Jwifɛl a.
Tasi ɛm a, godʼɛtŋ, Nyam eke el mob mob fɛŋ eci kok ɛs a, lↄl low a eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es ab es in ɛm. Ɛtŋ elel eke Nyam bʼow kokr low na eke lↄl es a e low iy nɛny a, mʼɛŋn bibm eke mi ki yɛgm kpata.
Ow bʼow ↄŋ ɛtŋ Nyam bʼow ɛcr Nyamel a eke lʼɛsŋ ab ɛm, nʼↄ́ŋ mob a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ afr ke ↄny es ɛw lel abusu ↄny ab a
úw in e sɛwr ab any. Nuŋ ɛm ↄny na Nyam bʼɛluʼl ↄkm sakunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm,
low a eke lʼikŋ anym li bɛbm lʼɛw es godʼɛtŋ a sosiɛm eci. Low ikŋ na, lʼɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm, li kok ow iy nɛny.
Ɛy eke sʼokr af Krist ab ke sʼubʼr nawrɛ a, sica abusu ɛru ɛy es eke si kʼↄwl abu sʼim Nyam ecʼany af ↄmn ɛm.
Na sosiɛm anake mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny ekʼɛm e gbre e mʼam ɛgŋ mʼeb ↄny sosiɛm a, kʼↄ́wrm ↄny sos es a. Tasi ɛm a, ow bʼow el ↄny ecʼanygbeŋ ligbɛl.
Ow sosiɛm mʼam ok ↄwrↄkp wus Nyam ɛy Ɛs ecʼany af,
in ɛm eke bosu fɛŋ ekʼanŋ afr lele wus ab anŋ a.
Mʼam ŋↄŋnʼn ekʼin ecʼanygbɛl e gbreŋgbi eke lʼij ab ɛm, li kʼɛcr in ecʼAbŋ ab ɛm nʼↄ́ŋ ↄny lɛc inymn es kikri ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm.
Ke Krist ír ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm ↄny ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ókr min erur ɛm, ke ↄny nimum a sígr es erur ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ bʼow ↄnyn abusu, ↄny lele Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a fɛŋ ab, írir mɛwl ɛm tasi Krist ecʼerur a ecʼes ar, sↄfu, sigb lel ow e sibn ab ab.
Ɛɛ, mʼam erur eke kʼuwr Krist ecʼerur ab any, eke lʼagb lʼakm low fɛŋ ekʼɛgŋ ↄtu eke kʼuw any a yɛji, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛ́ŋan Nyam ecʼowr anŋ a, ke lʼír ↄny ɛm nimum.
Nyam e lɛc a am kok juma ɛy ɛm ɛtŋ eke si bʼibrmʼn low a, lʼↄtu eke li ki kok ow afŋ es! In e lɛc a agb akm yecʼa e sʼↄtu eke si ki tutr a.
Anygbɛl él in eci, in e Nyamel ab ɛm lele Jesu Krist ɛm ab akpo akpo fɛŋ lele sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab! Amɛn.
Ɛm eke mʼel sobel ɛm ɛs Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sosiɛm a, kin yecʼeke mʼam ok ↄny mɛrm sabu af mi dad ↄny: ↄny eke Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny a, ↄnyn es an ekʼot ↄny ecʼɛsŋ ab es.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìsr es, èel frↄrↄ, ↄnyan sos es low ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ecʼelel eke anŋn a ebr erur ɛm.
Àtar sos es ucur af okr a eke Abŋ Lala bʼↄŋ ↄny a ↄnyn es, ɛrm es ɛy a eke bʼↄny okr ↄny af ↄny ↄfr ɛm a;
aŋke Nyam kok sos megl nyam, nʼↄŋ ↄny Abŋ Lala nyam, ɛtŋ low ↄmn nyam ɛm cɛ lʼɛsŋ ↄny.
Ɛtŋ ↄnyn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nyam, ↄmn nyam lele mij ok nuŋ nyam ab,
Nyam nyam cɛ eke el agŋ fɛŋ ecʼƐs eke ɛw fɛŋ es, bi kok low fɛŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm, ke ir agŋ fɛŋ ɛm a.
Gbɛkↄ ɛy ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam ɛŋn in ecʼob ap ekʼit a, ob ap ab ɛm eci yecʼa eke Krist ↄnynʼn ɛrm mamn ↄŋʼn a.
Kin yecʼeke Nyam Lɛl dad:
Eke lʼuyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a,
lʼot sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ab nʼim;
ɛtŋ li cɛc agŋ sob ap.
Kↄ
a, in ecʼiri tasi a el bogŋ ecʼee? Ow am yɛgm eke lʼikŋ anym lʼus es nʼim esr ɛm a, ekʼel wus af aŋa a.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ekʼus es a, in cɛ lʼel ɛgŋ a ekʼuyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a, yecʼɛtŋ ke li fáf es lʼeb wus na nimum.
In anake li cɛc ob ap ekʼit a nʼↄŋ agŋ, ke ow ↄŋ agŋ bɛb el Krist ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl, bɛb el kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl, bɛb el Amani Mamn a ecʼes ↄmun ɛsɛl, bɛb el pastɛrɛl oglog low yɛgm ɛsɛl a.
Li cɛc agŋ amua sob ap amua, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl ↄ́ŋ agŋ lala a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa úw juma e ki kok, ke ↄ́ŋ Krist e sos megl a imn anym ecʼab any.
Nɛnɛ anake ɛy fɛŋ si bʼow sʼↄny ↄmn lele Nyam ecʼIy a ecʼany uw nyam coco ab a. Ɛtŋ si bʼow sʼel agŋ ekʼↄny ↄmn ekʼusu ɛtŋ si bʼow sʼagb sʼanŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Krist anŋn ab af.

Sica si kʼow sʼelm ey abu ɛm ij. Si kʼow sʼanm ɛsɛ mijɛtŋ gↄŋni eke okij e mra am ↄny wↄwl usu fɛŋ eke lʼerur ab af ij. Ɛtŋ si kʼow si yɛbm sow tutr yadŋ eci lɛf a ɛlulm ɛy, ocm ɛcm ɛy usu fɛŋ ij. Agŋ kʼow ↄtum irmnm ɛy ɛl eci mɛju ab ɛm ij.
Ɛtŋ eke si bi dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam erur ɛm, si bʼow sʼagb fɛŋ ɛm sʼimn Krist ekʼel nuŋ a ogŋ.

In ɛm anake sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ bʼinym es kikri, ke bʼokr af a. Sos ŋgigŋnel usu nↄnↄ bʼↄŋ sos megl a nimum ókr af, ɛtŋ eke sos ogog nyam nyam fɛŋ bi kok in e juma ekʼit a, sos megl a nimum bʼagb ɛtŋ bʼↄny lɛc erur ɛm.
Kin low yecʼa eke mʼam dad, ke nɛny am atʼm es mi dad Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm a: ow itm eke kʼaan es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke bʼus ɛl e sow tutr eke low kaka anm ɛm a jam a.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a anŋ ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn a eke Nyam bʼↄŋ agŋ a, -nʼↄnym ɛl eci kaka anm ɛm, aŋke -lʼuwm ow e low kaka any ɛtŋ -nʼↄny ɛrm tuↄtuↄ yɛji.
-Lʼirmn agŋ ɛm ecʼɛb ir a e mɛwl a fɛŋ, -lʼocr ɛl sosi -lʼɛlu es an keskes ɛm ɛtŋ -nʼam kok sikpl owi fɛŋ eke bʼaw ɛl a.
Ɔny, ow elm nɛnɛ wewrmn Krist eci any uw a!
Ɔny, nawrɛ tasi ɛm irir in e lís e low fɛŋ ɛtŋ wɛl yɛgm ↄny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ekʼanŋ Jesu ɛm a.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ìgŋn ↄny ecʼɛb ir sig a ɛlul es. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, eel agŋ eke mɛju ecʼów aw iy ɛm ke am ŋuŋn. Ow sosiɛm, elel a eke anŋnin lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ow it eke kʼigŋn ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
ke yɛ́br wɛl itŋn ↄny nimum ↄny ecʼɛrm ɛm lel tutr ɛm ab,
ke ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr eke wɛl bi sus af, éel agŋ owr. Ɛgŋ owr ikŋ na wɛl kokʼr ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af.
Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam bʼↄŋʼn lʼel nyim nyim lele lala ab.
Na sosiɛm, ìgŋn yadŋ ↄny ɛlul es, ke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ fɛŋ dád lawl low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, aŋke ɛy fɛŋ sʼel sos megl nyam ecʼagŋ.
Eke batŋ ɛrm am ebl ↄny, kì kokr sikpl; kì yɛbr toŋ lɛgŋ es ew kʼɛ́ŋan ↄny ecʼɛrm bebl a.
Kʼɛ̀gbr agn usu kaka fɛŋ es ↄny ɛm.
Ke ɛgŋ eke bʼiy mil a, ɛ́lu mil iy ab es; ke kók juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm in obi e sabu ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke nʼɛ́ŋn ob lʼɛlum es abur ɛsɛl abu.
Odad ŋuŋ kaka kʼánŋ ↄny nɛnym kʼɛy ↄkm; kↄ dàdr low akpal e sodad eke bʼɛlum low abu, ke bʼatr ↄny lawlɛl sos es ↄ́ŋ ɛl lɛc a, yecʼɛtŋ ke sodad eke bʼow dadr a él low mamn agŋ eke bʼow iri a eci.
Kʼↄ̀war Nyam ecʼAbŋ Lala a ekʼↄŋ ↄny a sos es,
aŋke in anake Nyam ocʼr ↄŋ ↄny ɛsɛ mɛny ɛwr af a. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na bʼↄŋ ↄny ↄ́nyn ↄmn eke lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam bʼow sↄg ↄny nimum ↄny e sikpl ab ɛm.
Low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ekʼɛgŋ kok ↄny a, kʼèbr kʼɛwr es ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm. Kʼùcur lokm es, kʼèbal ɛrm; ke likekr owi, wɛwr owi lel ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab óc es ↄny ecʼaraŋn.
Ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ákpl lawl eci, ke sↄrŋ ikŋ íy ↄny ɛrm ɛm gbↄŋ. Ke áparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ap ↄny low Jesu Krist sosiɛm ab af.
Sica eke eel ey eke Nyam bʼerur a, àtar sos es kokr ɛsɛ in af.
Ke ↄny ecʼɛb ir a él erur ɛm, ót Krist ecʼerur ekʼↄny ɛy eci ke oc in e sel irmn ɛy sosiɛm, ɛsɛ ob ap lel egb waw ab ekʼow eci sↄsŋ mamn a
akpl Nyam sos ɛm ab af.
Ɔny eel Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a, ow sosiɛm ↄny ogŋ a, ów anŋ ekʼitm eke kʼanŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn, ɛsɛ: yↄw kaka fɛŋ ab ecʼɛrum ab, low fɛŋ ekʼáyalm ɛgŋ eci kok, érur eke ŋ sↄny cɛ kʼↄny ob fɛŋ.
Ow akplm yɛjʼeke kí dadr ɛ́s odad, nyamb odad lele sodad eŋuŋ ab. Kↄ ow tasi eke ki kokr a el ke dádr odad ɛlul Nyam bia.

Kin yecʼekʼit eke kʼuwr any: agŋ a eke bʼɛrum yↄw kaka fɛŋ ab oglog bi kok low fɛŋ ekʼayalm ɛgŋ a, kʼow ɛŋnm aja kakali Nyam lele Krist ab eci gbreŋgbi usu yogŋ. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam ow bʼow el agŋ a eke bʼerur eke kʼↄny ob fɛŋ ɛl sↄny cɛ ecʼa, aŋke érur eke kʼↄny ob fɛŋ ŋ sↄny cɛ a, anŋ ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ af.
Ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼírmnm ↄny mɛju e sodad ebl ↄfr ↄfr ɛm. Ów amua sosiɛm anake Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a bʼow ok agŋ a ekʼɛ́gŋm eke kʼɛlumʼn ab af a.
Kì kokr ɛsɛ ɛl ecʼab af!
Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm a, anŋn ncebn ɛm, kↄ jam aŋa ekʼokar af Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab a, anŋn usuayl ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, àan es ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼel usuayl ecʼey af gↄŋ,
aŋke usuayl bʼↄsu ey ekʼel ów amamn kok, ów nyim nyim lel nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ecʼów ab.
Àtar sos es uwr low eke bʼakpl Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sos ɛm ab any.
Ów a ekʼel ncebn ecʼa ↄ́sum ey amamn kaka. Ow sosiɛm kʼànŋn ow e low ɛm, kↄ kòkr ɛl ecʼów a ók ↄkm.
Tasi ɛm a, ów a ekʼagŋ amua bi kok es lↄl ɛm a eci dad bʼↄny ɛ́s.
Gbɛkↄ low yecʼeke wɛl ɛlu ↄkm a, sos bʼɛru es usuayl ɛm tasi;
ɛtŋ sica low yecʼa ekʼanŋ usuayl ɛm a, bʼɛwl el usuayl. Na sosiɛm anake wɛl dad ninɛ:
«Ŋ ekʼam ɛru mɛmn a, ùfŋm es.
Ànŋ agŋ ekʼuw a ecʼaraŋn igb,
ke Krist ɛ́jn in ecʼusuayl a okʼŋ af.»
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ↄny ecʼes an ab ɛm. Kʼìir ɛb nyamb ɛm, kↄ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛsɛwru
eke bʼuw any kok low wanci fɛŋ ɛm eke Nyam bʼↄŋ ɛl ab af, aŋke sɛgŋ a eke sʼanŋ ɛm a akplm.
Na sosiɛm kʼèel anyambu, kↄ òkr nuŋ ɛm es sɛnyn sɛnyn irir yecʼekʼel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼerur a.
Kʼɛ̀gŋn mar kʼↄny ↄny: mar ɛgŋ nↄnↄ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ; kↄ yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala iy ↄny ɛm gbↄŋ.
Ɔny ↄfr ɛm a, àtarir sos es selu ebl ɛm, Nyam ɛj ɛm lel ɛj ekʼAbŋ bʼↄŋ ↄny ab ab ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn kↄklm ecʼɛj ↄny ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci.
Ɔ̀ŋn ↄny Ɛs Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ low fɛŋ eci, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm.
Ɔ̀nyn es is ↄny ↄfr ɛm Krist ecʼɛlum ekʼↄnyn a sosiɛm.
Egŋ ɛyɛl, ↄnyn es is ↄny ɛcɛl eci ɛsɛ elel ekʼↄnyn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼab af,
aŋke igŋ el in e yↄw a ecʼes ɛw, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist el Nyamel ecʼes ɛw ab af. Krist in obi el Nyamel ekʼel in e sos megl a eci sↄg ɛs.
Na sosiɛm ow it eke egŋ ɛyɛl kʼↄny es is low fɛŋ ɛm ɛl ɛcɛl eci, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyamel bʼↄny es is Krist ecʼab af.
Ɔyↄw ɛcɛl, èrurir ↄny ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Krist erur Nyamel toŋ ke lʼoc in e sel a lʼirmn ow ecʼab af.
Lʼerur eke ɛbɛn a, li kʼↄŋ Nyamel el ob ekʼit eke kʼel Nyam eci, eke lʼayal ow mij ɛm lel odad ebl ɛm ab a,
aŋke lʼerur eke li kʼɛlu Nyamel ↄkm in obi in obi ecʼany af, ow e sakpl a fɛŋ ɛm, ow él ob lala ekʼob kaka itam ɛm, ɛwm duↄduↄ ke ↄnym abr ɛnym kaka fɛŋ.
Nɛnɛ anake ow it ekʼↄyↄw ɛcɛl kʼerur ɛl ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke -li bʼerur ɛl obi e sos megl ab af a. Ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼerur in e yↄw a, bʼerur in obi in obi.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ífnm in obi e sos megl a, kↄ ob ij li bʼↄŋ ow, li kok ow e lís e low fɛŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛj ɛm, ɛsʼelel eke Krist bi kok Nyamel ecʼab af,
aŋke ow el in e sos megl ekʼɛy fɛŋ sʼanŋ ɛm.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, wɛl bʼawl eke:
Low na eke lↄl es a agb nↄnↄ ɛtŋ ɛm, mʼam dad ↄny ekʼow el Krist lele Nyamel ab e low.
Gbɛkↄ ow el low ekʼↄny yɛji ↄn ↄny es: ke yↄw ɛc fɛŋ érur in e yↄw ɛsɛ in obi af, ke igŋ ɛy fɛŋ yɛji ɛ́lum in ecʼigŋ a.
Ey, ɛ̀lumn ↄny ecʼagŋ ekʼew ↄny a ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur ab af; na ↄny e low eke ki kokr.
anake el ol ab ɛm e krɛkrɛ eke Nyam ↄŋ agŋ ke low ɛwar anŋ af a.
Ɛtŋ kin low ɛwar a:
Ey ɛsɛl, kʼↄ̀ŋn ↄny ecʼey a kʼↄny ɛrm bebl. Kↄ gbàgbal ɛl, yɛ̀gmn ɛl low ke ↄ́mn ɛl ów ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur ab af.
Madu, ɛ̀lumn ↄny e wus af aŋa ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a, muru ɛm, ɛlum ɛm lel ɛrm nyam ɛm ab ɛsɛ elel eke bʼɛlumn Krist ab af.
Ow elm eke -li bʼɛw ↄny nyamn af a cɛ, kí kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼaw ↄny, kↄ ɛ̀lumn ɛsɛ Krist eci madu eke bi kok ɛrm nyam ɛm juma fɛŋ eke Nyam bʼerur ab af.
Ɛɛ! Ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm ki kokr ↄny ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a eci juma, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci juma ↄny am kokr af, kↄ ke ow kʼélm ɛsɛ agŋ ecʼaf.
Sica yecʼeke kʼↄkan a el: ke él adu oglog lewi, low nimamn a eke kok a ecʼob ap a eke kʼɛbmʼŋ a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow ↄŋ.

Ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl ekʼↄnymn madu ab a, ↄnyn es an nɛny nyam a ↄny eci madu a e lís; ↄny kʼↄ̀ↄrir ɛl abr. Sica ↄkan ekʼↄny lel ↄny e madu ab ab, Es Ɛw Ɛs nyam cɛ ↄnyn, in eke nʼanŋ afr ke lʼíjm ŋgoprɛ low eke li bi kok nʼↄŋ in ecʼagŋ ab ɛm a.
Sica uwar ɛm ecʼeke mʼam dad a el, ke ébr lɛc Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ecʼaf okr ɛm, in ecʼabusu ligbɛl ab ɛm.
Ɛ̀wr Nyam ecʼar ogŋn e mob a fɛŋ eke ↄŋ ↄny a sos, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́tur akmn agn eci mɛju a fɛŋ es,

aŋke ow elm agŋ eke si bʼɛkn any af ab ab si kʼow sʼogŋm ar a, kↄ ow el mob fɛŋ ekʼↄny lɛc eŋuŋ ke ↄny es ɛw lel abusu ab a. Ɛy ecʼar ogŋ a bʼow el lɛc fɛŋ ekʼel ncebn ɛm ecʼab ab, lele abŋ eŋuŋ ekʼↄny abusu ke anŋ lɛf ɛm ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀wr Nyam ecʼar mob fɛŋ sos, yecʼɛtŋ ke wanci ŋuŋ fɛŋ af, ↄ́tur inymn es kikri ifnu ecʼany af, ke bʼogŋn ar a ba ow bʼuwr a, ke ɛmɛny ínymn es lɛc ab.
Kin elel eke ki bɛbmn sos ar ogŋ a eci: ke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ánŋ ɛsɛ ↄny eci meb er ɛm eke kʼɛgŋn af, ke es an nyim nyim él ↄny ecʼar mob sus ɛm eke kʼocr ɛwr ɛr af;
ke ↄny eci gbragbra kok ɛrm es ɛy ecʼAmani Mamn ↄb ɛm a, él ↄny eci cↄkrukpↄ eke kʼanŋ ↄny akr ɛm.
Ke ↄny ecʼↄmn a ánŋ ɛsɛ ↄny ecʼerkpo af, ɛ́lum ↄny abu irmnin agn low ŋuŋ ɛs eci sibin a, ekʼal bʼanŋ nɛny af ke bʼↄwl im igŋ ob ab es.
Òcr sel ɛŋn ánŋ ɛsɛ ↄny eci kpokpo tufɛ af, ke Nyam odad ánŋ ɛsɛ ↄny eci lab any yony ekʼAbŋ Lala ↄŋ ↄny af.
Ów amua fɛŋ ìbrmn Nyam, Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm. Ɛɛ, ŋↄŋan Nyam low fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm. Ke low na nuŋ af, any ók ↄny es ke ánŋn cɛcɛ kok ɛm. Ŋↄŋan Nyam in ecʼagŋ lala a fɛŋ yɛjʼeci;
ɛm yɛji ŋↄŋan Nyam ɛm eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam ɛ́luʼm in ecʼodad ebl a nɛnym, ke mʼↄ́ny lokm susu mi dad low a eke lↄl es Amani Mamn ab ɛm a.
Eke mʼanŋ sobel ɛm yɛji, mʼel Amani Mamn a eci lebl ɛlu ɛs. Ow sosiɛm ŋↄŋan Nyam ke mʼↄ́ny lokm susu mi dad ɛsʼelel ekʼow it ab af.
Mʼerur ekʼↄny yɛji kʼuwr ɛm e lís e low any, ke úwr low yecʼeke mʼam kok a yɛjʼany. Tisik
ekʼel ɛgŋ lisijim lel ɛgŋ lawl mamn ab, ke am kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma cɛcɛ ɛm a, bʼow ↄŋ ↄny amani a fɛŋ.
Mʼam ɛrmʼn lʼow cɛ eke li ki dad ↄny ɛy e lís e low, ke lʼátr ↄny sos es.
Ke Nyam lel ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ↄ́ŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ɛrm es ɛy, erur lel ↄmn ab!
Ke Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼerur ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ab, erur a ekʼↄnym itŋn ab ɛm.
Philippians: Pↄl lele Timote ab, ekʼel Jesu Krist ecʼↄbↄwi a, e lɛl ekʼam awŋ Filip baŋn e Nyam ecʼagŋ ekʼanŋ Jesu Krist ab, Nyamel ecʼidr ɛsɛl lele diakrɛl ab.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy.
Mi bʼↄŋ Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ eke mi bʼↄkn ↄny e low a.
Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ e Nyam eke mi bi ŋↄŋn mʼↄŋ ↄny a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛm mi bi ŋↄŋn,
Amani Mamn a ecʼelel ekʼɛlumnʼm abu mi mↄmun es lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ toŋ igŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a sosiɛm eci.
Mʼuw any tasi eke Nyam ekʼↄb nuŋ am kok juma mamn na ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm a, bʼow ucu ↄny es toŋ ígŋ nuŋ, toŋ ow ók lɛgŋ eke Jesu Krist bʼow ow a.

Mʼↄny low ij, eke mʼↄny tutr nɛnɛ ↄny fɛŋ e lís. Mʼoc ↄny ɛm ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ke ow el ŋgbraka ɛm eke mʼanŋ, ke ow el lɛgŋ a eke mʼↄny abusu eke mi ki dogŋn, ke mʼↄmun Amani Mamn ab es a yɛji, ↄny a fɛŋ ɛŋan Nyam eci bibm a ɛsɛ ɛm af.
Ɛtŋ Nyam ij ɛm e daŋku eke ↄny fɛŋ mʼerur ↄny tasi, ɛsʼelel eke Jesu Krist ↄny erur ligbɛl ↄny ecʼab af.
Ɛtŋ ow eke mʼam ibrm ɛm e ŋↄŋn ɛm a el: ke erur na ekʼↄnyn a ágb afŋn es, ke ow ↄ́ŋ ↄnyn low any uw lele nuŋ ɛm ↄny ab,
yecʼɛtŋ ke úwr ów tasi eke el nawrɛ ab any. Ow bʼow ↄŋ ayal, abr ɛnym kʼánm ↄny lís, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu Krist bʼow ow a,
ɛtŋ ów amamn eci ey eke wɛl bʼɛŋn Jesu Krist ɛm a, bʼow ok ↄkm ↄny ɛm; ke ow él Nyam ecʼanygbɛl lele kↄklm ab.
Sica lisijimɛl, mʼerur eke kʼuwr any eke es abur na ekʼɛŋnʼm a, tasi ɛm a, ↄŋ Amani Mamn a imn anym eci,
aŋke sica agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ es ɛw ɛs a e gbugŋ a lele susu ɛjecʼab a uw any eke Krist sosiɛm mʼanŋ ŋgbraka ɛm.
Ɛtŋ agŋ lisijimɛl nↄnↄ ecʼↄmn ekʼↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm a obn, ŋgbraka na ɛm eke mʼanŋ a; ow ↄŋ erŋn ↄnym ɛl ɛtŋ lokm susu ɛm -nʼam dad Nyam ecʼodad.
Nawrɛ tasi ekʼɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam, ɛm sosiɛm, bʼↄb Krist ecʼAmani a ŋkre ɛm, ów es atar ɛm, ɛbɛn yɛji, likpr bʼↄb Krist ecʼAmani a erur ɛm tasi.
Ɛl akpasu a, -li bʼↄb Krist ecʼAmani a erur ɛm, aŋke -lʼuw any eke ɛm eci sobel ɛm aŋa eke mʼanŋ a, el Amani Mamn a e dogŋn eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke bʼↄb Krist ecʼamani a sow tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ɛm eci ŋkre ogŋ ɛm a, ɛl e tutr a el, ke -lʼobn ɛm e gbre ij a sobel ɛm aŋa eke mʼanŋ a.
Yɛji ↄfr ↄfr! Ekʼɛl eci sow tutr a el eŋuŋ oglog amamn yɛji, ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a el: Krist ecʼamani a ecʼa, wɛl am ↄb ɛtŋ ow bʼow iŋnʼm sos ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ,
aŋke mʼuw any eke ↄny e Nyam ŋↄŋn lele Jesu Krist ecʼAbŋ Lala ecʼabu ɛlum ab ab, bʼow el ɛm eci sↄg.

Sica ɛsɛ elel eke mʼam eku ke mʼam ↄmn tasi a, mi kʼɛknm low yecʼeke kʼↄnyʼm ɛ́s. Kↄ ke ow el sicaca oglog ke ow el sɛgŋ fɛŋ, mʼↄny ↄmn tasi ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼɛlu Krist eci sagb a ↄkm ɛm ecʼɛgŋ el fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm ecʼowr anŋ ɛm oglog ɛm e luw ɛm bↄbↄ yɛji.
Ɛm ecʼa, tasi ɛm a Krist anake el ɛm e sel a, ɛtŋ luw el ɛm eci ŋgrusiɛ.
Gbɛkↄ ekʼow it eke mi kʼanŋ owr ke mi kok juma mamn, ke mi kʼúwm low yecʼeke mi ki sↄsum mʼoc ab any.
Mʼanŋ sow tutr yony ecʼaraŋn: mʼam erur eke mi kʼuw ke mʼím mʼanŋ Krist ab, na anake akpl afŋn es a.
Gbɛkↄ ow it ke mʼánŋ owr sos megl ɛm ↄny e nimamn eci.
Ca mʼuw any tasi ŋ̂! Mʼow mʼanŋ owr, mi bʼow mʼir ↄny fɛŋ ab yecʼɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ↄny abu iman anym eci, ke ↄ́nyn sos ɛm iŋn ↄmn ɛm.
Ke lɛgŋ eke ɛmɛny mi bʼɛwl mʼow mʼɛŋn ↄny a, ↄny e sos ɛm iŋn a eke ↄnyn Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm a, ágb nↄnↄ.

Gbɛkↄ ow e tasi a cɛ el: ke áan es nyim nyim Krist ecʼAmani Mamn ab af, yecʼɛtŋ ke, eke mʼow mʼɛkn ↄny ɛtŋ mʼowm yɛji, mʼíri ekʼinymn es kikri ɛtŋ okar af ow tutr nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ am dogŋnin low abŋ nyam ɛm, ↄmn ekʼAmani Mamn ↄŋ ↄny a eci.
Kì yɛbr ↄny ecʼefnu a akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm kʼↄ́ŋ erŋn kʼↄny ↄny; low na bʼow yɛgm ɛl eke -lʼirm ŋ̂, ke ↄny ecʼa, ow yɛgm ↄny ekʼanŋn ↄny e sↄg ecʼebr af; ɛtŋ ow el low ekʼanŋ Nyam ogŋ ow,
aŋke Nyam ↄŋ ↄny bibm eke kʼubr Krist nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ kↄ ke ɛmɛny íjr in e gbre yɛji.
Sicaca ɛm a, ↄny lel ɛm ab anake sʼokr af sʼam dogŋn low a. Low dogŋn nyam a cɛ eke lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm
mi dogŋn, ke ɛmɛny mʼam dogŋn ɛsɛ elel ekʼuwr any ab af a.
Ɔny ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn Krist ɛm a bʼↄŋ ↄny lɛc ee? In ecʼerur a bʼatr ↄny sos es ee? Bʼokar af in ecʼAbŋ Lala ab ab ee? Bʼↄnyn sↄrŋ ikŋ lel ɛrm mamn ab ↄny ↄfr ɛm ee?
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke mʼam ibrm eke kʼↄŋnʼm sos ɛm iŋn tasi ↄny e nɛny af okr ɛm, ke ↄ́nyn erur nyam, ke ókar af ɛrm ɛm lel ow tutr ɛm ab.
Kì kokr low kaka ɛm bubr ecʼabŋ ɛm oglog eke agŋ kʼɛkn ↄny eci, kↄ es is ɛm, òcr ↄny lawlɛl ɛsɛ agŋ eke igbl ogŋ akm ↄny af.
Ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄ́lm in sↄny coco e nimamn es, kↄ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ↄ́l lawlɛl yɛjʼecʼa es.
Ɔny ↄfr ɛm a, ↄnyn es an ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ eke bʼuw Krist any a bi kok ab af.
In, nʼanŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam anŋn ab af,
aŋke godʼɛtŋ lʼel Nyam.
Gbɛkↄ lʼɛgŋm lʼatm bɛbmn ikŋ na e low any.
Kↄ in obi ɛm, li wal low fɛŋ eke nʼↄny a lʼɛlu es,
lʼocr in sosi libↄwi,
lʼel ɛgŋ ↄfr ↄfrli agŋ ecʼaraŋn,
ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ɛknʼn ɛsɛ ɛgŋ cɛ af.
Lʼɛgŋ in obi ɛm lʼeb eke li kʼir ɛb es is ɛm,
ɛtŋ lʼɛlum Nyam toŋ lʼigŋ luw ɛm, olikŋ af
e luw ɛm bↄbↄ yɛji.
Es is na sosiɛm, Nyam ↄny igblʼl ogŋ,
ɛwʼr low fɛŋ e nuŋ af
ɛtŋ ↄŋʼn nin ekʼagb akm nin fɛŋ.
Ow bʼow ↄŋ ob ob fɛŋ eke anŋ afr,
wus af aŋa lele ↄŋnes ab a,
ok ↄwrↄkp wus eke -li bʼiri Jesu e nin a.
Ke nɛny nɛny fɛŋ kↄ́klm eke Jesu Krist el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ,
Ɛs Nyam ecʼanygbɛl eci.

Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lawlɛl, ɛsɛ elel eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ bʼɛlumn Nyam ab af, ùcur ↄnyn es ɛbɛn ke kókr juma ↄny e sel a eke ɛŋan a eci, muru ɛm lel ɛlum ɛm ab, ke ow kʼélm ɛm ecʼany af cɛ, kↄ ɛm e jam jam yɛji,
aŋke Nyam in obi li bʼↄŋ ↄny low ɛgŋ eb lele ow e kok ab ecʼabusu ɛsɛ elel eke li bɛbm ab af.
Low fɛŋ eke bʼow kokr a, kʼélm abr ɛny ɛm lele ów es kpakpab ɛm ab,
yecʼɛtŋ ke éel agŋ eke abr ɛnym anm lís ke ayl, Nyam ecʼey eke ↄnym wɛwr, ke ir agŋ eke ↄny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony lele ów eŋuŋ ab ecʼaraŋn. Ow it ke ám jɛjan ɛl ecʼaraŋn ɛsɛ mrabri af,
aŋke ↄnymn sel ɛŋn ecʼodad ab ab. Eke bi kokr ɛbɛn, mʼbʼow mʼↄny sos ɛm iŋn ↄny eci, lɛgŋ eke Krist bʼow ow a, aŋke ow bʼow yɛgmʼm eke ow elm ↄfr ↄfr mʼurum es, mʼijm gbre mi kokm juma.
Ow kʼↄdm ke ɛm e mebl a ók es, él egb waw eke wɛl kok am igŋ ↄny ecʼↄmn eke ↄnyn Nyam ɛm ab af. Eke ow el ɛbɛn ow kʼɛcr a, sos ɛm am iŋnʼm ɛtŋ mʼam cɛc sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ↄny fɛŋ ab.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ↄny yɛji ow it eke sos ɛm kʼiŋn ↄny ke cɛ́cr sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɛm ab.
Mʼam ↄny tutr eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm, lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm mi kʼↄŋ Timote ow ɛkn ↄny, yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼíri ↄny e lís e low, ke ow átrʼm sos es ɛm obi ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, Timote cɛ anake el ɛgŋ eke ɛsɛ ɛm af, ↄny e low bʼokr ɛrmij, ke bi tutr ↄny e low tasi a.
Agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ecʼa, ɛl obi e lís ecʼów ecʼɛrmij cɛ -li bʼebr, kↄ ow elm Jesu Krist ecʼów a gbɛ.
Timote ecʼa, uwr any yɛjʼeke lʼɛlu in e nawrɛ ij a ↄkm, elel eke li kokr juma ɛm ab ɛsɛ iy lele ɛs ab af, Amani Mamn sosiɛm ecʼa.
In anake mʼam tutr eke mi kʼɛrmʼn lʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ kpɛkŋ eke ɛm e lís owi a bʼow aylʼm sos ɛm a;
ɛtŋ mʼↄny ↄmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm, eke lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm, mi bʼow mʼow mʼɛkn ↄny ɛm obi yɛji.
Gbɛkↄ mi tutr yɛjʼeke ow akpl e mi kʼↄŋ ɛy lisijim Epafrodit
eke el ɛm lawl juma kok ɛm lele low dogŋn ɛm ab a, ów ɛkn ↄny, in eke ɛrmn in lʼow lʼisʼm abu ɛlum a eke mʼam eku a.
Nʼam erur tasi eke ɛmɛny li kʼɛkn ↄny fɛŋ ɛtŋ nʼam ↄny ɛrmij yɛji, aŋke irir in ecʼↄl a e low.
Nawrɛ, ↄl ↄnyʼn tasi toŋ ow anŋ tɛl cɛ ke blel lʼúw, kↄ Nyam ikŋʼn sↄrŋ; ɛtŋ ow elm in sosiɛm sʼↄny cɛ, kↄ ɛm sosiɛm yɛjʼeci, yecʼɛtŋ ke sos kʼↄ́wm im es ɛmɛny obnm na eke ↄwʼm es a.
Ow sosiɛm a, mʼam ogŋ es eke mi kʼↄŋʼn lʼow nʼɛŋn ↄny, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny bʼɛkan in a, ow ↄ́ŋ ↄny sos ɛm iŋn, ke ɛm eci sos es ↄw a óc es.
Ow akpl eke kʼebr ir sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛm. Ow it ke ↄ́nyn agŋ akpasu nɛnɛ a eci sos usr,
aŋke Krist e juma sosiɛm anake blel lʼúw a. Ɛtŋ blel lʼírmn in ecʼowr anŋ a, abu ɛlum a eke ↄtumn eke ↄny obi kʼocr isrʼm, ke in lʼoc lʼisʼm ab ɛm.
Sica ɛm lisijimɛl, sos ɛm iŋn ↄny eke okar af Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab a. Ɛtŋ ow ɛymʼm sos ɛm eke mʼam ebr low yecʼa eke mʼikŋ anym mʼawŋ ↄny ow e lɛl ab ɛm; ↄny ecʼa ow akpl ɛbɛn.
Ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm juma eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl amua, mↄwr amua,
eke am ucu yadŋ ɛm e likr es ubr owi ↄny es a e lís!

Agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr el tasi a, ow ow el ɛy, aŋke ɛy si bʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ in ecʼAbŋ a ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm, si bʼɛlu ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ↄkm Jesu Krist sosiɛm ɛtŋ sʼocm ɛy ecʼↄmn a sʼɛlum ów amua eke el agŋ ɛm ecʼów ab ɛm.
Ke mʼↄtu cɛ eke ɛm yɛji, mʼóc ɛm ecʼↄmn a mʼɛlu ów amua e kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam ↄny tutr eke ów amua e kok bʼism ɛgŋ bibm ab, ke ɛm tasi anake mʼↄtu eke mi kʼↄny tutr akpasu na a.

Ɛm, wɛl ubrʼm likr es eke wɛl ewʼm bake ow ij sɛgŋ niwn a. Ɛm, Israɛl iyli tasi mew ɛm ɛtŋ, Bɛnjamɛ ecʼeb ɛm ecʼɛgŋ, Ebre e liy mebl ɛm ɛtŋ. Yecʼeke el Jwifɛl ecʼol ecʼɛlum ecʼa, ke ɛm Farisiɛl ecʼogog mʼanŋ;
ɛtŋ ɛm ecʼol ecʼɛlum ligbɛl eke mʼↄny a, ↄŋʼm mʼijr agŋ ekʼel Krist ecʼa gbre.
Sica yecʼeke el ol e jɛj ok nɛny nyam ɛm a, mʼↄnym abr ɛnym kaka.
Gbɛkↄ, ów amua fɛŋ eke mi lɛr ɛsɛ ob ↄny tasi af a, Krist sosiɛm a, sica mʼam lɛr ɛl ɛsɛ ów ↄfr ↄfr ekʼↄnym any af.

Jesu Krist ɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼany eke mi kʼuw a, anake el low tasi eke ↄny any a. Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke wɛl bʼɛŋn a, elm low kaka Krist ecʼany uw a ecʼany af. Krist sosiɛm, mʼigŋ fɛŋ mʼɛlu es. Mʼↄ́ny Krist anŋ ɛm ab, ke mʼókr af in ab a sosiɛm, mʼam lɛr ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af e suw af. Ow elm ol e mʼam ɛlum a sosiɛm mʼelm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, kↄ ↄmn eke mʼↄny Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Nyam anake bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke bʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm a, li bʼↄŋ ow ow el nɛny nyam ɛs.

Jesu Krist ɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼany eke mi kʼuw a, anake el low tasi eke ↄny any a. Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke wɛl bʼɛŋn a, elm low kaka Krist ecʼany uw a ecʼany af. Krist sosiɛm, mʼigŋ fɛŋ mʼɛlu es. Mʼↄ́ny Krist anŋ ɛm ab, ke mʼókr af in ab a sosiɛm, mʼam lɛr ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af e suw af. Ow elm ol e mʼam ɛlum a sosiɛm mʼelm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, kↄ ↄmn eke mʼↄny Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Nyam anake bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke bʼↄny ↄmn in ɛm a, li bʼↄŋ ow ow el nɛny nyam ɛs.
Low a cɛ eke mʼam erur a el: ke mʼúw Krist any, ke mʼúw abusu a yɛji ekʼↄŋʼn lʼigb luw ɛm ab any. Ɛtŋ ow eke ɛmɛny mʼam erur a el: ke mʼíj gbre in ab, ke mʼúw ɛsɛ in ecʼab af.
Ɛbɛn eke mʼam ↄny ↄmn eke batŋ mʼuw, ke ɛm yɛji mʼánŋ agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm mʼigb ana.
Mi dadm mʼɛsmɛ mʼɛŋn ow e mʼam ↄl ab ŋ̂, oglog ke mi kok ow iy nɛny ŋ̂! Gbɛkↄ mʼam uru es
mʼim cɛ eke mi kʼɛŋn es uru a eci labm sↄg a, aŋke Jesu Krist jɛj ↄnyʼm lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ.
Njaŋ, agŋ lisijimɛl, mi dadm eke mʼɛŋn labm sↄg a ŋ̂; gbɛkↄ low nyam cɛ mʼam kok: mʼíjl low sig fɛŋ es, ke mʼátr sos es mʼim mʼɛŋn ow a ekʼanŋʼm anym a.
Mʼam uru es mʼim eke mi kʼigŋ ow e nuŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼɛ́ŋn labm sↄg a eke Nyam, Jesu Krist ɛm, am ɛsŋ ɛy eke si kʼɛŋn afr a.
Ɛy fɛŋ eke sʼↄny ↄmn eke usu a, sʼↄ́nyn tutr nyam coco na. Ow e jam a, ekʼↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam am ↄny tutr ɛjeci, Nyam bʼow ayal ow e low ↄŋ ↄny.
Kↄ ca, aŋa eke sʼow bake sʼigŋ a, sʼébr ebr nyam a cɛ eke sʼeb toŋ ke sʼigŋ aŋa a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny fɛŋ kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af. Si yɛgm ↄny sɛwl; ow sosiɛm lɛ̀ɛr agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼan es sɛwl ikŋ na af a.
Mi dad ↄny sakp nↄnↄ yɛji ɛtŋ mʼam ebr ɛm mi dad ↄny ↄŋn ikŋ ɛm yɛfɛnyna yɛjʼeke: agŋ nↄnↄ anŋ eke ɛl ecʼes an a bi yɛgm eke -lʼel Krist ecʼolikŋ a ecʼefnu.
Ɛl akpasu na, irm cɛ -li bʼow -lʼirm, aŋke ɛl e Nyam el ɛl eci lok a,
ɛtŋ low eke kʼel ɛ́s ↄny ɛl a, bʼiŋn ɛl sos ɛm. Ɛl, wus ecʼów cɛ bʼanŋ ɛl nuŋ ɛm.
Ɛy ecʼa gbɛ, ɛy ecʼɛb ir usu anŋ afr, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke sʼam eku ɛsɛ ɛy e sↄg ɛs af, eke el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist a, bʼow anŋ afr yogŋ ow.
Ɛtŋ li bʼow lʼitŋn ɛy e sos megl a eke bʼugŋ es a, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ in ecʼanygbɛl e sos megl ab af, in ecʼabusu a eke ow ɛm li bʼↄŋ mob fɛŋ is es in ecʼes ɛw a ecʼany af a.
Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl, mʼam erur tasi eke ɛmɛny mi kʼɛkn ↄny, ↄny eke eel ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn lel ɛm ecʼany eb tufɛ
ab a; kin elel eke kʼinymn es kikri Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ↄny ecʼɛb ir ɛm.
Evodi lele Sɛntis ab, mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny, mʼok ↄny mʼɛrm sabu af, òkar af ↄny ecʼɛb ir ɛm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ŋ, ɛm lawl
tasi juma kok ɛm, mʼam dadʼŋ eke kʼɛlum ↄyↄw yony na abu, aŋke ɛm ab -li dogŋn Amani Mamn a ecʼↄb e low, Klema yɛji, lele ɛm e juma kok ɛm ecʼagŋ lawlɛl ɛjecʼa fɛŋ eke ɛl ecʼen anŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛl
ab ɛm a.
Sos ɛm íŋn ↄny sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke okar af Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab a. Mʼam dadr ɛm, sos ɛm íŋn ↄny!
Ɛ̀lul ↄny ecʼɛrm frↄrↄ ↄkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís, aŋke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼow a ibnm ij.
Kʼèbar low kaka ecʼɛrmij, kↄ low low fɛŋ ɛm, ìbrmn Nyam ↄny e ŋↄŋn ɛm, low yecʼa eke ↄnyn ow ecʼes abur a, ìbrmn in ɛrm eke bʼↄkn in e low ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Nyam ecʼɛrm es ɛy a eke agb akm nuŋ ɛm ↄny fɛŋ a, bʼow ↄsu ↄny e mɛrm a lele ↄny e sow tutr ab ab Jesu Krist ɛm.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yecʼekʼit eke kʼɛwr ɛrm af: low fɛŋ eke el nawrɛ ke it eke wɛl kʼɛlum, low fɛŋ eke el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam lele lala ab, low fɛŋ eke wɛl ↄtu eke wɛl kʼerur ke wɛl ɛ́gŋ eb, low nimamn fɛŋ lele low fɛŋ ekʼit eke wɛl kʼaw ab.
Kòkr yecʼa eke wewar ke ebr lele ow eke irir mi dad, ke ɛkanʼm mi kok ab ab. Ɛtŋ Nyam a eke bʼↄŋ agŋ ɛrm es ɛy a, bʼow anŋ ↄny ab.
Mʼɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm lel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ecʼɛb ir ab ɛm, aŋke ɛwal mɛny ↄnyn ɛm ecʼabu ɛlum ecʼerur. Abu ɛlum ecʼerur ikŋ na ↄnyn, kↄ abusu anake ↄtumn ↄnymn eke kʼɛlul il ↄkm a.
Ow elm es abur ɛm eke mʼanŋ a sosiɛm mi dadm nɛnɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm mʼuw any eke ow a cɛ eke mʼↄny a ↄdŋʼm ŋ̂.

Ɛm mʼuw gbre ɛm ecʼɛb ir any ɛtŋ mʼuw ehe ɛm ecʼɛb ir yɛjʼany. Mi wewr elel eke low fɛŋ ɛm lele susu fɛŋ ab, mi kʼɛgŋ elel eke mʼanŋn a mʼeb; ke mʼↄ́ny mʼij oglog ke mʼánŋ namn, ke mʼↄ́ny nↄnↄ oglog ke mʼↄ́ny tɛl.
Mʼↄtu eke mi kʼↄbr ses babur amua fɛŋ, Krist e lɛc a eke bʼↄŋʼm ab ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ, uwr kok eke ɛlumnʼm abu ɛm e gbre na ɛm a.
Ɔny Filip eyŋ, uwr any tasi eke lɛgŋ a eke mʼŋgboŋ Maseduan a, lakpo ab af eke wɛl ↄb nuŋ am ↄmun Amani Mamn ab es a, ↄny cɛ eel Nyamel eke ɛlum im abu, ↄŋʼm os mʼↄtu mi kok ɛm e lís e low a.
Ow a eke mʼanŋ Tesaloni baŋn a ɛtŋ, sakp nↄnↄ isrʼm abu ɛlum ekʼit a.
Ow elm ke mʼám ↄl ob eke wɛl kʼapʼm es; kↄ ow eke mʼam ↄl es a el, ke ɛ́ŋan ↄny eci ŋgrusiɛ.
Mʼɛŋn mob a fɛŋ ekʼit a; ow ɛny afŋn es yɛji. Mʼɛŋn mob a fɛŋ eke ↄŋn Epafrodit eke kʼoc isʼm a, ɛtŋ sica mʼↄny fɛŋ iyʼm nɛny. Ɔny ecʼabu ɛlum a anŋ ɛsɛ ob ap sŋↄsŋↄ af,
ɛsɛ egb waw eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb, ke akplʼl sos ɛm af.
Ɛm e Nyam a bʼow kok ↄny e lís e low fɛŋ, in e gbreŋgbi ij a ekʼɛy ↄkm Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
Anygbɛl él Nyam ɛy Ɛs eci, akpo akpo fɛŋ. Amɛn!
Ɛ̀sŋnin Jesu Krist ɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Nyam ecʼa. Agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ eke anŋ ɛm ab a yɛji am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Nyam ɛm ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ eke anŋ aŋa a, ab brobro agŋ a eke bi kok Sesar e juma a,
am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab!
Colossians: Pↄl, eke Nyam ecʼerur ɛm, el Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs lel ɛy lisijim Timote ab, am awŋ
Nyam ecʼagŋ ekʼir Kolↄs baŋn, ke el nɛny nyam ɛm ecʼɛy lisijimɛl eke okr af Krist ɛm a lɛl. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bʼɛlu Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼƐs bia eke si bi ŋↄŋnʼn ↄny ecʼa,
aŋke wɛl dad ɛy sʼiri ↄny ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn Jesu Krist ɛm lel ↄny ecʼerur ekʼↄnyn agŋ fɛŋ ekʼel Nyam ecʼagŋ a ecʼab ab e low.
Eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ecʼamani ekʼel Amani Mamn, ↄg es ow ↄny ogŋ a, ↄny, irir low yecʼa eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw ↄny es afr a; ɛtŋ ↄny ecʼↄmn lel ↄny ecʼerur ab ucu low eku ikŋ na ↄny es.
Amani Mamn a am eb es ɛtŋ am ↄsu ey wus nimum af, ɛsʼelel eke nʼam kokr ↄny ecʼaraŋn lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke ↄgr es irir Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a e low, ke uwr ob tasi eke lʼel ab any a.
Epafras ekʼel ɛy e juma kok ɛm e lawl eke sʼerur sɛnyn sɛnyn a anake yɛgm ↄny low ikŋ na a; nʼam usr ɛy usu li kok juma ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛs nimamn tasi af;
nʼↄŋ ɛy ↄny ecʼAbŋ Lala ecʼerur ekʼↄŋ ↄny a ecʼamani.

Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛji, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke sʼiri wɛl dad ɛy ↄny e lís e low a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam sʼↄŋ ↄny a. Sʼam ibrm Nyam eke li kʼↄŋ ↄny uwr in ecʼerur tasi ab any, nuŋ ɛm ↄny fɛŋ lel sɛwr fɛŋ ekʼin ecʼAbŋ a bʼↄŋ ↄny ab ɛm.
Ow bʼow ↄŋ ɛtŋ bʼow ↄnyn es an eke bʼusr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ sos ɛtŋ bʼow kokr sɛgŋ fɛŋ yecʼeke bʼakplʼl sos ɛm a. Bʼow kokr ów amamn fɛŋ ɛtŋ bʼow iman anym eci, ↄny eci Nyam ecʼany uw ab ɛm.
Sʼam ibrm Nyam eke kʼucu ↄny ↄny es low low fɛŋ ɛm in ecʼanygbɛl ecʼabusu ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ kʼↄ́tur inymn es kikri, ke ↄ́nyn ɛrm susu low eku ɛm.
Ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: in eke nʼↄŋ ↄny abusu eke kʼɛŋan ów a fɛŋ eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es afr ecʼusuayl ab ɛm, agŋ a ekʼel in ecʼa ecʼa.
Nʼↄny lʼoc ɛy es ncebn ecʼabusu ab ɛm ɛtŋ lʼoc lʼɛlu ɛy in ecʼIy e lʼerur a ecʼes ɛw ab ɛm.
Jim ɛm anake li sↄg ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm, ke lʼoc ɛy e sikpl a yɛji lʼap ɛy a.
Krist el Nyam eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e mɛny ɛwr.
Lʼel Liy krɛkrɛ ekʼanŋ mob mob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e ŋuŋ af,
aŋke in ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok ob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ afr lele wus af aŋa ab a:
mob e wɛl bʼɛkn lele yecʼeke wɛl ɛ́knm ab,
lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ, es ɛw fɛŋ lele abusu fɛŋ ab.
Nyam ɛcr in ɛm kok fɛŋ in eci.
Krist ikŋ anym anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ anŋ,
ɛtŋ in ɛm ob fɛŋ ↄtu inym es ɛl e susu a.
Krist eci sos megl el Nyamel
ɛtŋ in obi lʼel ow e nuŋ.
Krist el nuŋ ↄb, lʼel Liy krɛkrɛ eke wɛl ew,
ɛtŋ lʼel krɛkrɛ ecʼɛgŋ ekʼigb agŋ ekʼuw ab ɛm,
yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼél krɛkrɛ nʼanŋ mob fɛŋ e nuŋ af,
aŋke Nyam erur eke kʼir Jim ɛm nimum,
ɛtŋ lʼerur yɛjʼeke li kʼɛcr Jim ɛm
lʼokr wus nimum ecʼagŋ ɛm Jim eci.
Jim eci mebl a ekʼok es olikŋ af ab ɛm,
Nyam ɛw ɛrm es ɛy es wus af aŋa lel afr ab.
Ɔny Kolↄs eyŋ, ↄny yɛji lɛgŋ eke ɛc ab ɛm a, kpabr es Nyam e lís, eel in ecʼefnu ów eŋuŋ a eke bʼↄnyn ow e tutr ke bi kokr a sosiɛm eci.
Gbɛkↄ lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ↄny okr ↄny ɛm in ab, Jim e sos megl ɛm e luw a ekʼuw olikŋ af ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ówr in ecʼany af ɛsɛ agŋ lala, agŋ ekʼↄnym low ↄbr, ke abr ɛnym anm lís af.

Gbɛkↄ ow it eke kʼinymn es kikri ke íjr lɛc ↄmn ɛm. Ke kí kpabmn es Amani Mamn a e lís, aŋke lʼel low eke sʼam ↄmn. Ɔny, irir in e low, aŋke wɛl ↄb amani a ok agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ wus af aŋa a, ɛtŋ ɛm Pↄl, mʼel ow e juma kok ɛs.
Sica sos ɛm am iŋnʼm eke mʼam mʼij ↄny e gbre. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm obi ɛm a, ɛbɛn mʼanŋ ɛm mʼam mʼij Krist e gbre ekʼij in e sos megl a ekʼel Nyamel ecʼa.
Mʼel Nyamel e juma kok ɛs, aŋke ow el juma eke Nyam abulʼm eke mi ki kok ↄny eci: lʼabulʼm eke mi kʼↄb in ecʼamani a ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ab af.
Odad a eke el low eke lↄl es godʼɛtŋ sↄwↄrŋ ecʼany af, ke lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu ↄkm kpata yɛgm agŋ a eke el in ecʼa.

Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm ɛl -lʼuw low na eke lↄl es ab any, ke el ob ↄny lele low sↄbↄ ab, eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es agŋ fɛŋ ecʼa. Ɛtŋ kin low a eke lↄl es a: Krist anŋ ↄny ɛm ɛtŋ nʼↄŋ ↄny ↄnyn ↄmn eke ↄny yɛji bʼow ɛŋan Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a.
Ow sosiɛm, sʼam ↄb Krist ecʼamani sʼok ɛgŋ fɛŋ. Sʼam ɛwar ɛtŋ sʼam yɛgm ɛgŋ ɛgŋ low sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́y ↄkm Nyam ecʼany af ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any Krist ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm.
Na sosiɛm mʼam kok juma, ɛtŋ mʼam dogŋn low Krist e lɛc a ecʼabusu a ekʼanŋʼm ɛm ab ɛm.
Mʼerur eke kʼuwr gbre e mʼam ij ab any low na eke mʼam dogŋn ↄny ecʼab ɛm, ↄny lele Laodise ecʼagŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a lele agŋ ɛjecʼa fɛŋ ekʼuwm im any nyamn ɛm ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, mʼam erur eke -li kʼↄny ɛrm susu iy ɛl ɛrm ɛm gbↄŋ ke -lʼokr af erur ɛm, ke nuŋ ɛm ↄny íy ɛl ɛm gbↄŋ yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼↄtu -lʼuw Nyam e low eke lↄl es ab any. Low a eke lↄl es a el: Krist,
eke in ɛm ob ↄny ɛsɛ sɛwr af lele low any uw ab lↄl es a.
Mʼam dad ↄny low na yecʼɛtŋ ke kí yɛbmn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛjum ↄny sodad ebl amamn e dad ɛm.
Eke mʼanm ↄny ab sos megl ɛm yɛji, mʼanŋ ↄny ab ow tutr ɛm, ɛtŋ mʼↄny sos ɛm iŋn ekʼↄnyn ɛrm susu inymn es kikri usu nyam Krist ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn ab ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋn Jesu Krist ebr ɛsɛ ↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ af a, ìir ɛb af okr ɛm in ab.
Òkr min in ɛm, ùsr ↄny ecʼowr anŋ a in af. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìnymn es kikri ↄny ecʼↄmn ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl yɛgmn ↄny ab af, ke ɛ́lul Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ɛgŋ kaka ↄtum eke kʼↄny ↄgŋm ↄny meb agŋ e sow tutr yadŋ ab ɛm. Ow el yadŋ ↄny eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke bʼɛŋn lɛc agŋ ɛm ecʼow kok ɛm, wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ogŋ,
ke elm Krist ecʼa.
Nyam in nimum a, lʼir Krist e sos megl ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ↄny nimum a ɛŋan Krist ecʼowr anŋ e low fɛŋ, in eke lʼel es ɛw eke anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ lel abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e nuŋ af a.
Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm anake wɛl ubr ↄny likr es a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr ikŋ na elm ɛgŋ ecʼabu ɛm ecʼeke kok. Kↄ likr es ubr ekʼanŋ Krist ɛm ow, ke ↄny low a eke bʼitr ɛlu ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm a oc es.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ok ↄny mij nuŋ a, yogŋ ɛtŋ uwr Krist ab ɛtŋ anŋn luw ɛm igbr in ab, aŋke ubr Nyam ecʼabusu a ekʼigbm Krist luw ɛm a nawrɛ.
Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm,
ↄny eel agŋ ekʼuw abŋ ɛm ↄny e sikpl a nuŋ af
lele likr eke wɛl ubrm ↄny es,
ke eel Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ab ab sosiɛm.
Kↄ lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Nyam ↄŋ ↄny anŋn owr Krist ab
ɛtŋ lʼap ɛy, ɛy ecʼów ↄbr a fɛŋ.
Ɛy e labm e sʼↄny e lɛl a ekʼam ok ɛy ow af,
ke in ɛm e sol ekʼanŋ a am ↄb ɛy low a,
nʼↄny li tɛtŋ es.
Ɛtŋ ni ŋuŋn ow lʼↄb ow ecigbrↄ olikŋ af yogŋ.
Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ↄny es ɛw fɛŋ
lele abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e lɛc oc es ana;
ɛtŋ li kok wɛl sos keskes dedeku ɛm,
lʼot wɛl ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af,
Jim ecʼany eb ecʼagŋ ekʼam us jam ab ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki cak ↄny, ↄny ecʼob eke bʼijr oglog bʼɛgŋn ab ɛm, ses gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ecʼↄsu sosiɛm, awl owr e bʼɛli ɛy ↄkm ecʼes gbɛgbl lele nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ecʼↄsu owi ɛm ab.
Ów amua am yɛgm low tasi a eke bʼow ow a, kↄ ɛl -lʼelm low tasi a. Low tasi a el Krist.

Ɛgŋ kaka itm eke kʼɛdŋn ↄny any eb. Mʼam tutr agŋ a eke bʼis es ɛw ekekey afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼany af igŋ ɛl nuŋ a e low, -li bʼucu mɛmn ɛm ecʼów eke -li bʼɛkn a e low -nʼↄny es. -Lʼel agŋ ekʼɛl e sow tutr a el agŋ ɛm e sow tutr tasi, ow bʼↄŋ ɛl -lʼɛfu es,

ɛtŋ -lʼakŋamn Krist ab. Ke Krist anake el sos megl e nuŋ a, in ɛm sos megl nimum bʼɛŋn in ecʼob ij. In ɛm sos ŋgigŋnel a lele mifn ab bʼokr af inym es kikri, ɛtŋ sos megl ikŋ na bʼagb ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam bʼerur ab af.
Sica ↄny uwr Krist ab, ɛtŋ wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc
elm low kaka ↄny eci. Ɛtŋ bla sosiɛm ↄny am íir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛmɛny wus ecʼagŋ cɛ ↄny eel af ee? Bla sosiɛm am ɛgŋn ebr ekʼɛmɛny wɛl kʼↄŋ ↄny sol akpasu amua ɛsɛ:
kʼòc ob na, kʼìj ob na, kʼìtŋn ob na abu ee?
Eke wɛl bʼↄb nuŋ am kok ɛl e low a, ów amua bʼirm. Ow el sol lele low yɛgm ab eke agŋ ɛl obi eci nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛm ↄkn.
Tasi ɛm a, ígŋ ob nuŋ, ís es ɛw likekli afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼany af, íjr ŋ e sos megl gbre, wɛl bʼɛkn ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ sɛwr ecʼów af. Gbɛkↄ -lʼel ów ↄfr ↄfr, sos megl owi cɛ ow bʼɛlum abu.
Sica Krist ab anake anŋn luw ɛm igbr a. Ow sosiɛm a, ↄↄl afr ecʼów es, yogŋ a eke Krist anŋ, ke ow el Nyam e lidr abu af a.
Ow akpl eke kʼebar afr ecʼów ecʼɛrmij, ow a eke kʼebar wus af aŋa ecʼa ecʼɛrmij a.
Tasi, ↄny ɛcar luw ɛm, ɛtŋ ↄny ecʼowr anŋ a lↄl es Krist eke anŋ Nyam ogŋ ab ɛm.
Krist anake el ↄny ecʼowr anŋ tasi a, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ eke li bʼow lʼɛy ↄkm a, ↄny yɛji bʼow okr ↄkm in ab ɛtŋ in ecʼanygbɛl a, ↄny yɛji bʼow ɛŋan.
Na sosiɛm a, ìbir ↄny ɛm low fɛŋ ekʼel wus ecʼów ɛsɛ: nfaci ij af, sikpl owi af, ów aw eke ɛw fɛfɛdi lele ów aw eŋuŋ ab lele lokm suŋ ekʼin ɛw ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ ab af.
Ɛtŋ ów ↄbr ↄbr amua na sosiɛm anake Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a, [bʼow ok agŋ a ekʼɛgŋm eke kʼↄny in ecʼɛlum ab af a].
Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm, ↄny yɛji ow a ekʼam iir ɛb sikpl ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke kokr ana.
Kↄ jam aŋa, ìgŋn ów amua fɛŋ ekʼel: ɛrm bebl, ɛrm wewe lele ɛrm suŋ ab a okr es. Ke wɛwr lel odad ebl kpↄm kpↄm ab kʼánm ↄny nɛnym ɛym ↄkm.
Kʼↄ̀nyn yadŋ kʼↄŋanin ↄny ↄfr ɛm ij, aŋke ↄny ecʼelel eke aan es lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, waal ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
ɛtŋ ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr af, ɛwal mɛny anŋn ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af. Ɔny eci ɛb ir owr ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ am otr Nyam ekʼel ↄny e kok Ɛs ab es,
yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́tur uwr ir any ok ↄny es sos ɛm.
Jam aŋa agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ, ow ↄnym Jwif lel ɛgŋ ekʼelm Jwif ab, ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubrm likr es lel ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es ab, ɛbr ɛjeci ecʼagŋ lele mɛbɛy ab,
madu lel ewi ab. Gbɛkↄ low tasi a: el Krist ekʼel low fɛŋ, ke anŋ agŋ fɛŋ ekʼubʼr nawrɛ ab ɛm a.
Nyam sↄsum ot ↄny eke kʼeel in ecʼagŋ ɛtŋ li bʼerur ↄny. Ow sosiɛm a, ow akpl eke kʼↄnyn ɛrm ekʼerur lele sↄrŋ ikŋ ab iy ɛm gbↄŋ, ɛrm mamn, es is ecʼɛrm, ɛrm frↄrↄ lele low eku ecʼɛrm ab.
Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ecʼelel eke anŋn a ebr ke áparir low yɛji, sakp sakp fɛŋ ekʼↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam bʼow ↄny low lawl ab a. Ow it eke kʼaparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ap ↄny ab af.
Ɛtŋ low eke ki kokr tasi a el erur eke kʼↄnyn ↄny ↄfr ɛm a, aŋke erur el low eke bʼↄny agŋ okr af.
Ke Krist ecʼɛrm es ɛy a nyímn ↄny ecʼɛrm a; tasi ɛm a, ɛrm es ɛy ikŋ na ɛm anake Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny eke kʼokar af éel nyam ɛsɛ sos megl nyam coco af a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄŋan in bia.

Ke Krist ecʼodad ebl a, ɛ́ŋn usu ↄny ecʼɛrm ab ɛm in ecʼob ↄny a fɛŋ ab. Yɛ̀gmnin low ke ↄ́manin ów ↄny ↄfr ɛm sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛ̀lul Nyam bia ↄny ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn selu, ɛ̀gŋn Nyam e sɛj ɛjeci lele sɛj eke Abŋ Lala
bʼↄŋ ↄny ab ab.
Low fɛŋ eke bi kokr oglog bi dadr ab ɛm, kòkr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm, ke in ɛm ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia.
Ɔyↄw, ↄny, ìsr es ↄny ɛcɛl ecʼany af, ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it eke ki kokr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼany af ab af.
Ɔyↄw ɛcɛl, èrurir ↄny ɛyɛl ke kʼↄ́nymn ɛl lokm yony ɛm.
Ey, ↄnyn agŋ ekʼew ↄny a ecʼɛlum low low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow el low eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼerur.
Ey ɛsɛl, kʼìjar ↄny ecʼey a gbre, yecʼɛtŋ ke sos kʼↄ́wm ɛl es.

Madu, low low fɛŋ ɛm ɛ̀lumn ↄny e wus af aŋa eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a. Ow elm eke -li bʼɛw ↄny nyamn af cɛ ki kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼaw ↄny. Kↄ ɛ̀lumn ɛl ɛrm nyam ɛm tasi, ɛlum ekʼↄnyn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼa sosiɛm.
Juma fɛŋ eke bi kokr a, kòkr ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci juma ↄny am kokr af, ke ow kʼélm ɛsɛ agŋ ecʼaf.
Ow sosiɛm a, madu, ↄkan eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow ↄŋ ↄny ow ecʼob ap, ob ap a eke lʼɛdŋn lʼɛw in ecʼagŋ es a. Tasi ɛm a, Es Ɛw Ɛs a ekʼam kokr in eci juma a, in lʼel Krist.
Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ yecʼeke am kok low ŋuŋ a, bʼow ɛŋn yecʼekʼel in ecʼa, ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr low ŋuŋ ab af, aŋke Nyam eci low eke bʼow kok ab ɛm, li kʼow li jɛjm agŋ es.
Agŋ eke el madu eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a, kòkr ↄny e madu a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ke ŋkoprɛ kʼánm ɛm. Ke ↄkan ekʼↄny yɛji ↄnyn Es ɛw ɛs nyam ekʼanŋ afr.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm, ke ↄny e Nyam e bia eke bʼↄŋn Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm a él ɛrm ɛw ɛm.

Nyam ŋↄŋn ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji ŋↄŋan ɛy eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam kók sʼɛŋn abusu sʼↄmun in ecʼodad ab es, ke si dád Krist eci lís e low eke lↄl es a. Tasi ɛm a, low na eke lↄl es a sosiɛm anake mʼanŋ sobel ɛm a.
Ŋↄŋan Nyam yecʼɛtŋ ke mʼↄ́tu mʼotar odad a akr ayl, ok agŋ es sos ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it eke mi ki kok ab af.
Àan es nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛm agŋ ekʼuwm Krist any a e lís, ke abusu fɛŋ eke bʼɛru ↄny es a kʼírmnmn.
Ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄny ecʼodad ebl él amamn, ke mok ánŋ ɛm, ke uwr any dádr ɛgŋ fɛŋ odad ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ab af.
Erur ɛm ecʼɛy lisijim Tisik,
abu ɛlum ɛs nimamn ekʼel ɛm lawl Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, bʼow ↄŋ ↄny ɛm e lís ecʼamani fɛŋ.
Mʼam ɛrmʼn tasi eke li kʼow li dad ↄny ɛy e lís ecʼamani, ke lʼátr ↄny sos es yɛji.
Onesim
ekʼel ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ, ke el erur ɛm ecʼɛgŋ lisijim a anake am ɛwlʼl a. -Li bʼow -lʼↄb ↄny ów a fɛŋ ekʼam ɛy aŋa a ecʼamani.
Aritak

ekʼanŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ↄny, ɛbɛn nɛny nyam Mark ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ Barnabas e lisijim af a, in yɛji am ɛsŋn ↄny. (Mark ecʼa, ikŋn anym irir in e lís e low. Eke lʼow ↄny ogŋ yogŋ, èbr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn.)

Igŋ a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Jesu ke wɛl bʼok en es Justus a yɛji am ɛsŋn ↄny. Jwifɛl ekʼɛgŋ Krist e low eb a, ɛl ɛm a, agŋ nyahan na cɛ anake am kok juma ɛm ab Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ecʼa. Ɛtŋ -lʼatrʼm sos es nↄnↄ ligbɛl.
Epafras,

ekʼin yɛji el ↄny ɛm e nyam a, am ɛsŋn ↄny; Krist e libↄwi na sɛgŋ fɛŋ bʼatr sos es ŋↄŋn Nyam ↄny eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́tur inymn es kikri, ánŋn ɛsɛ agŋ ekʼagb ↄmn ɛm, ke bɛbm sos eke ki kok low fɛŋ eke Nyam bʼerur ab af.
Mʼↄtu eke mi kʼij in e nuŋ af e daŋku low na eci: li bʼij gbre nↄnↄ ↄny lele Laodise ecʼagŋ lele Iyerapolis
ecʼagŋ a ecʼab.
Luk
ekʼel erur ɛm ecʼɛy lawl ke el sɛkp kok ɛs lele Demas ab am ɛsŋn ↄny.
Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛy lisijimɛl ekʼanŋ Laodise a, lele ɛy lisijↄw Nɛnfa lele Nyam ecʼagŋ eke bʼas luku in ecʼakŋ ab ab ↄŋn ɛy.
Sica lɛgŋ eke bʼawal lɛl na ba ow bʼuwr a, kókr elel eke ki kokr ke wɛl ↄ́tu awl Laodise eci Nyamel ab ɛm yɛji. Ke ↄny yɛji áwal yecʼa eke bʼow anŋ ɛl ogŋ a ow a.
Ow ecʼuwr ɛm a, dàdr Arkip
kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma ekʼabul il a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ɛm Pↄl, ɛm obi ecʼabu ɛm mi nↄn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ecʼuwr ɛm. Sica kʼìjal es eke mʼanŋ sobel ɛm.
Ke Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny af.
I Thessalonians: Pↄl, Silas lele Timote
ab e lɛl ekʼam awŋ Nyamel ecʼagŋ ekʼanŋ Tesaloni baŋn, kʼel Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ecʼagŋ. Ke ↄwrↄ lel ɛrm es ɛy ab ánŋ ↄny ab.
Si bʼↄŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄny fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ si bʼↄkn ↄny sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛy e Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm.
Nyam ɛy Ɛs ecʼany af si bʼↄkn ↄny e nawrɛ ekʼubr e juma e kokr, ↄny ecʼerur ekʼↄnyn e low e kokr, lel ɛrm ekʼusurir ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ɛm ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn ab ab e low.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam erur ↄny, ɛtŋ sʼuw any eke li sↄsum lʼot ↄny eel in eci.

Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn ecʼodad eke si dad ↄny a, ow elm odad ebl nɛnym ɛm cɛ, kↄ Abŋ Lala ecʼabusu lele in ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm ab, ɛtŋ sʼuw any tasi ekʼow el low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ uwr any eke, ɛy ecʼes an ↄny ecʼaraŋn a, ↄny e nimamn eci.
Ɔny obi yɛji wewrmn ɛy lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ów. Gbre ijr nↄnↄ ecʼaraŋn yɛji, ɛgŋn Nyam ecʼodad a ebr, sos ɛm iŋn ekʼAbŋ Lala ↄŋ ↄny ab ɛm.
Ow ↄŋ ↄny eel Maseduan lele Akayi wus ab ecʼagŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a e sɛwl mamn.

Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad a anŋ ↄny ogŋ Maseduan wus af a ɛtŋ ↄmun es im toŋ ok Akayi wus af. Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ, kↄ ↄny ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low eb es susu a fɛŋ; ɛmɛny ow ɛbam eke si kʼↄb ow ecʼamani ij.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am dad elel ekʼebr ɛy ↄny ogŋ a, ɛrm ɛm ekʼitŋnin eel Nyam eci, sɛkp e nuŋ igŋ ekʼigŋn ɛlul es, ke ɛgŋn Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ke el Nyam nawrɛ a eci low kok a e low ebr a.
Ca am ekur in ecʼIy Jesu eke bʼow anŋ afr ow a. In eke Nyam igbmʼn luw ɛm nʼanŋ owr a, in anake lʼeb lʼɛlu ɛy es Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl ekʼam ow a e lís a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny obi yɛji uwr any ekʼↄny ogŋ a eke sʼow a ↄsu ey.
Uwr any yɛjʼeke lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, wɛl ijr ɛy gbre, wɛwr ɛy Filip baŋn a. Gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ecʼɛrm susu ekʼↄŋ ɛy ab ɛm, si dad ↄny in ecʼAmani Mamn a ecʼodad, gbre ij nↄnↄ ecʼaraŋn.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy ecʼów ↄm a elm yadŋ ɛm, ow elm ów tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ow elm kprakpr ɛm.
Kↄ ɛy, Nyam ɛkn eke sʼↄtu ɛtŋ lʼabul ɛy in ecʼAmani Mamn a e dad. Sica sʼam dad Nyam ecʼodad, ɛtŋ sʼↄlm agŋ ɛm ecʼerur es, kↄ Nyam eke bʼɛkn ɛy e mɛrm ɛm a ecʼerur sʼam ↄl es.
Ɔny obi uwr any eke lɛgŋ kaka si dadm mɛju ecʼodad; lɛgŋ kaka si kokm os ɛŋn e low. Nyam ij ow e daŋku.
Sʼↄlm ekʼɛgŋ kʼaw ɛy, ke ow el ↄny oglog ke ow el agŋ ɛjeci.
Ke sʼↄtu cɛ eke si kʼↄŋ ↄny low ebr, eke sʼel Krist ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkↄ sʼel agŋ frↄrↄ ↄny ecʼaraŋn ɛsɛ elel eke ey lis, frↄrↄ ɛm bi kok in ecʼey e lís e low ab af.
Ɔny ecʼerur eke sʼↄny a sosiɛm, sʼↄↄm ↄny Nyam ecʼAmani Mamn a sↄny cɛ, kↄ ɛy obi ɛy obi e sel a yɛji, aŋke ↄny iil an nↄnↄ ɛy eci.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, am ↄkan elel eke si kokr juma lɛc ɛm a: ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab abu anŋ ɛy juma kok ɛm, nɛnɛ anake si dad ↄny Nyam ecʼAmani Mamn a ecʼodad a, yecʼɛtŋ ke si kʼócm ɛy e lís e low sʼabulm ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka.
Ɔny ekʼubr nawrɛ a, ɛy ecʼes an ↄny ecʼaraŋn a ayl, el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci ekʼabr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji ijr daŋku, ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji ij daŋku.
Ɛmɛny uwr any eke si kok ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam nyam e lís low ɛsɛ elel ekʼey ɛs bi kok in ecʼey ab af.
Sʼↄm ↄny ów, sʼatr ↄny sos es, sʼibrm ↄny sakp nↄnↄ eke kʼaan es ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. In anake lʼɛsŋ ↄny eke kʼokr in ecʼes ɛw ecʼanygbɛl ab ɛm a.

Na sosiɛm sʼam ↄŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ, eke ebmn odad eke si dad ↄny a ɛsɛ agŋ ɛm ecʼodad af, kↄ ke ebr ɛsɛ Nyam ecʼodad af a. Ɛɛ, nawrɛ Nyam ecʼodad ab ana! Ɛtŋ li bi kok juma ↄny ɛm lʼitŋn ↄny ekʼubr nawrɛ a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, sica ↄny yɛji ɛkan ów a ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ecʼagŋ ekʼanŋ Jude e Sinyamel ɛm ke ub Jesu Krist nawrɛ a ɛkn ab af. Ɔny yɛji, ↄny e baŋn eyŋ ijr ↄny gbre ɛsɛ gbre ijr nyam a cɛ eke Jwifɛl ijr Sinyamel amua ecʼagŋ ab af.
Jwifɛl amua anake ibi Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab ab, ke ɛy yɛji ijr ɛy gbre a. -Nʼam kokmn Nyam ecʼerur, ɛtŋ -lʼel agŋ fɛŋ ecʼefnu.
-Nʼam ɛdŋn ɛy eke si ki dad sel ɛŋn ecʼodad sʼok agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl a bake -nʼɛŋn sel. Ow ↄŋ sikpl a eke godʼɛtŋ -li kokr a obn afŋn es. Na sosiɛm anake ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a ɛŋn ɛl a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, nawrɛ si kpab ↄny es lís sos megl ɛm ow ibn tɛl, kↄ ɛrm ɛm a sʼanŋ ↄny ab. Sʼerur tasi ɛtŋ sʼatr sos es eke ɛmɛny si kʼow sʼɛkn ↄny.
Sʼerur eke si kʼow ɛy fɛŋ sʼɛkn ↄny, ɛtŋ ɛm Pↄl, ɛm sↄny ɛm a, mʼatr sos es sakp nↄnↄ eke mi kʼow, kↄ Satan ↄ́ↄm ɛy ow ecʼabusu.
