Ɔny kↄtↄkↄ eel ɛy e low ↄmn, ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn, ɛy ecʼanygbɛl tufɛ, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼany af, in e mowrer e lɛgŋ a.
Ɛɛ! ↄny anake eel ↄny e low kok ɛm, ɛy ecʼanygbeŋ lele ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ab a.
Na sosiɛm, eke si kʼↄtum sʼekum ij a, si bɛbm eke si kʼanŋ Atɛn
ɛy sↄny, ɛtŋ sʼɛrm ɛy lisijim Timote eke bi kok Nyam juma ɛy ab, ke bi dad Krist ecʼAmani Mamn ecʼodad a. Sʼɛrmʼn eke li kʼow lʼusur ↄny ɛrm ke lʼátr ↄny sos es ↄny ecʼↄmn ab ɛm,
Na sosiɛm, eke si kʼↄtum sʼekum ij a, si bɛbm eke si kʼanŋ Atɛn
ɛy sↄny, ɛtŋ sʼɛrm ɛy lisijim Timote eke bi kok Nyam juma ɛy ab, ke bi dad Krist ecʼAmani Mamn ecʼodad a. Sʼɛrmʼn eke li kʼow lʼusur ↄny ɛrm ke lʼátr ↄny sos es ↄny ecʼↄmn ab ɛm,
yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́ym wus gbre ijr na ekʼanŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn ab ɛm, aŋke ↄny obi yɛji uwr any eke gbre ijr na, el low ekʼↄn ɛy es.
Ow a eke sʼanŋ ↄny ogŋ a, sʼikŋ anym si dad ↄny eke wɛl bʼow ijr ɛy gbre. Ca ow anake ow ɛy a, ↄny uwr any.
Na sosiɛm, eke mi kʼↄtum mʼekum a, mʼɛrm Timote eke kʼow otar ↄny ecʼↄmn a e low akr ókʼm, aŋke mʼam ebr ɛrmij, ekʼoglog ɛgŋ ɛju Ɛs a ɛju ↄny okr wus, ke juma eke si kok a el low ↄfr ↄfr ŋ̂.
Sica Timote anŋ ↄny ogŋ a ow
ɛtŋ ↄb ɛy ↄny ecʼↄmn lel erur ab ecʼamani, eke bʼↄkan ɛy e low sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ am erurir eke kʼɛkan ɛy, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji sʼam erur eke si kʼɛkn ↄny ab af.
Ow sosiɛm a, lisijimɛl, ↄny ecʼↄmn ecʼamani e sʼiri ɛy e sos es ↄw na ɛm lel ɛy e gbre ijr na ɛm ab a, ɛyr ɛy ɛrm es, atr ɛy sos es.
Sica sel ow ɛy ŋ̂, aŋke inymn es kikri Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ecʼaf okr ab ɛm.
Kↄ ayaf tasi si kʼↄŋn Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn na eke sʼↄny, ↄny sosiɛm Nyam ecʼany af ab ecʼee?
Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab si bʼat lebl es si ŋↄŋn Nyam eke li kʼↄŋ ɛy abusu bake ɛmɛny blel sʼɛ́kanin, ke si yíbr low yecʼekʼanm ↄny ecʼↄmn ab ɛm a.
Ke blel ɛy Ɛs Nyam in obi lele ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ab kók ɛy ejagb bake sʼow sʼɛkn ↄny.
Ke blel Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄ́ŋ erur ekʼↄnyn ↄny ↄfr ɛm lel agŋ ecʼɛjeci e lís ab a, ágb bubu af ɛsɛ elel ekʼↄny ecʼerur eke sʼↄny a agb ab af.
Ke blel lʼúsur ↄny e mɛrm a, eel lala ke abr ɛnym kaka kʼánm ↄny ɛm Nyam ɛy Ɛs ecʼany af, lɛgŋ ekʼɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu bʼow ow lele in eci afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala
a fɛŋ ab a.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ekʼɛmɛny mi ki dad a el, ɛsɛ elel eke wewar ɛy e lís es an mamn ekʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm, ke am kokr ɛbɛn a, sʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny, sʼibrm ↄny atrm ɛm, ekʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm a, kʼúcur ↄnyn es ɛbɛn iman anym eci akm na e kokr a.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr low yecʼeke si yɛgm ↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin ɛm ab any.
Kin, ow eke Nyam am erur a: ke ↄny ecʼes an a él lala in ecʼany af; ke ↄ́sur sos nfaci ij e lís.
Ke ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ nyam nyam úw any ↄnyn sos es nfaci ij e lís,
án es lala ɛm lele sos us ɛm ab,
ke kí yɛbm ów eŋuŋ ecʼaw akamʼn es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl af.
Low na ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́ju lawl ki kokʼr low ↄbr, aŋke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow jɛj agŋ e bi kok ów amua a eci low ok, ɛsʼelel eke sʼikŋ anym si dad sʼayal sʼok ↄny ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛsŋm ɛy eke si kʼanŋ sikpl owi ɛm, kↄ ów lala kok ɛm.
Na sosiɛm ɛgŋ ekʼɛgŋm low yɛgm na ebm a, ow elm ɛgŋ eci low yɛgm li digŋm lʼɛlum es, kↄ Nyam ekʼↄŋ ↄny in ecʼAbŋ Lala a eci low yɛgm li digŋ lʼɛlu es.
Sica yecʼekʼel agŋ lisijimɛl ↄfr ecʼerur e low a, ow ɛbam eke wɛl ki nↄn lɛl awŋ ↄny, aŋke ↄny obi ɛm wewar Nyam ogŋ elel eke kʼerurir ↄny ↄfr a.
Ɛtŋ erur ikŋ na e low anake am kokr Maseduan wus nimum af ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ e lís a. Gbɛkↄ agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny sʼam ibrm eke ki kokr ow akpl obn.
Àtar sos es ke ánŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke kʼɛ́ymn ɛgŋ e low ɛm, ke kókr juma ↄny obi ecʼabu ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke si dad ↄny ab af,
yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ ekʼelm Krist e jam us ɛsɛl a, ↄ́ny ↄny ecʼɛlum. Ke ↄny ecʼes abur a kʼélm agŋ eci.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼerur eke kʼuwr Krist e jam us ɛsɛl ekʼuw a e lís e low any, yecʼɛtŋ ke kʼánmn sↄrŋ ɛm ɛsʼagŋ likpr a ekʼↄnym ↄmn ecʼab af.
Eke sʼub nawrɛ eke Jesu uw ɛtŋ lʼɛwl nʼanŋ owr a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam sʼub nawrɛ eke Nyam bʼow ↄŋ agŋ ekʼub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a ɛ́wl ow in ab.
Sica kin yecʼeke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ in e low yɛgm ɛm dad ɛy, ke sʼam ɛlu ↄkm: Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a, ɛy eke si bʼow sʼanŋ owr a, si kʼow sʼikŋm agŋ ekʼuw a ecʼanym.
Lɛgŋ a, wɛl bʼow iri lebl nyam ikŋ ekʼel Nyam ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼes ɛw ɛs a e lebl lele Nyam e kↄkr e lebl ab ab, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow anŋ afr us es. Agŋ ekʼub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a bʼow igb anŋ owr krɛkrɛ.
Ke sica, ow e jam a, ɛy eke lɛgŋ a si bʼow sʼanŋ owr a, Nyam ↄ́ŋ ɛy sʼigb ɛl ab jru ɛm sʼím sʼↄbr Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ afr. Nɛnɛ anake si bʼow sʼanŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Ow sosiɛm, àtarir sos es ↄny ↄfr sodad amua ɛm.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, yecʼekʼel sɛgŋ lele wanci ab ecʼa, ow ibram eke wɛl ki nↄn lɛl awŋ ↄny,
aŋke ↄny obi yɛji uwr any tasi eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a bʼow okr ɛy es ɛsɛ elel eke ulu bʼow ncok ɛm ab af.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm ekʼagŋ bʼow dad ɛsɛ: «Low kaka anm, fɛŋ el ɛrm es ɛy a!»
yogŋ anake lɛgŋ a bʼow okr ɛl es kpru ɛm ŋuŋn ɛl a. Ow bʼow anŋ ɛsɛ iy ↄnyn eke bʼokr lok ab lis es ab af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka kʼow ɛcm saw.
Kↄ agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny ecʼa anmn ncebn ɛm eke lɛgŋ na kʼokr ↄny es ɛsɛ ulu ecʼab af,
aŋke ↄny fɛŋ eel lɛgŋ owr lele usu ayl ab ecʼey. Ɛy sʼelm lɛgŋ uk lele ncebn ab ecʼey.
Na sosiɛm ow itm eke si kʼɛru mɛmn ɛsʼagŋ amua na ecʼab af, kↄ sʼánŋ any owr, ke low fɛŋ ɛm any ók ɛy es.
Mɛmn ɛru ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm -li bʼɛru mɛmn; ɛtŋ mar ɛgŋ ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm bʼɛgŋ mar am ↄny.
Kↄ ɛy eke sʼel usu ayl ecʼa, ow akpl eke si kʼók any es, ke sʼóc ɛy ecʼↄmn lel erur ab ɛsɛ ar mob eke sʼok sos af, ke ɛy e sel ɛŋn ecʼeku ánŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo tufɛ eke sʼus af,
aŋke Nyam ↄↄm ɛy eke si kʼim sʼɛy in ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm, kↄ ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ↄ́ŋ ɛy sel ɛŋn.
In lʼuw ɛy sosiɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke nʼↄŋ ɛy sʼanŋ owr in ab, eke sʼanŋ owr ɛtŋ sʼuw yɛji.
Na sosiɛm, ↄmanin ów ke átarir sos es ↄmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke am kokr godʼɛtŋ ab af.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼam dad ↄny eke kʼↄ́nyn agŋ ekʼam kok juma ↄny ecʼaraŋn, yɛgm ↄny low, ke nyimn ↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm a ecʼɛlum.
Ɔ̀nyn ɛl e sos usr nↄnↄ lele erur ab, juma eke -nʼam kok a sosiɛm. Ànŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ↄny ↄfr.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, sʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny, ɛ̀nymn ↄkpↄrŋu abr; àtar agŋ eke sos ↄw es a sos es, ɛ̀lumn abŋ ɛm ecʼↄgbↄru a abu, ke ↄ́nyn low eku ɛgŋ fɛŋ e lís.
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼócm low ŋuŋ ↄbarm low ŋuŋ any. Kↄ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄↄl low nimamn e kok es ↄny ↄfr ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eci lís ab.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Sakp sakp fɛŋ kʼↄ̀pir Nyam ŋↄŋn.
Ɔ̀ŋn Nyam bia low low fɛŋ ɛm. Na el low eke Nyam am ibrm eke ki kokr, ↄny ekʼokar af Jesu Krist ab a.
Kʼìrmnin Abŋ Lala ecʼal ekʼanŋ ↄny ɛm ab es.
Kʼìfan odad eke Nyam bʼↄŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn e kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl dad ↄny a,
kↄ ìgbal low fɛŋ ogŋ ɛkan, ke úcur yecʼekʼakpl a ↄnyn es.
Ke ↄ́nyan sos es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e kok ɛm.

Ke Nyam ekʼel ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a in obi áyal ↄny nimum; ke nʼↄ́ŋ ↄny ecʼɛgŋ el a nimum ekʼel abŋ, liy, lele sos megl ab a él lala, ekʼabr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm toŋ bake ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e mowrer e lɛgŋ a ów.
In eke nʼam ɛsŋ ↄny a, li bʼow li kok ów amua fɛŋ iy nɛny, aŋke lʼel cɛcɛ.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy yɛji ŋↄ́ŋan ↄŋn ɛy.
Bìbrmnin ↄny ↄfr ɛsʼagŋ lisijimɛl af Krist ɛm.
Mʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny mʼok ↄny mɛrm sabu af, ekʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ e nin ɛm a, kʼáwal lɛl na ókr agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab!
II Thessalonians: Pↄl, Silas
lele Timote ab e lɛl ekʼam awŋ Nyamel ecʼagŋ ekʼanŋ Tesaloni baŋn, ke el Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ecʼagŋ:
Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ, ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow akpl eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ, si kʼɛlu Nyam bia ↄny sosiɛm. Ow it eke si ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke ↄny ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn a am bobn ɛtŋ ↄny ecʼerur eke ↄnyn ↄny ↄfr ɛm a, am agb imn anym eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Na sosiɛm, si bi dad ↄny e lís e low, sʼaw ↄny Sinyamel ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼas luku igŋ Nyam nuŋ a ecʼany af, aŋke ↄny bʼinymn es kikri ↄmn ɛm, gbre ijr lele sos es ↄw fɛŋ eke bʼↄbar ab ab ɛm.
Gbre ijr amua am yɛgm eke Nyam e jɛj ok a el nyim nyim. Tasi ɛm a, gbre ijr amua sosiɛm anake bʼow eel Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ekʼam ijr ow e gbre a ecʼagŋ tasi a.
Nyam el nɛnyɛmbri nyam Ɛs: ow sosiɛm agŋ ekʼam ijr ↄny gbre a, ɛl yɛji li bʼow lʼijr wɛl gbre.
Ɛtŋ ↄny ekʼam ijr gbre a, li bʼow lʼɛyr ↄny ɛrm es, ↄny lele ɛy ab, lɛgŋ eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu bʼow anŋ afr ow in lele ɛrm ɛsɛl abusu ɛsɛl ab ab a.
Lɛgŋ a, li bʼow nʼanŋ al ekʼam iri ecʼaraŋn lʼɛy ↄkm, yecʼɛtŋ ke li kók agŋ eke uwm Nyam any,
ke ɛ́luam ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼAmani Mamn a low ŋuŋ.
-Li bʼow -nʼɛŋn gbre eke kʼow ↄnym uwr, ɛtŋ gbre ij akpasu na, bʼow ↄny kpab ɛl es Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e lís lele in ecʼanygbɛl e lɛc ab ab e lís.
Low a bʼow ɛy lɛgŋ a ekʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow ow a. Li bʼow lʼow yecʼɛtŋ kʼagŋ a ekʼel in eci ke ubʼr nawrɛ a, úsrʼr sos, kↄ́klmʼn. Ɔny yɛji bʼow anŋn ɛl ɛm, aŋke ubr amani a eke sʼↄŋ ↄny a nawrɛ.

Na sosiɛm, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sʼam ŋↄŋn Nyam sʼↄŋ ↄny yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy e Nyam a ɛ́kn ↄny ɛsɛ agŋ eke it af, in ecʼɛsŋ a eke lʼɛsŋ ↄny ab ɛm. Ke in ecʼabusu ab ɛm, lʼɛ́lum ↄny abu kokr low nimamn fɛŋ ekʼam erurir a, ke nʼↄ́ŋ ↄny ecʼↄmn a ɛw gbagba!
Na ɛm a wɛl bʼow dad ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu e nin mamn, ɛtŋ ↄny yɛji -li bʼow -lʼaw ↄny. Ow bʼow el ɛy e Nyam lele Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ecʼↄwrↄ ekʼɛŋan.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, yecʼekʼel ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e mowrer eke bʼow ↄny as ɛy luku in ab a ecʼa,
sʼam ŋↄŋn ↄny,

kì yɛbr agŋ kʼirmn ↄny nuŋ ɛm fafa, erŋn kʼↄ́ny ↄny. Eke batŋ ɛgŋ dad ↄny ow e low ɛsɛ odad eke Nyam ↄŋ kokoba ↄb ɛs nyam dad af, oglog ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛjeci ecʼodad af, oglog ɛsɛ lɛl eke sʼawŋ ↄny ecʼodad af yɛji, kʼùbr nawrɛ.
Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka kʼɛju ↄny akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bʼow igŋ Nyam ecʼany uw a ɛlu es gbuŋ ke lɛgŋ a ów. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake Low ŋuŋ ɛs a, in a ekʼit eke kʼirm a bʼow ɛy ↄkm a.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs na bʼow ɛdŋn ob fɛŋ ekʼel Nyam eci ke agŋ bʼigŋ nuŋ a. Li bʼow lʼigb ów amua fɛŋ e nuŋ af, ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼim toŋ lʼɛy Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm li sig es,
ke lʼócr in sosi ɛsɛ Nyam af.
Kↄ kʼↄknmn eke mi dad ↄny ów amua, ow a eke mʼanŋ ↄny ab a ee?
Gbɛkↄ, uwr any eke low nyam anŋ eke caca ɛm a, am ɛdŋn Low ŋuŋ ɛs na eke kʼɛy ↄkm, toŋ bake lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm a ów.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs a ecʼabusu a ↄb nuŋ es lↄl ɛm am kok juma, ɛtŋ ekʼɛgŋ a ekʼucu ↄnyʼn es a kʼow anm ij a, li kʼow li kokm juma es lↄl ɛm ij.
Sica Low ŋuŋ ɛs a bʼow ɛy ↄkm, ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ŋúŋnʼn trɛ trɛ trɛ, in e nɛnym e sel fuf ɛm, ke li kíkn ow es in e mowrer ecʼusuayl eci jɛjn ab ɛm.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs a bʼow ow Satan e lɛc ab ab ɛtŋ li bʼow li kok mɛny ɛwr owi lele sakrowa yadŋ ɛm ab;
li bʼow lʼoc low ŋuŋ fɛŋ lʼɛlu ↄkm lʼɛjur agŋ ekʼam irm a, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼok wus. -Li bʼow -lʼok wus aŋke -lʼɛgŋm -lʼebm ɛtŋ -lʼerurm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke blel sↄg ɛl a.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam bʼow awŋ ɛl abusu ekʼel irm ecʼa yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼub yecʼekʼel yadŋ a nawrɛ.
Na sosiɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke kʼow ubm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam nawrɛ, ke bʼow erur anŋ low ŋuŋ kok ɛm a, Nyam bʼow ↄb ɛl low luw eci.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ↄny eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ erur ↄny a, ow it eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ si kʼɛlu Nyam bia ↄny eci, aŋke li sↄsum lʼot ↄny nuŋ ↄb ɛm ɛtŋ eke li ki sↄg ↄny Abŋ Lala eke bʼↄŋ ↄny éel Nyam eci lele ↄny ecʼↄmn ekʼↄnyn low nawrɛ ɛm a ecʼab.
Nyam ɛsŋ ↄny in ecʼAmani Mamn ecʼodad eke si dad ↄny ab ɛm. Lʼɛsŋ ↄny eke kʼɛŋan yecʼa eke kʼɛbm ↄny ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼanygbɛl ab ɛm a.
Na sosiɛm, agŋ lisijimɛl, ìnymn es kikri ke úcur low yɛgm a eke sʼↄŋ ↄny odad ebl ɛm oglog lɛl ɛm ecʼeke sʼawŋ ↄny ab a ↄnyn es.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist in obi, lele Nyam ɛy Ɛs ab, ekʼↄny ɛy ecʼerur ke ↄŋ ɛy bibm ɛm, sos es atr ekʼↄnym uwr lele low ↄmn tasi ab a,
yíbr ↄny ecʼɛrm a lokm susu, ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny lɛc kokr ów amamn ów kok ɛm lele odad ebl ɛm ab.
Sica lisijimɛl, ŋↄŋan Nyam ↄŋn ɛy, yecʼɛtŋ ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼodad ebl a ↄ́mun es fafa, ke wɛl úsrʼr sos ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɛcr ↄny ogŋ ab af.
Ŋↄŋan Nyam yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼéb lʼɛlu ɛy es agŋ eŋuŋ lele lokm ŋuŋ ɛsɛl ab ecʼabu ɛm, aŋke ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛgŋm ubm nawrɛ.
Gbɛkↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ el cɛcɛ, li bʼow lʼusur ↄny ɛrm, ke lʼↄ́su ↄny agn
e lís.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ↄŋ ɛy sʼↄny ↄmn ↄny ɛm ɛtŋ sʼuw any tasi ekʼam kokr ów a eke si dad ↄny a ɛtŋ ucur ↄnyn es am kokr.
Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ nyímn ↄny ecʼɛrm a Nyam ecʼerur a lele Krist eci low eku ab ab e lís.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm sʼam ibrm eke ki kpabr es agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ekʼam ir ɛb kpↄrŋ ɛm, ke ɛ́gŋm low yɛgm a eke sʼↄŋ ɛl a ebm a e lís.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr elel eke ki kokr ke ébr ɛy e lakr ab any, aŋke lɛgŋ eke sʼanŋ ↄny ecʼaraŋn a, sʼelm ↄ́rŋu.
Si yɛbm agŋ ↄↄm ɛy ob sʼijm ↄfr ɛm; kↄ ɛy obi sʼij gbre, sʼok law, si kok juma lɛc ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy e gbagbl e low kʼélm ↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
Si kok ɛbɛn, ow elm ke si kʼↄ́nym abusu eke si kʼibrm ↄny ecʼabu ɛlum a eci, kↄ sɛwl mum eke si yɛgm ↄny eke kʼebr.
Ɛtŋ ow a eke sʼanŋ ↄny ab a, si dad ↄny: ekʼɛgŋ erurm eke ki kok juma a, ow itm eke li kʼij ob.
Sica sʼam dad ↄny low na, aŋke sʼam iri ekʼↄny ɛm a, ↄ́rŋu anŋ ekʼerurm eke ki kok low kaka, eke ow elm agŋ e low cɛ eke -li kʼigb -lʼok ɛm.
Agŋ amua na, sʼam dad ɛtŋ sʼam ↄm ɛl ów ekʼƐs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, -li ki kok juma sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke -li gbagbal ɛl sosi.
Agŋ lisijimɛl ↄny ecʼa, low mamn e kok kʼam ↄny sos.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɛluam odad na ekʼanŋ lɛl na eke sʼↄŋ ↄny ab ɛm, ke ɛ̀bmnin in nyamn, ke kʼɛ́wmn mɛcrer in ab ij, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛ́s ↄ́nyʼn.
Gbɛkↄ kʼòcr ir ɛsɛ ifnu af, kↄ ↄmn in ów ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af.
Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ekʼel ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a, in obi ↄ́ŋ ↄny in ecʼɛrm es ɛy a sɛgŋ fɛŋ, low low fɛŋ ɛm. Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab!
Ɛm Pↄl, ɛm obi ecʼabu ɛm mi nↄn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ecʼuwr ɛm. Ɛbɛn eke mi bʼɛwr ɛm e silɛl fɛŋ eke mi bi nↄn a mɛny ana.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab.
I Timothy: Ɛm Pↄl, Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs, Nyam ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy ecʼↄmn ob ab ecʼabusu ɛm, mʼam awŋʼŋ lɛl na.
Ŋ Timote eke anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ecʼiy lokm tasi af ↄmn ɛm, ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Kↄtↄkↄ ab ɛ́dŋʼŋ ↄwrↄ, ↄ́ny ŋ e sↄrŋ ikŋ ke ↄ́ŋʼŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
Eke mʼaam Maseduan a, mʼijlʼŋ nɛny eke kʼanŋ Efɛs, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a ekʼam yɛgm agŋ ów yadŋ a, ɛ́dŋn ɛl ke -li ki kokmn ij.
Dàd ɛl -li wal ów a ekʼagŋ ɛl obi ↄkn dad lel ɛl lagŋɛl e mew ecʼes ↄsŋm owi e low a -lʼɛlu es,
ow es atar cɛ ow bʼis, ow ɛluam Nyam ecʼes eb ɛlu e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es, ke wɛl uw any ↄmn ɛm a abu.
Low na eke bʼow dad a, bʼow ↄŋ ɛl ecʼerur a agb: erur eke bʼanŋ ɛrm lala ɛm ow, tutr mamn ɛm lel ↄmn tasi ɛm ab a.
Agŋ bɛb igŋ ejagb na ɛlu es ɛtŋ irm sodad ekʼↄnym any e dad ɛm.
-Li bʼocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ Nyam ecʼol a ecʼany uw ɛsɛl tasi af, gbɛkↄ -lʼirimn ɛl obi e sodad eke -nʼam dad a, ɛtŋ ów a ekʼow sosiɛm -li bʼatar ów es a yɛji -lʼirimn.
Sʼuw any eke Nyam ecʼol a el ob mamn, eke wɛl uw any kok ow e low ekʼit a.

Wɛl ↄ́kn eke wɛl ɛwm ol agŋ eke bi kok ów amamn a eci; kↄ ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl lel agŋ ekʼɛ́luam ol ab ab sosiɛm wɛl bʼɛw ol, ɛsɛ: molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl, sikpl ɛsɛl, agŋ ekʼɛ́luam Nyam lel ob ekʼel lala ab ab, agŋ eke bʼibi ɛl ɛsɛl oglog ɛl lisɛl lel agŋ ibiu fɛŋ ab.
Ɛmɛny wɛl bʼɛw ol agŋ eke bʼij nfaci a eci, egŋ eke bʼɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab, agŋ eke bʼↄl madu ij, ayadŋu, agŋ eke bʼij daŋku yadŋ ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eke bi kok ów ekʼelm low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab eci.
Low yɛgm ikŋ na anŋ Amani Mamn a eke bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼuw Nyam ecʼanygbɛl ab any ab ɛm. Ɛɛ, Nyam eke el ehe fɛŋ eci nuŋ a anake abulʼm Amani Mamn na a.
Mʼam ɛlu Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eke ↄŋʼm lɛc, ɛm e juma kok ecʼa bia. Mʼam ɛluʼl bia eke nʼↄny ↄmn ɛm ɛm, ke lʼɛsŋʼm in e juma ab ɛm,
eke lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm, mi dad in e lís ecʼów eŋuŋ, mʼijrʼr gbre ɛtŋ mi wɛwrʼr yɛji. Gbɛkↄ Nyam ↄny ɛm e sↄrŋ ikŋ, aŋke mʼↄnym ↄmn in ɛm ɛtŋ mʼuwm low eke mʼam kok ab any.
Ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛdŋʼm ↄwrↄ nↄnↄ, ɛtŋ nʼↄŋʼm ↄmn lel erur eke bʼanŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ab ab.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi ekʼit ekʼagŋ a fɛŋ kʼeb: Jesu Krist ow wus na af sikpl ɛsɛl fɛŋ e sↄg eci. Mʼel ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi,

gbɛkↄ ow sosiɛm anake Nyam ↄny ɛm e sↄrŋ ikŋ a: lʼerur eke Jesu Krist kʼɛcr ɛm eke mʼel sikpl ɛsɛl ab ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a yɛgm in e low eku eke nʼↄny, ke ow él sɛwl agŋ a eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm bʼow ubʼr nawrɛ, ke bʼow ɛŋn sel ekʼↄnym nuŋ a eci.
Sos usr lele anygbɛl ab él Ɛb ebu a ekʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ,
ↄnym uw,
wɛl ɛ́knm
ke el Nyam nyam coco a eci! Amɛn.
Ɛm jim Timote mʼam abulʼŋ low yɛgm na, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ikŋ anym dad ɛw es ŋ e lís ab af. Ke sodad amua átrʼŋ sos es ↄŋ ogŋ mum mamn a,
ŋ ecʼↄmn a lele ŋ e tutr mamn ab ab ɛm. Agŋ nyam nyam ɛgŋm ↄsum ɛl e tutr mamn a, ow ↄŋ -lʼirmn ɛl ecʼↄmn a.
Agŋ ab ɛm Imene lele Alesandr ab yɛji anŋ; mʼot mʼok ɛl Satan abu ɛm
yecʼɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ ɛjeci -li kʼↄbrmn Nyam any.
Low krɛkrɛ eke mʼam dad eke wɛl ki kok agŋ fɛŋ ecʼa el: ke wɛl ŋↄ́ŋn Nyam íbrmʼn low, kók sↄrŋ ke ɛ́luʼl bia.
Ow it eke wɛl ki ŋↄŋn Nyam ↄŋ ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ lel agŋ fɛŋ ekʼↄnym es ɛw ab a, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼↄ́tu sʼir ɛb ekʼɛrm mij anm ɛm, ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, sos us ɛm, Nyam ecʼes ucu ↄny tasi ɛm.
Na anake akpl ke el sↄbↄ Nyam ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs,
eke bʼerur ekʼagŋ fɛŋ kʼɛŋn sel,
ke ↄ́tu uw low nɛnyɛmbri nyam any a.
Tasi ɛm a Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ,
ɛtŋ in lel agŋ ab ecʼaraŋn a yɛji ɛgŋ nyam cɛ anŋ,
ɛgŋ a in lʼel Jesu Krist
ekʼocr in sosi ɛw awoba agŋ a fɛŋ e sↄg eci.
Ekʼow e lɛgŋ a ow a, lʼɛlu ↄkm li yɛgm eke Nyam erur ekʼagŋ fɛŋ kʼɛŋn sel.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛwʼm lebl ɛlu ɛs lel ɛrm ɛs ab, ke mi yɛ́gm agŋ ekʼelm Jwifɛl yecʼeke el ↄmn lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab a. Mʼↄnym yadŋ, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam mʼam dad.
Mʼerur ekʼusu fɛŋ, egŋ ki gbigbl sabu ogŋ afr ŋↄŋn Nyam, gbɛkↄ Nyam ŋↄŋn a él ɛrm lala ɛm, ɛrm ekʼɛrm bebl lel ów es atar ab anm ɛm.
Mʼerur yɛjʼeke ↄyↄw ki sʼus mob ekʼit, mob frafra cɛ, ke ow kʼelm low agbr ɛm; ke -li ki kokmn sin ekʼagŋ kʼɛkn ɛl, -li kʼokmn sika ɛm miyob, miyob ac lele mob sus ɛm eke bʼil an nↄnↄ ab,
kↄ ke ɛl e sakpl a él ów amamn e kok, ɛsɛ elel ekʼow it ekʼↄyↄw eke bi dad ɛsɛ ɛl bʼɛlum Nyam a, ki kok ab af.
Ow it ekʼↄyↄw kʼok es tiŋ iri low yɛgm a, ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
Mʼɛlum abusu es eke yↄw ki yɛgm igŋ low oglog ɛw igŋ es; ow it eke li ki yewal tiŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, Adam anake Nyam ikŋ anym kok a, ɛtŋ ow e jam a li kok Ɛv.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm Adam yɛbm wɛl ɛjumʼn, kↄ yↄw yɛb wɛl ɛjuʼr ɛtŋ ɛluam Nyam ecʼodad ebl a.
Ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam bʼow sↄgʼr in ecʼey eke li bʼow lʼew ab ɛm,
gbɛkↄ ow it eke li kʼↄny ↄmn, erur, ke lʼír ɛb eke elm low agbr ɛm ke bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi: eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke kʼel Nyamel ecʼidr ɛs, ke juma sɛnyn lʼerur a.
Ow akpl eke Nyamel ecʼidr ɛs kʼel ɛgŋ ekʼabr ɛnym anm lís; yↄw nyam ecʼigŋ,
ɛgŋ eke bʼok sos es low ɛm, ke bʼↄny any es ok. Ke nʼↄ́ny es an mamn, lʼél ɛgŋ eke bʼeb etu, ke ↄtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low.
Li kʼélm mar ɛgŋu, li kʼↄ́nym gaŋgaŋ, kↄ lʼél frↄrↄ lel ɛrm es ɛyr ɛs ab. Li kʼélm ɛgŋ e bʼerur os owi,
kↄ lʼél ɛgŋ ekʼↄtu eke ki nyimn in obi ecʼakŋ a, ɛgŋ ekʼin ecʼey a bʼↄny in ecʼɛlum.
Tasi ɛm a, ekʼɛgŋ nyam ↄ́tum nyimnm in obi ecʼakŋ a, ayaf lʼↄtu eke li ki nyimn Nyamel ee?
Li kʼél ɛgŋ ekʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm owr owr; ekʼow el ɛgŋ ɛbɛn, li bʼow lʼeb sos ɛw abu ɛm ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼↄny es abur ɛsɛ agn ecʼab af.
Ow it yɛji ekʼagŋ ekʼubm Krist nawrɛ a kʼɛlumʼn, yecʼɛtŋ ke li kʼↄ́nym cak, ke li kʼɛ́ym agn e simeb e bʼuk ab ɛm.
Diakrɛl yɛji it ekʼel agŋ eke kʼus sos, ke ↄ́ny nɛnyɛmbri nyam yɛji; ow itm eke -li kʼɛgŋ mar nↄnↄ, -lʼↄl yadŋ ɛm eci os ↄny es;
ke -lʼucu low nawrɛ ekʼɛy ↄkm Krist ecʼↄmn e -nʼↄnyn ab ɛm a -nʼↄny es tutr lala ɛm.
Ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɛbm ɛl ɛkn; ekʼow e jam a wɛl ɛknm low ↄbr ɛl e lís a, ke sica -li kok juma ɛsɛ diakrɛl af gↄŋ.
Ɔyↄw eke el diakrɛl a
yɛji it eke kʼel agŋ eke kʼus sos. Ow itm eke -li ki dad ɛl lawlɛl e lís ecʼodad eŋuŋ; ow it ke -nʼↄny any es ok, ke -li kok cɛcɛ low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Ow it eke diakr kʼel yↄw nyam ecʼigŋ, ke nʼↄ́ny abusu eke li ki nyimn in ecʼey a, lel in ecʼakŋ a nimum ab mɛwl ɛm.
Diakrɛl eke bi kok ɛl e juma mɛwl ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ bʼow usr ɛl sos ɛtŋ -li bʼow -nʼↄny lokm susu ligbɛl ↄmn a ekʼↄny okr ɛy af Krist ab ab ɛm.
Mʼam awŋʼŋ lɛl na, kↄ mʼam tutr eke mi kʼow mʼɛknʼŋ lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm.
Gbɛkↄ eke mi kʼowm, bʼow ɛkn elel eke kʼaan es Nyam e bosu ab ɛm lɛl na e mʼam awŋʼŋ ab ɛm. Nyam e bosu a el Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ecʼagŋ a, ekʼucu low nawrɛ ↄny es a.
Tasi, low a e lↄl es ke ɛy ↄkm ɛy ecʼↄmn ab ɛm a agb nↄnↄ! Low a el:
Krist ɛy ↄkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af,
Abŋ Lala ɛluʼl ↄkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af
ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛknʼn.
Wɛl ↄb in ecʼamani ok sɛbr ɛjeci ecʼagŋ a,
ɛtŋ agŋ nↄnↄ ubʼr nawrɛ wus af aŋa,
ɛtŋ nʼim afr anygbɛl ɛm.
Abŋ Lala dad ɛrum mar ninɛ: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, agŋ bɛb bʼow igŋ ɛl ecʼↄmn a ɛlu es, ke ús sow tutr yadŋ lele low yɛgm eke bʼanŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ɛm ow a jam.
Agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl lel ayadŋu ab bʼow irmn ɛl. Agŋ amua, el agŋ eke Nyam owi am dadm low kaka, ke ɛl e sow tutr a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke wɛl oc lowi gbagba ɛwr mɛny af.

Agŋ amua ɛl eci low yɛgm ab ɛm bʼow dad ekʼow itm ekʼagŋ kʼɛbirir, -li bʼow -lʼɛdŋn mob bɛb eke wɛl bʼij a. Kↄ Nyam kok ob ij amua yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a ekʼub nawrɛ, ke uw low nawrɛ any a, ↄ́ŋʼn bia ke íj.
Ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a akpl;
kaka anm ɛm eke wɛl kʼigŋ ɛlu es, gbɛkↄ bʼeb a kʼↄ́pim eke kʼɛlu Nyam bia,
aŋke Nyam odad lele Nyam ŋↄŋn ab bʼↄŋ ob fɛŋ el nimamn Nyam ecʼany af.
Eke bʼoc low yɛgm na ɛlu ↄkm agŋ lisijimɛl ɛm, bʼow el Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs mamn, ɛtŋ bʼow yɛgm ekʼↄmn e sodad ebl a lele low yɛgm tasi a ekʼɛŋn Abŋ ɛm a, bʼiyrʼŋ lok.
Gbɛkↄ ìgŋ sawl odad eke low kaka anm ɛm ke ókrm af ↄmn ab a ɛ̀lu es, ke ↄ́tur sos akŋm Nyam ab ŋ ecʼɛb ir ɛm.
Sos ↄtur sos megl af ecʼa el low akplu, kↄ low tɛl ɛm cɛ. Kↄ Nyam ecʼakŋm ab a el low ekʼakpl low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼir ɛb Nyam ab yɛfɛnyna ɛm ɛtŋ ow bʼɛwar ɛy lɛgŋ anym ɛm ecʼɛb ir a.
Na el odad ebl tasi ekʼit eke agŋ fɛŋ kʼɛgŋ eb.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼam ij gbre si kok juma ɛtŋ sʼam atr sos es, aŋke sʼoc ɛy e low ↄmn sʼɛlu Nyam ekʼanŋ owr ke el agŋ fɛŋ e Sↄg Ɛs ab ɛm, ab brobro agŋ a ekʼub nawrɛ a.
Kin ów eke kí dad ke yɛ́gm agŋ.
Kì yɛb ɛgŋ kaka kʼiirʼŋ es aŋke el ŋgbafrɛli sosiɛm; kↄ èl agŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a e sɛwl: ŋ e sodad ebl ɛm, es an ɛm, erur ɛm, ↄmn ɛm lele ŋ e lala el tasi ɛm ab.
Gbuŋ ke mʼów a, àt any awl Nyam e Silɛl a dedeku ecʼany af, ↄm ɛl ów ke yɛ́gm ɛl low.
Kʼìjl Nyam ecʼob ap a ekʼↄny anŋʼŋ ɛm ab es, yecʼa ekʼɛŋn lɛgŋ a eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl dad ow e low, ke agŋ ekpekp a atʼŋ abu nuŋ a.
Àt any kok ów amua fɛŋ, òcr ŋ sosi nimum ɛlu juma eke wɛl abulʼŋ ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɛ́kn ŋ ecʼanym imn a.
Ɔ̀sur ŋ sosi lele ŋ e low yɛgm ab ab. Ìnym es kikri ow af. Tasi ɛm a, eke bi kok ɛbɛn, bʼow ebr ŋ sosi ɛlu es ɛtŋ bʼow eb agŋ a eke bʼiri ŋ e sodad a yɛji.
Eke anŋ ɛgŋ likpekp ab, kì dadʼr odad lɛc ɛm, kↄ ↄmʼn ów lebl es ok ɛm ɛsɛ asŋ
cɛ owʼn el af. Òc ŋgbafrɛ oto ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl af,
ↄyↄw ekpekp ɛsɛ esŋɛl af, ededyↄw oto ɛsɛ esŋ jↄwɛl af ɛrm lala tasi ɛm.
Ɛ̀w eŋnyↄw ekʼↄnym agŋ a e low any.

Gbɛkↄ eke iŋnyↄw nyam ↄny ey oglog alaw ekʼↄtu eke ki kok in e lís e low a, ke -li wewr -lʼɛlu ɛl ecʼↄmn a ↄkm ɛl obi ecʼakŋ a e lís, ke ow ↄ́ŋ -lʼↄwr ɛl ecʼagŋ a ecʼów eke kok ↄŋ ɛl a, aŋke ow el low eke Nyam erur.
Iŋnyↄw ekʼↄnym ɛgŋ kaka eke ki kok in e lís e low a, oc in ecʼↄmn a ɛw Nyam af, ɛtŋ li bi ŋↄŋn Nyam ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab lʼibrm ow abu ɛlum.
Gbɛkↄ iŋnyↄw eke bʼus in ecʼów aw owi jam a, abŋ ɛm a lʼuw ŋ̂, eke nʼanŋ owr sos megl ɛm bↄbↄ yɛji.
Low na anake it eke kʼↄkn ɛl a, yecʼɛtŋ ke wɛl kʼɛ́ŋnm abr ɛnym owi ɛl e lís.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɛ́wm in ecʼagŋ e lís e low any, ab brobro in obi ecʼakŋ ecʼagŋ a, lʼɛgbr in ecʼↄmn a ɛtŋ nʼuŋ lʼakm ɛgŋ ekʼubm Krist nawrɛ a.
Gbuŋ ke nↄ́n iŋnyↄw nyam e nin eŋnyↄw e lɛl ab ɛm a, ow it eke li kʼↄny akpo ekŋ nyahan. Ke lʼél yↄw ekʼↄny igŋ akp nyam cɛ,
ke wɛl úwʼr any in ecʼów amamn kok ɛm, ke lʼél yↄw eke gbagbl in ecʼey a mɛwl ɛm, ↄny ɛrm mamn etu ecʼeb ɛm, ↄŋ agŋ ekʼub Krist nawrɛ a mij yↄyↄg akr es,
atm gbre ɛsɛl abu ke kok ów amamn nↄnↄ gbɛl.
Eŋnyↄw ekʼanŋ ŋgbafrɛ a, kʼɛ̀lu ɛl nin lɛl ab ɛm, aŋke igŋ ɛbi owi bʼow ɛl nuŋ ɛm a, -li bʼigŋ Krist -lʼɛlu es,
ɛtŋ ow bʼↄŋ ɛl -nʼↄny jɛj ok aŋke -lʼirmn ɛl e krɛkrɛ e nɛny ij a ow e lís.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, eke -nʼↄnym low kaka eke -li ki kok a, -li bʼeb akŋ akŋ ecʼɛc abu ɛm; ɛtŋ yecʼeke akplm tasi a el ke -nʼam cacak agŋ, -nʼam dad ów ekʼotm ɛl es, -nʼam bebar nɛnym low fɛŋ ɛm.
Na sosiɛm mʼerur ekʼeŋnyↄw ŋgbafrɛ a kʼɛwl ɛbi egŋ, ew ey, ke nyímn ɛl ecʼakŋ a mɛwl ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke -li kʼↄↄmn ɛy ecʼefnu a abusu dadm ɛy ów eŋuŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, eŋnyↄw ab ɛm nyam nyam ŋgboŋ ejagb nyim nyim ab af, am us Satan jam.
Eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ecʼagŋ ab ɛm eŋnyↄw anŋ, ow it eke li kʼɛlum wɛl abu, ke li kʼígŋm lʼɛlum wɛl es eke Nyamel kʼɛkn ɛl e lís owi. Ke ow ↄ́ŋ Nyamel ↄtu ɛlum eŋnyↄw ekʼanŋ ɛl sↄny a abu.
Agŋ ekpekp a eke bi nyimn Nyamel mɛwl ɛm a it eke kʼɛŋn labm sↄg yony,
ab brobro ɛl a eke bʼij gbre dad Nyam odad, ke bi yɛgm agŋ low a.
Low tasi eke Nyam Lɛl dad a el:
, ɛtŋ:
Eke wɛl oc ɛgŋ likpekp nyam eke wɛl am ok ów af ow ŋ ecʼany af, kʼɛ̀gŋ ow e low kʼeb, eke irim adaŋku yony oglog nyahan e nɛnym.
Agŋ yecʼeke kok sikpl owi a, ɛ̀nym ɛl abr dedeku a nimum ecʼany af, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ likpr a úru low.
Kin low yecʼeke mʼam ibrmʼŋ tasi ɛm Nyam ecʼany af, Jesu Krist ecʼany af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke Nyam sↄsum ot ab ab ecʼany af: ɛ̀lum ów amua ke ow kʼelm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛm, ke kʼánm ɛgŋ kaka jam.
Kʼògŋ es kʼat ɛgŋ abu nuŋ kʼabul il juma Nyamel ɛm. Kʼɛ̀lu abu awlŋɛl e sikpl owi ɛm; ŋ obi a ànŋ lala.
Kʼɛ̀gŋ mij sↄny coco cɛ, kↄ ɛ̀gŋ mar tɛl ŋ eci lokm a sosiɛm, aŋke ↄl ↄ́wmʼŋ ↄny.
Agŋ bɛb e sikpl a bʼɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn gbuŋ eke wɛl ki jɛj ɛl e low ok a, kↄ agŋ likpr ecʼa, jɛj ok a bʼuwr gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl bʼɛkn ɛl e sikpl a.
Ów amamn yɛji wɛl bʼɛkn ɛl kpata, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ɛ́knm kpɛkŋ a yɛji ánm es lↄl ɛm ibnm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke el madu a it eke kʼↄny ɛlum nↄnↄ ligbɛl ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a e lís, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kí dadm low ŋuŋ okm Nyam e nin a lel ɛy e low yɛgm ab ab af.

Madu a eke ↄny es ɛw ɛsɛl eke el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a, wɛl el ɛl lisijimɛl. Ɛɛ nawrɛ! Gbɛkↄ ow elm na sosiɛm -li kʼↄbrmn wɛl any. Tasi ɛm a, wɛl e lís owi anake it eke -li ki kok tasi a, aŋke agŋ a eke -nʼam kok juma -nʼↄŋ a, el ↄmn ɛsɛl eke Nyam erur.
Kin low ekʼit eke ki yɛgm agŋ ke ↄ́ŋ ɛl -li kok a.
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam am yɛgm agŋ low ɛjeci ɛtŋ nʼam igŋ ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist e sodad tasi a lele low yɛgm a eke el ɛy ecʼↄmn ecʼab ab lʼɛlu es,

ke lʼel ɛgŋ eke es ɛfu iy ɛm gbↄŋ ɛtŋ lʼuwm low kaka any. Lʼel ɛgŋ e bʼerur ów es atar owi ke bʼogŋ mum odad ebl sosiɛm. Yogŋ ɛm ecʼów eke bʼanŋ ow a el: nyamn ɛyr, ów ɛsu, ɛgŋ wɛwr, sow tutr yadŋ ɛgŋ e lís,
lel ów es atar eke úwrm, ke bʼanŋ agŋ eke nuŋ ɛm okm es, ke irmn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e dad a ecʼaraŋn. -Li bi tutr ekʼↄmn eke wɛl bʼↄny Nyam ɛm a el ebr eke wɛl bʼeb ↄnyn ob af.
Tasi, ↄmn eke wɛl bʼↄny Nyam ɛm a el ob ↄny ligbɛl, eke wɛl bʼɛgŋ yecʼa cɛ eke wɛl ↄny a eb.
Tasi ɛm a, sʼisam ob kaka ab wus na af ɛtŋ si kʼow sʼↄtum sʼɛwlam ob kaka ab.
Na sosiɛm eke sʼↄny ob ij lele mob sus ɛm ab cɛ, ke ow ↄdŋ ɛy ŋ̂.
Agŋ eke bʼerur eke kʼↄny ob a, bʼɛy mɛju owi ɛm ɛtŋ low aw nↄnↄ lele low ŋuŋ ab bʼↄgŋm ɛl meb ɛtŋ bʼↄny ok ɛl wus ŋuŋn ɛl.
Tasi ɛm a os ecʼerur anake el ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ e min a. Agŋ bɛb ecʼa, os a ecʼↄny e low aw afŋn ɛl es toŋ ɛtŋ -li kpab es ↄmn e lís ɛtŋ -lʼijr ɛl ecʼɛrm a gbre ow sosiɛm.
Gbɛkↄ ŋ eke el Nyam ecʼɛgŋ a, àru ów amua fɛŋ ɛgb es. Ɔ̀l nɛny nyam ij es, ùcu Nyam ↄny es, ìr ɛb ↄmn ɛm, erur ɛm, low eku ɛm lele frↄrↄ el ɛm ab.
Ògŋ ↄmn ɛm e mum mamn a, ùcu sel ekʼↄnym uwr a ↄny es aŋke Nyam ɛsŋʼŋ eke kʼuw sel ɛŋn ikŋ na any, lɛgŋ a ekʼagŋ nↄnↄ ecʼany af ij ŋ ecʼↄmn tasi ekʼↄny e daŋku a.
Mʼam ijlʼŋ nɛny Nyam eke bʼↄŋ ob fɛŋ sel ecʼany af lele Jesu Krist ekʼij ↄmn tasi e nʼↄny a e daŋku Pↄns Pilat
ecʼany af a e nin ɛm.
Ɛ̀lum ów a eke mi dadʼŋ a, ↄsu ów a lala ɛm ekʼabr ɛnym kʼánm ɛm toŋ bake igŋ lɛgŋ a ekʼɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist bʼow ɛwl ow a.
Ɛgŋ a eke bʼow ↄŋ Krist ɛwl ow lɛgŋ a eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es a el Nyam.
Lʼel ehe e nuŋ lel ob fɛŋ ecʼes ɛw ɛs ab,
ɛ́b ebu ɛm ecʼƐb ebu lele kↄtↄkↄɛl ɛm e Kↄtↄkↄ
ab.
In cɛ li kʼↄtum lʼuwm.
Lʼir usuayl usu ekʼɛgŋ kʼↄtum titam.
Ɛgŋ kaka ɛknmʼn ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ɛknmʼn.
Sos usr lele abusu ab él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Dàd wus na af ecʼegbreŋgbi a, -li kʼɛwr sos, -li kʼocr ɛl ecʼↄmn a -li kʼɛwr ob ↄny na eke bʼuwr ab af, kↄ -lʼoc ɛl ecʼↄmn a -lʼɛlu Nyam ɛm, in eke li bʼↄŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ɛrm mamn ɛm ɛy e low kok ecʼa.
Dàd ɛl -li kok ów amamn, -lʼij gbreŋgbi ów amamn kok ɛm, -lʼel ɛ́rm mamnu ke -lʼel agŋ eke bi cɛc ob ɛl lawlɛl ab.
Eke -li bi kok ɛbɛn, -li bʼow -lʼas ob ↄny mamn ekʼↄnym uwr a luku lɛgŋ anym ɛm eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke -nʼɛŋn owr anŋ nawrɛ tasi a.
Libↄwi Timote, ↄsu mɛwl ɛm yecʼa eke Nyam abulʼŋ a. Àru nɛnym ot eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke ókrm af ↄmn ab a lele sodad ekʼagŋ bʼub nuŋ ɛm ↄny e sodad a ɛgb es.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb ij nɛny dad eke ɛl ↄny nuŋ ɛm ↄny ikŋ na ɛtŋ -li kpab es ↄmn e lís.
Ke Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny ab.
II Timothy: Ɛm Pↄl, mʼel Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Wɛl abulʼm eke mi kʼↄb sel ɛŋn a eke wɛl ɛwar ow e low ɛw es, ke anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a ecʼamani.
Timote ɛm ecʼiy e mʼerur, ŋ anake mʼam awŋʼŋ lɛl na a. Ke Nyam Ɛs lel Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ɛ́dŋʼŋ ↄwrↄ, ↄ́ny ŋ e sↄrŋ ikŋ ke ↄ́ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e lís e low tutr tasi ɛm ɛsɛ elel ekʼɛm lagŋɛl
kok ab af a, mʼam ɛluʼl bia. Ncok lel lɛgŋ owr ab mi bʼↄkn ŋ e low ɛm e Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm ɛtŋ mi bʼɛlu Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ ŋ eci.
Mʼam ↄkn ŋ e mikŋ a e low
ɛtŋ mʼam erur tasi eke mi kʼɛknʼŋ bake mʼↄny sos ɛm iŋn.
Ŋ ecʼↄmn nawrɛ tasi a ekʼↄny Jesu Krist ɛm a e low anŋʼm sos ɛm, ↄmn a ekʼalaŋ Lois lel esŋ Enis ab ikŋ anym ↄny gbuŋ ke ↄny a. Mʼub nawrɛ tasi eke ŋ yɛji ↄny.
Ow sosiɛm mʼam ↄknʼŋ: ob ap a eke Nyam ↄŋʼŋ lɛgŋ a eke mʼatʼŋ abu nuŋ a, òkrʼr meb ɛm,
aŋke Abŋ a eke Nyam ↄŋ ɛy a, ↄↄm ɛy sʼɛwm dra dra. Tasi ɛm a, in ecʼAbŋ a bʼↄŋ ɛy lɛc, erur lele low ɛm eci sos es ok ab.
Ɛ́s kʼↄ́nyʼŋ ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci daŋku ij ɛm; ɛ́s kʼↄ́nyʼŋ ɛm e lís eke mʼanŋ sobel
ɛm in sosiɛm a eci. Kↄ ìj gbre ɛm ab Amani Mamn a sosiɛm, lɛc a eke Nyam bʼↄŋʼŋ ab ɛm.

Nyam anake eb ɛlu ɛy es ke ɛsŋ ɛy eke si kʼel in ecʼa; ow elm ɛy ecʼów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kↄ ow el in obi e low eke li bɛbm lʼɛw es, ɛtŋ ow el bibm ↄfr ɛm eke nʼↄŋ ɛy Jesu Krist ɛm gbuŋ eke wus kʼↄb nuŋ a.
Gbɛkↄ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, lʼɛlu ow e low ↄkm ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs Jesu Krist ecʼow na ɛm, aŋke Jesu Krist ↄny luw ecʼabusu a oc es ɛtŋ Amani Mamn ab ɛm li yɛgm owr anŋ a eke úwrm a.
Nyam ocʼm eke mi kʼↄb Amani Mamn na eci kokoba ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛs lele low yɛgm ɛs ab af,

ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm anake mʼam ij gbre amua a. Gbɛkↄ mʼↄny ɛrm susu ligbɛl aŋke mʼuw ɛgŋ a eke mʼoc ɛm ecʼↄmn a mʼɛlu ɛm ab any ɛtŋ mʼub nawrɛ tasi eke nʼↄny abusu eke Jesu Krist e lís ecʼAmani a eke nʼↄŋʼm a, li kʼↄsu toŋ ke ow ít jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a.
Òc ɛsɛ sɛwl af sodad nawrɛ a eke mi dadʼŋ a dadr odad, ke ↄmn a lel erur ab ab a eke sʼↄny Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm a, íj lɛc ow ɛm.
Ɔ̀su Amani Mamn a eke wɛl abulʼŋ a Abŋ Lala a ekʼir ɛy ɛm a e nin ɛm.
Ɛsɛ elel ekʼuw any ab af, Azi ogog ecʼɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ wal ɛluʼm es. Fijɛl lel Ɛrmojɛn ab anŋ ɛm.
Ow akpl eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ kʼɛ́lu in ecʼɛrm mamn a ↄkm Onesifↄr e bosu a e lís, aŋke sakp nↄnↄ li bʼatrʼm sos es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm eke mʼanŋ a, ɛm owi ecʼɛ́s ↄnymʼn;
Ow ↄŋ, eke lʼow Rom a, lʼigŋ nuŋ es lʼↄlʼm es toŋ nʼɛŋnʼm.
Ow akpl eke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ kʼↄŋ abusu nʼɛ́ŋn Nyam ogŋ eci sↄrŋ ikŋ a. Efɛs yogŋ ecʼabu ɛlum eke mʼɛŋn in ɛm a, uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ŋ, ɛm jim, ɛ̀ŋn ŋ e lɛc a bibm eke bʼanŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ɛŋn ɛy ab ɛm.
Low yecʼa ekʼiri mi dad adaŋku nↄnↄ ecʼany af a, òc abul agŋ ekʼↄny ↄmn ɛl ɛm eke bʼow ↄtu ↄny lɛc, ɛl yɛji oc im yɛgm agŋ ɛjecʼa.
Ŋ yɛji gbre ekʼit eke kʼɛbmʼŋ ɛsɛ Jesu Krist ecʼar ogŋ ɛs mamn af a, ɛ̀gŋ eb.
Ar ogŋ ɛs mamn ekʼɛgŋ ar ogŋ e low eb, ke am erur ekʼin ecʼɛgŋ ligbɛl a kʼawʼr a, li kókm agŋ ɛm ecʼów a eke agŋ ekʼelm ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a bi kok a ij.
Mum ogŋ ɛs ekʼam ogŋ mum a, ke nʼɛ́ŋn ow ecʼob ap ekʼanŋ ɛm a, ow it eke li kʼɛlum mum ogŋ a e sol a.
Wus juma kok ɛs it eke kʼij gbre kok juma, gbuŋ ke nʼɛ́ŋn ow ecʼegb ey a lʼij.
Tùtr ów amua eke mʼam dad a sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow ɛlumʼŋ abu iri fɛŋ ow okʼŋ es sos ɛm.
Ɔ̀kn Jesu Krist ekʼel David e bosu ɛm ecʼɛgŋ ke anŋ luw ɛm igb ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn a eke mʼam ↄb ow e kokoba a dad ab af a.
Amani Mamn na sosiɛm anake mʼam ij gbre, ke wɛl okm ŋgbraka ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs af a. Gbɛkↄ Nyam ecʼodad a in wɛl okmʼn ŋgbraka.
Na sosiɛm mʼam ɛgŋ low fɛŋ mʼeb agŋ a eke Nyam sↄsum ot a e nimamn eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -nʼɛŋn sel ɛŋn a eke bʼow anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow a, lel anygbɛl a ekʼↄnym uwr ab ab.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi:
Eke sʼuw Krist ab,
si bʼow sʼanŋ owr in ab;
eke si bʼinym es kikri,
si bʼow sʼel es ɛw ɛsɛl in ab;
eke si bʼigŋ sʼɛluʼl es,
in yɛji li bʼow lʼigŋ lʼɛlu ɛy es;
ekʼɛy sʼelm cɛcɛ,
ke in gbɛ lʼel cɛcɛ,
aŋke li kʼↄtum lʼɛgbram in sosi.
Ɔ̀kn agŋ a fɛŋ ów a ekʼiri a, ke íbrm tasi Nyam ecʼany af eke -li kʼɛsumn ów sodad ebl sosiɛm. Ów ɛsu amua elm low kaka, ow el agŋ a eke bʼiri a ecʼirmn cɛ.
Ŋ ecʼa, àtr sos es ke Nyam ecʼany af a él gbawru, ɛsɛ juma kok ɛs ekʼitm ekʼɛ́s kʼↄny in e juma e li kok a eci, ke am ↄb nɛny nyam ɛm low nawrɛ ecʼamani a.
Ów es atar ↄfr ↄfr a, ekʼelm ↄmn ecʼa, àru ɛgb es, aŋke agŋ a eke bʼanŋ ow ecʼów ɛm a, ow bʼow ↄŋ ɛl -nʼam kpab es Nyam e lís.
Ɛl eci sodad ebl a bʼow anŋ ɛsɛ lɛbi ekʼugŋ es ke am ij sos megl a lokm ɛm ab af. Agŋ amua ɛm anake Imene lele Filɛt ab anŋ a.
-Li digŋ low nawrɛ a -lʼɛlu es. -Nʼam dad eke Nyam in ↄny agŋ in igbm luw ɛm lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ, ow ↄŋ -nʼam ŋuŋn agŋ nↄnↄ ecʼↄmn a.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam ecʼodad ebl nawrɛ tasi a eke sigm es ɛsɛ êl eci lebn eke wɛl ɛlu nↄmu ɛm af a, itŋnm. Kin sodad eke wɛl nↄn af yogŋ a:
. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl igŋ af eke:

Êl ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ow elm sikpokpo eke wɛl kok sika ɛm lele jɛtɛ ufu ɛm ab cɛ ánm, kↄ kpokpo eke wɛl aku ekŋ ɛm lele yecʼeke wɛl kok kpeŋ ɛm ab yɛji bʼanŋ. Ekʼes gbɛgbl bʼanŋ a, jɛtɛ ufu ɛm lele sika ɛm e sikpokpo a wɛl bʼot, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ ↄfr ↄfr ɛm ecʼa, wɛl bʼot ekŋ ɛm lele kpeŋ ɛm ab ecʼa.

Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼocr sos es ów yadŋ na fɛŋ ɛm a, bʼow anŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo amamn a eke wɛl bʼijr ob es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab af. Wɛl bʼow oc ɛwʼr es in ecʼEs Ɛw a eci. Li bʼow nʼanŋ ow e juma eci ɛtŋ wɛl bʼow oc kokrʼr juma nimamn fɛŋ.
Àru ŋgbafrɛ ɛm e low aw fɛŋ ɛgb es; ↄl ɛb ir nyim nyim, ↄmn, erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab es, agŋ a ekʼɛrm lala ɛm bʼɛsŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ab ab.
Ów es atar ↄfr ↄfr eke low kaka anm ɛm a, àru ɛgb es, aŋke uw any ekʼow bʼɛdŋ nuŋ ów ɛsu ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma kok ɛs itm eke kʼɛsu ów. Ow it ekʼin e low kʼakpl agŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛgŋ ekʼↄtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low, ke ɛ́gŋ agŋ eci cak eke bi cakʼr a e low eb.
Ow it ekʼɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm, li ki yɛgm agŋ a eke bʼocʼr odad es nɛnym a low, aŋke Nyam ↄtu eke kʼↄŋ ɛl abusu -lʼitŋn ɛl ecʼes an a, ke -lʼuw low nawrɛ any.
-Li bʼow -nʼŋgboŋ agn eci meb a ekʼucu ↄny ɛl es ab ɛm, -li kʼow -li kokmn agn ecʼerur ij, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼↄg es -nʼam ↄny sow tutr amamn.
Kin low ekʼit eke kʼuw any: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, sɛgŋ a bʼow ɛw tuↄtuↄ.

Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bʼow ↄny ɛl obi cɛ ecʼerur, el os e lawlɛl, safri ↄwl ɛsɛl lel es ɛfuu ab; -li bʼow -lʼel Nyam any ↄbr ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li kʼow -nʼↄnymn ɛl ɛsɛl ecʼɛlum. -Li kʼow -lʼuwmn bia ↄŋ any; -li kʼow -nʼↄnymn Nyam ecʼów a ecʼɛlum.

-Li bʼow -lʼel agŋ ekʼↄny ɛrm tuↄtuↄ, ↄnym sↄrŋ ikŋ, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -li dad ów yadŋ ɛm ɛl lawlɛl e lís. -Li bʼow -lʼel agŋ ekʼↄnynm sos es, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼerur agŋ eci gbre ijr, ke -lʼel low nimamn ecʼefnu.
-Li bʼow -lʼel agŋ ɛju, agŋ ekʼam jɛjm ów es, agŋ ekʼes ɛfu iy ɛm gbↄŋ. -Li bʼow -lʼerur ɛl obi ɛm ecʼów eke bʼaw ɛl a, -lʼakm Nyam ecʼerur eke -li kʼↄny a.
-Li bʼow -li kok nyandrɛ -lʼel Nyam ecʼéruru; kↄ tasi ɛm a, -li bʼow -lʼigŋ ↄmn e lɛc a -lʼɛlu es. Agŋ amua, àru ɛgb ɛl es.
Ɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam bʼok mel akŋ ɛtŋ ↄyↄw fuɛfuɛ a ekʼↄny sikpl nↄnↄ, ke ↄmn ijm lɛc a, -li bʼɛŋn wɛl meb a eke -li bʼuk wɛl ab ɛm; ↄyↄw amua bi kok ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke bʼaw ɛl a.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄyↄw amua bʼanŋ low wewr ɛm, kↄ -lʼↄtumn lɛgŋ kaka -lʼuwmn low nawrɛ any.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a Janɛs lele Jambrɛs
ab atarir Mois ab a, agŋ amua yɛji bʼatar low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab. -Lʼel agŋ ekʼɛl e sow tutr a inyam, ke ɛl ecʼↄmn a yɛji elm low kaka.
Gbɛkↄ -li kʼow -nʼiimn kpekpe yɛji, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ bʼow ɛkn ɛl eci yadŋ a ɛsɛ elel ekʼow ɛcr Janɛs lele Jambrɛs ab ecʼab af.
Gbɛkↄ ŋ, usʼm jam ɛm e low yɛgm ab ɛm, es an ab ɛm, lel ów eke mi bɛbm mʼɛw es ab ab ɛm. Usʼm jam ɛm ecʼↄmn ab ɛm, ɛm e low eku ab ɛm, ɛm ecʼerur ab ɛm, ɛm e low es ucu ↄny kikri ab ɛm,

ɛtŋ gbre eke wɛl ijrʼm lele low eke mi dↄgr ab ab yɛji uw any. Low fɛŋ ekʼɛŋnʼm sɛb amua ekʼel: Pisidi ecʼAntiↄs Ikoniↄm lele Lisr ab ɛm a, uw any ɛtŋ uw gbre yecʼeke wɛl ijrʼm a yɛjʼany. Gbɛkↄ, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eb ɛluʼm es ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.
Ɛtŋ agŋ fɛŋ ekʼerur eke kʼir ɛb cɛcɛ ɛm Nyam eci, Jesu Krist ab ecʼaf okr ɛm a, wɛl bʼow ijr ɛl gbre.
Gbɛkↄ, molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a lele mɛju ɛsɛl ab ab bʼow im kpekpe ɛl eci low ŋuŋ kok ab ɛm; -li bʼow -lʼɛju agŋ bɛb ke ɛl obi yɛji wɛl ɛju ɛl.
Sica ŋ ecʼa, ùcu yecʼa eke wɛl yɛgmʼŋ ke ɛgŋ eb ↄmn ɛm tasi a ↄny es. Uw low yɛgm ɛsɛl eke yɛgmʼŋ low ab any.
Tasi ɛm a, ŋ e likekli ɛm ɛtŋ uw Nyam e Silɛl Lala ab any, -lʼↄtu eke -li kʼↄŋʼŋ sɛwr a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm, eke wɛl bʼↄny ↄmn Jesu Krist ɛm a.
Nyam Lɛl fɛŋ el Nyam ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm ecʼów eke wɛl nↄn, ɛtŋ ow bʼɛlum agŋ abu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ogŋ low yecʼekʼelm ow a, akpal low ŋuŋ, yɛgm agŋ es an nyim nyim ɛm ecʼɛb ir,
yecʼɛtŋ ke Nyam ecʼɛgŋ ↄ́ny sos bɛbm nawrɛ tasi, ke lʼↄ́tu nʼↄny abusu li kok low nimamn fɛŋ.
Sica mʼam dadʼŋ Nyam ecʼany af lele Jesu Krist eke bʼow jɛj agŋ ekʼanŋ owr lel agŋ ekʼuw ab ecʼów ok a ecʼany af, mʼam dadʼŋ Jesu Krist e mowrer a lel in ecʼes ɛw ab ab sosiɛm mʼɛsɛ:
nɛny átʼŋ es dad Nyam ecʼodad a, ekʼow el lɛgŋ mamn ɛm oglog lɛgŋ ŋuŋ ɛm yɛji, dád eb agŋ, ɛ́nym agŋ abr oglog átr agŋ sos es, ke ↄ́ny low eku nↄnↄ agŋ e low yɛgm ɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ bʼow ow ekʼagŋ kʼow erurm eke kʼiri low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi a, ke bʼow erur us ɛl obi ecʼów eke bʼaw ɛl a jam, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼɛsŋ low yɛgm ɛsɛl nↄnↄ eke bʼow dad ɛl ów a eke -li bʼerur eke -li kʼiri a.
-Li bʼow -li bʼabl ↄru low nawrɛ ecʼiri e lís, ke -lʼɛwl -nʼam iri agŋ ecʼów eke bi kↄkn dad a.
Ŋ ecʼa, òk sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋ gbre ij eb, kòk ŋ ecʼAmani Mamn e kokoba ↄb e juma a, kòk ŋ e Nyam juma a íy nɛny.
Ɛm ecʼa, wanci ow eke wɛl kʼoc wawrʼm egb; wanci eke mi kʼɛlu wus na es a ow.
Mʼogŋ mum mamn a, mʼim toŋ mʼigŋ ɛm ecʼes uru a e nuŋ, mʼucu ɛm ecʼↄmn a mʼↄny es.

Sica any eke mʼeb eci labm sↄg a, am ekuʼm. Ow ow el nɛny nyam ij e tufɛ a eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, jɛj ok ɛs nɛny nyam ɛs a bʼow ↄŋʼm jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm cɛ li kʼow nʼↄↄm im, kↄ agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼam eku erur ɛm wanci a eke li bʼow lʼɛlu sos ↄkm a.
Àtr sos es ow fafa ɛŋnʼm,
aŋke Demas igŋ ɛluʼm es wus ecʼów ecʼerur eke nʼↄny nↄnↄ a sosiɛm eci; lʼeb ejagb nʼim Tesaloni. Kresan eb ejagb im Galasi ɛtŋ Tit im Dalmasi.
Luk sↄny cɛ anŋ ɛm ab. Òc Mark ke ów in ab, aŋke lʼↄtu eke li kʼɛlum im abu ɛm e juma ab ɛm.
Mʼɛrm Tisik Efɛs.
Lɛgŋ eke bʼow ow a, ìsmʼm ɛm e mob af ɛw a eke mʼɛw es Troas Karpↄs ogŋ a, ke ísmʼm silɛl a yɛji, ab brobro ɛl a eke wɛl nↄn ndey lɛl af a.
Alesandr
lôw ofŋ ɛs a kok low ekʼakplm ɛm e lís; Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ bʼow sↄgʼr low ŋuŋ a e li kokʼm a e labm.
Ŋ yɛji ↄsu sos in e lís, aŋke ɛy e sodad a e dad ɛm lʼatar ɛy ab lɛc ɛm.
Lɛgŋ eke mʼↄg es mʼim odad jɛj ok ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka anm ɛm ab, ɛl fɛŋ -lʼigŋ -lʼɛluʼm es. Ke blel Nyam kʼↄ́bm ɛl low ow eci.
Gbɛkↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, in anŋ ɛm ab ɛtŋ lʼatrʼm sos es, ow ↄŋ mʼↄny abusu mi dad in ecʼodad a mʼok Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl amua fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ li sↄgʼm kukuma amua e nɛnym.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ɛmɛny bʼow eb ɛluʼm es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼanŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ mʼɛy in ecʼAfr eci gbreŋgbi usu a. In ecʼél anygbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Ɛ̀sŋn Prisil, Akilas lele Onesifↄr e bosu ab ab ↄŋʼm.
Eras anŋ Korɛnt ɛtŋ mʼɛw Trofim es Mile, aŋke ↄl am ↄnyʼn.
Àtr sos es ow gbuŋ ke lɛfr e lɛgŋ a ów. Ebul, Pudɛs, Linus, Klodia lel agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjecʼa fɛŋ ab am ɛsŋnʼŋ.
Ke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ánŋ ŋ ab.
Ke Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny ab.
Titus: Ɛm bↄwri Tit,

ɛm Pↄl, Nyam e juma kok ɛs lele Jesu Krist ecʼɛrm ɛs ab, ɛm mʼam awŋ lɛl na. Nyam abulʼm eke mi kʼɛsŋ agŋ a eke li sↄsum lʼot a ↄny ↄmn, ke mi yɛ́gm ɛl -lʼuw low nawrɛ any, ke -lʼir ɛb ekʼokr af ɛy ecʼↄmn eke sʼↄny ab ab,
yecʼɛtŋ ke -nʼↄny low eku sel ekʼↄnym uwr a eci. Nyam ekʼↄ́nym yadŋ a, ɛwar ɛy ɛb ir ikŋ na gbuŋ eke low fɛŋ kʼanŋ a.
Lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw es a, Nyam ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs ɛlu in ecʼodad a ↄkm. Odad a anake el amani a eke nʼↄŋʼm, ke nʼↄŋʼm abusu eke mi kʼↄb a.
Tit, mʼam nↄn lɛl na mʼawŋʼŋ, ŋ ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ecʼiy tasi af, ↄmn a ekʼokr ɛy af ab ɛm. Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs ab ɛ́dŋʼŋ ↄwrↄ, ke ↄ́ŋʼŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
Mʼɛwʼŋ es Krɛt eke kʼuwar ów sisigm ekʼanŋ a, ke ɛb ɛb a e Sinyamel ab ɛm sↄ́sum agŋ ekpekp ot ɛsɛ idr ɛsɛl af, ɛsʼelel eke mʼↄŋʼŋ ow ecʼabusu ab af.
Ɛgŋ likpekp a it eke kʼel ɛgŋ ekʼabr ɛnym anm lís; yↄw nyam cɛ ecʼigŋ,
ke in ecʼey a él Nyam e nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl eke wɛl kʼↄtum okm ów af ɛl ecʼes an keskes eci, oglog ɛl ecʼɛgŋ ɛluam eci.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyamel ecʼidr ɛs eke bʼɛkn Nyam ecʼów a, it eke kʼir ɛb mɛwl ɛm. Li kʼélm es ɛfuu, ɛrm beblu, mar ɛgŋu, lʼélm ɛgŋ ekʼↄny gaŋgaŋ, lʼélm ɛgŋ e bʼↄl os ↄny es yadŋ ɛm.
Ow it eke li kʼeb agŋ eke bʼow in ogŋ a mɛwl ɛm, ke lʼél low nimamn e lawl. Ke lʼél ɛgŋ e bʼiri ɛgŋ owi, ɛgŋ nyim nyim, eke bʼeb Nyam ecʼebr a, ke lʼél ɛgŋ e bʼↄnyn sos es.

Ow it eke li kʼucu odad tasi a ekʼit a nʼↄny es nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, odad a ekʼokr af yecʼa eke wɛl yɛgm ab ab a. Ɛbɛn ke lʼↄ́tu lʼatr agŋ likpr a sos es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ɛm, ke li yɛ́gm agŋ a ekʼɛgŋm low yɛgm a ebm a ɛl ecʼirm a.
Mi dad sodad amua aŋke agŋ nↄnↄ ↄ́nym ɛlum, ab brobro Jwifɛl eke bʼus Jesu jam, ke am erur ekʼagŋ kʼubr likr es ab ɛm;
-li bʼirmn agŋ ɛl e nɛnym ↄb e sodad ebl ab ɛm.
Ow it eke kʼabl ɛl nɛny es, aŋke -li bi ŋuŋn sibosu nimum ɛtŋ -li bi yɛgm low ekʼitm a, yecʼɛtŋ ke -nʼɛŋn os yadŋ ɛm.
Krɛt iy nyam in obi, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛs nyam anake dad ninɛ: «Godʼɛtŋ Krɛt eyŋ el ayadŋu, mindey eŋuŋ, ↄkpↄrŋu e bi tutr ɛl e lok iy owi cɛ.»
Ɛtŋ ow eke li dad a el low nawrɛ tasi. Na sosiɛm anake ki dad ɛl odad lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm, ke -lʼub nawrɛ tasi,
yecʼɛtŋ ke -li kʼucumn Jwifɛl e kpↄkpↄ ɛm ecʼów yadŋ a e dad a -nʼↄnymn es; -lʼɛluamn agŋ a eke bʼigŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛlu es e sol a.
Fɛŋ el lala
agŋ a eke bʼɛlum Nyam e sol a eci; kↄ agŋ a ekʼɛluam, ke ɛ́gŋm ubm nawrɛ ecʼa, kaka elm lala, aŋke ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a lel ɛl sow tutr ab ab yɛji ikpi.
-Li bʼij nɛny -lʼɛsɛ ɛl uw Nyam any, kↄ ɛl ecʼów eke -li bi kok a bʼanŋ ɛjeci. -Lʼel agŋ ↄbr tasi, -lʼɛluamn ɛgŋ kaka ɛtŋ -lʼↄtumn -li kokmn low nimamn kaka.
Gbɛkↄ ŋ, yɛ̀gm yecʼa ekʼotarir es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab a.
Dàd agŋ ekpekp a él agŋ eke kʼↄny sos es ok low kok ɛm, ↄ́ny sos us, any es ok, íj lɛc ↄmn ɛm, erur ɛm lele low eku ɛm ab.
Dàd ↄyↄw ekpekp a yɛji ↄ́ny ɛb ir mamn eke bʼakpl Nyam sos ɛm. Ke -li ki dadmn ɛl lawlɛl a e lís ecʼów eŋuŋ, -lʼelmn mar eci madyↄw. Ke -li yɛgm low yeci ekʼakpl a,
yecʼɛtŋ ke -li yɛgm ↄyↄw oto a ↄ́ny ɛl ɛcɛl lel ɛl ecʼey ab ecʼerur.
-Lʼel any es ok lisɛl ekʼↄnym wiawia, akŋ juma kok lisɛl amamn, ekʼↄny ɛl ɛcɛl ecʼɛlum, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄ́nym low ŋuŋ dadm Nyam ecʼodad a e lís.
Ìbrm ŋgbafrɛ oto a yɛji él agŋ ány es oku low fɛŋ ɛm.
Ŋ obi yɛji, ow it eke kʼel sɛwl ów amamn kok ɛm. Ŋ e low yɛgm a él nawrɛ tasi, ↄ́ny sos usr.
Ke ŋ e sodad ebl a él nyim nyim eke wɛl kʼↄ́nym low dadm ow e lís, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛy ecʼefnu a kʼↄ́nym low dadm okm ɛy af, ke ɛ́s ók ɛl any.
Ow it eke madu kʼↄny ɛl ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a ecʼɛlum, ke -nʼↄŋ wɛl áw ɛl low fɛŋ ɛm, ke -li kʼↄnymn odad wɛl ab.

Ɛtŋ ow itm eke -li kʼiy wɛl ob kaka fɛŋ. Kↄ ow tasi eke -li ki kok a el, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ -lʼɛlu ɛl ecʼagŋ amamn eke -lʼeel lele ɛl e cɛcɛ el ab ab ↄkm, yecʼɛtŋ ke low fɛŋ ɛm Nyam ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs eci low yɛgm a ɛ́ŋn any.
Mi dad ów amua fɛŋ aŋke Nyam ɛlu in e bibm eke bi sↄg agŋ fɛŋ a ↄkm.
Bibm a bi yɛgm ɛy eke si kʼigŋ ɛy ecʼɛb ir ŋuŋ lele wus ecʼów aw ab ab sʼɛlu es, ke sʼↄ́tu wus af aŋa sʼir ɛb nuŋ ɛm ↄny ɛm, nɛny nyam ɛm lele Nyam ecʼes ucu ↄny ɛm ab.
Nɛnɛ anake si bʼow sʼeku sos ɛm iŋn e lɛgŋ a eke sʼam ↄmn a, lɛgŋ a ekʼɛy e Sↄg Ɛs Jesu Krist ekʼel ɛy e Nyam ligbɛl a bʼow ɛy ↄkm in ecʼanygbɛl ɛm a.
Lʼirmn in e sel a ɛy sosiɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke li sↄ́g ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm. Lʼerur eke li ki kok ɛy sʼel bieku ekʼin obi lʼayal, agŋ ekʼel in sↄny eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ów amamn kok bʼanŋ sos ɛm.
Low yɛgm na anake kʼɛlu ↄkm ŋ ecʼabusu a ekʼɛŋn ab ɛm, átr agŋ sos es oglog ɛ́nym agŋ abr a. Kì yɛb ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ kaka kʼiirʼŋ es.
Ɔ̀kn nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ow it eke -li kʼis es es ɛw ɛsɛl lele abusu ɛsɛl
ab ecʼany af, -nʼↄny wɛl ecʼɛlum, ke -nʼↄny sos bɛbm low mamn fɛŋ e kok eci.
-Li ki dadmn low ŋuŋ ɛl lawl e lís, kↄ -lʼel ɛrm es ɛy ecʼagŋ, -lʼel agŋ amamn, ke -lʼɛlu ɛl e frↄrↄ el ↄkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís.

Gbuŋ ke sʼúb Jesu nawrɛ a, sʼel agŋ ekʼuwm low kaka any, ↄnym ɛlum kaka, irm itm es, el low aw lele low e bʼiŋn sos ɛm ab eci madu ɛtŋ sʼir ɛb low ŋuŋ ɛm lele nyamnɛyr ɛm ab. Wɛl bʼↄny ɛy e sifn ɛtŋ ɛy ↄfr ɛm yɛji si bʼifanin.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs ɛlu in e sↄrŋ ikŋ lel in ecʼerur ab ab ↄkm agŋ fɛŋ eci,
ɛtŋ li sↄg ɛy, ow elm ɛy ecʼów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kↄ eke nʼↄny ɛy e sↄrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Li sↄg ɛy mij a eke bʼayal ɛy sʼel agŋ owr ab ɛm;
ɛtŋ ow ecʼiri tasi a el: ɛb ir owr a ekʼAbŋ Lala bʼↄŋ ɛy a.
Abŋ Lala na, Nyam in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm ↄmun in es ɛy af, Jesu Krist ɛy e Sↄg Ɛs ab ecʼaf okr a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn anake in e sↄrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, li bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼel nyim nyim in ecʼany af, ke ow bʼɛlu ɛy abusu es sʼɛŋn sel a ekʼↄnym uwr ke sʼam ↄmn a.
Odad na el odad nawrɛ tasi, ɛtŋ mʼam erur eke nɛny kʼatʼŋ es nↄnↄ ow e dad ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke agŋ a ekʼub Nyam nawrɛ a, át any kok ów amamn mɛwl ɛm. Na el low akplu ɛtŋ el agŋ fɛŋ ecʼabu ɛlum.
Gbɛkↄ àru ów ekʼↄnym low yɛgm a ɛgb es ɛsɛ: agŋ lagŋɛl e mew ecʼes ↄsŋm,
ów ɛsu lele Mois ecʼol a ecʼów es atar owi ab ab. Amua fɛŋ el ów ↄfr ↄfr eke low kaka anm ɛm.
Ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼis ɛm bubr owi a, ɛ̀war ir akp nyam, sakp yony
gbuŋ ke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, kpábʼr es Nyamel e lís.
Ɔtu eke kʼuw any ekʼɛgŋ ikŋ na ejagb ŋuŋ nʼam eb. Ɛtŋ sikpl a eke nʼam kok nʼim ab ɛm, ow el in sosi eke nʼam ↄbr low.
Ba mi bʼɛrm Artemas oglog Tisik
ow a, àtr sos es ow ɛŋnʼm Nikopolis, aŋke mi bɛbm eke mi kʼanŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
Ɛ̀gŋ eb ɛlum Zenas eke jɛj ok owi ɛm el ɛgŋ dogŋn ɛs a lel Apolↄs
ab abu ɛl ecʼejagb us ab ɛm, yecʼɛtŋ ke -li kʼↄnymn ob kaka ecʼes abur.
Ow akpl eke ɛy ecʼagŋ ekʼub Krist nawrɛ a yɛji, ki wewr ɛrm mamn ↄny, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼↄtu -li kok es abur fɛŋ eke bʼowr ɛl a, ke ɛl ecʼɛb ir a kʼélm ↄfr ↄfr.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼanŋ ɛm ab a am ɛsŋnʼŋ. Ɛ̀sŋn ɛy lawlɛl a ekʼↄny ↄmn nyam coco ɛy ab a.
Ke Nyam ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab.
Philemon: Ɛm Pↄl, eke wɛl ɛlu sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm
lele ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, mʼam awŋ Filemↄ ɛy lawl sɛnyn juma kok ɛm lɛl na.
Lɛl na el ɛy lisijↄw Apia lel ɛy e low dogŋn ɛm e lawl Arkip
lele Nyamel eke bʼas luku ŋ ecʼakŋ ab ab yɛjʼeci.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ↄny ↄwrↄ, ke ↄ́ŋ ↄny ɛrm es ɛy.
Sakp sakp fɛŋ, ɛm e Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm, mi bʼↄkn Filemↄ ŋ e low ɛtŋ mi bʼↄŋ ɛm e Nyam a bia;
aŋke mʼam iri agŋ am dad ŋ ecʼerur ekʼↄny agŋ a fɛŋ ekʼub nawrɛ a eci, lele ŋ ecʼↄmn ekʼↄny Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼab ab e low.
Mʼam ibrm Nyam eke ↄmn a ekʼↄny ɛsɛ ɛy af a, kʼij lɛc ŋ ɛm, ke ow ↄ́ŋ uw ów amamn fɛŋ eke sʼↄny Krist ɛm, ɛy ecʼowr anŋ na ɛm ab any.
Lisijim ŋ ecʼerur ekʼↄny a, ↄŋʼm sos ɛm iŋn nↄnↄ lele sos es atr ab, aŋke agŋ a ekʼub nawrɛ a, usur ɛl ɛrm.
Na sosiɛm, ekʼabusu ɛruʼm es Krist ɛm eke mi ki dadʼŋ low ke kók yɛji,
mʼam erur ekʼerur ɛm a, mʼɛw ibrm ɛm. Ɛm Pↄl, ɛ̀kn elel eke mʼanŋn, ɛgŋ ligbɛlgbɛl ekʼɛmɛny anŋ sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm,
mʼam ŋↄŋnʼŋ eke kʼeb Onesim.
Lʼel ɛm ecʼiy Jesu Krist ɛm sobel ɛm aŋa.
Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm, lʼakplm ŋ eci, kↄ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a lʼakpl ŋ lel ɛm ab eci.
Mʼam ɛwlmʼn mɛny sica lʼow nʼɛŋnʼŋ, in eke lʼɛw ɛsɛ ɛm obi e sos ogog af a.
Mʼerur tasi eke blel mʼↄnymʼn ab nʼanŋʼm saw eke mʼanŋ sobel ɛm Amani Mamn sosiɛm a, yecʼɛtŋ ke ŋ usuiy a li kók ɛm e lís e low.
Gbɛkↄ mʼerurm eke mi ki kok low ekʼɛlum nɛny es, yecʼɛtŋ ke low mamn a eke ki kok a, kʼélm atrm ɛm, kↄ ɛrm frↄrↄ ɛm.
Onesim kpabʼŋ e lís, ow kʼↄdm ke ow el lɛgŋ tɛl eci, yecʼɛtŋ ke bʼɛŋnʼn ke ow él sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci,
aŋke caca ɛm a, lʼelm adu ij, kↄ nʼↄny any lʼakm adu: lʼel erur ɛm ecʼɛgŋ lisijim. Lʼilʼm an nↄnↄ, kↄ ŋ ecʼa ow bʼow afŋn es, ɛgŋ e lʼel a lele nawrɛ ub ɛs eke lʼel ab ab sosiɛm eci.
Sica eke bʼocʼm ɛsɛ awlŋ af, ke èbʼr ɛsɛ ɛm obi ɛm obi af.
Eke li kok ŋ low ŋuŋ oglog nʼↄnymʼŋ ob ab, ùb ɛwʼm af.
Ɛm obi ecʼabu ɛm anake mʼam nↄn ów amua a: Ɛm Pↄl, mi bʼow mʼↄwr mʼↄŋʼŋ. (Ow itm eke mi kʼↄknʼŋ eke ŋ obi yɛji ↄnymʼm ob ab, kↄ yadŋ ee? ŋ ecʼowr anŋ tasi a.)
Lisijim, mʼam ŋↄŋnʼŋ, kok low na eke mʼam ibrm a ↄŋʼm Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ecʼerur a sosiɛm: ɛ̀yrʼm ɛrm es Krist ab ecʼaf okr a sosiɛm.
Wanci na af eke mʼam awŋʼŋ lɛl a, mʼↄny ↄmn tasi eke bʼow kok low a eke mʼam ibrmʼŋ a ɛtŋ mʼuw any yɛjʼeke bʼow kok ow afŋ es.
Kòkʼm es ɛru usu yɛji kpɛkŋ, aŋke ↄny e Nyam ŋↄŋn ɛm, mʼam ↄny ↄmn eke wɛl bʼow ɛluʼm es ↄŋ ↄny.
Epafras
ekʼanŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab Jesu Krist sosiɛm a, am ɛsŋnʼŋ,
ɛtŋ Mark,
Aritak, Demas lele Luk ab ekʼel ɛm lawlɛl juma kok nyam ɛm a yɛji, am ɛsŋnʼŋ.
Ke sica Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu Krist ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab.
Hebrews: Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Nyam ɛcr kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ɛm dad ɛy lagŋɛl odad, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl odad a sakp nↄnↄ lel akunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm ab.
Kↄ sica, sɛgŋ na ekʼel sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛcr Jim ɛm dad ɛy odad. Jim na ɛm lʼɛcr li kok afr lele wus ab, ɛtŋ in cɛ anake Nyam sↄsum ocʼr eke li kʼel ob a fɛŋ ecʼaja ij ɛs a.

Iy na bʼɛlu in ecʼanygbɛl e jɛjn a ↄkm, ɛtŋ lʼel ow ecʼes otarir kpɛŋ, ɛtŋ in ecʼodad ebl ecʼabusu a ucu wus lel ob fɛŋ ab ↄny es. Li yↄyↄg agŋ e sikpl ab es, ɛtŋ nʼim li sig es afr Nyam ekʼↄny abusu ob fɛŋ af a e lidr abu af.
Iy na ↄny any nↄnↄ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl. Ɛɛ, ow ɛru es kpata, aŋke Nyam ↄŋʼn aja nin ekʼↄny any nↄnↄ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼa.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ:
Ŋ el ɛm ecʼIy,
yɛfɛnyna, ɛm mʼewʼŋ.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, li dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka yɛji lʼɛsmɛ:
Ɛm, mi bʼow mʼel Ɛs,
ɛtŋ in, li bʼow lʼel ɛm ecʼIy.
Gbɛkↄ, lɛgŋ a eke nʼↄŋ in e yɛfl Iy a ow wus na af a, li dad ninɛ:
Nyam ecʼafr ɛrm ɛsɛl a pupukpaŋ it eke kʼigŋʼn nuŋ.
Kin low yecʼeke li dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl e lís:
ŋ el ɛgŋ a ekʼↄŋ ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛf af,
ke ŋ e juma kok ɛsɛl bi kok ŋ e low ɛsɛ al e bʼiri ab af a.
Kↄ Nyam dad Jim e lís ninɛ:
ŋ el Nyam ɛtŋ ŋ ecʼɛb ebu ecʼatufu lɛkpn a anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Ŋ e kpama ab ab, am nyimn ŋ ecʼagŋ a low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm,
bʼerur low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛtŋ bʼifn low ŋuŋ.
Na sosiɛm Nyam, ŋ e Nyam sↄsum ocʼŋ awlŋɛl ab ɛm
eke kʼel in eci, ɛtŋ lʼɛtm sos ɛm iŋn e mun lʼokʼŋ nuŋ.
Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ:
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, nuŋ ↄb ɛm a, ŋ anake kok wus a,
ɛtŋ afr el ob eke ŋ e sabu a ol.
Ów amua fɛŋ bʼow irm,
kↄ ŋ, bʼow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Afr lele wus ab bʼow ɛni ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
bʼow ↄny ar ɛl es ɛsɛ gbad af,
ɛɛ, -li bʼow -lʼitŋn any ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af.
Gbɛkↄ ŋ, bʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ŋ ecʼelel a cɛ,
ɛtŋ ŋ ecʼowr anŋ a úwrm.
Lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ:
Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af,
toŋ bake mʼót ŋ ecʼefnu mʼok ŋ ecʼakr ew a.
Tasi ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl bla -lʼel ee? -Lʼel abŋ ekʼↄny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, ke Nyam bʼɛrm im ɛlum agŋ a eke kʼij sel ekʼↄnym uwr ecʼaja a abu.
Low na sosiɛm a, ow it eke si kʼoc ɛrm sʼɛw sodad eke sʼiri ab af; eke ow elm ɛbɛn, si bʼow sʼitir ejagb any.
Nyam ɛcr afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛm ↄŋ agŋ in ecʼodad a, ɛtŋ lʼɛlu odad a e nawrɛ ekʼel a ↄkm tasi.
Agŋ bɛb ɛgŋm usrmʼn sos, ɛgŋm ɛluamʼn, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -nʼɛŋn gbre a ekʼit eke kʼɛŋn ɛl a.

Sica ɛy, ayaf si bʼow sʼaru gbre na sʼɛgb es, eke si bʼigŋ sel ɛŋn ligbɛl na sʼɛlu es ee? Sel ɛŋn na, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ anake ikŋ anym ↄb in ecʼamani a. Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke iri wɛl dad sel ɛŋn na e low a, ɛlu in e low nawrɛ e lʼel a ↄkm.

Nyam in obi yɛgm eke ɛl e sodad a el nawrɛ, mɛny ɛwr, ów ɛgbɛl, lele sakrowa ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke bʼiti any ab ɛm. Ɛmɛny Nyam yɛgm eke ow el nawrɛ Abŋ Lala ecʼob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a eke li cɛc agŋ ɛsɛ elel eke lʼerur ab af ab ɛm.
Sʼam dad wus eke kʼow a e low. Ow elm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl Nyam ↄↄm abusu eke kʼɛw wus na es.
Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl bʼɛŋn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a el:
Kↄ agŋ bla -lʼel eke kʼɛw ɛl e low ɛrm ee?
Bla -lʼel eke ki kok ɛl e lís owi ee?
Ɛw ɛl afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼew lɛgŋ tɛl eci,
ↄŋ ɛl anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw tufɛ af,
ot ów a fɛŋ ɛw es ɛl ecʼakr ew, ɛl ecʼes ɛw ew.
Nyam ↄŋ agŋ abusu ob ob fɛŋ af. Lʼɛgbm ob kaka es eke anm wɛl ecʼabusu ab ɛm. Gbɛkↄ yɛfɛnyna, sʼam ɛkn tasi, agŋ kʼↄnym abusu ob ob fɛŋ af.

Kↄ bla anake ɛy yɛji sʼam ɛkn ab ee? Jesu anŋ sɛgŋ bɛb afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ecʼew, kↄ sica, Nyam ↄŋʼn anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw e tufɛ af. Bla ecʼee? Aŋke lʼij gbre ɛtŋ lʼuw yɛji. Ow ↄŋ ɛtŋ Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn ɛm, Jesu uw agŋ fɛŋ eci.

Nyam anake kok wus a ɛtŋ wus anŋ in eci. Kↄ lʼerur ekʼin ecʼey ab ɛm e nↄnↄ ligbɛl kʼanŋ in ecʼanygbɛl a e low ɛm. Ɛtŋ ekʼow el Jesu ekʼam ot im ɛl sel ɛŋn a ogŋ a, ow it eke Nyam kʼoc gbre ijr ɛm ↄŋʼn lʼiy nɛny lʼigŋ nuŋ.
Jesu bʼↄny agŋ fɛŋ e sikpl a oc ɛl es lís. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ eke bʼayal agŋ a lele agŋ a eke wɛl ayal ab ab ɛl fɛŋ bʼↄny ɛgŋ Ɛs nyam. Na sosiɛm ow ↄnymʼn ɛ́s eke li kʼɛsŋ wɛl lisijimɛl.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu dad Nyam ninɛ:
Mi bʼow mʼↄb ŋ e nin a ecʼamani mʼok ɛm lisijimɛl.
Dedeku ecʼaraŋn, mi bʼow mi kↄklmʼŋ.
Ɛmɛny Jesu cɛ, li dad ninɛ:
Ɛm, mi bʼow mʼoc ɛm ecʼↄmn a nimum nimum mʼɛlu Nyam ɛm.
Ɛmɛny ninɛ:
Kin ɛm lele ey a eke Nyam ↄŋʼm ab ab.

Ey amua ↄny low nyam eke okr ɛl af: -lʼel agŋ ekʼↄny sos megl lele mebl ab. Agn ↄny abusu eke kʼibi ɛl. Na sosiɛm, Jesu, in yɛji itŋn el ɛgŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke nʼↄny agn eci lɛc a lʼoc es in obi eci luw ab ɛm.
Agŋ ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ madu af ɛl ecʼowr anŋ a nimum ɛm, luw eci muru eke -nʼↄnyn a sosiɛm a, Jesu sↄg ɛl in e luw ab ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, lʼowm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eci abu ɛlum eci, kↄ lʼow agŋ ekʼel Abraham ecʼalaw a ecʼabu ɛlum eci.

Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke li kʼitŋn nimum nimum lʼot lisijimɛl lele lisijↄwɛl ab es, yecʼɛtŋ ke lʼél wɛl ecʼegb waw ɛs ligbɛl, eke ɛrm mamn iy ɛm gbↄŋ ke el cɛcɛ Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, ke bʼɛŋn agŋ e sikpl oc ap ecʼabusu a.
Ɛtŋ eke Jesu in obi ij gbre ɛbm ɛkn ɛm a, lʼↄtu eke li kʼatm agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛl yɛji wɛl bʼɛbm ɛkn a abu.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ekʼanŋ afr a ɛsŋ ↄny eke kʼeel in ecʼagŋ lala; ow sosiɛm, lɛ̀ɛr Jesu eke sʼam ɛgŋ sʼeb ɛsɛ ɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm lele egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab a.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke Mois nyimn Nyam ecʼagŋ a,
lʼel cɛcɛ ow ecʼany af ow e juma e kok ab ɛm. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛsɛ Mois af, Jesu el cɛcɛ Nyam eke abul il in e juma a ecʼany af.
Gbɛkↄ Jesu ɛbm eke kʼɛŋn anygbeŋ akm Mois, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛgŋ eke bʼus êl a bʼↄny sos usr akm êl ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, êl nyam nyam fɛŋ ɛgŋ bʼus gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ a eke bʼus fɛŋ a el Nyam.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Mois el cɛcɛ Nyam ecʼagŋ a ecʼaraŋn. Lʼel juma kok ɛs eke wɛl abul Nyam e lɛgŋ anym ɛm ecʼów a eke bʼow dad a e daŋku ij.
Gbɛkↄ Krist el cɛcɛ, lʼel Iy tasi a ɛtŋ nʼanŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ a e nuŋ af. In ecʼagŋ a, ow ow el ɛy, gbɛkↄ ow it eke si kʼucu ɛy ecʼↄmn a, lele ntotŋ a ekʼɛy e low ↄmn a bʼↄŋ ɛy ab ab sʼↄny es.
Na sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am dad ab af:
Yɛfɛnyna, eke bʼirir Nyam e lebl a,
kʼↄ̀turir ↄny ecʼɛrm a, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼelel
eke ↄny lagŋɛl kokr loj ab ɛm ab af.
-Lʼↄbrʼm any ɛtŋ -lʼɛbmʼm -lʼɛkn.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ a, ↄny lagŋɛl ijrʼm gbre eke kʼɛkn
yecʼa eke mi bʼow mi kok a.
Ɛtŋ -lʼɛkn yecʼa eke mi kok a
toŋ akpo ekŋ yony.
Na sosiɛm, mʼↄny ɛrm bebl agŋ na e lís
ɛtŋ mi dad mʼɛsɛ: ɛl ecʼɛrm a sɛgŋ fɛŋ bi kpab es ɛm e lís,
ɛtŋ -lʼↄtum -lʼuwm ɛm ecʼejagb ab any.
Ɛm ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm, mʼofn mʼɛsɛ:
-li kʼow -lʼokmn lɛgŋ kaka
ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm mʼɛw es ab ɛm!
Agŋ lisijimɛl ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka itm eke kʼↄny ɛrm ŋuŋ, ɛrm ekʼúbm nawrɛ, ɛrm eke bʼitrʼr lʼigŋ Nyam ekʼanŋ owr a lʼɛlu es.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
”. Ow sosiɛm, eke
na kʼuwrm a, àtarir sos es ɛgŋ ɛgŋ lɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼow ↄnym ɛrm tuↄtuↄ, ɛtŋ sikpl kʼow ɛlum ɛgŋ kaka wus.
Sica, sʼel Krist e lawlɛl, gbɛkↄ ow it eke si kʼucu ɛy ecʼↄmn a eke sʼↄny lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke sʼubʼr nawrɛ a sʼↄny es.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Yɛfɛnyna, eke bʼirir Nyam e lebl a,
kʼↄ̀turir ↄny ecʼɛrm a
ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼelel eke ↄny lagŋɛl ↄbrʼm any ab af.
Bwo ecʼɛgŋ iri Nyam e lebl ab ee? Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄbrʼr any ee? Ɛl -lʼel agŋ a fɛŋ eke Mois ↄny ok ↄkm Ejipt a.
Nyam ebl ɛrm toŋ ow ij akpo ekŋ yony. Bwo ecʼɛgŋ e lís ee? Agŋ a eke kok sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ɛl nɛny nyam a cɛ anake -lʼuwr loj ab ɛm a.
Nyam ofn dad ninɛ: Li kʼow -lʼokmn lɛgŋ kaka sel eb a eke mi bɛbm mʼɛw es ab ɛm. Bwo sosiɛm lʼofn akpasu na ee? Agŋ a ekʼↄnym ɛlum a sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, kin yecʼeke sʼam ɛkn a: -lʼↄtum -lʼokm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm, aŋke -nʼↄnym ↄmn.
Gbɛkↄ Nyam ɛwar ɛy low ɛw es eke si bʼow sʼok in e sel eb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ low na eke lʼɛwar ɛy lʼɛw es a ɛcm okm es. Ow sosiɛm ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke ɛgŋ kaka ↄny ɛm a kʼánm jam!
Wɛl ↄb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɛy ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ab af, gbɛkↄ odad a eke -lʼirir a elm ɛl low kaka. Eke -lʼirir ow e low a, -lʼebm ow ↄmn ɛm.
Ɛy, sʼub nawrɛ, sʼↄtu eke si kʼok Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Nyam in obi dad ninɛ:
Ɛm ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm, mʼofn eke:
-Li kʼow -lʼokmn lɛgŋ kaka
ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm mʼɛw es ab ɛm.
Ke, Nyam uwar in e juma lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke li kok wus na nimum a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin yecʼeke wɛl dad sɛgŋ lↄbŋ ɛm a e lís:
Nyam yɛji dad ow ecʼodad eke li bi dad lʼɛsɛ:
Agŋ a ekʼikŋ anym ɛŋn Amani Mamn a ɛgŋm ↄnym in ecʼɛlum. Ow sosiɛm, -lʼↄtum -lʼokm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Agŋ ɛjeci gbɛ ↄtu eke ɛmɛny kʼok ɛm.
Na sosiɛm Nyam ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ɛtŋ lʼɛsŋ ow
Eke ow ibn a, Nyam dad David e nɛny ɛm lɛgŋ ikŋ na e low, odad a eke wɛl ikŋ anym dad lɛl na ecʼafr ɛm a:
Yɛfɛnyna, eke bʼirir Nyam e lebl a,
kʼↄturir ↄny ecʼɛrm a!
Sica am ɛkan eke, blel Joswe nawrɛ tasi ↄtu ɛŋn sel eb na ↄŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ ab ana, Nyam blel dadm ow e jam a, lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ecʼodad.
Ow am yɛgm eke sel eb ɛmɛny anŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ a eci. Ɛtŋ sel eb a ot sɛgŋ lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼab es.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ a eke bʼɛy Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm a, in yɛji am eb in obi e juma a e sel, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam eb in ecʼa e sel ab af.
Na sosiɛm sʼↄ́ↄl ɛy ecʼɛrm fɛŋ ɛm sel eb na ɛm ecʼɛy es, yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼébm ɛy lagŋɛl a ekʼɛgŋm ɛluam low a eci sɛwl a, ke ow ↄ́ŋ ɛgŋ kaka kʼɛ́ym wus.

Ow it e si kʼuw any eke Nyam ecʼodad ebl a bʼism sel ab, lɛc iyʼr ɛm gbↄŋ. Li bʼɛdŋ lakm ler ɛm lab ekʼin ecʼany a yony mum bʼufu a. Nyam ecʼodad ebl a bʼɛy ɛgŋ ɛm im igŋ es. Li bʼɛy ow ɛm nʼim toŋ nʼɛŋn ow ecʼabŋ a lele liy ab ab, li bʼim toŋ nʼɛŋn ow e sos ŋgigŋnel a lele ew ab ab. Li bʼuw ɛgŋ e nuŋ ɛm ecʼów tutr lele ɛrm ɛm ecʼab ab any.
Tasi ɛm a, low kaka lↄlm es Nyam ecʼany af. Ob fɛŋ eke li kok a ɛruʼr es any af kpata. In e nyamn a bʼɛkn fɛŋ, ɛtŋ in anake si kʼawl ɛy e lís ecʼów fɛŋ sʼokʼr a.
Sʼↄny egb waw ɛs abusu ɛs ligbɛl nyam eke ubr afr ɛm im toŋ ok Nyam ogŋ yogŋ. In lʼel Jesu, Nyam ecʼIy a. Ow sosiɛm, sʼúcur ↄmn a eke sʼɛgŋn sʼebr a sʼↄnyn es.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl na eke sʼↄny a, ↄtu eke kʼↄny ɛy e sos ↄnym a e sↄrŋ ikŋ, aŋke ɛsɛ ɛy af, in yɛji wɛl ɛbmʼn low low fɛŋ ɛm, gbɛkↄ in li kokm sikpl.
Sʼímn si titmn ↄmn ɛm tasi ɛy e Nyam ɛrm mamnu ecʼes ɛw ecʼatufu lɛkpn a. In e lís si bʼow sʼɛŋn sↄrŋ ikŋ a eke bʼanŋ in ecʼɛrm mamn ab ɛm ow a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, li bʼow lʼɛlum ɛy abu wanci ekʼit a.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl fɛŋ, agŋ ecʼaraŋn wɛl bi sↄsumʼn ocʼr. In e juma el ke lʼɛ́lum agŋ abu ir ɛb Nyam ab, li kok ob ap lele egb waw ab agŋ e sikpl a ecʼoc ap eci.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a, in obi yɛji lʼel ɛgŋ ekʼↄny sikpl. Ow sosiɛm, lʼↄtu eke li kʼiri agŋ a ekʼuwm low any lel ɛl a ekʼam irm ab ab e ses babur a.
In e sikpl e nʼↄny a sosiɛm, ow it eke li ki waw egb dedeku a e sikpl a eci, ɛtŋ ow elm dedeku a e sikpl a cɛ eci, kↄ in obi in obi ecʼa yɛjʼeci.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛgŋ kaka áwm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl e juma a ebm in obi ɛm. Kↄ Nyam anake bʼɛsŋ ɛgŋ ow ecʼel ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke lʼɛsŋ Arↄn el ab af a.
Krist ecʼa yɛji, ɛbɛn ow ɛcr. Ow elm in obi lʼawm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ecʼel a lʼebm. Nyam eke dadʼr odad a ogŋ ow anŋ ow. Kin odad a:
Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ:
Krist, in e wus af aŋa ecʼɛb ir ab ɛm, ŋↄŋn Nyam ɛtŋ kok sↄrŋ ↄŋ Nyam, babarm ɛm lele ↄŋn ikŋ ɛm ab. Ni ŋↄŋn Nyam ekʼↄtu eke kʼↄny ocʼr es luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ Nyam iriʼr lebl, aŋke lʼɛlum ow es is ɛm.
Krist el Nyam ecʼIy, na low nawrɛ! Gbɛkↄ gbre ijr amua fɛŋ ɛm eke lʼɛcr a, li wewr ɛlum nawrɛ tasi.
Ɛtŋ sica eke lʼiy nɛny lʼigŋ nuŋ a, lʼel sel ɛŋn e nuŋ agŋ fɛŋ eke bʼɛlumʼn a eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam ɛwʼr egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ecʼab af.
Low na af a, sʼↄny ów nↄnↄ eke si ki dad, kↄ ɛl e dad a ↄtu nↄnↄ, aŋke ↄny e low iri a ɛwl am ↄtu.

Ɔny, ↄtur eke wanci na af a kʼeel low yɛgm ɛsɛl tasi gↄŋ! Kↄ kin eke ow am ibrm eke wɛl ki yɛgmn ↄny nuŋ ↄb ɛm e Nyam odad ecʼów ab ɛm. Ɔny, ↄnymn tɛri eke kʼijr ob ij leg leg, mɛny mij ow it eke wɛl kʼↄŋ ↄny.
Ɛgŋ a eke bʼanŋ am ɛgŋ mɛny mij a, el iyli ↄmn ɛm. Li kʼↄtum lʼuwm yecʼa ekʼel low nyim nyim ab any.
Gbɛkↄ ob ij leg leg el agŋ ɛgbɛl ↄmn ɛm eci. Ɛl e low es ɛkn ɛw a, ↄŋ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ↄny a, bʼuw any ok ereb low mamn lele low ŋuŋ ab ecʼaraŋn.

Na sosiɛm si kʼow sʼɛwlm sʼowm nuŋ ↄb ɛm ecʼów a eke sʼuw any Krist e lís ab af ij, kↄ sʼíman anym eci low yɛgm ekʼot agŋ ɛgbɛl ↄmn ɛm ecʼab es. Ɛmɛny ow itm yɛjʼeke wɛl kʼɛwl ow ów a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ecʼes igŋ ɛlu owi af lele ɛy ecʼↄmn a eke si kʼoc sʼɛlu Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low af ij.
Ow ibram yɛjʼeke ɛmɛny wɛl ki yɛgm ↄny low sos es yↄyↄg ɛrŋ ɛrŋ e low af, ɛgŋ abu nuŋ at owi af,
luw ɛm anŋ igb owi af, lele jɛj ok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab e low af.
Ow sosiɛm a, eke Nyam ɛlu ɛy abusu es, si bʼow sʼimn anym eci ów a ekʼel Nyam e lís ecʼa ecʼany uw tasi ɛm.
Sica, bla wɛl ↄtu eke ki dad agŋ a ekʼigŋ ɛl ecʼↄmn a ɛlu es a e lís ee? Nyam ecʼusuayl a ɛkan ɛl es, -li tat afr ecʼob ap a anm ɛtŋ -nʼɛŋn Abŋ Lala.
-Li tat Nyam ecʼodad ebl mamn a lele sɛgŋ ekʼam ow e lɛc ab ab yɛji anm.

Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji -lʼigŋ ɛl ecʼↄmn a -lʼɛlu es. Agŋ amua, kʼↄtum sakp yony ɛm itŋnm es an ij. Tasi ɛm a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Nyam ecʼIy a cɛ ɛmɛny wɛʼn am ɛw olikŋ af wɛl obi ɛm af ɛtŋ -li bʼↄŋ agŋ ɛjecʼa ow eci wɛwr ecʼabusu.
Sʼócr ↄgm nyam e low sʼↄbar any: in e wus a bʼↄdu mij a fɛŋ eke nyàm bʼan ke bʼokʼr af a eb. Li bʼↄsu egb iju agŋ a eke kokʼr juma af a ecʼabu ɛlum eci. Ow bʼↄŋ Nyam bʼɛdŋ wus a ↄwrↄ.
Kↄ eke li bʼↄsu kati lele njoj ab, lʼelm ob kaka. Ow kʼow ibnm Nyam bʼow digŋ ɛluʼl es ɛtŋ wɛl bʼow tɛtul il.
Erur ɛm ecʼagŋ lisijimɛl sʼam dad nɛnɛ, gbɛkↄ ɛbɛn yɛji, sʼuw any tasi eke ↄny anŋn ejagb mamn a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm ab af.

Nyam elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs. Li kʼↄtum lʼijlm ów amamn a eke kokr ab es, lʼijlm erur a eke ɛlul ↄkm in e lís ab es. Lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm a, ɛlul erur ikŋ na ↄkm agŋ a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sicaca ɛm yɛji ↄnyn es am kokr.
Sʼam erur cɛ ekʼↄny ɛm ecʼɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ kʼanŋ gbragbra kok ab ɛm toŋ ok nuŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke fɛŋ a eke am ↄman a ɛ́ŋan.
Kʼèel ↄ́rŋu, kↄ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ a ekʼↄny ↄmn ke ↄny ɛrm susu ab af. Agŋ amua, -li bʼɛŋn aja a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es a.
Eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham ob a, nɛny ij ab lʼɛwar. Gbɛkↄ ɛgŋ kaka agbm akamʼn eke kʼel nɛny ij na e daŋku, ow ↄŋ Nyam ofn in obi e nin ɛm.
Li dad Abraham ninɛ:
Mʼow mʼɛdŋʼŋ ↄwrↄ
ke mʼↄ́ŋ ŋ ecʼalaw ɛny bobn.
Abraham usur ɛrm toŋ ɛtŋ nʼɛŋn yecʼa eke Nyam ɛwar ir ow e low ɛw es a.
Eke agŋ bʼij nɛny a, daŋku nyam eke agb akm ɛl a e nin ɛm li bʼij nɛny. Nɛny ij a bʼↄŋ ɛl e sodad a el tasi, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, wɛl ↄ́tum dadm low ɛjecʼij.
Ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a: lʼerur e li kʼɛlu ↄkm kpata eke low a e lʼɛwar in ecʼagŋ a, kʼↄtum itŋnm lɛgŋ kaka. Ow sosiɛm anake lʼij nɛny lʼigŋ in e low ɛwar ab af a.

Low ɛwar lele nɛny ij ab, el ów yony eke wɛl kʼↄtum ↄnym itŋnm, aŋke Nyam kʼↄtum ↄnym yadŋ. Ów yony na sosiɛm, ɛy eke sʼigŋ fɛŋ sʼɛlu es a, si bʼow sʼɛŋn sos es atr ligbɛl, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼúcu low ↄmn a eke wɛl ɛw ɛy es a sʼↄny es.
Low ↄmn na, ɛy ecʼa ow anŋ ɛsɛ ob leg leg nyam ekʼↄↄm ɛy e liy a abusu eke ki mumu af. Low ↄmn na el nawrɛ tasi ɛtŋ li bʼɛpir Nyamel a ekʼanŋ afr a eci gbad
ab ɛm, lʼɛy usu lala tasi a.
Yogŋ anake Jesu ikŋ anym ɛy, ɛy ecʼa. Ɛtŋ lʼel egb waw ɛs ligbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ecʼab af.
Mɛlkisedɛk na, Salɛm ecʼɛb ebu lele Nyam Afr Kpekpe ecʼegb waw ɛs ab. Lɛgŋ a eke Abraham anŋ ar ↄkr ɛm am ow yogŋ a eke lʼakm sɛb ebu ab es a, Mɛlkisedɛk im ↄbrʼr ɛtŋ ɛdŋʼn ↄwrↄ.
Ɛtŋ Abraham ↄŋʼn ob fɛŋ eke lʼot a e lɛw ɛm a. Mɛlkisedɛk e nin a e nyandrɛ el “ɛb ebu eke bi nyimn agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm”. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, lʼel Salɛm ecʼɛb ebu, ow e nyandrɛ el
Wɛl uwm ɛs, lis lele lagŋɛl ab any. Wɛl am dadm in e mew a lele luw ab ab ecʼodad. Gbɛkↄ li bʼot Nyam Jim es, aŋke lʼel egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Ɛ̀kan elel eke Mɛlkisedɛk ↄny any a! Ɛy lagŋ ligbɛl Abraham bↄbↄ yɛji ↄŋʼn ob a fɛŋ eke nʼɛŋn ar ab ɛm a eci lɛw ɛm a.
Mois ecʼol a ↄŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ekʼel Levi ecʼeb ɛm ecʼa abusu eke -li kʼibrm Israɛl ecʼagŋ a ɛl ecʼob fɛŋ eke -nʼↄnyn a e lɛw ɛm.
-Li bibrm Israɛl ecʼagŋ a ecʼob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm, ke agŋ amua, ɛl lisijimɛl ekʼɛl yɛji el Abraham ecʼeb ɛm ecʼagŋ cɛ.
Ke Mɛlkisedɛk, in, lʼelm Levi ecʼeb ɛm ecʼɛgŋ. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, nʼɛŋn Abraham ecʼob fɛŋ ekʼɛŋn a e lɛw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ in, lʼɛdŋ ɛgŋ na eke Nyam ɛwar low ɛw es a ↄwrↄ.
Bɛbar kaka anm ɛm, ɛgŋ ligbɛl a bʼɛdŋ likek a ↄwrↄ.
Egb waw ɛsɛl a eke bʼɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, el agŋ eke bʼuw. Mɛlkisedɛk yɛji ɛŋn mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, kↄ in, nʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl am dad ab af.
Levi ecʼeb ɛm ecʼey a anake bʼɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a. Gbɛkↄ wɛl ↄtu eke ki dad eke Levi, in yɛji, Abraham ɛm a, nʼɛnm ob lɛw ɛm na.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Abraham ↄbr Mɛlkisedɛk a eke wɛl kʼewm Levi yɛji, lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, lʼikŋ anym nʼanŋ yogŋ lagŋ ɛm.
Israɛl eyŋ ecʼol ɛm a, Levi ecʼeb ɛm ecʼey a anake wɛl ki sↄsum ot el egb waw ɛsɛl a. Ɛtŋ -li bʼel egb waw ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke ow ↄb nuŋ Arↄn ɛm ab af.
Gbɛkↄ ɛl ecʼelel eke -li bʼeel egb waw ɛsɛl a okm ɛm iym nɛny, blel ow iy nɛny, ke bla sosiɛm -li kʼↄny egb waw ɛs ɛjeci ɛsɛ elel eke ow ↄb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af ee? Ow bʼow el low eke ↄnym any ij.
Sica, eke egb waw ɛs ecʼel a itŋn a, ol a yɛji it eke kʼitŋn.
Sodad amua, ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ af wɛl dad ok. In, eke lʼel eb ɛjecʼɛm ecʼɛgŋ, ke eb ab ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka, ɛgŋ anm ɛym ↄkm kokm egb waw ɛs eci juma a.
Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, Juda ecʼeb ab ɛm wɛl ewʼr. Ɛtŋ Mois dadm eb na e low lɛgŋ a eke li dad egb waw ɛsɛl ecʼodad a.
Ca gbɛ ów a fɛŋ am ayl, sica eke wɛl sigm egb waw ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke bʼot Mɛlkisedɛk es a.
Lʼelm egb waw ɛs agŋ e mew ecʼol ecʼelel eke bʼɛkan ab ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, owr anŋ ekʼↄnym uwr a ecʼabusu ab anake sigmʼn es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs af a.
Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Ŋ el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci,
ɛsɛ elel eke ow ↄb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af.
Ol sig a iym nɛny ɛtŋ elm low, ow ↄŋ wɛl ↄny fifnʼn es.
Mois ecʼol a ↄsum liy sↄbↄ kaka. Gbɛkↄ wɛl ↄŋ ɛy low ↄmn nimamn tasi nyam, ɛtŋ si bʼɛcr in ɛm si titm Nyam.
Eke si bʼɛkn a ke Nyam ij nɛny sigm egb waw ɛs na es. Gbɛkↄ Levi ecʼeb ɛm ecʼa, -lʼel egb waw ɛsɛl, eke nɛny ij anm ɛm.
Kↄ Jesu ecʼa, Nyam ij nɛny lɛgŋ a eke li dad ninɛ:
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ ij nɛny ɛtŋ li kʼow lʼitŋnm ɛbr:
El egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Ow am yɛgm ɛy eke Jesu anake el ɛgŋ a eke am ↄŋ ɛy sʼuw any tasi eke sinm a eke Nyam kok ɛy ab a, akpl akm lisig a.
Ɛmɛny low anŋ eke ok ereb: egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjecʼa ɛny nↄnↄ, aŋke luw ↄ́ↄm ɛl abusu eke -li kʼanŋ egb waw ɛs el ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Kↄ Jesu gbɛ, in, nʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ɛjeci kʼow elm egb waw ɛs in usuiy a.
Na sosiɛm anake lʼↄtu eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ li kʼeb agŋ a eke bi titm Nyam a lʼɛlu es in ecʼabu ɛlum ɛm a. Eke sica Jesu anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼa, lʼↄtu eke li ki ŋↄŋn Nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ wɛl eci.
Jesu el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl tasi a eke kʼel ɛy ecʼa. Lʼel lala, nʼↄnym low ↄbr, ɛtŋ lʼitam ɛm kaka, nʼanm ɛsɛ ɛy sikpl ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ afr Nyam usrʼr sos ligbɛl.

Jesu anm ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ɛjecʼab af. Ow ibram eke lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ li ki waw egb in obi in obi e sikpl a eci, ke ɛmɛny li waw dedeku a eci. In sosi eke lʼocr li wawr egb a, ow el egb waw a eke li kok akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼa.

Mois ecʼol a bi sigm agŋ eke iym nɛny ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl af. Kↄ Nyam e nɛny ij a eke anŋ ol e jam ow a, sigm Iy ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af, in eke lʼiy nɛny lʼigŋ nuŋ akpo akpo fɛŋ ecʼa.
Kin low a eke sʼam erur eke si ki dad a e liy a tasi: ɛy sʼↄny egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam ɛsɛ na eke si dad in e low ab af. Li sig es afr, Nyam ekʼↄny abusu a e lidr abu af.
Li bi kok in e juma a usu lala a, afr eci nuŋ igŋ usu tasi a. Ɛɛ, afr eci gbad ɛm êl tasi a, ow elm Israɛl ecʼagŋ a usm, kↄ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ in obi anake usʼr a.
Egb waw ɛs fɛŋ eke wɛl sigm es a e juma eke bi kok a el ob ap lele egb waw ab. Ow it eke ɛy ecʼa yɛji kʼↄny ob ap nyam ↄŋ Nyam.
Blel Krist anŋ wus af aŋa yɛji, li kʼelm egb waw ɛs, aŋke egb waw ɛsɛl ikŋ anym anŋ eke am kok juma na ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ecʼol a ibrm ab af.
Egb waw ɛsɛl amua am kok juma usu lala ekʼel afr ecʼusu lala tasi a e sɛwl a lele ow ecʼes otarir ab ab eci. Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Mois am ow us gbad ɛm êl a, Nyam dadʼr ninɛ:

Kↄ sica, ɛy ecʼegb waw ɛs ligbɛl Jesu, wɛl abul il juma ekʼagb nↄnↄ akm egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjecʼa ecʼa. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, nʼam ism sinm owr nyam ekʼel Nyam eci, ke ↄny any nↄnↄ akm sinm sig a. Ɛtŋ Nyam ɛwar ów amamn nↄnↄ eke li bʼow nʼↄŋ ɛy a, lʼɛw es sinm owr na ɛm.
Blel krɛkrɛ e sinm a itam ɛm ana,
blel ow ibram Nyam kokm yony ɛm eci usrmʼn usu.
Gbɛkↄ, kin low a eke Nyam am ɛnym in ecʼagŋ a, ow ecʼabr a:
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ:
Sɛgŋ am ow eke mi bʼow mi kok sinm owr
Israɛl ecʼagŋ a lele Juda ecʼagŋ ab ab.
Sinm na kʼow anm ɛsɛ yecʼa eke mi kok ɛl lagŋɛl ab,
lɛgŋ a eke mʼↄny ɛl abu
mʼot mʼok ɛl ↄkm Ejipt a.
Ɛtŋ -lʼɛgŋm -lʼijm nɛny nyam ɛm e sinm a e lís;
ow ↄŋ, ɛm yɛji, mʼigŋ mʼɛlu ɛl es.
Gbɛkↄ kin sɛgŋ na ɛm a,
sinm a eke mʼam mʼow mi kok Israɛl ecʼagŋ ab ab a:
Ɛm, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, mi bʼow mʼoc ɛm e sol a
mʼɛlu ɛl e tutr ab ɛm,
mi bʼow mi nↄn sol a ɛl e mɛrm ab ɛm.
Mi bʼow mʼel ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼel ɛm ecʼagŋ.
Ɛtŋ ow kʼow ibram eke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki yɛgm in ecʼɛb iy oglog lisijim ɛm ecʼany uw e low ij,
aŋke ɛl pupukpaŋ -li bʼow -lʼuwʼm any,
ɛl kpaŋ, igŋ ey toŋ ok ɛgbɛl.
Low nawrɛ, aŋke mi bʼow mʼap ɛl e sikpl a
ɛtŋ mi kʼow mʼↄknm ow e low mru mru mru.
Eke Nyam bi dad sinm owr e low, ke sinm krɛkrɛ a, lisig nʼↄŋ ow el a. Sica ob nyam ekʼel lisig ke am usu a, el ob eke in ecʼirm ibnm.
Krɛkrɛ eci sinm a ↄny in ecʼów ekʼanŋʼn ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ a eci lele Nyam ecʼusu lala eke wɛl kok ab wus af aŋa.
Ow sosiɛm a, wɛl us gbad ɛm êl nyam eke wɛl bubr oj yony ɛm yogŋ. Krɛkrɛ ecʼusu a wɛl ɛsŋʼn “usu lala”, yogŋ anake kɛniɛ nyam eke ok ál lↄbŋ lele tabl a eke futufutu a eke wɛl bʼap Nyam ab ab anŋ a.
Sica, gbad yony ɛm a e jam a, el gbad ɛm êl a ecʼogog yony ɛm a. Yogŋ wɛl ɛsŋʼn “usu lala tasi”.

Yogŋ, ogŋ ofŋ usu sika ɛm anŋ; ɛtŋ sinm araka eke sos af a el sika ɛm yɛji anŋ. Sinm araka ab ɛm, sika ɛm kpokpo nyam anŋ eke afr eci futufutu iy gbↄŋ; ɛtŋ Arↄn e kpama a eke gigŋ suw ↄdↄdↄ a yɛji anŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, mebn a eke af yogŋ wɛl nↄn sinm e sodad a yɛji anŋ ɛm.
Araka a e nuŋ af a, Serubɛnɛl

eke wɛl aku am yɛgm eke Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a anŋ aŋa. Ɛl ecʼↄw a e lↄw a am bubur araka a e nɛny ab es, yogŋ a eke wɛl bʼok sikpl oc ap e mebl ab es a. Gbɛkↄ aŋa si kʼow si dadm obli nyam nyam e lís ecʼodad.
Gbad ɛm êl ab ɛm, nɛnɛ anake wɛl sisigm ów a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl a bʼok krɛkrɛ ecʼusu a kok ɛl e juma a.
Kↄ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a sↄny cɛ bʼɛy êl a ecʼogog yony ɛm a, akp nyam cɛ lakpo nimum eci. Yogŋ li bʼoc ndey e mebl ab nʼim li wawr egb nʼↄŋ Nyam in obi in obi e sikpl a eci lele dedeku a nimum ecʼab.
Kin low yecʼeke Abŋ Lala am erur eke ki yɛgm a: eke krɛkrɛ eci gbad ɛm êl na anŋ a, usu lala tasi a ecʼejagb a ki figm.

Ow el low ekʼel yɛfɛnyna ɛm eci. Ɛtŋ kin ow e nyandrɛ a: ɛgŋ ekʼam igŋ Nyam nuŋ ke am ibi mindey apʼr oglog am waw egb ↄŋʼn a, kʼow ↄtum ów amua e kok ɛm ↄnym ɛrm es ɛy Nyam ɛm in ecʼów tutr ɛm toŋ ow ok nuŋ.
Ow el sol ekʼel sos megl af eci cɛ ɛsɛ: ob ij, mar lele sos ayal e mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl bʼok ab ab. Sol amua fɛŋ ↄny any toŋ ow ok lɛgŋ a eke Nyam titŋn ɛl fɛŋ yecʼa eke ↄny any nↄnↄ akm ɛl ab ab a.

Gbɛkↄ Krist ow ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af ↄŋ ɛy ów amamn a eke anŋ a. Lʼɛcr gbad ɛm êl nyam ekʼagb el sↄbↄ akm wus af aŋa ecʼab ɛm. Êl a, el ob eke ow elm agŋ ecʼabu usm, ow e nyandrɛ el; ow elm ɛy e wus na eke wɛl kok a ecʼob.

Krist ɛy usu lala tasi a ekʼel Nyam e saw a, akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Lʼocm sican lele sed gↄŋ gↄŋ ey ab e mebl a li kokrm egb waw, kↄ in obi in obi e mebl a lʼoc li kokr egb waw ɛtŋ li sↄg ɛy sikpl ecʼabu ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.

Tasi ɛm a, wɛl bʼoc sican lele sed gↄŋ gↄŋ ey ab e mebl a lele id yↄw eke wɛl ofŋ e milakŋ a, ok agŋ a eke kok sikpl ab af. Ow bʼayal ɛl sos sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ow bʼↄŋ ɛl abusu owr eke -li kʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ.

Eke na eke wɛl dad a el low nawrɛ, ke Krist eci mebl a, in ↄtu eke kʼↄny mbas nↄnↄ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ a ekʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ecʼabusu ɛm, Krist ocr in sosi ap Nyam, ɛsɛ ndey a eke ítam ɛm ke wɛl bʼoc kokr egb waw ab af. Ɛbɛn a, li bʼow lʼayal ɛy e tutr a, eke ów eŋuŋ eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ibar a, yecʼɛtŋ ke sʼↄ́tu si kok Nyam ekʼanŋ owr a e low.

Na sosiɛm anake Krist el ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ ɛy lele Nyam ab ecʼaraŋn, ke oc sinm owr a ism Nyam ecʼagŋ a. Lʼuw, agŋ ecʼes eb ɛlu sosiɛm, ɛl ecʼów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr ow a eke -nʼanŋn krɛkrɛ e sinm a ecʼes ɛw ɛm a. Ɛbɛn ke agŋ eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, ↄ́tu ɛŋn ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛl ow e low ɛw es ke anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam nↄn aja ij e lɛl ɛw es a, gbuŋ ke wɛl kók lɛl ab ɛm e low a, ow it ke wɛl yɛ́gm eke lɛl nↄn ɛs a uw.
Tasi ɛm a, aja ij eci lɛl nɛnɛ eke wɛl bi nↄn ɛw es a, ɛgŋ a eke nↄn a bʼuw gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl bi kok ow e low. Sica ekʼɛgŋ a anŋ owr ke kʼuwm a, lɛl a elm low kaka.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke Nyam am bɛbm Israɛl ecʼagŋ ab ab sinm owi a,
wɛl ikŋ anym ibi mindey ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛl eci mebl ab es.

Sica dedeku a nimum ecʼany af, Mois ikŋ anym awl sodad a pupukpaŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl bʼɛŋn ɛl ol ab ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, lʼot sed gↄŋ gↄŋ a lele sican ab ab e mebl a li wuwlm mij ab ɛtŋ lʼoc isↄp ikŋ
eci lal nyam eke wɛl ucu licɛb suw nɛny af a, ɛtŋ nʼam usm mebl ab ɛm li fufŋ ol e lɛl ab af lele bieku a nimum ab.
Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ:
Ɛbɛn cɛ Mois oc mebl ufŋ gbad ɛm êl a lele mob mob a fɛŋ eke wɛl bʼot kokr Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low ab ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ol dadr ab af, mebl anake bʼayal ob fɛŋ a. Eke wɛl okm mebl es, ɛy e sikpl a ecʼoc ap anm.
Sica eke ow el nɛnɛ wɛl kʼayal mob a eke el ɛl a ekʼanŋ afr a eci any ↄkŋnin, ɛbɛn ke ɛl tasi a ekʼanŋ afr a ibrm segb waw sↄbↄ tasi.

Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛym usu lala nyam eke el agŋ ecʼabu ecʼeke us ab ɛm; usu lala a el afr ecʼusu lala tasi a ekʼanŋ a eci any ↄkŋnin cɛ. Kↄ afr nana anake Krist ɛy yogŋ a eke lʼuw es inym ɛy e ŋↄŋn ↄŋ eci Nyam ecʼany af a.
Lakpo fɛŋ, Jwifɛl ecʼegb waw ɛs ligbɛl a bʼɛy usu lala tasi a mebl eke elm in ecʼab ab. Gbɛkↄ Krist, in, lʼuyum afr eke li ki wawr in sosi egb sakp nↄnↄ.

Blel ow el ɛbɛn ana, blel lʼij luw e gbre sakp nↄnↄ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus nimum a. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ca sɛgŋ na ekʼel sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛluʼl ↄkm akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, in sosi ecʼegb a eke li wawr ab ɛm, ni ŋuŋn sikpl.
Ow akpl e kʼuwr any eke Nyam bɛbm ɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼakp nyam a eke kʼuw a e low ɛw es, ke sica ow e jam a li jɛ́j ow e low lʼok.

Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn nɛny nyam cɛ, Nyam oc Krist kokr egb waw akp nyam coco, agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl e sikpl a ecʼoc ap eci. Li bʼow lʼɛlu sos ↄkm sakp yony ɛm eci, ow elm sikpl oc ap ecʼij, kↄ agŋ a ekʼam eku in e mɛny ɛwl ow a e sel ɛŋn ↄŋ eci.

Mois ecʼol a anŋ ɛsɛ ów amamn a eke bʼow ow a eci es otarir af. Gbɛkↄ ow elm na elm ów tasi a gbɛ. Ow bʼibrm eke lakpo fɛŋ abu kʼanŋ ɛm, wɛl ám kok segb waw nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ. Na sosiɛm anake li kʼↄtum nʼↄↄm agŋ a eke bʼow Nyam saw a e low iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ a.
Tasi ɛm a, blel segb waw a eke -li kokr a ↄtu ↄny ɛl e sikpl a tɛtŋ es akp nyam a cɛ ana, blel -lʼocrm ɛl sosi sikpl ɛsɛl ɛmɛny -nʼanm segb waw a cɛ e kok ɛm.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, segb waw amua bʼↄkn lakpo fɛŋ ɛl e sikpl a e low,
aŋke sed a lele sican ab ab eci mebl a kʼↄtum ↄnym sikpl tɛtŋm es.
Ow sosiɛm, wanci ab af eke Krist am ow wus af aŋa a, li dad Nyam ninɛ:
Ŋ ibram segb waw lele sob ap ab
kↄ ŋ kok sos megl nyam ↄŋʼm.
Mindey eke wɛl bʼofŋ lele mob ɛjeci fɛŋ
eke wɛl bʼot ow waw egb ↄŋʼŋ sikpl oc ap ecʼa,
ákplmʼŋ sos ɛm.
Ɛtŋ mi dadʼŋ mʼɛsɛ:
Ɛm e Nyam, ɛm obi mʼam ow ŋ ogŋ
mi kok ŋ ecʼerur,
ɛsʼelel eke wɛl nↄn ɛm e lís ɛw es ol e lɛl ab ɛm ab af.
Krist ikŋ anym dad ninɛ:
Ke ol ibrm eke wɛl ki kok segb waw amua fɛŋ cɛ.
Ɛmɛny Krist usr af ninɛ:
Odad na am yɛgm eke nʼam ↄny segb waw esig a lʼot es, ke lʼúsr in ecʼa usu.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, Jesu Krist kok Nyam ecʼerur; lʼocr in sosi li wawr egb akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ ow ɛm, li yↄyↄg ɛy e sikpl ab es.
Sica, sɛgŋ fɛŋ egb waw ɛs fɛŋ bʼow Nyam ecʼany af kok juma; ɛtŋ li bi kok segb waw nɛny nyam a cɛ, gbɛkↄ ow el segb waw eke kʼↄtum ↄnym sikpl ocm es.
Krist ecʼa gbɛ ow elm ɛbɛn, egb waw akp nyam a cɛ eke li kok a, el egb waw eke bi tɛtŋ sikpl es sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Sica li sig es Nyam e lidr abu af a
ɛtŋ nʼam eku eke Nyam kʼot in ecʼefnu a okʼr es akr ew.
Ob ap nyam ɛm cɛ, Krist ↄŋ agŋ a eke wɛl yↄyↄg sikpl es a, iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Abŋ Lala yɛji am ɛlu ↄkm yɛgm ɛy dad ɛsɛ:
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ:
Kin sinm a eke mi bʼow mi kok ɛl ab sɛgŋ amua e jam a:
Mi bʼow mʼoc ɛm e sol a mʼɛlu ɛl ɛrm ɛm,
ɛtŋ mi bʼow mi nↄn ɛl e sow tutr ab ɛm.
Ɛmɛny lʼigŋ af ninɛ:
Mi kʼow mʼↄknm ɛl ecʼów ↄbr ↄbr a lel ɛl e sikpl ab ab e low ij.
Sica eke wɛl oc sikpl ap a, ow ibram eke wɛl kʼim kok ow ecʼoc ap ecʼegb waw ij.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Jesu e mebl a eke ok es ɛy ecʼa usur ɛy ɛrm eke si kʼↄwl abu sʼim sʼok Nyam ecʼusu lala tasi a.

Ɛɛ, li kikn in e sos megl ab es, yecʼɛtŋ ke li fíg ɛy ebr owr ekʼel sel ɛŋn ecʼebr a. Ɛtŋ low na eke li kok a, otarir es ɛsʼelel eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm, Nyamel ab ɛm e gbad a ekʼam ɛdŋn agŋ eke kʼim Nyam ecʼany af a, agbr ɛm oc es ab af.
Ɛy, sʼↄny egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam ekʼanŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ a e nuŋ af.
Sica wɛl yↄyↄg ɛy ecʼɛrm ab ɛm ecʼów fɛŋ eke kʼok ɛy ów af ab es, ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛy e sos megl a mij, mij lala tasi ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, si títmn Nyam ɛrm ekʼij nɛny nyam ke inym es kikri ɛy ecʼↄmn ab ɛm.
Sʼúcur ɛy e low ↄmn a eke sʼɛgŋ ow e low sʼeb a sʼↄnyn es kikri, aŋke Nyam ɛwar ɛy ów ɛw es ɛtŋ sʼuw any eke lʼel cɛcɛ.
Sʼɛ́warir nyamn af, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow átr ɛy sos es sʼↄ́ny erur tasi ke si kók ów amamn.

Si kʼígŋn ɛy e luku a eke si bʼas usu nyam a si kʼɛlul es, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɛcm agŋ bɛb ab am kok ab af. Ow tasi eke si ki kok a el, ke sʼátarir sos es ɛy ↄfr, eke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eci lɛgŋ a ow titm a sosiɛm.
Sica eke sʼuw low nawrɛ any a, eke abu anŋ ɛy ɛm sʼam ɛkn piↄ si kok sikpl, ke egb waw ɛjeci kaka anm eke bʼow ↄny ɛy e sikpl a oc es ij.
Low cɛ eke si ki kok a el, ke erŋn ab sʼanŋ sʼam eku eke Nyam e jɛj ok a kʼow lele al gbɛl a eke bʼow ŋuŋn Nyam ecʼany ↄbr ɛsɛl ab ab.
Ɔ̀kan eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke ɛluam Mois ecʼol a batŋ agŋ yony oglog nyahan ij daŋku dad eke nawrɛ ɛgŋ a in ɛluam ol a, wɛl ócm apmʼn, eke wɛl bʼibiʼr.

Sica ɛgŋ yecʼeke bʼow yayr Nyam ecʼIy a, kↄ li kʼow nʼɛŋnm low agbm akm na ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ na ɛluam mebl a eke wɛl oc kokr sinm a eke yↄyↄg in e sikpl ab es a. Ɛtŋ li wɛwr Abŋ Lala a eke bʼↄŋ ɛy sʼuw Nyam ecʼɛrm mamn ab any a.
Ɛɛ, sʼuw ɛgŋ a eke dad ninɛ:
Li dad yɛjʼeke:
Odad na am yɛgm ɛgŋ a eke bi yayr Nyam ekʼanŋ owr a, e gbre ligbɛl eke bʼow ɛŋn a.
Sica ↄkan yecʼa ekʼɛy lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke ɛŋan Nyam ecʼusuayl a. Kpɛkŋ cɛ ↄbar gbre ijr nↄnↄ ɛtŋ inymn es kikri ↄmn ɛm itarir lɛc ɛm.
Sakp oglog, wɛl ↄny ow ↄny agŋ ecʼany af wɛwr ↄny, kokr ↄny akpoto. Sakp bɛb ecʼa, ɛgŋn ebr anŋn agŋ eke wɛl am ijr gbre akpasu na a jam.
Tasi ɛm a, ijr gbre agŋ a ekʼanŋ sobel ɛm ab ab. Ɛgŋn ebr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm eke wɛl ki dↄgr ↄny ecʼob ekʼↄnyn a eb ↄny abu ɛm, aŋke ↄny uwr any eke ↄnyn ob ↄny ligbɛl ekʼanŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Ow sosiɛm a, àtar sos es! Ɔmn ɛm, bʼow ɛŋan ob ap ligbɛl.
Ow am ibrm eke kʼↄnyn ɛrm susu yecʼɛtŋ ke ↄ́tur kokr yecʼa eke Nyam am erur a, ke ɛ́ŋan yecʼa eke lʼɛwar lʼɛw es a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
ɛmɛny ow anŋ lɛgŋ tɛl, lɛgŋ tɛɛli cɛ,
ɛtŋ Ɛgŋ a eke kʼow a, bʼow ow;
li kʼow nʼinŋnm ów ij.
Nyam dad ninɛ:
Ɛgŋ yecʼekʼel nyim nyim ɛm ecʼany af a bʼow anŋ owr in ecʼↄmn a eke lʼoc lʼɛluʼm ɛm a sosiɛm.
Gbɛkↄ eke li bʼɛwl mɛny li lɛr jam,
mi kʼow mʼocm ɛm ecʼɛrm a mʼɛwmʼn af ij.
Ɛy ecʼa gbɛ, sʼanm agŋ a eke bʼɛwl mɛny lɛr jam ke bʼirm ab ɛm. Njaŋ, ɛy obi sʼoc ɛy ecʼↄmn a sʼɛlu Krist ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke li sↄ́g ɛy.
Ɔmn el elel nyam eke wɛl bʼuw any tasi eke low a eke wɛl am ↄmn a, wɛl bʼow ɛŋn; elel nyam eke wɛl bʼɛkn ów tasi eke wɛl ɛ́knm a.
Eke Nyam aw lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼagŋ a, ke ɛl ecʼↄmn a eke -nʼↄnyn a sosiɛm cɛ eci.
Ɔmn ɛm, si bʼuw any eke odad ebl ɛm Nyam kok wus. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, mob a eke wɛl bʼɛkn a el mob eke wɛl ot mob a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a kokr.

Ɔmn ɛm, Abɛl kok egb waw ekʼakpl akm lisijim Kayɛn ecʼa, ↄŋ Nyam. Ow ↄŋ Nyam ocʼr ɛgŋ nyim nyim in ecʼↄmn a sosiɛm, aŋke ow ɛgŋ in ecʼegb waw a eb. Ɛtŋ ↄmn a sosiɛm cɛ anake eke Abɛl uw a yɛji, in e low anŋ cɛ a.
Ɔmn ɛm, Enↄk uwm agŋ e luw ɛtŋ ŋgboŋ wus af aŋa im afr.
Nyam Lɛl dad eke gbuŋ ke Enↄk in ím afr a,
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum elm ɛgŋ mamn Nyam ecʼany af eke nʼↄnym ↄmn. Ɛgŋ eke bi titm Nyam a, it eke kʼub nawrɛ eke Nyam anŋ ɛtŋ agŋ eke bʼↄlʼl es a, li bʼap wɛl ob.
