«Nↄn lɛl awŋ Sard e Nyamel a ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a: “Kin odad yecʼeke ɛgŋ a ekʼↄnym Nyam ecʼabŋ lↄbŋ a lele mílɛ́l lↄbŋ ab ab a am dad: Mʼuw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any. Agŋ bi tutr eke anŋ owr, kↄ tasi ɛm a, uw!
Ùfŋm es! Ke yecʼa eke anŋʼŋ ke kʼuwm a, ↄ́ŋʼn nʼanŋ kikri gbuŋ ke lʼúw nimum nimum. Mʼɛkn eke ŋ ecʼów a bɛbmnm tasi, ɛm e Nyam a ecʼa ekʼam erur ab ab.
Ɔ̀kn yecʼa eke iri ke eb a, ùcu ↄny es ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm. Eke ufŋam es, mi bʼow mʼow kpru ɛm ɛsɛ ulu af mʼocʼŋ, ɛtŋ kʼow uwm wanci ab af eke mi bʼow mʼow ab any.
Gbɛkↄ Sard yogŋ, ↄny ɛm ecʼagŋ nyam nyam ibarm ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a. Agŋ amua bʼow anŋ mob efu ɛm ɛc ɛm ab, aŋke -lʼit.
Ɛbɛn eke agŋ a eke bʼow eb any a bʼow sus mob efu ana. Mi kʼow mi tɛtŋm ɛl ecʼen ab es sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm,
ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs lel in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ecʼany af, mi bʼow mi dad eke agŋ amua el ɛm eci.
Ke ɛgŋ yecʼeke ɛli ↄru a, íri yecʼa eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.” »

«Nↄn lɛl awŋ Filadɛlfi e Nyamel a ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a: “Kin odad yecʼeke ɛgŋ a ekʼel lala lele low nawrɛ ab a, ɛgŋ a eke ↄnym ɛb ebu David eci safuɛ ab ab, bi fig ke ɛgŋ kaka ↄ́tum ablm, bʼabl ke ɛgŋ kaka ↄ́tum figm a am dad:
Mʼuw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any; mi fig lisany nyam mʼɛwʼŋ es any af eke ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ablm. Lɛc tɛl cɛ ↄny, gbɛkↄ ucu ɛm ecʼodad a ↄny es ɛtŋ dadm eke uwm im any.

Kin low eke mi bʼow mi kok Jwifɛl ekʼel Satan ecʼogog ecʼagŋ a eke bʼocr ɛl sosi Nyam ecʼagŋ, ke ow bʼel yadŋ a: mi bʼow mʼↄny ɛl lɛc ɛm -lʼok ↄwrↄkp wus ŋ ecʼany af, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼuw any eke mi bʼerurʼŋ.
Eke ↄsu ol a eke mʼↄŋʼŋ eke kʼusur ɛrm a, ɛm yɛji mi bʼow mʼↄsuʼŋ gbre eci lɛgŋ a eke bʼow ow wus nimum af ɛbm wus ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ a.
Ow kʼow ibnm eke mi bʼow mʼow. Ow sosiɛm, yecʼa ekʼↄny a, ùcu ↄny es kikri yecʼɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kʼébm ŋ ecʼany eb e tufɛ a.

Agŋ a eke bʼow eb any a, mi bʼow mʼↄsŋm ɛl es ɛm Ɛs eci Nyamel ab ɛm ɛsɛ êl ecʼakr ab af, ɛtŋ -li kʼow -lʼokmn ↄkm ij. Mi bʼow mi nↄn ɛm e Nyam a eci nin a lele in ecʼɛb a eci nin ab ab agŋ amua eke ɛŋn any ab af. Ɛb a, in lʼel Jerusalɛm owr a eke bʼow anŋ afr, ɛm e Nyam a ogŋ us es a. Mi bʼow mi nↄn nin owr a eke mʼɛŋn a yɛji ɛl af.
Ke ɛgŋ yecʼeke ɛli ↄru a, íri yecʼa ekʼAbŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.” »
«Nↄn lɛl awŋ Laodise ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a: “Mʼel ɛgŋ a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Amɛn,
ɛgŋ a ekʼel daŋku ij ɛs cɛcɛ lele low nyim nyim ab a, ɛgŋ a eke anŋ ów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e nuŋ ↄb ɛm a. Kin ɛm eci odad a:
Mʼuw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any, ɛtŋ mʼɛkn eke ɛwm dra ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛwm gbagba yɛji. Blel ↄtu el ów yony ab ɛm e nyam yɛji, ow ɛ́w afanma.
Kↄ sica ekʼel dede, ke elm dra oglog gbagba a, mi bʼow mʼɛgbl mʼɛluʼŋ es.
Ŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: mʼↄny os nↄnↄ, mʼↄnym low kaka ecʼes abur. Kↄ tasi ɛm a, ŋ uwm any eke el gbre ɛs, ↄny sↄrŋ nↄnↄ, el gbↄru, el any eflu lele sos ↄfr ɛs ab.

Ow sosiɛm a, kin ów eke mʼam ↄmʼŋ: òw ɛm ogŋ a, ↄl sika eke al ɛlu ow eci sayl a ↄkm a, ke él gbreŋgbi. Òw ↄl mob sus ɛm efu sus, yecʼɛtŋ ke kʼánm sos ↄfr ɛ́s ↄnymʼŋ. Òw ↄl sɛkp ok ŋ ecʼanyamn ab ɛm, ke ɛ́kn es.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke mi bʼerur a, mi bʼɛnym ɛl abr ɛtŋ mi bʼɛw low mʼↄŋ ɛl.
Ɛ̀lu lɛc ij ↄkm ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm.
Sica mʼinym es lisany ɛtŋ mʼam icm abu. Eke ɛgŋ nyam iriʼm lebl ɛtŋ figʼm lisany a, mi bʼow mʼɛyʼr akŋ, mi bʼow mʼus abu in ab ɛtŋ in yɛji li bʼow lʼus abu ɛm ab.
Agŋ a eke bʼow eb any a, mi bʼow mʼↄŋ ɛl abusu -li sig es ɛm ab, ɛm eci atufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm yɛji eke mʼeb any a, ɛm Ɛs ↄŋʼm abusu mi sig es in ab, in eci atufu lɛkpn af ab af.
Ke ɛgŋ yecʼekʼɛli ↄru a, íri yecʼa ekʼAbŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.” »
Ɛmɛny ow e jam a, mʼɛkn low ɛjeci. Afr, mʼɛkn lisany nyam eke fig, ɛtŋ lebl a ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ krↄkr eci lebl af ke mʼikŋ anym mʼiri a, dadʼm ninɛ: «Ùyu af aŋa, ke mi yɛ́gmʼŋ ow e jam ecʼów eke bʼow ow a.»
Kpɛkŋ Abŋ ocʼm ɛtŋ afr yogŋ, mʼɛkn atufu lɛkpn nyam ekʼɛgŋ nyam sig es af.
Ɛgŋ a eke sig es af a eci jɛjn a am ot mebn sↄbↄ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ es ɛsɛ jasp lele sarduan ab af. Nyamgodi eke am jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn emerod af a iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
Atufu lɛkpn likŋ lele yar ab did iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ligbɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab sig es af. -Li sus mob efu ɛtŋ -lʼus sika tufɛ.
Afr eci ŋɛŋn lele nyamgbrany ab ab am anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm ok ↄkm. Mrabri lↄbŋ eke wɛl gigŋ a am iri any af yogŋ. Mrabri lↄbŋ a el Nyam ecʼabŋ lↄbŋ a.
Atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af a, okij ekʼayl toŋ am ɛkan es ke ot lebn ufu pum pum es anŋ.
Araŋn yogŋ, mindey yar eke ɛl ecʼanym lele jam ab a el anyamn ↄfr a, iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
Krɛkrɛ eci ndey a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma af, yony ɛm ecʼa anŋ ɛsɛ id liy af, nyahan ɛm ecʼa ɛli any ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ecʼab af, ɛtŋ yar ɛm ecʼa anŋ ɛsɛ káká ekʼigb nyɛnyn ↄw es af.
Mindey yar amua e nyam nyam ɛli ↄw nↄhↄn, ɛtŋ -lʼɛli anyamn eb ɛl ↄw a nimum, ew lele af ab. Ɛtŋ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab nɛny bʼanŋ ɛl ɛm -nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ:
«Lala, lala, lala el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs eci,
in eke nʼanŋ godʼɛtŋ, nʼanŋ yɛfɛnyna ke nʼam ow a eci.»

Ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a, mindey yar a bi kↄklmʼn, bʼusrʼr sos ɛtŋ bʼↄŋʼn bia. Ɛtŋ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke -li bi kↄklm ow a, agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab a bʼok ↄwrↄkp wus ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ecʼany af. -Li bʼigŋ ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼa nuŋ. -Li bʼot ɛl eci sika tufɛ a -li wↄwl atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af yogŋ ke -nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ:

Ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a, mindey yar a bi kↄklmʼn, bʼusrʼr sos ɛtŋ bʼↄŋʼn bia. Ɛtŋ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke -li bi kↄklm ow a, agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab a bʼok ↄwrↄkp wus ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ecʼany af. -Li bʼigŋ ɛgŋ a ekʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ecʼa nuŋ. -Li bʼot ɛl eci sika tufɛ a -li wↄwl atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af yogŋ ke -nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ:
«O, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, ɛy e Nyam,
it eke kʼɛŋn anygbɛl,
es susm lel abusu ab,
aŋke ŋ kok ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ŋ ecʼerur ɛm ob fɛŋ anŋ owr ɛtŋ bʼok sel.»
Sica mʼɛkn lɛl nyam eke wɛl ar es ke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a e lidr abu ab ɛm. Wɛl nↄn lɛl a any lele jam ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ↄnyn nɛnyɛmbri ab es, es ↄnyan ob lↄbŋ ab.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm e lɛc ɛs nyam eke am ↄg lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm ɛsɛ: «Bwo ecʼɛgŋ it eke ki bↄbm es ↄnyan ob amua es ke fíg lɛl na ee?»
Ke ow el afr, wus af aŋa lele wus ew
ab, ɛgŋ kaka anm eke kʼↄtu fig lɛl a bake lɛr ow e lokm a.
Ow ↄŋ mʼikŋ ↄŋn nↄnↄ eke ɛgŋ kaka kʼanm itm eke ki fig lɛl a bake ↄtu lɛr ow e lokm a.
Gbɛkↄ agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam dadʼm ninɛ: «Kʼìkŋ ↄŋn! Kin Juda ecʼeb ab ɛm e kukuma a, ɛb ebu David eci lilaw a eb any,
li bʼow li bↄbm es ↄnyan ob lↄbŋ ab es ke li fíg lɛl a.»

Sica ɛmɛny mʼɛkn atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ɛtŋ mʼɛkn licɛbli nyam eke wɛl ibi egb waw eci, ke inym es ɛl eci araŋn. Lʼɛli ↄcↄwr lↄbŋ lele anyamn lↄbŋ ab. Anyamn lↄbŋ a el abŋ lↄbŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm ow wus nimum af a.
Licɛbli a ɛri im ɛtŋ oc lɛl a ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a eci lidr abu ab ɛm.

Kpɛkŋ mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab ok ↄwrↄkp wus licɛbli a ecʼany af. Ɛl ɛm ecʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ↄnym saŋgo nyam ab lele sika ɛm kpↄk eke ogŋ iy ɛm gbↄŋ ab, ke el agŋ lala a eci nyam ŋↄŋn a.
-Nʼam ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam:
«Ŋ cɛ it eke kʼoc lɛl a ke bↄ́bm es ↄnyan ob lↄbŋ ab es,
aŋke wɛl ibiʼŋ ocʼŋ wawr ŋ egb ɛtŋ ow ɛm a,
eb eb fɛŋ ɛm, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ɛm, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm ab,
ɛwl sↄg agŋ ↄŋ Nyam.
Kok ɛl -lʼel gbreŋgbi usu a ecʼagŋ,
-lʼel egb waw ɛsɛl eke ki kok juma ɛy e Nyam a ecʼany af,
ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼɛw wus na nimum es.»
Sica ɛmɛny mi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼam iri afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nↄnↄ gbɛl e lebl. -Nʼɛny nↄnↄ ligbɛl, -lʼiwr atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp yar ab ab -lʼɛlul ɛm.
-Nʼam ɛgŋ ɛj lebl gege ɛm -lʼɛsɛ:
«Licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a cɛ it eke kʼɛŋn
abusu, ob ↄny, sɛwr lele lɛc ab;
es susm, anygbɛl lele kↄklm ab!»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼiri eke ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok anŋ afr, wus af aŋa, wus ew lele okij ɛm ab a, ob fɛŋ eke anŋ owr a am ɛgŋ ɛj dad ɛsɛ:
«Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kↄklm, anygbɛl lele abusu ab él
ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a
lele licɛbli ab ab eci!»
Ɛtŋ mindey yar a am ɛlu “Amɛn!” Ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp a am ok ↄwrↄkp wus igŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab nuŋ.
Ow e jam a, mʼɛkn licɛbli a ↄny es ↄnyan ob lↄbŋ a eci krɛkrɛ a ↄb es,
ɛtŋ mʼiri mindey yar ab ɛm e nyam barm lebl ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ecʼikŋ ab af ninɛ: «Òw!»
Mi bi lɛr a, mʼɛkn gbaŋkↄ ufu nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ↄnym bin ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ↄŋʼn any eb e tufɛ. Lʼikŋ anym lʼeb any ɛtŋ ɛmɛny nʼaam any eb eci.
Eke licɛbli a bↄbm yony ɛm eci es ↄnyan ob ab es a, mʼiri mindey yar ab ɛm e yony ɛm ecʼa eke am dad ɛsɛ: «Òw!»
Ɛtŋ gbaŋkↄ ɛjeci nyam ɛy ↄkm. Lʼebl es ɛsɛ al af. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɛŋn abusu eke kʼↄny ɛrm es ɛy oc es wus na af, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow ↄ́ŋ agŋ ibirir ɛl ↄfr. Ɛtŋ wɛl ↄŋʼn lab ler ɛm ligbɛl nyam.
Eke licɛbli a bↄbm nyahan ɛm eci es ↄnyan ob ab es a, mʼiri mindey yar a e nyahan ɛm ecʼa eke am dad ɛsɛ: «Òw!» Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼɛkn gbaŋkↄ ibr nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ↄnym toy ab.

Mʼiri ob nyam am ikŋ ɛsɛ lebl nyam ekʼanŋ mindey yar a ecʼaraŋn af, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛ̀wŋn ble kilo nyam lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sↄg eci; ke ɛ́wŋn ↄrj gbɛ kilo nyahan lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sↄg eci. Gbɛkↄ Lek, kʼìtŋn oliv e mun a lele viny e mar ab ab gbɛ abu.»
Eke licɛbli a bↄbm yar ɛm eci es ↄnyan ob ab es a, mʼiri mindey yar ab ɛm e yar ɛm ecʼa eke am dad ɛsɛ: «Òw!»

Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼɛkn gbaŋkↄ nyam ekʼɛw mufu mufu. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a, wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn Luw, ɛtŋ ↄŋnes baŋn am usʼr jam. Wɛl ↄŋ ɛl abusu wus ecʼↄy yar ab ɛm e nyam ɛm ecʼagŋ ab af, eke -li kʼibi wɛl ar ogŋ ɛm, lek owi ɛm, ↄl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm lele mindey eŋuŋ ɛm ab.

Eke licɛbli a bↄbm yen ɛm eci es ↄnyan ob ab es a, mʼɛkn egb waw usu a ecʼew a, agŋ agŋ eke wɛl ibi a eci liy a. Wɛl ibi ɛl nɛny nyam eke -lʼijr Nyam odad eci lele daŋku eke -lʼijr ow ecʼab ab sosiɛm.
-Nʼam ↄg lɛc ɛm -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Es Ɛw Ɛs Lala, Es Ɛw Ɛs Nawrɛ, kↄ toŋ ba bogŋ lɛgŋ iy bʼow jɛj wus ecʼagŋ a e low ok, íbrm ɛl ɛy e luw a eci low ee?»
Sica wɛl ↄŋ ɛgŋ nyam nyam mob sus ɛm ufu, ɛtŋ wɛl dad ɛl eke ɛmɛny -li kʼeku sɛgŋ tɛl, toŋ bake wɛl íbi ɛl lisijimɛl a eke am kok Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma a ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ibi ɛl ab af a, ów yibr ɛl.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn licɛbli a eke am bↄbm nↄhↄn ɛm ecʼes ↄnyan ob ab es a, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wus umu lɛc ɛm; ligbn ibr pri pri pri ɛsɛ niŋn mob af, ɛtŋ awl ebl es kondoŋ ɛsɛ mebl af.
Mílɛ́l anŋ afr am ok wus ɛsɛ babm ikŋ ecʼey a eke kʼeblm, ke lɛf tuↄtuↄ bʼɛlu ↄny ok wus ab af.
Afr am oc es ɛsɛ ajraŋka eke wɛl bʼↄny ar es ab af; ɛtŋ mafɛny a lele silekr ab ab fɛŋ am ŋgboŋ ɛl e susu susu a.
Ow ↄŋ ɛtŋ wus ecʼɛ́b ebu, agŋ any ɛsɛl, ar ogŋ ɛsɛl ɛm ecʼagŋ ɛgbɛl, egbreŋgbi, abusu ↄny ɛsɛl, agŋ ɛjecʼa fɛŋ ekʼel madu oglog agŋ ewi a, im lↄl es mafɛny ↄmu ɛm lele mób ɛm ab.
-Nʼam dad mafɛny a lele mób ab ab -lʼɛsɛ: «Òkr ɛy af ke lↄ́ↄl ɛy es ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ecʼany a e lís, ke ↄ́ny kpabr ɛy es licɛbli a ecʼɛrm bebl a e lís,
aŋke ɛl ecʼɛrm bebl a e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a ow ŋ̂. Sica bwo ecʼɛgŋ bʼow ↄtu anŋ owr ab ee?»
Sica ow e jam a, mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ekʼinym es wus eci ↄy yar ab ɛm. -Nʼↄny ↄy yar a e lɛf a eke bʼɛlu wus na af ab es, yecʼɛtŋ ke lɛf kaka kʼɛ́lum wus na af, okij af lele ekŋ ɛm ab.

Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ɛy ↄkm yogŋ a eke ligbn bʼigb a. Nʼↄnym Nyam ekʼanŋ owr eci ob a eke bʼoc ɛwr ɛgŋ mɛny ab ab. Li barm lebl tuↄtuↄ lʼɛsŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke ɛŋn abusu eke ki ŋuŋn wus lel okij ab a ninɛ:
«Èkur yɛ! Kì kokr wus, okij lele ekŋ ab low ŋuŋ kaka. Ow it eke si kʼikŋ anym sʼɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam ɛy e Nyam a eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ecʼanyafr a.»
Ɛtŋ mʼiri agŋ a eke wɛl ɛwr mɛny anyafr a e nɛny a. -Lʼij agŋ fandi ekŋ lↄbŋ, agŋ miy yar. Ow ow el Israɛl ecʼeb eb a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ a:
Juda ecʼeb ab ɛm agŋ fandi lɛw yony,
Rubɛn ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Gad ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Asɛr ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Nɛftali ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Manase ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Simeↄn ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Levi ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Isakar ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Zabulↄn ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Josɛf ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Bɛnjamɛ ecʼab ɛm fandi lɛw yony.
Ɛl fɛŋ, -nʼɛŋn Nyam e mɛny ɛwr a.

Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn agŋ nↄnↄ gbɛl eke ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum awlm. Ow el ɛb ɛb fɛŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ lele ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ab ecʼagŋ. -Nʼinym es atufu lɛkpn a lele licɛbli ab ab ecʼany af, -li sus mob efu ɛtŋ arakp anŋ ɛl abu ɛm.
-Nʼam ↄg lɛc ɛm -lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛy e sel ɛŋn a, ɛy e Nyam a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a lele licɛbli ab ab ogŋ ow bʼanŋ ow!»
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn a, agŋ ekpekp a lele mindey yar ab ab ɛm. -Nʼam ok ↄwrↄkp wus atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af ɛtŋ -nʼam igŋ Nyam nuŋ -li dad -lʼɛsɛ:
«Nawrɛ! Kↄklm, anygbɛl, sɛwr, bia ɛlu lele sos usr ab, abusu ↄny lele lɛc ab él ɛy e Nyam a eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.»
Agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam ibrm im ninɛ: «Bwo ɛl el agŋ amua eke sus mob efu a, ɛtŋ bogŋ -nʼanŋ lʼow ee?»
Mʼↄdu mʼeb mi dadʼr mʼɛsɛ: «Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ anake uw any a.» Ɛtŋ lʼↄdu lʼeb li dadʼm ninɛ: «Amua, agŋ a eke ɛcr gbre ijr ligbɛl ab ɛm ab ana.
-Li yↄyↄg ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ mob sus ɛm a ufu pum pum pum.

Na sosiɛm anake -li bʼinym es Nyam ecʼatufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af, ke ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab -li bʼigŋ ow nuŋ ow eci nuŋ igŋ usu a. Ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a bʼow ot ok ɛl in eci gbad êl ab ɛm ke ↄ́su ɛl.
Namn lele mij amn ab kʼow ↄnym ɛl ij, ɛtŋ ligbn lele elubu ab yɛji kʼow ↄnynm ɛl ij.
Nawrɛ, aŋke licɛbli a ekʼinym es atufu lɛkpn a e saw a, bʼow el ɛl e nyimn ɛs, ot im ɛl mij ewl mij eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ sel a e saw, ke Nyam tɛ́tŋ ɛl e mikŋ ab es.»
Eke licɛbli a bↄbm lↄbŋ ɛm eci es ↄnyan ob ab es a, afr, usu a irm es tiŋ toŋ ow ↄtu ekʼij wanci ikpr mum.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a eke bʼanŋ Nyam ecʼany af a; wɛl ↄŋ ɛl krↄkr lↄbŋ.

Mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ekʼow inym es egb waw usu a; nʼↄnym ogŋ ofŋn ob sika ɛm ab. Ɛtŋ wɛl ↄŋʼn ogŋ nↄnↄ eke li kʼoc, ke Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a e nyam ŋↄŋn ab ab li kokr egb waw sika ɛm egb waw usu a eke anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af a.
Afr ɛrm ɛs a ecʼabu ɛm a, ogŋ a e mregbn a eke wuwlm Nyam ecʼagŋ lala a e sinyam ŋↄŋn ab ab a am il Nyam ecʼany af.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a oc ogŋ ofŋn ob a, eb egb waw usu a ecʼal a ok ɛm ɛtŋ oc ↄwl wus. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ nyamgbrany am babarm, afr am ŋɛŋn ɛtŋ wus am umu.
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a eke ↄnym krↄkr lↄbŋ ab ab a am bɛbm sos eke kʼafl krↄkr a.
Krɛkrɛ ecʼa afl in e krↄkr a. Nyamok lele al eke wuwlm mebl ab a am ok wus. Wus ecʼog nyahan e nyam, ekŋ eke wɛl ok sakp nyahan eci akp nyam lele suw owr fɛŋ ab eb al iri ok es.
Yony ɛm ecʼa afl in e krↄkr a. Ob ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ lafɛny ligbɛl nyam ekʼam iri al af ɛy okij ɛm; ɛtŋ okij ecʼog nyahan a e nyam itŋn el mebl.
Mindey ekʼanŋ okij ɛm a eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uw, ɛtŋ simijɛtŋ eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uŋ.
Nyahan ɛm ecʼa afl in e krↄkr a. Lɛ́l ligbɛl nyam ekʼam iri al ɛsɛ mrabri af a anŋ afr ɛy wus. Lʼɛy simij ewl mij a ecʼogog nyahan e nyam ɛm lele mij eŋ af ab.
Lɛ́l a e nin el “Lolo”. Simij ogog nyahan e nyam itŋn am lol, ɛtŋ agŋ nↄnↄ a eke ɛgŋ mij a am uw, aŋke ow am lol nↄnↄ.

Sica yar ɛm ecʼa afl in e krↄkr a. Wɛl iyr ligbn ecʼogog nyahan a e nyam a, awl yɛji ecʼogog nyahan a e nyam a lele mílɛ́l eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ab ab ob; ɛtŋ ow ↄŋ ɛl eci afŋ a e nyahan ɛm irm es. Lɛgŋ owr e nyahan ɛm a lele ncok eci nyahan ɛm ab ab irmn ɛl ecʼusuayl a.

Ɛmɛny mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼɛkn káká nyam eke igb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a ke am ɛlu lebl tuↄtuↄ dad ɛsɛ: «Musue! Musue! Musue bʼow el wus ecʼagŋ eci, lɛgŋ a eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nyahan a ekʼanŋ a bʼow afl ɛl e krↄkr a!»
Sica yen ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krↄkr a, ɛtŋ mʼɛkn lɛ́l nyam ekʼanŋ afr ɛy wus, ke wɛl oc nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a e safuɛ a ɛlu abu ɛm.
Lɛ́l a fig nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a ɛtŋ mregbn eke otarir es al gbɛl e mregbn ab am uyu ok ↄkm. Mregbn a ekʼam ok ↄkm a ibar ligbn lele lɛf ab.
Ɛtŋ mregbn ab ɛm, tɛtɛ gbaŋgban anŋ ok ↄkm eb es wus na nimum af; ɛtŋ -nʼɛŋn abusu eke anŋ ɛsɛ sibↄban ecʼab af.
Wɛl ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki ŋuŋnmn suw, ekŋ lele ob ɛjeci eke ɛli wus af ab. Gbɛkↄ abusu ɛru ɛl es eke -li kʼijr agŋ a eke Nyam e mɛny ɛwr anm anyafr a gbɛ gbre.
Ɛtŋ agŋ amua e gbre ijr a eke -nʼɛŋan ow ecʼabusu a yɛji elm wɛl ecʼibi eci, kↄ ke -lʼijr wɛl gbre nↄnↄ toŋ ow íj awl yen. Ke gbre ijr a e dudu a ánŋ ɛsɛ bↄban ecʼɛgŋ eke bʼakŋ a e dudu ab af.
Ɛtŋ awl yen ab ɛm, agŋ bʼow ↄl luw es, kↄ -li kʼow -nʼɛŋnmn ow; -li bʼow -lʼerur eke -li kʼuw, kↄ luw kʼow owrm ɛl.
Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua anŋ ɛsɛ sigbaŋkↄ eke wɛl bɛbm sos ar ogŋ ecʼaf; ɛl e nuŋ ab af, wɛl bʼɛkn mob ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ sika tufɛ af, ɛtŋ ɛl e many a anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ e many af.
Ɛl e sin nuŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ↄyↄw ecʼab af, ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼan nɛnym a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ecʼab af.
Ɛl ecʼɛrmni a anŋ ɛsɛ erkpo lowi ɛm af, ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼↄw a ecʼikŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ar ogŋn eci mɛtŋ a eke wɛl bʼot cucur sigbaŋkↄ nↄnↄ im ar ogŋ ɛm ab af.
Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua ɛli ewl eke mbe anŋ ɛm ɛsɛ sibↄban ecʼab af. Ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼewl amua ab anake -li bʼow -li kok agŋ ów eŋuŋ toŋ ke ow íj awl yen a.
Ɛl ecʼes ɛw ɛs a el nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a. Ebre ɛm a wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn “Abadↄn”, ɛtŋ Grɛk ɛm a wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn “Apoliↄn” (ekʼel nyandrɛ ɛm “Ŋuŋn Ɛs”).
Sica krɛkrɛ ecʼabu ɛyr na ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkↄ ow e jam a, ɛmɛny abu ɛyr yony anŋ eke bʼow ow.
Ɛtŋ nↄhↄn ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krↄkr a. Egb waw usu a ekʼel sika ɛm ke anŋ Nyam ecʼany af a ecʼↄy yar ab ɛm, mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼam ikŋ ow.
Lebl a dad nↄhↄn ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a eke ↄnym krↄkr ab ab a ninɛ: «Mↄmu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke anŋ ŋgbraka ɛm, mij gbɛl a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Efrat a e saw ab es.»
Wɛl mↄmu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ab es. Nawrɛ ɛm a, wanci na af, lɛgŋ na af, awl na af lele lakpo na af ab anake wɛl bɛbm ɛl sos wus nimum ecʼagŋ sakp nyahan a ecʼakp nyam ecʼibi ecʼa.
Mʼiri ɛl ecʼar ɛsɛl eke bʼuyu gbaŋkↄ af a eci nɛny a: -lʼij agŋ miliↄn ekŋ lɛw.

Ɛtŋ kin elel eke mʼɛkan sigbaŋkↄ a lele ɛl ecʼaf uyu ɛsɛl ab ab a: -lʼɛw erkpo lowi ɛm sos. Erkpo a ebl es ɛsɛ al af, ɛw ble eke iir ɛm ɛsɛ safir lebn af, ɛtŋ ow e mij a yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ sika e mij ab af. Sigbaŋkↄ a ecʼeŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ecʼab af; ɛl e nɛnym a, al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab am ok ↄkm.
Ów eŋuŋ nyahan amua ekʼel al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab ke anŋ sigbaŋkↄ a e nɛnym am ok ↄkm a anake ibi wus ecʼagŋ sakp nyahan a ecʼakp nyam a.
Tasi ɛm a, sigbaŋkↄ a e lɛc a anŋ ɛl e nɛny a lel ɛl ecʼewl ab ab ɛm. Ɛl ecʼewl a bʼot morŋn es: -nʼↄny eŋ eke -li bʼot -nʼam kokr agŋ low ŋuŋ.

Sica agŋ a eke ów eŋuŋ amua ibim ke anŋ a, itŋnm es an ɛl ecʼabu ɛm eci ekŋ ekpr eke -li kokr a e lís; -lʼigŋm abŋ eŋuŋ, sika ɛm sinyam, jɛtɛ efu ɛm eci, jawie ɛm eci, mebn ɛm eci lele ekŋ ɛm ecʼa e nuŋ igŋ a -lʼɛlum es; mob amua eke ↄ́tum ɛknm es, irim ów, anm es yɛjʼa.
-Li walm ɛl ecʼagŋ ibi owi, ɛl e cam kok owi, ɛl eci nfaci ij lele ɛl e mil iy ab ab bↄbↄ yɛji -lʼɛlum es.
Ow e jam a, mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs lɛc ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke anŋ afr am us es. Jru wiwrmʼn ab ɛtŋ nyamgodi iwrʼr nuŋ af; in ecʼany a anŋ ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛtŋ in ecʼakr a anŋ ɛsɛ al ekʼam iri imn afr ecʼaf.
Nʼↄnym lɛl likekli eke fig ab. Lʼoc in e lidr e lakr a lʼɛw okij af ɛtŋ lʼɛw nɛmn ecʼa wus af.
Li barm lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke kukuma bi barm ab af. Ɛtŋ eke li barm lʼok es a, nyamgbrany lↄbŋ a ↄdu eb babarm.
Mʼerur eke mi ki nↄn ów a eke nyamgbrany a dad a, kↄ mʼiri lebl nyam dadʼm ninɛ: «Òc nyamgbrany lↄbŋ a ecʼów a eke dad a ɛw es sos ɛm; kì nↄn.»
Sica afr ɛrm ɛs a eke mʼɛkn inym es okij af lele wus af ab a, igbl lidr abu ogŋ,
ɛtŋ ij nɛny Nyam ekʼanŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ab a e nin ɛm. Li dad ninɛ: «Ɛmɛny Nyam kʼow ekum ij!

Kↄ wanci ab af eke lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a bʼow ↄb nuŋ am afl in e krↄkr a, yogŋ anake Nyam e low a eke lↄl es a bʼow iy nɛny ɛsɛ elel eke li dad ow e low lʼok in eci juma kok ɛsɛl ekʼel kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab af a.»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lebl a eke anŋ afr ikŋ mʼiri a, am dadʼm ɛsɛ: «Ìm oc lɛl likekli a eke fig anŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ekʼinym es okij af lele wus af ab a ecʼabu ɛm a.»
Mʼim mi titm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛtŋ mʼibrmʼn eke li kʼoc lɛl likekli a nʼↄŋʼm. Li dadʼm ninɛ: «Òc ij. Li bʼow li dedʼŋ nɛnym ɛsɛ mow mun af, kↄ li bʼow li lolʼŋ lokm.»
Mʼoc lɛl a afr ɛrm ɛs a ecʼabu ɛm ɛtŋ mʼij. Nawrɛ, lʼɛw mrɛmrɛ ɛm e nɛnym a ɛsɛ mow mun af, kↄ eke mʼakŋ mʼɛmn a, lʼɛwʼm lolo lokm.
Ɛtŋ sica wɛl dadʼm ninɛ: «Ow it ke ɛmɛny ím ↄb Nyam e kokoba ok agŋ, ɛb ɛb, ɛbr ɛbr, lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ab.»
Ow e jam a, wɛl ↄŋʼm likŋ sreŋ nyam eke wɛl bʼoc bɛbmn ob, ɛtŋ wɛl dadʼm ninɛ: «Ìm bɛbmn Nyamel gbɛl a lele egb waw usu ab ab, ke áwl agŋ a eke bʼigŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛm yogŋ a yɛji.
Gbɛkↄ ɛ̀w Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ ab es, kì bɛbmn, aŋke wɛl oc ↄŋ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke bʼow uyu ob fɛŋ af ŋuŋn ɛb lala ab ɛm toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
Ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼɛrm ɛm ecʼadaŋku yony a sus niŋn mob ow. -Li bʼow -lʼↄb Nyam ecʼamani a toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan.»
Adaŋku yony a el oliv ekŋ yony a lele mun al yony a ekʼanŋ wus ecʼEs Ɛw a ecʼany af a.
Ekʼɛgŋ nyam am erur eke ki kok ɛl low ŋuŋ, al bʼanŋ ɛl e nɛnym a am ok ↄkm tɛtul ɛl ecʼefnu a trɛ trɛ trɛ. Ɛɛ, ɛbɛn ekʼɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bʼow ↄl ɛl e low ŋuŋ kok es a bʼow uw ana.

Adaŋku amua ↄny abusu eke kʼɛdŋn nyam eke kʼan ↄpar wus es a, sɛgŋ a nimum eke -nʼam ↄb agŋ Nyam ecʼamani a. -Nʼↄny abusu eke -li kʼitŋn mij el mebl, ɛtŋ -nʼↄny abusu yɛjʼeke -li kʼↄŋ abu ɛyr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ów wus af, sakp abi a eke -li bʼerur a.
Gbɛkↄ ba -li bʼuwar ɛl ecʼamani ↄb a, ndey a eke bʼanŋ nↄmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, bʼow ogŋ ɛl ar, akm ɛl es ke ibi ɛl.
Ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a bʼow anŋ ɛb gbɛl a ecʼɛjɛm araŋn a, yogŋ a eke wɛl ɛw ɛl Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ olikŋ af a. Nyandrɛ ɛm e nin eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ ɛb a el Sodↄm oglog Ejipt.
Agŋ agŋ a fɛŋ, eb eb a fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ lele ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ab ecʼagŋ a bʼow lɛr ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab, ɛtŋ kʼow erurm eke wɛl kʼim ot ɛl es.
Wus ecʼagŋ a sos ɛm bʼow iŋn, ɛl e luw a eci; -li bʼow -li kok sos ɛm iŋn ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼaparir ob, aŋke Nyam e kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl yony na ↄŋ ɛl -lʼɛkn gbre nↄnↄ.
Gbɛkↄ eke sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab ab ɛc a, Nyam fuf kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl yony a in ecʼowr anŋ e sel a, ɛtŋ ow igbm ɛl. Ow ↄŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke am lɛr ɛl a erŋn ligbɛl ↄny.
Kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl yony a iri lebl tuↄtuↄ nyam ekʼanŋ afr am ikŋ dad ɛl ɛsɛ: «Ùyur owr aŋa!» Ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼefnu a fɛŋ ekʼam lɛr ɛl a ecʼany af, -lʼuyu afr e jru ɛm.
Wanci ab af cɛ, wus umu lɛc ɛm. Ɛb a ecʼogog lɛw ɛm e nyam bubm ok ɛtŋ agŋ fandi lↄbŋ ɛŋn luw wus a ekʼumu ab ɛm. Agŋ bɛb a ekʼanŋ owr a erŋn afŋn es toŋ ɛtŋ -nʼam ↄŋ Nyam ekʼanŋ afr a anygbɛl.
Sica yony ɛm ecʼabu ɛyr a ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkↄ, ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ow kʼow ibnm ɛtŋ nyahan ɛm ecʼa yɛji bʼow ow.
Lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krↄkr a. Ebl nↄnↄ anŋ afr am ikŋ lɛc ɛm dad ɛsɛ: «Sica wus eci es ɛw a e low anŋ ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ lel in e Mesi ab ab ecʼabu ɛm, ɛtŋ es ɛw na bʼow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ!»
Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a ekʼɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in e lɛkpn af Nyam ecʼany af a, ok ↄwrↄkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋʼn nuŋ dad ɛsɛ:
«Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs,
ŋ eke anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ godʼɛtŋ a,
sʼam ɛluʼŋ bia eke oc ŋ ecʼabusu ligbɛl ab ɛm sigm ŋ ecʼes ɛw ab es a.
Ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ebl ɛrm,
kↄ sica ŋ ecʼɛrm bebl a anake am ɛy ↄkm a.
Wanci a eke ki jɛj agŋ ekʼuw a e low ok ab ana.
Ŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl ekʼel kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl eci wanci a eke kʼɛŋn ɛl ecʼob ap a anake ow a.
Agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab ekʼel ŋ eci ke bʼɛlumʼŋ ↄmn ɛm a, yɛji bʼow ɛŋn ɛl eci.
Wanci a eke bʼow ŋuŋn agŋ a eke bi ŋuŋn wus ab ana.»
Sica Nyamel gbɛl a ekʼanŋ afr a fig, ɛtŋ sinm araka a ɛy ↄkm. Afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm, wus am umu ɛtŋ nyamok am an ok wus.
Ca ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl nyam ɛy ↄkm afr: ow el yↄw nyam eke ligbn iwr ɛlul ɛm ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, ke awl anŋ in ecʼakr ew a. Lʼus es ɛw e tufɛ eke mílɛ́l lɛw yony anŋ af.
Lok usuʼr bɛbmn iy ew ab, ɛtŋ iy a eke am ↄnynʼn a am ↄŋʼn li babarm.
Ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ɛjeci nyam ɛy ↄkm afr: ow el tamranji nyam eke ebl es kondoŋ ke ɛli eŋ lↄbŋ lele ↄcↄwr lɛw ab. Nuŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ.
In e luwl ab ɛm, li papl afr e mílɛ́l sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ɛm a es lʼok wus. Ɛtŋ lʼigb lʼow nʼinym es lʼↄbr yↄw a ekʼiy am ↄnyn ab any, ba ow bʼew iy a ke kpɛkŋ nʼↄ́ny nʼɛmn.
Yↄw a ew iy igŋ nyam eke bʼow ɛw ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ es abusu ligbɛl ɛm.
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl oc iy a im ɛw es Nyam lele in ecʼatufu lɛkpn ab ab e saw.
Kↄ yↄw a gbɛ, lʼuru es nʼim loj, yogŋ a eke Nyam kok usu nyam ɛwʼr es, eke wɛl kʼↄŋʼn ob lʼij toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan a.
Ɛtŋ mum ɛy afr yogŋ; Mikaɛl lele in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ogŋ mum tamranji a lele in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.
Kↄ tamranji a eb ɛ́s; ow ↄŋ in lel in ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab -nʼↄnym abusu eke -li kʼanŋ afr yogŋ ij.
Wɛl ↄny tamranji a ↄwl gbeŋ. In anake lɛgŋ sig ab ɛm lʼel lorŋn a
eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ agn oglog Satan, ke bʼɛju wus nimum ecʼagŋ a. Wɛl ↄny ↄwlʼl wus in lel in ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.

Ɛtŋ afr mʼiri lebl nyam barm tuↄtuↄ ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Sica es eb ɛlu eci lɛgŋ a ow ŋ̂! Ɛy e Nyam a ɛlu in ecʼabusu a lele es ɛw ab ab ↄkm! Sica es ɛw a anŋ in e Mesi a abu ɛm, aŋke wɛl ↄny ɛy lisijimɛl a ecʼɛgŋ a eke bʼok ɛl ów af a ↄwl gbeŋ. Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab li bʼok wɛl ów af ɛy e Nyam a ecʼany af.
Gbɛkↄ ɛy lisijimɛl a akmʼn es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm lel ow e daŋku a eke -lʼijr ab ɛm, aŋke -lʼerurm ɛl ecʼowr anŋ a toŋ -lʼurum luw bↄbↄ yɛji.
Ow sosiɛm a, afr lele ↄny eke iir ɛm ab ab, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn! Gbɛkↄ wus lel okij ab, gbre él ↄny eci! Agn us es ow ɛŋn ↄny, ɛrm bebl iyʼr ɛm gbↄŋ, aŋke lʼuw any eke sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ anŋʼn.»
Eke tamranji a bʼɛkn eke wɛl ↄny ↄwlʼl wus a, lʼigb nʼam ogŋ yↄw a eke ew iy igŋ ab es.

Gbɛkↄ yↄw a ɛŋn káká ligbɛl nyam ecʼↄw yony eke li kʼoc ke lʼígb toŋ lʼók usu a eke wɛl kok ɛwʼr es loj a, yecʼɛtŋ ke li kpáb es lorŋn a e lís, ke yogŋ wɛl ↄ́ŋʼn ob lʼij toŋ akpo nyahan lele likpr ab.
Ɛtŋ lorŋn a am ɛgbl mij ok es ɛsɛ mij ewl mij gbɛl af, yecʼɛtŋ ke ow éb yↄw a.
Gbɛkↄ wus ow ɛlum yↄw a abu: lʼↄdu mij bubutɛ a eke tamranji a ɛgbl ok es a fɛŋ lʼeb.
Sica tamranji a ɛrm am ebl nↄnↄ yↄw a e lís, ɛtŋ nʼim nʼam ogŋ mum yↄw a ecʼey likpr ab ab, ɛl a eke bʼɛlum Nyam e sol a ke bʼucu low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke Jesu ɛlu ↄkm a ↄny es a.
Ɛtŋ tamranji a ɛc inym es okij nɛny e sɛc ab af.
Ow e jam a, mʼɛkn ndey nyam anŋ okij ɛm ɛy ↄkm. Lʼɛli ↄcↄwr lɛw lele eŋ lↄbŋ ab; in e licↄwr fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ; ɛtŋ in e nuŋ fɛŋ af a, nin eke bi wɛwr Nyam anŋ.
Ndey a eke mʼɛkn a ot fabn es, in ecʼakr a ɛw ɛgbɛl ɛsɛ urs
ecʼab af, ɛtŋ in e nɛny a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma ecʼab af. Tamranji a afl in e lɛc a, in ecʼes ɛw a lele in ecʼabusu ↄny ab ab es ↄŋʼn.
Ndey a ecʼeŋ a e nyam ob kok ɛsɛ ekʼowʼn kʼuw af, gbɛkↄ ob a eke kokʼr luw ecʼa as. Ow ↄŋ wus nimum erur ow e low ɛtŋ am us ndey a jam.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am igŋ tamranji a nuŋ, aŋke ow afl abusu es ↄŋ ndey a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛl a cɛ, -nʼam igŋ ndey a yɛji nuŋ -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ot ndey ab es ɛtŋ bwo ↄtu eke kʼakmʼn es ee?»
Ɛtŋ ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke ki dad es ɛfu lele ɛgŋ wɛwr e sodad ab ok Nyam af; nʼɛŋn abusu eke li ki kok low toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
Ɛtŋ ndey a am wɛwr Nyam; nʼam dad ow e nin, ow ecʼɛb ir usu a lele agŋ a ekʼir afr ab ab ecʼodad ŋuŋ.
Abusu ɛruʼr es eke li kʼogŋ Nyam ecʼagŋ a ar ke lʼákm wɛl es; nʼɛŋn abusu a eb eb fɛŋ af, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ af, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ af lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ af ab.
Wus nimum ecʼagŋ a bʼow igŋʼn nuŋ, agŋ a eke wus e kok ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl ecʼen a anm sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.
Sel ɛŋn e lɛl na, licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a eci.
Ke ɛgŋ ekʼɛli ↄru a íri sɛnyn sɛnyn!

Ɛgŋ eke in ecʼa ow el eke wɛl kʼↄny ɛluʼl sobel ɛm a, wɛl bʼow ↄny ɛluʼl sobel ɛm; ɛgŋ eke in ecʼa ow el lab ler ɛm ɛm, li kʼuw a, lab ler ɛm ɛm li bʼow luw. Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ekʼel Nyam ecʼa it eke kʼↄny ɛrm susu lele ↄmn ab a.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn ndey ɛjeci nyam ekʼanŋ wus ɛm ɛy ↄkm. Lʼɛli ↄcↄwr yony ɛsɛ licɛb ecʼab af ɛtŋ nʼam dad odad ɛsɛ tamranji af.

Ndey na ↄny abusu ɛsɛ krɛkrɛ ecʼa ekʼanŋ okij ɛm ɛy ↄkm ab af, ɛtŋ nʼam kok juma ow e nin ɛm. Nʼam ↄny wus nimum lel in ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ ab lɛc ɛm igŋ krɛkrɛ eci ndey a nuŋ, ndey a eke ob kok nuŋ ɛsɛ ekʼowʼn kʼuw af ke ow as a.
Ndey na ekʼanŋ wus ɛm ɛy ↄkm a, am kok mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl; nʼam ↄŋ al bↄbↄ yɛji anŋ afr ok wus agŋ a pupukpaŋ ecʼany af.

Ɛtŋ nʼam irmn wus ecʼagŋ a, mɛny ɛwr a eke nʼam ↄtu li kok krɛkrɛ eci ndey a eci nin ɛm a. Nʼam ɛju agŋ eke kʼaku likŋ ɛgŋ nyam, krɛkrɛ eci ndey a e sos usr eci, ndey a eke lab kok ob nuŋ ɛsɛ ekʼowʼn kʼuw af, ke ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a.
Ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke kʼↄŋ ndey krɛkrɛ a eci likŋ ɛgŋ a sel, yecʼɛtŋ ke likŋ ɛgŋ a ↄ́tu dad odad ke ↄ́ŋ wɛl ibi agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛ́gŋm igŋmʼn nuŋ a.
Nʼↄny agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, egbreŋgbi lele ↄgbↄru ab, ewi lele madu ab lɛc ɛm eke kʼɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam lidr abu af oglog anyafr.
Ow ↄŋ ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke mɛny ɛwr anm af a ↄtum eke kʼↄl ob oglog ɛw ob an; mɛny ɛwr a el ndey a e nin oglog ob awl e mↄni ekʼel nin a ecʼa.

Aŋa anake ow am ibrm eke ɛgŋ kʼↄny sɛwr a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yecʼeke ↄny nuŋ ɛm ↄny a ↄtu eke kʼuw ndey a e mↄni a ecʼabi a eke kʼij a e nyandrɛ ab any, aŋke ow el ɛgŋ e nin. Ob awl e mↄni a el ekŋ yen yen sakp nↄhↄn ekŋ nyahan miy nↄhↄn.
Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼɛkn licɛbli a eke inym es Siↄn e lafɛny
ab af, in lele agŋ fandi ekŋ lↄbŋ miy yar eke wɛl nↄn in e nin a lele Ɛs ecʼab ab ɛw anyafr a.
Mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼanŋ afr am ow, ke am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij e mra af, oglog ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ligbɛl ecʼikŋ ab af. Lebl a eke mʼiri a anŋ ɛsɛ saŋgo ↄny ɛsɛl e mob a eke bʼↄny ab af.

Agŋ amua fɛŋ am ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ecʼany af. Ɛgŋ kaka ↄtum eke ki wewr ɛj a, eke ow elm agŋ fandi ekŋ lↄbŋ miy yar a eke el wus aŋa ecʼagŋ a eke wɛl ↄl a cɛ.
Agŋ amua kokm sikpl owi ↄyↄw ab, -lʼayl.
-Li bʼus licɛbli a jam usu fɛŋ eke ow bʼim a. Wɛl ↄl ɛl agŋ ecʼaraŋn eke -li kʼel agŋ krɛkrɛ eke wɛl kʼoc ap Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab.
Lɛgŋ kaka -nʼↄnym yadŋ; -li kokm sikpl kaka.
Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ekʼam igb afr kpoŋ ɛm a ɛc. Nʼↄnym Amani Mamn a ekʼↄnym uwr ab ab eke li kʼↄb lʼok wus nimum, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ecʼagŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ lele agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ab.
Nʼam dad lebl gege lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ke ↄ́ŋn in anygbɛl! Aŋke wanci ow eke li bʼow li jɛj wus nimum e low lʼok. Ìgŋn ɛgŋ a eke kok afr, wus, okij lele mij ewl mij fɛŋ ab a nuŋ!»
Yony ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ krɛkrɛ ecʼa e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Babilↄn ɛb gbɛl a ɛy wus!
Lʼel ɛb a eke ɛju ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ɛgŋ in e mar a eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm a.»
Nyahan ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ yony a e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad lebl gege ɛsɛ: «Eke ɛgŋ nyam am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ɛtŋ nʼɛŋn ow eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr lele abu af ab,

in yɛji, li bʼow lʼɛgŋ mar a eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Mar na bʼow ɛw tuↄtuↄ ɛtŋ Nyam bʼow ɛtm ok in ecʼɛrm bebl a e kpↄk ab ɛm. Agŋ amua bʼow ij gbre nↄnↄ al ɛm lele mebn eke ler ecʼal ab ɛm, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala lele licɛbli ab ab ecʼany af.

Al a eci mregbn a eke am ↄŋ ɛl -lʼij gbre nↄnↄ a, am uyu afr akpo akpo fɛŋ eci. Agŋ amua eke am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ke ɛŋn in e nin a e mɛny ɛwr a ↄnym sel eb ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab.»
Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ekʼel Nyam eci, bʼɛlum in e sol a, ke ↄny ↄmn Jesu ɛm a kʼↄny ɛrm susu a.

Ɛtŋ mʼiri lebl nyam ekʼanŋ afr am dadʼm ɛsɛ: «Nↄn odad na: ehe él agŋ a eke caca ɛm am uw Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ e juma kok ɛm a eci! Ɛɛ, Abŋ am dad eke agŋ amua in anŋ ehe ɛm. Sica wɛʼn ↄtu eke wɛʼn kʼeb sel juma a fɛŋ eke wɛʼn kok a eci, aŋke wɛl eci juma a e liy a in am us wɛl jam.»
Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ mʼɛkn jru ufu nyam. Jru ab af, ob nyam ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af sig es. In e nuŋ af a sika tufɛ anŋ ɛtŋ egb ubr lab fufu kↄnↄ nyam anŋʼn abu ɛm.

Ɛmɛny mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ekʼanŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ɛy ↄkm ke barm lebl tuↄtuↄ ɛm am dad in a eke sig es jru ab af a ɛsɛ: «Òc ŋ ecʼegb ubr lab a ke úb gↄŋ, aŋke wus eci egb a ekʼebl ub ecʼa e wanci ow.»
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es jru ab af a oc in ecʼegb ubr lab a ɛtŋ lʼɛw abu lʼub wus nimum ecʼegb a.
Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam anŋ afr e Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ↄkm; in yɛji, nʼↄnym egb ubr lab fufu kↄnↄ nyam ab.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw al es a anŋ egb waw usu a ɛy ↄkm. Li barm lɛc ɛm nʼam dad yecʼa ekʼↄnym egb ubr lab fufu ab ab a lʼɛsɛ: «Òc ŋ e lab fufu a ke úb wus e viny egbekl a, aŋke in ecʼey a ebl.»
Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in ecʼegb ubr lab a ɛtŋ ɛw abu ub wus e viny egbekl a ɛtŋ ot ok ɛl es ifir ob gbɛl ab ɛm eke -li kʼɛkn Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a.
Wɛl ifi viny ey ab es es ifir ob ab ɛm baŋn a e jam a; ɛtŋ es ifir ob ab ɛm mebl nↄnↄ ewl ok ↄkm. Mebl a ewl toŋ im igŋ kilo ekŋ yen yen sakp nyahan, ɛtŋ uyu toŋ ok sigbaŋkↄ a e nɛnɛkp a e nɛny nɛny.
Ɛtŋ afr mʼɛkn mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl ɛjeci nyam eke in e low am itiʼm any: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ eke ↄnym es abal el ɛm ecʼabu ɛyr lↄbŋ ab, eke ɛl ɛm Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a bʼow ɛdŋ nuŋ a.

Ɛtŋ mʼɛkn okij eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es, ke al wuwlm ab. Agŋ a fɛŋ eke eb any ndey a, in e likŋ ɛgŋ a lele in e nin a e mↄni a ecʼabi a eke kʼij ab af a, inym es afr okij na eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es ab af. Ɛtŋ -nʼↄnym sisaŋgo a eke Nyam ↄŋ ɛl ab ab.
-Nʼam ɛgŋ Nyam e juma kok ɛs Mois
lele licɛbli ab ab ecʼɛj a:
«Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ɛbɛn eke ŋ e sijuma a agb ke akpl ana!
Ɛb ɛb ecʼƐb Ebu, ɛbɛn eke ŋ ecʼów a eke bɛbm ok es a el nyim nyim
ke el nawrɛ ana!
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ, bwo ecʼɛgŋ tasi ↄtu eke kʼɛluamʼŋ ee?
Bwo ecʼɛgŋ ↄtu eke ki kↄklamʼŋ ee?
Ŋ sↄny coco el lala.
Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ bʼow igŋʼŋ nuŋ,
aŋke ŋ ecʼów nyim nyim a ok ↄkm kpata -lʼɛkn.»
Ow e jam a, afr, mʼɛkn Nyamel gbɛl a fig. Ɛm yogŋ Nyam eci sinm a eci gbad ɛm êl a anŋ.
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a ekʼↄnym abu ɛyr lↄbŋ ab ab a anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ok ↄkm. -Li sus mob eke ufu pum pum pum ke am jɛjn, ɛtŋ -lʼucu ↄhↄny eke wɛl kok sika mij ɛm ɛr ɛm.
Mindey yar ab ɛm eci nyam ↄŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a sika ɛm kpↄk lↄbŋ. Ɛm yogŋ, Nyam ekʼanŋ godʼɛtŋ a ecʼɛrm bebl a iy ɛm gbↄŋ.
Mregbn iy Nyamel ab ɛm gbↄŋ; ow el Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a lele in ecʼabusu ab ab. Ow ↄŋ ɛgŋ kaka kʼↄtum ɛym Nyamel ab ɛm, eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a eci abu ɛyr owi a eke ot ow a e low kʼiym nɛny.
Ow e jam a, mʼiri lebl ligbɛl nyam anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm am ikŋ dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a ɛsɛ: «Ìmn wus ke ɛ́wal Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl a ekʼanŋ kpↄk lↄbŋ ab ɛm a es!»
Krɛkrɛ ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok wus af, ɛtŋ abi ɛgbɛl eke bi dudu a ok agŋ a eke ndey a e mɛny ɛwr anŋ af, ke bʼigŋ in e likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a.
Yony ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok okij ɛm. Mij a itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛgŋuw e mebl ab af, ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ ekʼanŋ owr okij ɛm a uw.
Nyahan ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok simij ewl mij lele mij eŋ ɛm ab, ɛtŋ simij a titŋn el mebl.
Ɛtŋ mʼiri afr ɛrm ɛs a ekʼɛw mij es a am dad ɛsɛ: «Ŋ ekʼanŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ godʼɛtŋ, ŋ ekʼel lala a, eke ow el nɛnɛ anake jɛj ok a, ke el jɛj ok ɛs nyim nyim.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua ibi agŋ lala a ekʼel ŋ ecʼa lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab ab ok mebl es, ɛtŋ sica ɛl yɛji ↄŋ ɛl mebl -lʼɛgŋ. Ow ekʼit ɛl ecʼab ana!»
Ɛtŋ mʼiri lebl nyam anŋ egb waw usu a am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛɛ, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ŋ e jɛj ok fɛŋ el nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab!»
Yar ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok ligbn af, ɛtŋ ligbn ɛŋn abusu eke ki kakŋ wus ecʼagŋ a in ecʼal ab ɛm.
Agŋ al am kakŋ sos, ɛtŋ -nʼam wɛwr Nyam a ekʼↄny abusu abu ɛyr amua af a e nin a. Gbɛkↄ -lʼɛgŋm eke -li kʼitŋn ɛrm ɛm bake -nʼↄŋ ow any.
Yen ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok ndey a ecʼatufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛtŋ in ecʼes ɛw a ɛy ncebn ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ am akŋn anm gbre eke -nʼam ij a eci.
-Nʼam wɛwr afr e Nyam a ɛl e gbre e -nʼam ij lele abi ab ab sosiɛm. Gbɛkↄ -lʼigŋm ɛl ecʼów eŋuŋ a -lʼokm es.
Nↄhↄn ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok mij ligbɛl a eke wɛl bʼɛsŋ Efrat ab ɛm. Mij a mam es ɛtŋ ɛw ɛ́b ebu a eke bʼanŋ yogŋ a eke ligbn bʼigb a ejagb es ow.
Tamranji a, ndey a lele kokoba ↄb ɛs yadŋu ab ab e nɛnym a, mʼɛkn abŋ eŋuŋ nyahan ekʼanŋ ɛsɛ betibↄm af am ok ↄkm.
-Lʼel abŋ eŋuŋ eke bi kok simɛny ɛwr. -Nʼaam -nʼɛŋn wus ecʼɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ, yecʼɛtŋ ke -lʼas wɛl luku Nyam Abusu Ɛs e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a e mum ogŋ a eci.
Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ dad ninɛ: «Kin, mʼam ow ɛsɛ ulu af. Ehe él ɛgŋ yecʼa eke anŋ any owr ke sus mob am eku, yecʼɛtŋ ke li kʼíim sos ↄfr agŋ ɛknm in ecʼɛ́s a eci!»
Abŋ eŋuŋ a as ɛ́b ebu a luku usu nyam eke Ebre ɛm a wɛl bʼɛsŋ Armagedↄn.
Lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpↄk ab ɛm ecʼa es ok lɛf ɛm. Lebl nyam anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm barm tuↄtuↄ; ow el lebl ekʼanŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ow. Ɛtŋ lebl a dad ninɛ: «Sica ow uwr ŋ̂!»
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm ɛtŋ wus am umu. Wus ecʼumu ikŋ a, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke agŋ anŋ wus a, -lʼɛknm ɛbɛn.
Baŋn gbɛl a ufŋ es ok sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ɛb ɛb a e baŋn baŋn a fɛŋ bubm ok. Nyam ijlm Babilↄn gbɛl ab es; nʼↄŋ eke ow kʼɛgŋ mar kpↄk gbↄŋ a ekʼel in ecʼɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
Lekr a fɛŋ irm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛ́knm mafɛny ij.
Ɛtŋ nyamok eku eku anŋ afr am an ok agŋ af; ɛtŋ agŋ am wɛwr Nyam, nyamok na sosiɛm, aŋke ow el ob eke ↄny lɛc nↄnↄ.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a ekʼↄnym kpↄk lↄbŋ ab a eci nyam ow dadʼm ninɛ: «Òw, mi bʼow mi yɛgmʼŋ abu ɛyr a eke Nyam bʼow ↄŋ facyↄw gbɛl a eke inym es simij ewl mij nↄnↄ e nɛny a.
Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a ij nfaci in ab, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ir wus na af a ɛgŋ in eci nfaci owi a e mar am ↄny.»
Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a ocʼm im loj. Yogŋ, mʼɛkn yↄw nyam eke sig es ndey ebl kondoŋ af. Nyam eci wɛwr ecʼen eb ndey a e sos a fɛŋ; ɛtŋ lʼɛli eŋ lↄbŋ lele ↄcↄwr lɛw ab.
Yↄw a ok gbad ebl mamn, lʼok sika ɛm miyob nↄnↄ, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab. Nʼↄnym sika ɛm kpↄk ab. Ɛm yogŋ, in eci nfaci ij a eci kpↄtↄm owi a fɛŋ iy ɛm gbↄŋ.
In ecʼanyafr a, wɛl nↄn nin eke ow eci nyandrɛ a lↄl es: “Babilↄn gbɛl, afacyↄw lele wus na nimum ab eci musue owi fɛŋ ecʼɛl lis.”
Mʼɛkn yↄw a eke Nyam ecʼagŋ a lele agŋ a ekʼij Jesu eci daŋku ke wɛl ibi a eci mebl am ɛc any.
Mi bʼɛknʼn a, low ebʼm sos.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dadʼm ninɛ: «Kↄ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ow am itiʼŋ any ee? Mi bʼow mʼɛlu yↄw a eke sig es ndey ab af a lele ndey na eke ɛli eŋ lↄbŋ lele ↄcↄwr lɛw ab a e low eke lↄl es ɛm a ↄkm mi yɛgmʼŋ.

Ndey a eke ɛkn a, lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm a, wɛl ɛknʼn nʼanŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna nʼanm owr ij. Gbɛkↄ li bʼow nʼanŋ nↄmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm lʼɛy ↄkm nʼim in eci ŋuŋn eci. Ɛtŋ wus na ecʼagŋ a eke wus eci nuŋ ↄb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl nↄnm ɛl ecʼen sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a, low bʼow iti any ndey a ecʼɛkn ɛm, aŋke lɛgŋ ekʼɛc a, nʼanŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna nʼanm owr ij, kↄ li bʼow lʼɛwl lʼow.
Sica wɛl ↄ́ny nuŋ ɛm ↄny lele sɛwr ab gↄŋ! Eŋ lↄbŋ a el egigl lↄbŋ eke yↄw a sig es af a; ow el ɛ́b ebu lↄbŋ yɛji:
ɛl ɛm eci yen ok wus, nyam ɛw usu es, lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼa kʼowm. Lɛgŋ eke li bʼow lʼow a, ow bʼow el lɛgŋ tɛl cɛ eci.
Ndey ebl kondoŋ a eke lɛgŋ ekʼɛc ab ɛm anŋ owr, ke yɛfɛnyna anm owr ij a, in obi ɛm a, lʼel niwn ɛm ecʼɛb ebu; ɛtŋ ɛsɛ lↄbŋ ab af, in yɛji nʼaam in ecʼibi eci.
Ɔcↄwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a el ɛ́b ebu lɛw eke kʼↄbm nuŋ kʼɛwm usu es; gbɛkↄ ndey ab ab -li bʼow -nʼɛŋn abusu -lʼɛw usu es wanci nyam eci.
Ɛ́b ebu lɛw amua eci tutr a okr af; tutr a el ke -lʼot ɛl e lɛc a lele ɛl ecʼabusu ab ab -lʼɛlu ndey a e lís e low kok ɛm.

-Li bʼow -lʼogŋ licɛbli a ar, gbɛkↄ licɛbli a bʼow akm ɛl es, aŋke lʼel kↄtↄkↄ ɛm e Kↄtↄkↄ lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ecʼƐb Ebu ab; ɛtŋ in ecʼagŋ nɛny nyam ɛsɛl a eke li sↄsum lʼot ke lʼɛsŋ ab ab, -li bʼow -lʼakm wɛl es.»
Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dadʼm ninɛ: «Simij a eke ɛkn yogŋ a eke facyↄw a sig es a el agŋ agŋ, bieku bieku, ɛb ɛb lele ɛbr ɛbr ab.
Ɔcↄwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a lele ndey ab ab bʼow ↄny facyↄw a eci sifn: -li bʼow -lʼeb ow ecʼob fɛŋ eke ow ↄny a, -nʼↄŋ ow anŋ sos ↄfr. -Li bʼow -lʼot ow eci megl a fɛŋ -lʼij ke -lʼofŋ ow eci likpr a,
aŋke Nyam ↄŋ eke ɛl ecʼɛrm ab ɛm, -li ki kok low yecʼa eke Nyam am erur a. Nɛny bʼow okr ɛl af -lʼoc ɛl ecʼes ɛw eci abusu a -li kok ndey a e lís e low toŋ ke Nyam eci sodad a fɛŋ íy nɛny.
Ca yↄw a eke ɛkn a el ɛb gbɛl a eke ɛw wus na nimum eci ɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ es a.»
Na bʼɛc a, mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ekʼanŋ afr am us es. Nʼↄny abusu ligbɛl nyam, ɛtŋ in ecʼanygbɛl a ayal wus na nimum.
Lʼɛlu lebl tuↄtuↄ li dad ninɛ: «Lʼɛy wus, Babilↄn gbɛl a ɛy wus! Sica ow el abŋ eŋuŋ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a ecʼusu ekʼir, ɛl ecʼes lↄl usu; aŋa anake ↄr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ lele mindey ekʼaylm ke wɛl bʼifn ab ir a.

Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ a ɛgŋ in eci mar a eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ecʼɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a igŋʼn af -lʼok nfaci ij owi ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus na eci án ↄlu a el egbreŋgbi in ecʼob eke nʼↄny afŋn es a sosiɛm.»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼiri lebl ɛjeci nyam ekʼanŋ afr am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛm ecʼagŋ, òkr ↄkm ɛb ab ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke kʼánmn in e sikpl a e low ɛm, in eci abu ɛyr ɛgbɛl a eke bʼow ɛŋnʼn a kʼɛ́ŋnm ↄny.
Tasi ɛm a, in eci sikpl a tatakŋ toŋ im ok afr, ɛtŋ Nyam ijlm in ecʼów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi amua es.

Kòkr ɛb a low ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr agŋ ɛjecʼab af. Low yecʼa eke li kok a, in yɛji kòkr ir ow eci sakp yony. Mij kpↄk a eke li bi wuwlm mar tuↄtuↄ ab nʼↄŋ agŋ ɛgŋ a, in yɛji mar eke ɛw tuↄtuↄ a, wùwlmn ow eci ↄtu sakp yony ab ↄŋn in lʼɛ́gŋ.

Anygbɛl owi a eke li kok lele ɛb sɛnyn a eke lʼij ab ab a, ↄwar ow eci dudu a lele ow eci gbre ab ab eke bɛbmn ab a ↄŋn in. Li bi dadr in ɛm lʼɛsɛ: “Mʼir aŋa ɛsɛ ɛb eb yↄw af, mʼelm iŋnyↄw ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka mi kʼow mʼɛknm niŋn owi.”

Low na sosiɛm anake gbre owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl bɛbm ɛwʼr es a bʼow ɛŋnʼn a: ↄl ekʼel luw eci, niŋn owi lele lek ab. Lɛgŋ nyam coco af fɛŋ bʼow ɛŋnʼn ɛtŋ wɛl bʼow ɛtul il. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ eke jɛj in e low a ok a ij lɛc nↄnↄ.»
Eke wus eci ɛ́b ebu a eke in ab kok nfaci owi ke ir ɛb mɛwl ɛm a bʼow ɛkn ɛb a ekʼɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li bʼow -lʼikŋ ↄŋn -li kok sↄrŋ.
Ke in eci gbre owi a kʼɛ́ŋnm ɛl a, -li bʼow -li kpab ow es lís -nʼim akpoj ke -nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Bogŋ e gbre ana ee? Oy Babilↄn! Ɛb gbɛl ekʼij lɛc! Wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake wɛl ↄbʼŋ low a.»
Wus na ecʼán ↄlu a yɛji am ikŋ ↄŋn ɛtŋ am kok in eci sↄrŋ aŋke sica wɛl ↄ́lm ɛl ecʼan ob a ij:
sika, jɛtɛ ufu, mebn amamn lele ayrɛ ab; gbad fuɛfuɛ, gbad ebl amamn, gbad frɛfrɛ; ekŋ sŋↄsŋↄ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ, ɛyr nɛn ɛm ecʼob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ekŋ ekʼil an, jawie, lowi oglog lebn mamn;
ekŋ sel sŋↄsŋↄ lele mob sↄsŋn mob ɛjecʼab, mijey, kpey lele ogŋ ab; mar, mun, ble mpupu lele miy ab; sed, mɛcɛb, sigbaŋkↄ lele ow eci mɛtŋ ab toŋ agŋ eci sos megl lele ow eci liy bↄbↄ yɛjʼab.
Wɛl am dad ɛsɛ: «Mob mob a fɛŋ ekʼam erur a anm ŋ ogŋ a ij, ŋ ecʼob ↄny fɛŋ lele ŋ ecʼɛb ij sɛnyn ab ab irm; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl kʼow ɛŋnm ɛl ij!»
Án ↄlu a eke ↄl an ɛb ab ɛm ke ↄny ob a, -li bʼow -nʼinym es akpoj, ɛb a eci gbre owi eke kʼɛŋn ɛl a sosiɛm. -Li bʼow -lʼikŋ ↄŋn -li kok sↄrŋ,
-li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Kↄ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? Lʼɛw ob fuɛfuɛ sos, gbad ebl amamn, lʼok sika ɛm miyob, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab.
Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake mob amua fɛŋ irm a!»
Simijɛtŋ a eci idr ɛsɛl a, agŋ a ekʼus mij ɛl ab a, ɛm yogŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼɛŋn ob ij mij af yogŋ a bʼow inym es akpoj.
Eke -lʼɛkan ɛb a ekʼam ɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li bʼow -lʼɛlu lebl -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Ɛb kaka anm eke agb ot ɛb na es!»

-Nʼam ok siflefl nuŋ, -nʼam ikŋ ↄŋn -li kok sↄrŋ ɛtŋ -nʼam ɛlu lebl -li dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Kↄ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? In ecʼob ↄny ab ɛm anake agŋ a fɛŋ eke ↄny simijɛtŋ okij na af a el egbreŋgbi a. Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake amua fɛŋ irm a!»
Afr, sos ɛm íŋnʼŋ Babilↄn eci wus eke ɛr ok a eci! Nyam ecʼagŋ, ɛrm ɛsɛl lele kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab, sos ɛm íŋn ↄny aŋke Nyam jɛj okʼr low ŋuŋ a eke li kok ↄny a eci!
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ekʼↄny lɛc a oc ma ↄlul lob legleg nyam ↄwl okij ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Ɛbɛn eke wɛl bʼow oc Babilↄn ɛb gbɛl a ↄwl lɛc ɛm ana, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka wɛl kʼow ɛknmʼn ij.
Lɛgŋ kaka ŋ ogŋ a wɛl kʼow irim saŋgo ↄny ɛsɛl ecʼɛj, ɛj ɛgŋ ɛsɛl, kete afl ɛsɛl, krↄkr afl ɛsɛl e lebl ij. Wɛl kʼow ɛŋnm mɛwl ɛs kaka fɛŋ ij; wɛl kʼow irim ob iny usu eci likekr ij.
Mun al a kʼow ayalm ŋ ogŋ a ij; wɛl kʼow irim ↄyↄw ɛcɛl owr owr eci sↄ́g ij. Ŋ eci án ↄlu a ↄny any akm wus na nimum ecʼa, ɛtŋ ŋ eci cam owi ab ɛm, irmn ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ a.»
Babilↄn yogŋ anake kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl, Nyam ecʼagŋ a lele wus na nimum ecʼagŋ a fɛŋ eke wɛl ibi ab ab eci mebl a ok es a.
Low na bʼoc es a, afr mʼiri lebl tuↄtuↄ nyam ekʼot agŋ nↄnↄ eci likekr es, ke am dad ɛsɛ: «Lili! Lili! Kↄklmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ! Aŋke es eb ɛlu, anygbɛl lele lɛc fɛŋ ab a el ɛy e Nyam a eci!

In eci jɛj ok owi a fɛŋ bʼel nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab! Ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, lʼↄb facyↄw gbɛl a eke bʼↄny wus ecʼagŋ a ok in eci nfaci ij owi ɛm a low. Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a eke lʼibi a, Nyam kok li sↄg ow e labm.»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -nʼam dad -lʼɛsɛ: «Lili! Lili! Kↄklmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ! Ɛb gbɛl a eke wɛl ɛtul a eci mregbn a am il godo godo fɛŋ eci!»
Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a lele mindey yar ab ab ok ↄwrↄkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋ Nyam eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a nuŋ, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: «Amɛn! Lili! Lili! Kↄklmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ!»
Lebl nyam anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab af am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: «Ɔny a fɛŋ a eke eel Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, ↄny eke bʼↄnyn in ecʼɛlum a, kↄklmn ɛy e Nyam a!»

Ɛmɛny mʼiri lebl ekʼot agŋ nↄnↄ eci lebl es; ow am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij eci mra eke bʼɛlu ab af, ɛsɛ nyamgbrany af. Kin lebl a ecʼodad eke am dad: «Lili! Lili! Kↄklmn Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ! Aŋke ɛy Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs sigm in ecʼes ɛw ab es!
Sʼɛ́lul sos ɛm iŋn e lili, sʼánŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, si kↄ́klmn in! Aŋke licɛbli a eci mɛbi a ecʼes gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ ow ŋ̂, in e yↄw a bɛbm sos inym es.
Nyam ↄŋʼn ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ ekʼam jɛjn eke li kʼɛw sos.» (Ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ a el Nyam ecʼagŋ a ecʼów nyim nyim a.)
Afr ɛrm ɛs a dadʼm ninɛ: «Nↄn dad ɛsɛ: Ehe él agŋ a eke wɛl ɛsŋ licɛbli a e mɛbi a ecʼes gbɛgbl ab ɛm a eci.» Ɛtŋ lʼigŋ af li dad ninɛ: «Amua, ow el Nyam ecʼodad ebl tasi.»

Mʼok ↄwrↄkp wus in ecʼakr esr a eke mi kʼigŋʼn nuŋ, kↄ li dadʼm ninɛ: «Kì kok! Ɛm yɛji, juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl a eke ij Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke ɛlu ↄkm a eci daŋku ab af. Nyam anake it eke kʼigŋ nuŋ a! Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke Jesu ij ow eci daŋku a, el kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl eci odad a eke dad a eci liy tasi.»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn afr ekʼagbr ɛm, ke gbaŋkↄ ufu nyam ɛy ↄkm. Ɛgŋ a ekʼuyu gbaŋkↄ ab af a, wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn Nɛny Nyam Ij Ɛs lele Low Nawrɛ Ɛs ab; in e jɛj ok a lele ar ogŋ ab ab bʼel nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci.
In ecʼanyamn a am iri ɛsɛ al af, ɛtŋ es ɛw eci tufɛ nↄnↄ anŋʼn nuŋ. Wɛl nↄn nin nyam in af ekʼɛgŋ kaka uwm ow e low any, ekʼow elm in sↄny coco cɛ.
In eci mob af ɛw a eke li sus a el mebl ↄfr. Ɛgŋ a wɛl bʼɛsŋʼn Nyam Odad.
Afr eci ar ɛsɛl a sus mob efu fuɛfuɛ ekʼayl ɛtŋ uyu sigbaŋkↄ efu af am usʼr jam.

Lab ler ɛm fufu nyam ɛyʼr ↄkm nɛnym agŋ ecʼↄr eci. Li bʼow ni nyimn wɛl lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ li bʼow li yɛgm Nyam Abusu Ɛs ecʼɛrm bebl ligbɛl a. Li bʼow lʼifi wɛl es lɛc ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl bʼifi viny ey es es ifir ob ɛm ab af.
Kin nin a eke wɛl nↄn in e mob af ɛw ab af lele in eci im ab ab af a: “Ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ecʼƐb Ebu lele kↄtↄkↄ ɛm e Kↄtↄkↄ ab.”
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ekʼigb inym es ligbn ab ɛm. Nʼam ɛlu lebl tuↄtuↄ lʼɛsŋ ↄr a fɛŋ eke bʼigb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a lʼɛsɛ: «Òwr, àsr luku Nyam eci ob ij gbɛl a eci!

Òwr ijr ɛ́b ebu a eci megl a, ìjr srↄda eyŋ ecʼes ɛw ɛsɛl a lele ar ɛsɛl ab ab eci megl a, ìjr sigbaŋkↄ a lele ɛl ecʼaf uyu ɛsɛl ab eci megl a, ìjr agŋ fɛŋ eci megl a, ewi lele madu ab eci megl a, ìjr ey lele ɛgbɛl ab eci megl a.»
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn ndey a, mʼɛkn wus eci ɛ́b ebu a lele ɛl eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab eke as luku, eke kʼogŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkↄ af a lele in eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab ar.

Wɛl ↄny ndey a lele kokoba ↄb ɛs yadŋu a eke kok mɛny ɛwr owi eke kʼirmn agŋ a eke ↄny ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a, ke am igŋ likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a. Wɛl ↄny ndey a lele kokoba ↄb ɛs yadŋu ab ab ow ↄwl mebn eke ler faf es am iri al ab ɛm.
Lab ler ɛm a eke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkↄ ab af a e nɛnym am ɛy ↄkm a, ibi ɛl eci ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ɛtŋ ↄr a fɛŋ am ij ɛl e megl a.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ekʼanŋ afr am us es. Nʼↄnym nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a eci safuɛ a lele ŋgbraka ligbɛl nyam ab.

Nʼↄny tamranji a, lorŋn sig a ekʼel agn oglog Satan a, lʼok ow ŋgbraka ɛtŋ lʼoc lʼↄwl ow nↄmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm akpo fandi eci. Lʼabl nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a safuɛ ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke tamranji a kʼírmnm ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ a toŋ ke akpo fandi a ɛc ok es. Ow bʼow uwr a, ow it ke wɛl ɛ́luʼl es lɛgŋ tɛl eci.

Nʼↄny tamranji a, lorŋn sig a ekʼel agn oglog Satan a, lʼok ow ŋgbraka ɛtŋ lʼoc lʼↄwl ow nↄmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm akpo fandi eci. Lʼabl nↄmu croŋ gbɛl a safuɛ ɛm yecʼɛtŋ ke tamranji a kʼírmnm ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ a toŋ ke akpo fandi a ɛc ok es. Ow bʼow uwr a, ow it ke wɛl ɛ́luʼl es lɛgŋ tɛl eci.

Ɛmɛny mʼɛkn atufu mɛkpn: agŋ a eke ok es af a ɛŋn abusu eke ki jɛj agŋ e low ok. Mʼɛkn agŋ a eke wɛl ibi a yɛji eci abŋ a; wɛl ibi ɛl Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ekʼɛlu ↄkm a lele Nyam odad ab ab eci daŋku eke -lʼijr a sosiɛm. -Lʼigŋm ndey a nuŋ, -lʼigŋm ow eci likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ, ɛtŋ -nʼɛŋnm ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr, -nʼɛŋnm ow anm ɛl abu af yɛji. -Lʼigb luw ɛm ɛtŋ Krist ab -lʼɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi.
Na krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ana. Agŋ ɛjecʼa eke uw a kʼow igbm luw ɛm eke akpo fandi a kʼɛcm kʼokm es.
Ehe él agŋ a eke anŋ krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ɛm a! -Lʼel Nyam eci agŋ lala ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci luw a ↄnym abusu ɛl af;
-li bʼow -lʼel Nyam lele Krist ab eci egb waw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ Krist ab -li bʼow -lʼɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi a.
Lɛgŋ a eke akpo fandi a bʼow ɛc ok es a, wɛl bʼow ɛlu Satan es sobel ɛm,
ɛtŋ li bʼow nʼim lʼɛju ɛb ɛb a ekʼel Gↄg lele Magↄg ab ekʼanŋ wus na eci susu kpekpe a.
Li bʼow lʼas wɛl luku ar ogŋ eci, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -nʼɛny ɛsɛ okij any eci mrici af.
-Nʼanŋ susu a fɛŋ -lʼow -lʼiwr Nyam ecʼɛb lala a eke erur ke in ecʼagŋ ir a -lʼɛlul ɛm eke -li kʼeb. Gbɛkↄ al bʼow anŋ afr ow ŋuŋn ɛl.
Ɛtŋ agn eke bʼɛju ɛl a, wɛl bʼow oc ↄwlʼl mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm, yogŋ a eke ndey a lele kokoba ↄb ɛs yadŋu ab ab anŋ a. -Li bʼow -lʼij gbre nↄnↄ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab godo godo fɛŋ eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn atufu lɛkpn ufu nyam lele ɛgŋ a eke sig es af ab ab. Wus lele afr ab kpabʼr es lís im kpekpe ɛtŋ wɛl ɛwlm ɛknm ɛl ij.
Ɛmɛny mʼɛkn agŋ ekʼuw a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, eke inym es atufu lɛkpn a ecʼany af. Silɛl nↄnↄ fifig ok es, ɛtŋ lɛl ɛjeci nyam yɛji fig ɛru es, ke sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ana.
Agŋ a ekʼuw a, wɛl jɛj ɛl e lís e low ok low a eke -li kokr ab ɛm, yecʼa eke wɛl nↄn anŋ silɛl ab ɛm a.
Okij ɛlu agŋ a ekʼuw ke nʼↄnym ab a es. Luw lele ↄŋnes baŋn ab yɛji ok ɛl ecʼagŋ a ekʼuw ke -nʼↄnymn ab a es, ɛtŋ wɛl jɛj ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e lís e low ok in e juma a eke li kok ab ɛm.
Wɛl itr luw lele ↄŋnes baŋn ab ok al a eke faf es ab ɛm. Al na eke faf es a el luw sakp yony ɛm a.
Wɛl bʼoc ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl nↄnm in e nin sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ɛm a ↄwl al a eke faf es ab ɛm.
Ɛmɛny mʼɛkn afr owr nyam lele wus owr nyam ab; krɛkrɛ ecʼafr a lele krɛkrɛ eci wus ab ab irm ɛtŋ okij a yɛji anm ij.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mʼɛkn Jerusalɛm owr a, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ↄŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a. Li bɛbm sos ɛsɛ yↄw eke kpɛkp sos eke kʼim ↄbr ɛc af.

Mʼiri lebl tuↄtuↄ nyam ekʼanŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: «Sica Nyam ecʼɛb ir usu a ow agŋ ecʼaraŋn! Li bʼow lʼir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼel Nyam ecʼagŋ. Nyam in obi bʼow anŋ ɛl ab ɛtŋ li bʼow lʼel wɛl e Nyam.
Li bʼow li tɛtŋ wɛl e mikŋ a fɛŋ es; luw owi, niŋn owi, likekr owi lele gbre ij owi ab kʼow anm ij. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm ecʼów a fɛŋ ot es ŋ̂.»
Ɛtŋ sica ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a dad ninɛ: «Sica mʼam ↄŋ ów a fɛŋ itŋn el owr.» Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lʼigŋ af li dad ninɛ: «Nↄn low na aŋke ɛm eci sodad a el nawrɛ, wɛl ↄtu eke kʼↄny ↄmn ow ɛm.»
Ɛmɛny lʼigŋ af li dad ninɛ: «Sica fɛŋ uwr ŋ̂! Mʼel Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab. Ɛgŋ yecʼeke mijamn am ↄny a, mi bʼow mʼↄŋʼn mij ewl mij a eke bʼↄŋ ɛgŋ sel a ↄfr ɛm lʼɛgŋ.
Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bʼow eb any a, bʼow ɛŋn aja ikŋ na; mʼow mʼel in e Nyam ɛtŋ in li bʼow lʼel ɛm ecʼiy.

Érŋnu, ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, agŋ eŋuŋ, agŋ ibiu, afacu, cam kok ɛsɛl, agŋ a eke bʼigŋ sɛkp nuŋ lele ayadŋu fɛŋ ab ecʼa, ɛl ecʼusu bʼow anŋ mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm. Ke luw sakp yony ɛm ab ana.»
Sica mʼɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lↄbŋ a, eke ↄnym kpↄk lↄbŋ a eke abu ɛyr es abal el lↄbŋ a anŋ ɛm a eci nyam. Lʼow nʼam dadʼm lʼɛsɛ: «Òw, mi bʼow mi yɛgmʼŋ yↄw ɛc a, licɛbli a eci yↄw a.»
Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a ocʼm im lafɛny gege ligbɛl nyam eci nuŋ af. Li yɛgmʼm Jerusalɛm, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ↄŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a.
Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a am ↄŋ li jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn mamn af, ɛsɛ jasp eci lebn eke bʼɛkan es af.
Nʼↄny lakp sisil gege nyam eke ↄny masany lɛw yony lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony ekʼam ↄsu ab. Masany ab af a, wɛl nↄn Israɛl ecʼeb lɛw yony a ecʼen a anŋ.
Baŋn ecʼogog nyam nyam fɛŋ bʼↄny masany nyahan: nyahan bʼanŋ yogŋ eke ligbn bʼigb a, nyahan bʼanŋ yogŋ eke ligbn bʼɛru a, nyahan bʼanŋ afr ogog a, ɛtŋ nyahan bʼanŋ esr ɛm a.
Baŋn a eci lakp a sigr mób lɛw yony eke wɛl ok ↄmu ɛm, ɛtŋ af yogŋ, wɛl nↄn licɛbli a ecʼɛrm ɛsɛl a ecʼen a.
Afr ɛrm ɛs a eke am dadʼm odad a ↄnym ob bɛbmn ob ab, sika ɛm eci likŋ soŋni eke ki bɛbmn baŋn a, in eci masany a lele in eci lakp ab ab.
Baŋn a eci ogog yar a bɛbmn; sↄfu a lele es ar ab ab bɛbmn. Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in eci sika ɛm likŋ soŋni a bɛbmn baŋn a; ow ij sↄfu fandi lɛw yony,
es ar a, sigb a lele sↄfu ab ab bɛbmn.
Li bɛbmn lakp a yɛji. Ob bɛbmn ob a eke lʼoc li bɛbmn ab ɛm, nʼɛŋn sigb a eci sↄfu a ekŋ lↄbŋ miy yar,
wɛl awŋ lakp a jasp ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛb a in obi a wɛl usʼr sika tasi ɛm ɛtŋ ow bʼayl ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ af.
Mób a eke wɛl ok ↄmu ɛm awŋ baŋn a eci lakp a, wɛl ot mebn amamn ekʼↄny mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ijr mɛwl: krɛkrɛ eci lob a jasp ɛm, yony ɛm ecʼa safir ɛm, nyahan ɛm ecʼa agat ɛm, yar ɛm ecʼa emerod ɛm,

yen ɛm ecʼa onis ɛm, nↄhↄn ɛm ecʼa sarduan ɛm, lↄbŋ ɛm ecʼa krisolit ɛm, niwn ɛm ecʼa beril ɛm, libarm ɛm ecʼa topas ɛm, lɛw ɛm ecʼa krisopras ɛm, lɛw nyam ɛm ecʼa turkuas ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛw yony ɛm ecʼa ametis ɛm.
Masany lɛw yony a el ayrɛ lɛw yony; lisany nyam eci kok ɛm a, wɛl bʼoc ayrɛ ligbɛl nyam coco. Ɛjɛm a el sika tasi ↄfr eke ayl am ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ af.
Mʼɛknm Nyamel ɛb ab ɛm, aŋke ɛb a eci Nyamel a el Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam Abusu Ɛs lele licɛbli ab ab.
Ɛb a ↄlm ligbn es, ↄlm awl es eke kʼayal il, aŋke Nyam ecʼanygbɛl a am ayal il ɛtŋ licɛbli a el in eci mun al.
Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ecʼagŋ a bʼow an es in eci usuayl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus eci ɛ́b ebu a bʼow ot ɛl eci ob ↄny a ow yogŋ.
Lɛgŋ owr nimum a, baŋn a eci masany a bʼow fifig ok es; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl kʼow bablm, aŋke yogŋ lɛgŋ uk kʼow anm ij.
Wɛl bʼow ot ɛb ɛb a eci sagb a lele ob ↄny ab ab ow yogŋ.
Ob fɛŋ eke aylm Nyam ecʼany af lele agŋ eke bi kok musue owi ke bʼↄny yadŋ a kʼow okm baŋn a. Agŋ a sↄny coco a eke bʼow ok ɛm a el, ɛl a eke wɛl nↄn ɛl ecʼen licɛbli a eci sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.

Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a yɛgmʼm sel ɛŋn eci mij ewl mij ekʼam jɛjn ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ af, ke anŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab ecʼatufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am jɛjn ok ↄkm ewl im ɛb a ecʼusu araŋn a. Mij a ecʼál yony a eke ok a ecʼaraŋn a, sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a anŋ. Lakpo nyam af a, li bʼↄsu ey sakp lɛw yony, awl nyam akp nyam. In eci suw a bʼewlm ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ a.

Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a yɛgmʼm sel ɛŋn eci mij ewl mij ekʼam jɛjn ɛsɛ akrↄŋnↄ af, ke anŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab ecʼatufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am jɛjn ok ↄkm ewl im ɛb a ecʼusu araŋn a. Mij a ecʼál yony a eke ok a ecʼaraŋn a, sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a anŋ. Lakpo nyam af a, li bʼↄsu ey sakp lɛw yony, awl nyam akp nyam. In eci suw a bʼewlm ɛb ɛb ecʼagŋ a.
Ofn owi kaka kʼow anm ij.
Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab eci atufu lɛkpn a bʼow anŋ ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a bʼow igŋʼn nuŋ.
-Li bʼow -lʼɛkn ow ecʼany a, ɛtŋ ow eci nin a bʼow nↄn ɛl ecʼanyafr a.
Lɛgŋ uk kʼow anm ij, ɛtŋ -li kʼow -lʼibramn mun al ecʼusuayl a lele ligbn ecʼab ab, aŋke Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam in obi li bʼow lʼok wɛl in ecʼusuayl ab af, ɛtŋ -li bʼow -lʼel es ɛw ɛsɛl godo godo fɛŋ eci.

Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dadʼm ninɛ: «Sodad amua el nawrɛ, wɛl ↄtu eke kʼↄny ↄmn ow ɛm; ɛtŋ Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Nyam a eke bi nyimn kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl eci abŋ a, ɛrm in ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs ow yecʼɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm in e juma kok ɛsɛl a low eke bʼow ɛy lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm a.»
Jesu dad ninɛ: «Ìri, ow kʼow ibnm mʼow mʼow! Ehe él agŋ a eke bʼoc kokoba ↄb e sodad ekʼanŋ lɛl na ɛm a sɛnyn sɛnyn a eci!»
Ɛm Jan, mʼiri ɛtŋ mʼɛkn ów amua. Ɛtŋ eke mʼiri ke mʼɛkn a, mʼok ↄwrↄkp wus afr ɛrm ɛs a eke yɛgmʼm ów amua a ecʼany af eke mi kʼigŋʼn nuŋ.

Gbɛkↄ li dadʼm ninɛ: «Kì kok ɛbɛn! Ɛm yɛji juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl kokoba ↄb ɛsɛl ab af, ɛsɛ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bʼoc lɛl na ɛm eci sodad a sɛnyn sɛnyn ab af. Nyam anake it eke kʼigŋ nuŋ a, kↄ ow elm ɛm!»
Ɛmɛny li dadʼm ninɛ: «Kokoba ↄb e sodad ekʼanŋ lɛl na ɛm a, kʼòc ki lↄl es, aŋke ów amua fɛŋ eci sɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ok es a titm.
Ke ɛgŋ eke akplm a, nʼánŋ in ecʼakplm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke aylm Nyam ecʼany af a, nʼánŋ in ecʼaylm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, nʼánŋ low mamn kok ab ɛm; ɛgŋ ekʼel lala a, nʼánŋ lala el ab ɛm.»
Jesu dad ninɛ: «Kin, ɛm ecʼow ibnm ij! Mi bʼow mʼism ob ap ab, ɛtŋ mi bʼow mʼↄŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ, juma a eke li kok a eci.
Mʼel Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, mʼel Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Kpↄkpↄ lele Uwar ab.»
Ehe él agŋ a eke am ɛfn ɛl ecʼob sos ɛw es eke kʼɛŋn abusu ij sel ɛŋn e likŋ a ecʼey a eci. -Li bʼow -nʼɛŋn abusu -lʼɛ́cr masany a eci -lʼok ɛb ab ɛm.
Sica baŋn a eci jam a, agŋ eŋuŋ a, cam kok ɛsɛl, afacu, agŋ ibiu, sɛkp nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl lele ayadŋu ab ecʼusu ekʼanŋ ana!
«Ɛm Jesu, mʼɛrm ɛm ecʼafr ɛrm ɛs a ow ij ów amua e daŋku Nyamel fɛŋ ecʼany af. Ɛm, mʼel David ecʼeb ab ɛm eci lilaw,
ibribr eci lɛ́l ekʼam jɛjn.
Abŋ a lele yↄw a eke wɛl ɛbi ab ab am dad ɛsɛ: “Òw!” Ke ɛgŋ yecʼeke in yɛji am iri low na a dád ɛsɛ: “Òw!” Ke ɛgŋ eke mijamn am ↄny a ów; ke ɛgŋ eke am erur sel ɛŋn eci mij a, éb ↄfr ɛm.»

Ɛm, Jan, kin low eke mʼam igbl ow eci lebl ogŋ mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bʼow iri kokoba ↄb owi a ekʼanŋ lɛl na ɛm a: eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am oc low ɛjeci nyam ɛlu ɛm a, ke abu ɛyr owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl dad ow e low lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam bʼow ot ↄŋʼn.

Ɛtŋ eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am ↄny kokoba ↄb e sodad a ekʼanŋ lɛl na ɛm a ecʼob nyam oc es, ke sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a ecʼey a lele ɛb lala a eke wɛl dad ow ecʼodad lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam bʼow ↄny ocʼr es abu ɛm.
Ɛgŋ a eke ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam na ecʼasmanu a dad ninɛ: «Mʼam ow caca!» Amɛn! Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu, òw gↄŋ!
Ke sica Ɛs Kↄtↄkↄ Jesu ecʼↄwrↄ a ánŋ ↄny fɛŋ ab.
